40016017	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Simong, Yonaac medac, yoac imoc ngic dedeunac mi dedang, imocac ge kenecgagoc. Manna kurumennu kecde, yennoc imoc mekperagima edeguu dedang.
40016018	Neng ifingoc edeguba negenna, ge Petoro, anu hoc yomocac witiau kpebungtoana faibade. Nga imocngo serima nanu homecamaac nagungo naric mi hepatanggeude.
40016019	Ni kurumeng eucererenggac ki gemba geng bangecfu iwai sasawa dzegenade, imoc kurumennu ifingoc dzege dzegea fingerude. Nga ge wiac bangecfu yungecdacnade, imocngo kurumennu ifingoc yungec yungec fingerude.”
40016020	Ifi dema medacfora yeneng Yesu ye Messia, imoc ngic mong mi edeyunugecdeac deracyunuec.
40016021	Naso imohai hanahema Yesungo medacfora yofi edeyunuec, “Ni Yerusalennu kemba yudangic enarafocngina nga womonggareng enara amma mitiac negen negengngic yeneng kpendzengtoau fainuma nuhomegecde. Anu uameme harebec ammanu monggoc gborima yacbesare.” Faka imoc fingerudeac deec.
40016022	Ifi edeyunuu Petorongo Yesu ngadeau wangec kemma tembucfu namma dekpetari ammima deec, “Anutungo meficgumanu faka imocngo gearu naric mi fingecgembeso.”
40016023	Ifi deu Yesungo dzigenema Petoro yofi edeec, “Satang, ngadenau hakenna, ni memanunadeac negennec. Ge wiac negennec, imoc Anutuarunac kpac, imocngo ine ngicac negen negeng ande.”
40016024	Ifi dema medacfora yofi edeyunuec, “Mong ye ni modacnubeso negendeu ye yengena ubasebiaac songo memama mariponga miacma tofohoma modacnubeso.
40016025	Ngic mong ye kekeha segereudeac negemma uaya mekecde, ye kekeha sufumiude. Nga mong ye neac amma kekeha waude, ye kekeha fingecmiude.
40016026	Imocac amma ngic mong ye bangectoa bangec yomocac finac sasawa meficgema yengena kekeha ukuu sufuude, wiac imocngo memefihagoc naric mi anude. Amma mong ye kekeha monggoc meudeac negenside, ye imoc bummemeac osiude.
40016027	Nga Ngicac Medacngo Mamaarunac kuc nga kibikperagiagoc angerofora yenigoc hama ngicngac sasawa angammemengina angandae, imocac sirihau turunga kpouyemmebesande.
40016028	Foracngoc, ngic yomoc nandae, ngenearunac goa mi homemagec Ngicac Medacngo eucererengagoc hau kicnginango hembesandae.”
40017001	Uameme 6 wisickemanu Yesungo Petoro nga Yakobo amma munea Yohane hesicyunuu tikitoa herea monnu emma tembucngina kecgec.
40017002	Ihai kecmagec Yesuac sebia kicnginau heimerenec. Heimerenu kicmesuya imoc wenac isoc anec nga ngakpikporuha imoc kongac kpema ama meaiu kperagia fingecande, ifi isoc anec.
40017003	Ifi ammanu Mose nga Eria yereng imohaingoc fingecyemmema yegoc denegeng anoc.
40017004	Nga Petorongo Yesuac deec, “Kebu, nenang yei kecni songea andeac ge negenna naric anu bedzo bedzo harebec meba. Geac mong nga Moseac mong amma Eriaac mong.”
40017005	Anu Petorongo ifi denammanungoc hoeng mong kperagiagocngo mama semeyunumanu hoeng manaunac yoacudumeng mong yofi kpacma deec, “Yomoc neac Songomedacna, ye hensongo ammiduae. Ngeni yeac yoac negembisia.”
40017006	Nga medac yeni imoc negemma kengec ebiria amma bangecfu makpema kicmesungina sufugec.
40017007	Ifi anggec Yesungo yenearu kemma midiyunuma yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni yacgec, kengec mi anggec.”
40017008	ifi deu yeni kicngina fima ngic mong mi henggec, yeni Yesu yengenasac nanu henggec.
40017009	Anu tikiunac mama Yesungo deracyunuma yofi deec, “Ngeni onga hendau, imocac ngic mong mi edeyunubisia. Kecma Ngicac Medacngo homecfunac gborima yaruguc ine edeyunubisia.”
40017010	ifi deu medacfora yeneng kpesimigec, “Mitiac negen negengngic yeni dafiac Eriango waraima haudeac deandae?”
40017011	ifi degec yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Eriango warai hama wiac sasawa memengere anudenoc.”
40017012	Ni yofi edengunuba negenggec, “Eria ye bic hau yeni mi hensima yenang songo modacma faka hania hania ammigec. Nga yeni Ngicac Medac ifingoc kpendzennu faigec kpendzeng kpeude.”
40017013	Ifi deu medac yeni Yohane dokunadzicac deec, imoc bic irickegec.
40017014	Anu yeni tikiunac mama habutoa yenearu kensikemagec ngic mongngo Yesuaru hama fafoc heimima deec,
40017015	“Kebu, ge medacnaac ubaga manganeu. Ye afonasoya hau kpendzeng ebiria kpema naso homac gerecfu nga dokuu kemeande.
40017016	Nga medacna geac medacfocga yenearu mekemba yeneng ye mengeregecdeac obohoma wadau.”
40017017	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngicngacareng yomoc ngeni negen negensingngina kpac yombong amma ngeni fakangina sicsauha. Ni naso herea ngenigoc monggoc tacbadeac modzona tide. Ngeni medac nearu mehagec.”
40017018	Deu mehagec Yesungo hadehade ngabayoac seria edeu ye medac imoc wama kenec. Kenu naso imohaingoc medac imoc ngereec.
40017019	Ifi anu medacfora yeneng Yesuaru hama tembucngina tacma kpesimigec, “Neni dafiac hadehade imoc kporacbibieding?”
40017020	Kpesimigec Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Foracngoc, ngeni negen negensingngina kapianecsac fedeac obohoma wadau. Ngeni negen negensingngina mastet gbomea isoc fengemmeu debac ngeni tiki yomoc naric edegecde, ‘Tiki, ge yomohacnac yacma edimoc kenna.’ Ifi edegec ye kenude. Nga ngeni wiac monggac naric mi obohogecde.
40017021	Hadehade ifia yakasege kecma nunumungosac kporacbesonga.”
40017022	Yesu nga medacfora yeni yenahafoc Gariraia bangecfu kpedzucnema kecmagec yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic yeneng Ngicac Medac kererema ngicngac yeneac mariu faigecde, imocac naso wegenede.
40017023	Faigec yeneng ye mema kpegec homeude. Homema uameme harebec ammanu homecfunac monggoc gborima yarude.” ifi deu yeni ubaebic kuneng megec.
40017024	Anu Kafanaung taonnu kensikemagec Anutuac womonggac takesimemengic yeneng Petoroaru hama kpesimigec, “Ngeneac kpoukpou ye womonggac takesi faiande me kpac?”
40017025	ifi degec Petorongo deec, “Oc, faiande.” Ifi dema amau emma yoac mi demanu Yesungo kpesimiec, “Simong, ge dafi negennec, bangeha bangeha ngictaungina, yeni takesi meracarunac meandae? Yeni yenang medacfocngina, yenearunac me ngicngac goa yenearunac meandae?”
40017026	Kpesimiu deec, “Yeni ngicngac goa yenearunac meandae.” ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ifiac amma medacfora yeni takesi mi faifai eng kecgecde.
40017027	Nga yeni neranggac negemmangang mi anggecdeac amma geng ine dzohong tegiau kemma kondungyang memeac hawic mong ukuna. Ukuma kondungyang waraima menade, imocac enara mekpacgema silwadzo mong meficgenade. Meficgema dzo imoc mema neac nga geangga kpacfu takesimemengic yemmebesena.”
40018001	Naso imohai medac yeneng Yesuaru hama kpesimigec, “Kurumenggac eucerereng, imocac arennu merang kuneng kecde?”
40018002	Ifi kpesimigec Yesungo nambarac yenearunac mong kparec. Kparu kenu ye botucnginau faiu nanu yofi deec,
40018003	“Foracngoc, ngeni ubangina mi merenggecde amma nambarac yeni isoc mi anggecdeu kurumenggac eucererennu naric mi enggecde.
40018004	Imocac ngic mong ye memaemema medac yofia, yeac siricfu kefude, yeng kurumenggac eucererennu kuneng kefude.
40018005	Nga mong ye nambarac yenearunac mong yofia neac kpacfu hoanggeude, yeng ni hoannuude.
40018006	Nga nambarac kapia yenearunac mong ni negensinnude, ye mongngo ngombonggeu sing segeudeu faka yomocngo yearu ngereebac. Ye yagucnoc dzamandzingtoa ubiau ubahemima kondung keme kemeau ukugec kemebac.
40018007	Bangectoa bangec yomocac ngic manganaac ngombonggema ogofocngina kopocsicfu faiyunuandae, yeni sowecnginagoc. Nga faka imoc fingerude nga fingecbesande, amma ngic mong ye faka imoc fingerudeac ngombonggeude, ye ebihagoc.
40018008	Ge haniga me mariga mongngo anggenu kopocsic meficgenadeu geng imoc herecgema ukuna kembeso. Hanimariga hafoangoc kecma gerec wisic wisickea kpac, imohai ukugugec kemebanggac, hani mangang me hanimariga tegec tegera kecma kekecseriu ennade, imoc ine ngereeude.
40018009	Me kicga mongngo anggenu kopocsic meficgenadeu geng kicga meickema ukuna kembeso. Ge kicga yohockanggoc kecma hofeac gerecfu ukugugec kemebanggac kicga nobohagocsac kecma kekecseriu embesannec, imoc naric anude.
40018010	Ngeni nambarac kapia, yenearunac mong ubango mi ukubisia. Ni edengunuba negenggec, nambarac yeneac angerofocngina kurumennu kecdae, yeni nasosoc Manna kurumennu kecde, yeac kicmesuya hengkecdae.
40018011	Nga Ngicac Medacngo ngicngac sufu sufuya, yeni ebicfunac kpedzucyunuma meyunuudeac maec.
40018012	Ngic mong ye ramafora 100 mekecde, imohacnac mong kemma sufuu yofi anude. Ye ramafora 99 tikiu wayunuu nanggec kemma sufudacmoc, imocnoc hoforude.
40018013	Hofockecma meficgema yeac ubangerec kuneng negenude. Nga 99 mi sufugec, yeneac ubangerec negengande, imoc ferahema sufuec, yeac ubangerec kuneng negenude, imoc fora yombong.
40018014	Nga Mangngina kurumennu kecde, yeng ifi isocngoc areng kapia yomoc, yenearunac mongngo mi sufuudeac negemma kecde.
40018015	Ogoga mongngo gearu kopocsic meficgeudeu ge kenna yegoc tembucngira tacma imoc deficgemina. Nga yeng yoacga negenudeu ge firang anna ye geac ogoga monggoc anude.
40018016	Nga ye yoacga mi negenudeu geng ine ngic mocgu me yohockang meyuruna ngenahafoc ebic imoc mengeregecdeac tacbisia. Ifi amma ngic yohockang me harebec dede sasawa demeseri ambisia.
40018017	Nga ye yoacngina mi negenudeu ngeni ine kemma kpebung edeyunubisia. Edeyunugec yeng kpebung yeneac yoac ifingoc waudeu ine ngic imoc henggec ye ngic Anutu mi negemmidae nga takesimemengic, yeni isoc ambeso.
40018018	Foracngoc, ngeni bangecfu wiac sasawa dzegegecde, imoc kurumennu ifingoc dzege dzegea feude. Nga ngeni bangecfu wiac yungecdacgecde, imoc kurumennu ifingoc yungec yungera feude.
40018019	Imoc yofiac, yei bangecfu ngicngac yohockang me harebecngo neac kpacfu kpeturanggema tacgecdeu ni botucnginau kecbade. Imocac ngenearunac yohockangngo uba mocgu amma wiac monggac me monggac kpesiecdeu Manna kurumennu kecde, yeng negengngecmema imoc ngemerude.”
40018021	Anu Petorongo Yesuaru hama kpesimiec, “Kebu, ogonango nearu kopocsic meficgeudeu naso dafiguc kopocsiha wabadeac negennec? Atac 7 soha ande me?”
40018022	ifi deu Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Atac 7 kpac, atac 70 namma ende imocac deduae.
40018023	Imocac kurumenggac eucerereng imoc ngictau mong ngic homac mingingngina kefec, ye isoc. Nga yeng wanacngic yeni yearu turungngina kpougecdeac nasoya faiec.
40018024	Faiu hagec turungnginaac ising ising ua hanaheu ngic mong ye turunga kifa 150 tausenggac uabung, imocacsoc feec, ngic imoc yearu mehagec.
40018025	Nga ye turunga imoc kpouudeac obohoma minginango edeu yengena nga enemmedacfora minging monggaru sueyunuma wiara sasawa suedacma, imocngo dzo kirecgeu turung imoc kpac anudeac deec.
40018026	Ifi deu wanacngic ye imoc negemma minginaac kicfu makpema deec, ‘Kunenna, ge neac ubaga manganeu tomaina kecmana turunna kpoudacbade.’
40018027	Ifi deu minginango yeac ubea manganeu yoara nga turunga momoc waec.
40018028	Anu wanacngic ye ngadeau kemeec. Kemema ine wanacngic ogea mong yearu turunga uameme 100ac uabung feec, ye meficgeec. Meficgema ye mendanggema ubea mendzicma deec, ‘Neac turunna gearu fede, imoc bic kpounendacna.’
40018029	Ifi deu wanacngic ogeango imoc negemma yeac kicfu makpema desambic ammima deec, ‘Ge neacnec ubaga manganeu tomai kecmana turungga imoc ngade kpoubade.’
40018030	ifi deu ogeango yeac yoac wama turunga kpoudacmaguc maudeac mekemma witicamau faiu tarec.
40018031	Taru wanacngic ogofocngira yeneng faka imoc hemma ubangina homac manganeu negenggec naric mi anec. Nga yeni kemma faka fingerec, imoc sasawa mingingngina edegec.
40018032	Edegec mingingnginango wanacngic imoc deu hau edeec, ‘Ge wanacngic mangac manganea. Geng desambic anenna turungga sasawa wadua.
40018033	Nga neng geac ubana manganeu turungga wadua, ge ifi isoc wanacngic ogogaac ubaga ifingoc manganeu turunga wabanggacsoc.’
40018034	Ifi dema minginango herebu negemma ngaba ammima witicamagareng yeneac mariu faiec. Faiu wanacngic ye turung imoc sasawa kpoudacmaguc maudeac deec.
40018035	Anu ngeni sasawango ogofocngina tembuc tembuc yeneac kopocsic ubaherenginango yombong mi wagecdeu Manna kurumennu kecde, yeng siriha ifingoc ngeni angemmeude.”
40019001	Yesungo yoac imoc dedaru wisickeu Gariraia bangec wama Yudaia bangecfu Yodang nobocgengau kenec.
40019002	Kenu ngicngac habutoa kuneng yombong ye modacgec yeng ngicngac hafeinginagoc mengereyunuec.
40019003	Anu farisaio yeneng yearu hama faitobannu faigecdeac kpesimigec, “Ngic ye enema wiac hania haniaac amma waude, singngo imoc dede me?”
40019004	Ifi degec Yesungo meremma yofi edeyunuec, “Fingec fingec minginango hanahema deu ngic nga ngac anecde, ifi meficyuruec. Ngeni imocnoc osonegeng angandae.
40019005	Ye meficyuruma yofi deec, ‘Imocac amma ngic ye nonggomama wayuruma enemaaru kpeketaheu yegoc sebi mocgu anecde.’
40019006	Ifi anecdeac yeri yohockang monggoc mi andape, kpac. Yeri sebi mocgu anecdeac yofi ande, Anutungo wiac dzegeec, imoc ngicngo naric mi herecgebeso.”
40019007	Deu degec, “Nga dafiac Mosengo dedeseri yofi nemmeec, ngic mongngo ngac wawa kibi ohoma ngac miu ngac ye wau kembeso?”
40019008	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngeni ngic ubaseri nga herengina dzege dzegea, imocac Mosengo enengfocngina wayunugecdeac kpae mi heiec. Nga hanac hanaheaunac ereec sing ifia mong mi feec.
40019009	Ni ine yofi edengunuba, ngic mongngo enema serofaka mi ammanu ye eng wama ngac mong meude, ngic imocngo serofaka anude.”
40019010	Ifi deu negemma medacfora yeneng degec, “Eweeneng yereac botucfu faka ifia fedeu eweeneng kekec kecnide, imoc gombunga yombong kpac.”
40019011	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Yoac yomoc goa yenearu mi heiude. Yoac imoc ngic yemmeyemmea yenearusac heiude.
40019012	Ngic goa yeni nonggo heremanaunac kufing fingecgec. Nga goa yeni ngicngo faka ayemmegec kufing anggec amma ngic goa yeni kurumeng eucererenggac amma kufing isoc kecandae. Ngic mong ye yoac imoc yearu heide, yeng imoc mebeso.”
40019013	Anu ngicngac yeneng nambaracfocngina kapiabisic Yesuaru meyunu kemma negenggec, “Yeng mariango nambarac witinginau faima numuyemmeude.” ifi anggec medacfora yeneng kpetariyemmegec.
40019014	Yesungo ine yofi deec, “Nambaracbisic bisic yeni nearu naric hagec. Ngeni kpae mi heiyemmegec. Kurumenggac eucerereng imoc nambaracbisic bisic yofia yeneac.”
40019015	Ifi dema maria witinginau faima kenecyunuu wisickeu ye amabangec imoc wama monnu kenec.
40019016	Negenggec, ngic mongngo Yesuaru hama deec, “Kpoukpou, ni noc faka gombunga angkecma kekecseri mebai?”
40019017	Ifi deu yeng yofi deec, “Ge wiac gombungaac ni mi kpesinenna. Mocgungo gombunga kecde. Nga ge kekecseriu embesonga dema dedeseriyoacnina tofohobesena.”
40019018	Ifi deu deec, “Dedeseriyoac damoc tofohobadeac denec?” ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ge ngicngac mi yunuhomebesena nga kaiserofaka mi ambesena nga hamangec mi mebesena amma enacfu faifai mi ambesena.
40019019	Ge nonggomanghocga seseyurubesena amma geangga anggengande, siriha imocngoc ogofocga heresongogoc hoangyunubesena.” (Mke 20:12-16; Dser 5:17-20)
40019020	Ifi deu sebigboringic yeng deec, “Ni imoc sasawa modacanduae. Nga noc wiacac monggoc kpedadanggebade?”
40019021	Deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ge ngic dindingac hafoangoc kecbesonga negennec isoc, yofi anna. Kemma wiacga sasawa suedacma hiedzoga mema ngicngac makpekpea yemmebesena. Ifi anna kurumenggac dzofinac fingecgenu hama modacnubesena.”
40019022	Ifi deu sebigboringic ye dzofinaha homac femiecac yoac imoc negemma ubaebic mema kenec.
40019023	Kenu Yesungo medacfora yofi edeyunuec, “Foracngoc, ngic mong dzofinactoagoc, ye kurumenggac eucererennu enudeac ambibieude.
40019024	Amma monggoc deba negenggec, kamelengo bungic singau engeng, imoc ua efea nga ngic dzofinacgoc yeng Anutuac eucererennu engeng, imocngo ine uatoayagoc.”
40019025	Ifi deu medac yeneng yoac imoc negemma kpidohoma kerectegec yombong amma degec, “Ifi anu merang naric komoc kpeude?”
40019026	Ifi degec Yesungo yenemma yofi deec, “Ngic ngeni imoc obohoma wagecde nga Anutungo wiac sasawa naric meude.”
40019027	Ifi deu Petorongo deec, “Negenna, neni wiacnina sasawa wadacma modacguma kecdimbe. Imocac neni noc wiac menide?”
40019028	ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Foracngoc, kecma wiac sasawa gboria fingerude, naso imohai Ngicac Medacngo kurumenggac kuc nga kibikperagiaac ngictautatahau tarude. Nga ngic modacnuandae, ngeni ifingoc ngictautatac 12 imohai tacma Israeac kisic 12, yeneac fakangina isinggema desibesandae.
40019029	Nga ngicngac kpacnaac amma amafocngina me dacmunafocngina me nonggomangfocngina me nambaracfocngina me bangecngina wagec, ngeni sasawango wiac imocac naso 100 monggoc megecde nga kekecseringo ngeneac ambesandenoc.
40019030	Ngic warac warac kecandae, yenearunac ine homacngo ngadea anggecde nga ngadea kecdae, yenearunac homacngo warac warac anggecde.”
40020001	“Kurumenggac eucerereng imoc ngic mong amabangehagoc, siriha imocacsoc. Ye asoacngoc kemma ngic waing uayau ua megecdeac ngic yagura meyunuec.
40020002	Meyunuma uangic yagura yeni uameme mocguac dzo ifiasoc megecdeac denegeng amma uba mocgu amma sueyunuu uau kenggec.
40020003	Nga 9 kiroc ammanu waing ua minginango ngic goa kpedzaroc sobennu eng nanggec yenemma
40020004	yofi edeyunuec, ‘Ngeni ifingoc waing uanau kemma ua megec, imocac sirihau dzo ngemmebade.’
40020005	Ifi deu yeni waing uayau kenggec. Nga ye 12 kiroc nga 3 kirocfu faka imocngoc anec.
40020006	Nga 5 kiroc anu ye monggoc kemma ngic goa ifingoc eng nanggec meficyunuma yofi edeyunuec, ‘Ngeni nocac eng nanggec ama marai ande?’
40020007	Ifi deu degec, ‘Ngic mongngo uayoac mong mi denemmedac.’ Ifi degec yofi edeyunuec, ‘Ngeni ifingoc kemma neac waing uau ua mebisia.’
40020008	Ama marai anu ua minginango ua gareng yofi edeec, ‘Ge yagurangic kpacyununa hagec uaac bung yemmena. Amma ngic wisic wisickea hagec, yenearunac hanahema yemmekengkecna waraima hadau, yenearu wisickebeso.’
40020009	Ifi deu ua garengngo ngic 5 kiroc hagec, yeni hanahema ua meme mocguac bung, ifi yemmeec.
40020010	Yemmeu ngic waraima hagec yeneng negenggec, ‘Ye dzo meemma nemmeude.’ Nga ua garengngo dzo kpetea imocngoc yemmeec.
40020011	Yemmeu yeni dzo kpetea imoc hemma negenggec naric mi anu waing ua mingina
40020012	edegec, ‘Ngic yomoc yeni ngade yombong hama aua mocgusac ua medau. Nga neni ine asoacngoc hama uaac ebic hemma wenacfu namma meerekecni ama marai ande. Nga geng yenigoc siriha mocgungoc anemmedang.’
40020013	Ifi degec yeng yenearunac mong yofi edeec, ‘Ogona, ni kopocsic mong mi meficgegendua. Negenna, nerang waraima uameme mocguac dzo ifiasoc deserima uba mocgu andic.
40020014	Ge imocac dzoga mema kenna. Nga neng ine yagurangic ngade hadau yeni bung socfungoc yemmebadeac songona ande.
40020015	Ni neanna hiedzongo ifi me ifi ambesonga negemma imoc naric ambai. Amma fakana gombunga anu imocac negen negengga mi manganebeso.’
40020016	Ifi isoc ngadea yeneng warac warac anggecde nga warac warac yeneng ine ngadea anggecde.”
40020017	Yesungo medacforagoc Yerusalennu kembeso kemma sinnu tembucnginau yofi edeyunuec,
40020018	“Negendae, nenang Yerusalennu endimbe. Enni ngic yeneng Ngicac Medac womonggareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic, yeneac mariu faigecde. Faigec yeneng ye homeudeac desigecde.
40020019	Desima ye bangec monnunac ngic Anutu mi negemmidae, yeneac mariu faigecde. Faigec yeneng deendema ammima dzikacngo kpema sebia kpekperecge amma mariponnu kpegec homeude. Amma uameme harebec kemmanu homecfunac monggoc yarude.”
40020020	Anu Dzebedaioac medachora nonggongirango meyuruu Yesuaru hagec. Hama Yesu fafoc heimima deec, “Ni wiac monggac naric kpesigembai me?”
40020021	Ifi deu deec, “Ge noc wiacac anggende?” Deu edeec, “Medachocna yomoc yereng eucererenggau mongngo foigau nga mongngo kanagau tarecde imoc deserinenna.”
40020022	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngeni wiac kpesidae, imocac hania mi negenghomedae. Nga neng kpendzenggac kpakenecfu nebeso anduae, ngeri imoc neecdeac dedape me?” deu deoc, “Oc, naric nedede.”
40020023	Yeri ifi deec Yesungo yofi edeyuruec, “Ni kpendzenggac kpakenecfu nebade, ngeri imocngoc neecde. Nga ngic merang foinau me kananau tarude, imocac fora ine neng naric mi desibade. Mannango ngic tatac imohai tarecdeac bic mengereec, yereng ihai naric tarecde.”
40020024	Anu medacfora 10 yeneng imoc negemma dacmunac yereac negenggec manganeec.
40020025	Manganeu Yesungo kpacyunuu kenggec yofi edeyunuec, “Bangec monnunac ngicngac, yeneac ngictaufocngina ngicngac yeneac ngickuneng siricfu garengyunuandae. Nga ngicngac kunengfocngina yeni ngicngacfocngina yeneng yoacngina modacgecdeac kuc feyemmede, ifinoc negengandae.
40020026	Nga faka ifia ngeneac botucfu mong mi febeso, kpac. Ngicac Medacngo ngicngac yeneng yeac kingang kpegecdeac mi maec, kpac. Yeng yeneac kingang kpema ngicngac homac ebicfunac yungecyunuma kekeha wau yeneac doudeac maec. Ifi isoc ngenearunac ngic mongngo engena kecbeso ammide, yeng botucnginau kingang kpekpengina kecbeso. Nga ngeneac botucfunac warac warac ambeso ammide, yeng botucnginau wanacngicngina kecbeso.”
40020029	Yesu nga medacfora yeni Yeriko taong wama kemmagec ngicngac habutoa kuneng yombong modacyunugec.
40020030	Nga sing tegiau kicpisic ngic yohockang taroc. Tarec ngicngac yeneng degec, “Yesungo hama kende.” ifi degec yeri imoc negemma kpacma deoc, “Kebu, Dawidiac bangeha, ge nereacnec ubaga manganeu.”
40020031	Ifi kparec ngicngac habutoa yeneng waickema tarecdeac kpetariyecmegec. Nga yeri ine monggoc seriangoc kpacma deoc, “Kebu, Dawidiac bangeha, ge nereacnec ubaga manganeu.”
40020032	Kparec Yesungo namma kpacyuruma yofi deec, “Ngeri noc wiac angecmebadeac negendape?”
40020033	deu deoc, “Kebu, neri kicnira tegerudeac negendipe.”
40020034	Deec Yesungo ubea manganeu mariango kicngira kpesereu yeri imohaingoc kicngira fima ye modaroc.
40021001	Yesu nga medacfora yeni Yerusaleng mewegenema Betefage amabangec Oliwatikiu tarec, imohai kensikema Yesungo medachora yohockang yofi dema sueyuruec,
40021002	“Ngeri dindingac kemma guruama sing enarau tacde, imohai donggi mong bic meficgeecde. Ye medahagoc witickegec nande. Ngeri donggi imoc yungecyuruma nearu mehaec.
40021003	Nga ngeri ifi anec ngic mongngo ngeremma kpesingemerude isoc ngeri yofi edebesera, ‘Kebungo yerigoc ua meudeac dede.’ Ifi deec yeng donggi nonggomedac bic ngerigoc sueyuruude.”
40021004	Profete yoac mong yofi deec, imoc fora anudeac ifi fingerec.
40021005	“Ge Sionggac ngicngac yofi edeyunubesena, ‘Henggec, ngictaugnina ngenearu habesande. Ye donggi witiau tacdenoc, ye donggi medahau hade nga ye fakaya memaemeemea.’ ” (Dzek 9:9)
40021006	Nga medac yeri kemma Yesungo edeyuruec, ifi isoc anoc.
40021007	Ifi amma donggi medahagoc meyuruma hama ngakpingira herea hesima donggi nonggomedac yereac witingirau tiameoc. Tiameec Yesungo imocac witiau tarec.
40021008	Taru ngicngac habutoa nanggec, yeni ngakpingina hesima sinnu tiamegec nga goa yeni ic fawa icfunac herecgema sinnu tiamegec.
40021009	Nga ngicngac habutoa kiwau kenggec nga ngadeau modacgec, yeneng kpacma yofi degec, “Ohec waec, Dawidiac kisicfunac, ohec. Ngic Kebuac kpacfu hade, ye kenehagoc. Wi kurumennu kpara dengeregec, ohec waec, hosanna.” (Myeg 118:26)
40021010	Yesungo Yerusalennu enu taonggac ngicngac sasawa yeni kpidohoma kengha amma degec, “Imoc merac?”
40021011	Ifi degec ngicngac habutoa yeneng edeyunugec, “Imoc Yesu, profetenoc Gariraia bangecfunac Nadzarete taonnunac.”
40021012	Anu Yesungo Anutuac womonggac oda manau emma ngicngac wiac emekpesi anggec, yeni imohacnac kporacyunuec. Ye ngic hiedzo emekpesi anggec, yeneac tebo heimeremma kebesac emegec, yeneac tatac ifingoc heimeremma
40021013	yofi edeyunuec, “Yoac yofi oho ohoya fede, ‘Neac ama imoc nunumuama, kpara ifi kpacbesonga.’ (Yes 56:7) Nga ngeneng ine imoc merenggec, hamangec ngic yeneac sufu sufuama ande.” (Yer 7:11)
40021014	Anu womonggac odatoaac manau ngic kicpisic amma hanimangang yeneng yearu hagec yeng mengereyunuec.
40021015	Ye faka kuhagoc ifi meec nga nambarac yeneng womong manau kpacma yofi degec, “Dawidiac bangeha, ohec, hosanna.” Kpacgec womonggareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic yeneng imoc hemma herebu negemma
40021016	Yesuaru kemma degec, “Yeni yoac dedaemoc, imoc negennec me?” Ifi degec yeng yofi deec, “Negenduae amma ngeni yoac yomocnoc osonegeng mi angandae gedang, ‘Ge nambarac kapia nga sabac namuu kecdae uayoac yemmena yeneng geac kpac kuneng heiwayong memigecde.’ ” (Myeg 8:2)
40021017	Ifi dema wayunuma taong wama Betania amabangecfu kemma tofocnac ihai kefec.
40021018	Amma Yesungo asoac taonnu dzigene kemma hereaac homema
40021019	sing tegiau kic fima fig ic mong henec. Hemma negenu foragoc isoc anu haniau kemma mariasac hemma ic yofi edeec, “Ic, gearunac fora monggoc mi fingeckecbeso.” Ifi deu fig ic imoc imohaingoc ururueec.
40021020	Ururueu medacfora yeneng imoc hemma kpidohoma kpesimigec, “Fig ic imoc dafi bic yombong ururuede?”
40021021	Ifi dema kpesimigec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Foracngoc, ngeni negen negensingnginagoc kecma negengyohoc mi anggecdeu icfu faka medua, faka imoc naric megecde, imoc edengunuduae. Nga imocsac kpac, ngeni ifingoc tiki yomocac yofi naric degecde, ‘Tiki ge miacemema kondunnu ukuemema kemena.’ Ngeni ifi edegec, ifinoc anude.
40021022	Nga ngeni wiac monggac me monggac negensinggema nunumunginau kpesigecdeu ngeni imoc sasawa megecde.”
40021023	Yesungo ifi dema taonnu hama womonnu emma kpoukpou ua meu womonggareng enara nga yudangic enarafocngina, yeneng hama kpesimigec, “Ge noc kucfu ua yomoc menec amma merang uayoac imoc genec?”
40021024	Ifi kpesimigec yeng yofi merengyemmeec, “Neng ngeni wiac monggac ifingoc kpesingemmeba ngeni turunga edenugecdeu ni uakibinaac hania imoc edengunubade.
40021025	Yohanengo dokunadzic ua mekefec, imoc dahacnac, kurumennunac me ngicfunac?” Deu yeni yenaocngoc denegeng amma degec, “ ‘Imoc kurumennunac.’ ifi denideu yeng yofi kpesinemmeude, ‘Ifi negemma ngeni nocac ye mi negensinggegec?’
40021026	Me ‘Imoc ngicfunac.’ ifi denideu ngicngac sasawa yeni Yohaneac ye profete negendae, imocac debesonga yeneac kengecnunude.”
40021027	Yeni ifi denegeng amma Yesu edegec, “Imoc mi negendimbe.” Ifi degec Yesungo yofi deec, “Ifi degec, ni ifingoc noc uayoacac kucfu ua mekecduae, imoc mi edengunubade.”
40021028	Negenggec, “Ngic mong ye medachora yohockang nga ye waracmedahaaru kemma edeec, ‘Medacna, ge yaguc waing uau kemma ua mebesena.’
40021029	Ifi edeu medahango merenec, ‘Ni imoc waduae.’ Ifi dema ine ngade ubea dzigeneu uau kenec.
40021030	Nga manggac ye kemma ngademedaha, yeac ifingoc edeu ngademedahango deec, ‘Manggac, ni naric kembade.’ Ifi dema kemma ihoc bahoc amma uau mong mi kenec.”
40021031	Ngeni dafi negendae, “Medac yerearunac merang mamaac songo modacma uaya meec?” Ifi kpesiyemmeu degec, “Waracmedaha yeng.” degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Foracngoc, takesimeme ngic nga singtoangac yeneng waraingemmema Anutuac eucererennu enggecde.
40021032	Yohanengo sing dindingac modacma ngenearu hau ngeni ine mi negensinggegec. Nga takesimeme ngic nga singtoangac yeneng ye negensinggegec. Ngeni ine imoc henggec amma sifu ubangina mi merenggec nga mi negensinggegec.”
40021033	Ni yoac mong heiba negenggec, “Ngic mong amabangehagoc ye waing ua mong homecma oda dzegeec. Dzegema waing tidzoc tidzohoac teng usuma gareng yeneac kicfifiac amaherec meec. Ifi meu wisickeu waing ua garenggegecdeac ngic meficyunuma yenigoc yoac dedzege anggec. Nga yengenaoc ine bangec hereau kenec.
40021034	Kenu fora kpememe naso hau ye wanacngicfora sueyunuu uagareng yenearu waing fora megecdeac kenggec.
40021035	Kenggec ua gareng yeneng ine minginaac wanacngicfora meyunuma mong kpema mong kpehomema mong hocngo heigec.
40021036	Ifi anggec ua minginango wanacngic goa homac monggoc sueyunuu kenggec gareng yeneng faka imocngoc ayemmegec.
40021037	Nga ngade ua minginango yofi negemma yengena medaha sueec, ‘Yeni medacnaac ewea sifu heigecde.’
40021038	Ifi dema sueu kenu ua gareng yeneng medaha hemma yofi denegeng anggec, ‘Yeng kecma ua yomoc tiu enude, imocac ye kpehomema bangeha nga maridzominga sasawa meni nenang ambeso.’
40021039	Ifi dema miacukugec oda ngadeau kemeu mema kpehomegec.
40021040	Nga ua minginago monggoc hama uagareng dafi ayemmeude?”
40021041	Ifi deu degec, “Ua minginango hama uagareng mangana memanganeyunuma yunuhomema waing uaya imoc uagareng goa yeneac mariu faiude. Faiu yeneng imoc garenggema foranasou mingina fora migecde.”
40021042	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi deec, “Mitikibiu yoac yofi oho ohoya fede, ‘Amameme ngic yeneng hoc mong mangana dema ukugec. Nga hoc imocngo amaac hoc wotung amma seria nanude nga nambesande. Kebu yengenaoc faka imoc meu imocngo nenang kicfu wiac bibiagoc ande.’ (Myeg 118:22-23) Ngeni kibi imoc osonegeng mi angandae gedang.
40021043	Imocac amma edengunuba negenggec, Anutungo eucerereng ngenearunac meickema areng mong yemmeude. Nga yeneng eucererenggac uaya mema foraya meficgegecde.
40021044	Nga ngic mong ye hoc imocac witiau maude, ye sebia tegerude. Nga hoc imocngo yeac witiu makpema hedzameu kapuc kpeude.”
40021045	Anu Yesungo yoac heiec, imoc womonggareng enara nga farisaio yeneac deec, imoc bic negentegecgec.
40021046	Yeni ifi negenggec nga habu yeneng yeac profete degecac yeni ine Yesu mendanggegecdeac kengecyunuu osima wagec.
40022001	Yesungo yoac mong heima torokpema yofi edeyunuec,
40022002	“Kurumenggac eucerereng imoc ngictau mong isoc, ye medahaac memeturang nasoac yakatoa ohoma memengere anec.
40022003	Amma ngictaungo wanacngicfora sueyunuu yeni ngicngac memeturanggac amma bic heitaiyunuec, yeni wangecyunugecdeac kenggec. Kenggec ngicngac yeneng ine modzongina tiu wagec.
40022004	Wagec ngictaungo wanacngicfora goa monggoc sueyunuma yofi deec, ‘Ngeni kemma ngic bic heitaiyunuai, yeni edeyunugec, “Negendae, burumakana ngiwa nga yang kerectoayagoc imoc bic kpeoho amma yakatoa mengeredacdua. Ni wiac sasawa bic memockedua, imocac ngeni hagec.” ’
40022005	Ifi deu kemma edeyunugec, yeneng ine yoac monggoc hau imoc negemma modzongina tiu eng wama kengha anggec. Mong ye uayau kenec nga mongngo kpounec uayau kenec.
40022006	Nga ngicngac tosea yeneng ngictauac wanacngicfora ngaba ayemmema yunuhomegec.
40022007	Ifi anggec ngictau ye imoc negemma herebu amma wasaifora sueyunuu kemma ngickpekpengic imoc yunuma taongngina faigec dzeec.
40022008	Amma wanacngicfora yofi edeyunuec, ‘Memeturanggac yaka imoc bic mengec mengerea nga ngic heitaiyunudua, yeni areng mangana ifiango nearu hagecdeacsoc mi ande.
40022009	Imocac ngeni sing sosocfu kemma namma ngic meficyunugecdesoc, yeni edeyunugec memeturanggac amau habisia.’
40022010	Ifi deu wanacngic yeni sinnu kemma ngic meficyunugecsoc gombunga nga mangana momoc hesicyunudacma hama memeturanggac yakaama imoc mewakegec.
40022011	Anu ngicngac yeni hadacma tacgec ngictaungo yenenudeac hama ngic mong memeturanggac ngakpi mi heima tarec,
40022012	ye hemma yofi edeec, ‘Tosona, ge dafi memeturanggac ngakpi mi heima erema tacnec?’ Ifi deu ngic ye yoara kpac waickema taru
40022013	ngictaungo kingangngicfora yeneac yofi deec, ‘Ngeni hanimaria kpema ngadeau kundunnu ukugec kemeu. Ihai kiacma enara kisaranggema kecbeso.’
40022014	Ngicngac kpacyunuyunuya, yeni homac nga meisingyunuyunuya, yeneng ine efeanec.”
40022015	Anu farisaio yeneng kemma yoac dafi dema Yesu tobanggeni yoac goa segeu meni dema imocac denegeng anggec.
40022016	Ifi amma medacfocngina nga Herodeac areng goa Yesuaru sueyunugec kemma degec, “Kpoukpou, ge yoac fora dekecnec, imoc negendimbe. Nga Anutuac sing dindingac ngicngac edekpou anemmekecnec amma ngic monggac me monggac songo mi negemma engena mamea socfungoc anemmeannec.
40022017	Imocac dafi negennec, damocngo naric ande, neni takesi ngictau Sisa naric minide me kpac?”
40022018	Ifi degec Yesungo ngabasiricfu degec, imoc negemma yofi edeyunuec, “Ikocngic, ngeni nocac suba idenendae?
40022019	Ngeni takesi faiandae, imohacnac dzo mong mehagec hemba.” Ifi deu yeni denarihoc mong mekemma edzahegec
40022020	yeng imoc hemma yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Onga nga kibi yoc, imoc meracac?”
40022021	Deu degec, “Imoc Sisaac.” Ifi degec yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Imocac ngeni Sisaac wiac Sisa mibisia nga Anutuac wiac Anutu mibisia.”
40022022	Ifi deu yeni imocac negenggec engena anu wama kenggec.
40022023	Sadukaio areng yeni homecfunac yacyac mi fede, ifi dekecdae, yenearunac ngic goango wenac imohaingoc Yesuaru hama kpesimigec,
40022024	“Kpoukpou, Mosengo yofi deec, ‘Ngic mongngo ngac meec nga ye gboriha kpac kecma homeu muneango daraac hotsec mema gboric kpeficgema daraac kpac miacma kecbeso.’
40022025	Dacmunac seweng nenigoc kecgec, yenearunac waracdacnginango ngacfu kemma gboriha kpac kecma homeu muneango hotseha meec.
40022026	Meu munea nga yeac ngadeau munafora 5 kecgec, yenearu faka ifiangoc fingeru yeni sasawango homedacgec.
40022027	Homedacgec ngac ye ifingoc kecma homeec.
40022028	Ngic seweng yeni sasawango ngac yeac ewea anggec. Nga yacyac nasou ngac imoc meracac enema ambesande?”
40022029	Ifi degec Yesungo meremma yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni mitikibi nga Anutuac kuc mi negentegecdaeac yoac desufudae.
40022030	Yacyac nasou ngicngac yeni monggoc mi meemegecde amma manggac mongngo yofi mi deude, ‘Ni naroanna ngic mibade.’ Imohai ngicngac yeni ine kurumenggac angero, yeni isoc anggecde.
40022031	Nga homecfunac yacyac dema Anutungo yofi bic edengunuec,
40022032	‘Ni Abrahang nga Isaka amma Yakobo, yeneac Anutu.’ (Mke 3:6) Ngeni imoc osonegeng mi angandae gedang. Nga ye ine ngic homemea, yeneac Anutu kpac. Ye gbori kecdimbe, neneac Anutu.”
40022033	Nga ngicngac habutoa yeni kpoukpouya imoc negenggec engena anec.
40022034	Anu farisaio yeneng yoac yomoc negenggec, “Yesungo sadukaio yeneac yoac merenu yoacngina dugung kpeu engsac nanggec.” Yeni imoc negemma kpedzucnema
40022035	yeneac botucfunac dedeseriyoacac negen negengngic mongngo Yesu faitobannu faima kpesimiec,
40022036	“Kpoukpou, dedeseriyoacac manau dedeseriyoac damocngo engena yombong ande?”
40022037	Ifi kpesimiu yofi edeec, “ ‘Ge ubaherega nga ubaongaga amma negen negengga hafoangoc Kebu Anutugaac songo negemma kecbesena.’ (Dser 6:4-5)
40022038	Imocngo dedeseriyoacac warac warac nga kuneng ande.
40022039	Nga imocac ngadeau ogea yofi, ‘Ge geangga anggengande, siriha imocngoc gegoc wegenac kecdae, yeni heresongogoc hoangyunubesena.’ (Sese 19:18)
40022040	Dedeseriyoac nga profeteyoac sasawango dedeseriyoac yohockang yomocac witiau tima nandae.”
40022041	Anu farisaio yeni kpedzucnema tacmagec Yesungo yofi kpesiyemmeec,
40022042	“Ngeni Messiaac hania dafi negendae, ye meracac kisicfunac?” Kpesiu meremmigec, “Ye Dawidiac bangeha.”
40022043	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi deec, “Ifi anu Tiri Asungo dafiac Dawidiac enac meefaiu yeac ‘Neac Kebu.’ dema yofi deec,”
40022044	“ Kebungo neac Kebu edeec, ‘Ge foinaugeng tacmana ngabafocga hanigaac bageau faiyunuba yeni hanititiga ambesandae.’ ” (Myeg 110:1) Ifi deec.
40022045	Nga Dawidi yengenaoc kpara yofi kparec, “Neac Kebu. Nga Messiango dafiu Dawidiac bangeha ande?”
40022046	Ifi deu yeni Yesuac yoac turunga merembesonga obohogec. Obohoma naso imohacnac erema yeac kengec amma mongngo dekpesi monggoc mi ammigec.
40023001	Yesungo ngicngac habutoa nga medacfora yofi edeyunuec,
40023002	“Mitiac negen negengngic nga farisaio yeni Moseac tatacfu tacdaeac
40023003	yeni yoac edengunudae, ngeni imoc sasawa tofohoma modacbisia. Nga yeni faka angandae, ngeni siric ifi mi ambisia. Yeni yoac edengunuandae, imoc ine yenaoc mi modacandae.
40023004	Yeni singyoacac dede ebiria yombong dedeckema ngic ngeneac fuau faigec ebiriude. Nga yenaoc ine dede imoc meefaima meficngunugecdeac gbongnginango miacgecdeac mi ayemmeude.
40023005	Yeni ngicngo fakangina henggecdeac mitigbomea kandacbisic bisicngina meyadiandae. Amma ngakpingina herea heiandae, imohai witic kibi kibi kpatainggema nangande, imoc kuneng yombong meandae.
40023006	Yeni yakatoa nasou nga kpekpeturang amau warac warac tatacfu tacbesonga ayemmeude.
40023007	Nga kpedzaroc sobennu ngicngac yeneng ‘Wenacngerec.’ nga ‘Gareng,’ ifi dema kpacyunugecdeac homac ayemmeude.
40023008	Anu ngeni garengngina mocgungo kecde nga ngeni sasawa dacmunac andae. Imocac ngeneac negemma mongngo ‘Gareng,’ ifi mi kpacngunubeso.
40023009	Mangngina mocgungo kurumennu kecdeac amma ngeni bangecfu ngic monggac ‘Mannina,’ ifi mi debisia.
40023010	Nga kunengngina Messia mocgungo kecdeac amma ngic mongngo ‘Kunenna,’ ifi mi kpacngunubeso.
40023011	Nga kunengngina kecde, yeng ine ngeneac kingangkpekpe kecbeso.
40023012	Ngic mong ye yengenaac negenu engena angkecde, ye mamea anudeac memagecde. Nga mong ye yengenaac negenu mamea angkecde, ye meenggecde.
40023013	Mitiac negen negengngic nga farisaio, ngeni kurumeng eucererenggac nagu kpebung yeneac kicnginau heiandae. Ngeneng imohai enggecdeac segeandae nga kpebung yeneng embesonga ammagec kpae ifingoc heiyemmekecdae. Ngeni ikocfakangina ifia mekecdaeac ngeni sowecnginagoc.
40023014	Mitiac negen negengngic nga farisaio ngeni sowecnginagoc. Ngeni ngachotsec ewefocngina homemea amangina wangecyunugec engsac kecgecde. Amma ngicngac yeneng negengngeree ngemmegecdeac ngeni nunumu hereangoc numuandae. Ngeni ikocfaka ifia angandaeac turunga ebiriangoc megecde.
40023015	Mitiac negen negengngic nga farisaio, ngeni ngic mocgu dekerecyoac ammigecdeac bangeha bangeha nga kondung ferecgema kengandae. Nga yeng ngenearu torokpeu mefahegec, ye ngenang isoc hofeac nambarac amma feracngunuma kemeude. Ikocfakangina ifia mekecdaeac ngeni sowecnginagoc.
40023016	Sing edzac edzac ngic, ngeninoc kicpisic andae. Ngeni yoac yofi deandae, ‘Ngic mongngo Anutuac womong kpacma yoara deseriudeu, imoc yoac kapia. Nga mongngo womong manau gol tacde, imoc kpacma yoara deseriudeu ye yoara imoc naric mi waude.’ Ifi deandaeac ngeni sowecnginagoc.
40023017	Womongngo gol kpanggeu kpetiac anude, imoc wiac engena nga gol yengenaoc imoc wiac mamea. Ngeni kicpisic nga negen negengngina mi irec ireckea.
40023018	Amma ngeni deandae, ‘Mong ye arata kpacma yoara deseriudeu, imoc yoac kapia. Nga mongngo sese arata witiau bic faifaia, imoc kpacma yoara deseriudeu yoara imoc naric mi waude.’
40023019	Aratango sese kpanggeu kpetiac anudenoc, imocngo wiac engena nga sese yengenaoc imoc wiac mamea. Ngeni kicpisic areng.
40023020	Ngic mong ye arata kpacma yoara deseriudeu ye arata nga sese arata witiau fedacde, imoc momocngoc kpacma medarude.
40023021	Nga mong ye womong kpacma yoara deseriudeu womong yengena amma Anutu imohai kecde, ye momocngoc kpacma medarude.
40023022	Nga mong ye kurumeng kpacma yoara deseriudeu, ye Anutuac tatac nga yeng ihai mingina amma tarude, ye momocngoc medarude.
40023023	Mitiac negen negengngic nga farisaio, ngeni sowecnginagoc. Ngeni singyoac kapiabisic modacma dedeseriyoac engena, imoc ine wagecde. Ngeni ikocfakangina ifia meandae. Ngeni wiac homuna gombunga nga yakaac nga ic sogonggac homuna gombunga fingerude, imocac gbomea kapiabisic 10, imohacnac mocgu hendzicma Anutu miandae. Amma faka dindingac nga ubamangang amma negen negensingngina hafoangoc mekekec, imoc ine ihoc bahoc amma wagecde. Ngeni faka gombungngina imoc naric modacbisia amma tosea deduae, imoc ifingoc mi wabisia.
40023024	Ngeni ngicngac sing edzacyunugecdeac ua, imoc kicpisic siricfu angkecdae. Nga kurungnginau picpic hemma imoc meickema kamele ine mi hemma gbokoandae. (Sese 11:1-2, 4, 20)
40023025	Mitiac negen negengngic nga farisaio, ngeni ikocfakangina yofia mekecdaeac ngeni sowecnginagoc. Ngeni tera tasengina ngadeasac dzuacandae amma ngenang ubaherengina manau ine kickerec homac fede, imoc ngenaoc mi garengemeandae.
40023026	Ge tase teraac mana dzuacnaguc ngadea ifingoc kongac kpeude. Farisaio ngeni kicpisic.
40023027	Mitiac negen negengngic nga farisaio ngeni yofi negenggec, kicsere imoc homemea seucnginagoc nga sicngo wake wakea fede, imoc kibiagoc anudeac ngeni kicsereac simeng weroc nadzicandae. Nga ngeni ubaherenginau nga sebinginau siriha ifia amma kecdae.
40023028	Ngeni sebinginango ngickicfu dindingac isoc ande. Nga ubaherenginau ine ikocngo wake wakea amma ngeni ngenaoc dedeseriyoac kpema kecdae. Ngeni ikocfakangina ifia mekecdaeac ngeni sowecnginagoc.
40023029	Mitiac negen negengngic nga farisaio, ngeni sebiengeneng amma ikocfakangina mekecdaeac sowecnginagoc andae. Ngeni profete yeneac kicsereu simengngina meyemmema ngic dindingac simengngina kibiagoc anudeac monggoc heigborima mengereandae.
40023030	Mengerema yofi deandae, ‘Neni bangecfocnina yeneac nasou kecbing debac profete naric mi yunuhomebing nga sacngina maudeac faka yenigoc mi ambing.’
40023031	Ngeni ifi mekecma yofi dekperagiemedae, ‘Nenang ngic profete yunuhomegec, yeneac medacfocngina.’
40023032	Ngeni ifi dema bangecfocngina yeneac faka mewakema mekecgecde.
40023033	Ngeni ngenaoc boidzoc amma boidzocac medac, ngeni yoacfu turunga mema hofeu kemebauac
40023034	neng profete nga negen negengngic amma mitiac negen negengngic sueyunuba hangemmegecde. Nga ngeneng kecma yenearunac goa yunuhomegecde nga goa mariponnu yunugecde amma goa kpekpeturang amanginau dzikacngo yunuma ngaba ayemmema taong monnunac monnu kporacyunugecde nga kporacyunubesandae.
40023035	Ngeni ifi mekecma ngic dindingac yunudacgec sacngina bangecfu madarec, imocac turunga hafoangoc ngenearu feude. Imoc Abeac sacfunac hanahema erekecma Barakiaac medac Dzekaraia, yeac sacfu erede. Ngeni ye kpetiac ama nga arata botucngirau kpehomegec.
40023036	Foracngoc, faka sasawa imocac turunga, imoc areng yomoc ngenearu fingecdacbesande, imoc edengunuduae.
40023037	O, Yerusaleng, Yerusaleng, ge profete yunuhomeannec nga ngic gearu sueyunuyunuya, yeni hocngo yenereannec. Kokorec nonggeango nambaracfora kpeganga bageau foforacyunuande, ni naso homac ifi isoc nambaracfocga kpedzucyunubadeac negembare ngeneng ine imocac songo mi negenggec.
40023038	Negenggec, ngeneac amagerec imoc ngiha kpac anu kisi fingerude.
40023039	Ni edengunuba negenggec, yofinenggac hanahema ngeni monggoc mi nenggecde. Nga nang enggecdeu yofi degecde, ‘Kebuac kpacfu ngic hade, ye kenehagoc.’ ifi degecde, naso imohai ngeneng monggoc nenggecde.”
40024001	Yesungo womonnunac mamanu medacfora yeneng yearu hama womonggac mana kuneng hania hania edzahegec
40024002	yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Wiac imoc yaguc hendacdae, imoc ine ngade yofi fingerude. Foracngoc, areng mong yeneng hama imoc sasawa hembarackedacgec kendarude. Kendaru hoc mongngo monggac witiu mi wagec tacbesande.” Ifi dema
40024003	Yesungo Oliwa tikiu kemma taru medacfora tembucngina yearu kemma kpesimigec, “Ge yoac dedang imoc noc nasou fingerude? Nga naso wisic wisickea amma geangga hahanasogau noc soi fingecbesande, imoc edenununa.”
40024004	Ifi degec Yesungo meremma yofi deec, “Ngic mongngo ikocfu wangecngunubacac ngeni henghomema kecbisia.
40024005	Imoc yofiac, ngic homac yeneng hama neac kpac kpacma degecde, ‘Ni Messia.’ ifi dema ngicngac homac uba mesufu ayemmebesandae.
40024006	Nga ewekpekpetoaac siduc bangec wegenacfunac nga bangec hereaunac hau ngeni imoc negemma mi kpidohobisia. Wiac ifia fingecbeso nga nasongo imohaingoc bic mi wisickeude.
40024007	Bangec goa yeneng bangec ogofocngina yenigoc ewekpekpe anggecde. Nga ngictau monggac arengngo ngictau monggac areng yenigoc ngaba angemegecde. Nga boditoa bangec goau fingerude nga goau usoctoa mebesande.
40024008	Wiac gboria hanahema fingerudeac gadze kiande, ifi isoc ande.
40024009	Ifi fingeru ngicngac yeneng ngeni ngabafocnginaac mariu faingunugecde. Faingunugec ngaba yeneng ngunuma homecfu faingunugecde. Nga bangeha bangehaac ngicngac sasawa yeni neac kpacnaac amma ubango ukungunugecde.
40024010	Nga ngicngac homac yeni negemmangang amma wanuma yenaocngoc ogofocngina ngaba yeneac mariu faiemegecde nga ubango ukuemegecde.
40024011	Nga profete ikoha homacngo fingecma ngicngac homac ikocfu wangecyunugecde.
40024012	Singyoac wawa faka imoc yadiude imocac ngicngac homac yeneac heresongogoc negengemeeme nga hoangemefaka nomaneude.
40024013	Nga ngic mongngo serima kecmanu naso wisickeude, yeng komoc kpeude.
40024014	Nga ngicngac yeneng eucererenggac siduc gombung yomoc edeyunugec dedekperagi imoc bangec sasawa sokodaru ngicngac yeni imoc negendacmagec naso wisickebesande.
40024015	Profete Danierengo wiac mangac manganea imocac yoac warac deec, imocngo ama kpetiacfu nanu hembesandae. Ngic mong ye yoac yomoc osoude, yeng imoc negentegecbeso.
40024016	Faka imoc fingeru ngicngac Yudaia bangecfu kecdae, ngeni worama tikiu embisia.
40024017	Nga mong ye ama witiau nande, ye wiac mong meudeac ama manau mi embeso.
40024018	Nga mong ye semeng uau nande, ye ngakpi hereha meudeac mi dzigenebeso.
40024019	Ngac heregoc kecdae nga nenggac sabac namuu meyunukecdae, yeni naso imohai ebicnginagoc anggecde.
40024020	Nga ngeni woragecdeac naso haude, imoc nomannasou me sabatanasou mi fingerudeac numubisia.
40024021	Naso imohai kpendzeng kuneng yombong fingerude. Kpendzeng ifia bangec hanac hanaheaunacngoc erekecma yofinenggac mong mi fingerec amma ngade ifingoc mi fingecbesande.
40024022	Nga uameme imoc mi mewegenegecde isoc ngic mongngo komoc naric mi kpeude. Amma ngicngac isingyunuyunuya, ngeneac amma naso mewegenebesandae.
40024023	Naso imohai yoac mong yofi fingecbesande, ‘Henggec, Messia yei fingecde.’ me ‘Messia ye edi fingecde.’ Ifi degecde isoc ngeni mi negensingyunubisia.
40024024	Imoc yofiac, Messia ikoha nga profete ikoha yeneng fingecma ngicngac uba mesufu ayemmegecdeac tobangyunuma faka morora nga faka kuhagoc engena megecde. Amma yeni sing meficgegecdeu ngicngac isingyunuyunuya ifingoc ikocfu wangecyunugecde.
40024025	Negenggec, ni faka imoc fingerudeac bic edengunuba negendae.
40024026	Ngicngac goa yeneng yofi degecde, ‘Henggec, ye bangec kisiu kecde.’ Ifi degecdeu ngeni ihai mi kembisia. Me yofi degecde, ‘Ye yei ama manabisicfu tacde.’ Ifi degecdeu ngeni imoc mi negensinggebisia.
40024027	Piratacngo wenac ere ereaunac heima wenac keme kemeau kpesiande. Nga Ngicac Medac haude, naso imohai siriha imocacsoc fingecbesande.
40024028	Hasaukpesac neng yeni fareng fede, imohai eacandae.
40024029	Anu kpendzengtoa nasoya wisickeuguc wenackiwa kundung kpeu afokperagia mi fingerude. Asomeng yeni kurumennunac fotockema magec kurumenga kurumenga yeneac kuc sasawa kpemindzahebesandae. (Yes 13:10; 34:4)
40024030	Imohai Ngicac Medacac soi sawakebangau fingeru bangeha bangeha ngicngac sasawa yeni imoc hemma kiacsonggong anggecde. Ifi ammagec Ngicac Medacngo kurumenggac hoennu kuc nga kibikperagitoagoc hau henggecde.
40024031	Nga trampet udumengtoa kuneng fingecmanu ye angerofora sueyunuu yeneng kurumenga kurumenga noboc noboc amma bangec tegia noboc noboc 4 imohai kemma Kebu yengenaoc ngicngac meisingyunuec, yeni kpedzucyunubesandae.
40024032	Fig icngo haniaya edekpou angemmeu ngeni imoc negembisia. Fawa firitickema besaiu ngicngac yofi negengandae, wenac naso ande.
40024033	Nga wiac sasawa dedua, imoc fingeru ngeni imoc hemma ifingoc negembisia, Ngicac Medacac naso imoc bic wegenema hade amma ye nagu ngadeau nande.
40024034	Foracngoc, areng yomoc ngeni mi homemagec wiac yomoc fingecdacbesande.
40024035	Fingeru bangec nga kurumeng kpac anecde nga neac yoac, imoc ine mi kpac anude.
40024036	Faka imoc noc uamemeu amma aua nofu fingerude, imoc mongngo mi negenbesande. Kurumenggac angero yeni imoc mi negendae nga Medacngo ifingoc mi negende. Manggacngosac naso imoc negende.
40024037	Noaac nasou faka fingerec, Ngicac Medacngo hau faka siriha imocngoc fingecbesande.
40024038	Kiatunggbaung mi hamanu ngicngac yeneng nenedoku nema ngic yeni ngacfu kenggec nga manggac yeneng yofi degec, ‘Ni naroanna ngic mibade.’ ifi angkecmagec Noango wageu enec.
40024039	Enu yeni mi negemma kecmagec kiatunggbaungtoango hama merucyunudarec. Ngicac Medacac hahanasou faka ifiangoc fingerude.
40024040	Naso imohai ngic yohockang semeng uau kecmaec yerearunac mong mema mong ine wagec uau kefude.
40024041	Ngac yohockang yeri flawa amau namma flawa hedzamema kecmaec yerearunac mong mema mong ine wagec nambesande.
40024042	Kebunginango noc uamemeac haude, ngeni imoc mi negendaeac amma ubagbori kecbisia.
40024043	Hamangecngic ye ama hetackema engande. Nga ama mingina mong ye hamangecngic noc nasou haude negendeu ye gaugbori kecma amea garenggekecma hamangecngic imoc kpae heimiude.
40024044	Imocac ngeni ifingoc efaima kecbisia. Ngicac Medacac aua ngeni mi negemmagec habesande.
40024045	Wanacngic mongngo negen negentegehagoc kefec. Nga minginango ye wanacngic ogofora yeneac gareng amma yakangina nasoyau modacma yemmeudeac demiec.
40024046	Ye ua demi demia imoc medaru minginango hama henu naric anude, ye kenehagoc.
40024047	Foracngoc, yeac minginango wiara sasawa garenggeudeac demiude. Ngeni siriha imocacsoc kecbisia.
40024048	Nga wanacngic mangana, ye ine yengenaoc negensiude, ‘Ni minginna naso herea kecmaguc haude.’
40024049	Ifi dema wanacngic ye ogofora yunuma minggong ngic, yenigoc doku seria neude.
40024050	Ifi amma tomai mi kecma wanacngic yeng minginaac uamemenaso nga auaya mi negemmanu minginango haude.
40024051	Hama wanacngic imoc kpema herec kperecge heima ngic ikoha yenigoc faiude. Nga yeni ihai kiacma enacngina kisaranggema kecgecde.”
40025001	“Kurumenggac eucerereng imoc yofi isoc anude. Naroang 10 yeni kifangina mema memeturang ngic yegoc meficemegecdeac sinnu kenggec.
40025002	Yenearunac naroang 5 yeni mi irec ireckea nga 5 yeni negen negengnginagoc.
40025003	Naroang mi ireckegec, yeni kifangina mema kirung dokuyagoc mong mi megec.
40025004	Nga negen negengnginagoc, yeneng kifangina mema dokungina kirunnu kisima megec.
40025005	Nga memeturang ngicngo bic mi hau naroang sasawango kicngina gau anu gau fegec.
40025006	Femagec tofocnac dzongiau kpakpac mong yofi fingerec, ‘Negenggec, memeturang ngic hade, ngeni kemma yegoc eacgec.’
40025007	Ifi fingeru naroang 10 yeni gauunac gborima yacma kifangina memengere amma
40025008	naroang negen negengngina mi irec ireckea, yeneng negen negenggoc yeneac degec, ‘Kifanina bokobeso andeac ngeni doku mong kisinemmegec.’
40025009	Ifi degec naroang negen negenggoc, yeneng merengyemmema yofi edeyunugec, ‘Doku yomocngo nenanggacsoc kpac. Imocac ngeni ine kifadokuya faiandae, yenearu kemma bummegec.’
40025010	Ifi degec, yeni kifadoku bummebesonga kemmagec memeturang ngicngo haec. Hau naroang efaigecmoc, yeni yegoc memeturanggac amau enggec. Emma nagu ukugec kpeu imohai nenesemeng nesogai amma tacgec.
40025011	Tacmagec ngade ngac tosea yeneng hasikema degec, ‘Kebu, Kebu, nagu witinemmena ereni.’
40025012	Ifi degec, yeng edeyunuec, ‘Foracngoc, ni kicrurungngunuduae.’
40025013	Ngeni wenac nga aua mi negendae, imocac amma ngeni ubagbori kecbisia.
40025014	Imohai faka siriha yofi fingecbesande. Ngic mongngo bangec monnu kenudeac wanacngicfora kpacyunuma dzofinaha yeneac mariu faima kenudeac negenec.
40025015	Ye dzo garenggegecdeac kucnginaac sirihau yofi hendzicma yemmeec. Ye ngic mong tarantong dzo 5 nga mong tarantong dzo yohockang amma mong tarantong dzo mocgu, dzo ifi yemmema kenec.
40025016	Kenu ngic tarantong dzo 5 meec, ye imohaingoc kemma emekpesi uaya mema tarantong dzo 5 torokpema meficgeec.
40025017	Nga ngic tarantong dzo yohockang meec, ye ifingoc kemma emekpesi uaya mema yohockang torokpema meficgeec.
40025018	Nga ngic tarantong dzo mocgu meec, yeng ine kemma mingina dzo miec, imoc mema bangec usuma tonggoma mesufuec.
40025019	Anu mingingnginango naso herea kecma monggoc dzigene hama dzo yemmeec, imocac turunga kpoumigecdeac kpacyunuec.
40025020	Kpacyunuu ngic tarantong dzo 5 meec, yeng tarantong dzo 5 mong momoc mekemma deec, ‘Kunenna, ge tarantong dzo 5 nenna ni emekpesi uaya mema 5 monggoc torokpema meficgedua.’ Ifi deu
40025021	minginango yofi edeec, ‘Wanacngic gombunga yombong. Ge fakaga dindingac amma yoac modac modacfakaga soronga. Nga geng yoac modacma wiac kapia kpacgoc garenggedanggac wiac ebiriangoc garenggenadeac faigubade. Hana kunenggaac sogac sogaiu nerahafoc kecdede.’
40025022	Nga ngic tarantong dzo yohockang meec, yeng ifingoc hama deec, ‘Kunenna, ge tarantong dzo yohockang nenna ni emekpesi uaya mema tarantong dzo yohockang monggoc torokpema meficgedua.’ Ifi deu
40025023	minginango yofi edeec, ‘Wanacngic gombunga yombong. Ge fakaga dindingac amma yoac modac modacfakaga soronga. Nga geng yoac modacma wiac kapia kpacgoc garenggedanggac wiac ebiriangoc garenggenadeac faigubade. Hana kunenggaac sogac sogaiu nerahafoc kecdede.’
40025024	Nga ngic tarantong dzo mocgu meec, yeng ifingoc hama deec, ‘Kunenna, ge ngic gerea, imoc negenduae. Amma uau wiac heihomec mi amma foraya kpedziannec amma gbomea mong mi kpegima sifu foraya mesiannec.
40025025	Imocac kengecnuu kemma tarantong dzoga bangecfu tonggoba feec wiacga imoc monggoc merenggenduae.’
40025026	Ifi deu minginango yoara turunga yofi meremmiec, ‘Ge wanacngic mangana amma oyonga. Ni uau heihomec mi amma foraya kpedzianduae amma gbomea mi kpegima sifu foraya mesianduae, geng imoc bic negennec.
40025027	Ge imoc negemma dzona dzo tohonnu faina heikpegumekecgec saheu neng dzigenema dzona imoc nobohagoc mebai.
40025028	Imocac ngeni tarantong dzo yearunac wangecma ngic tarantong dzo teng mekecde, ye migec.
40025029	Ngic mong ye wiac mekecde, ye monggoc migec homac ebiriangoc anude. Nga mong ye wiac mi mekecde, yearunac wiac mekecdemoc, imoc ifingoc wangecgecde.
40025030	Wanacngic uaya gombunga mi medac, ngeni ine ye mema ngadeau kundunnu ukugec kemebeso. Ihai kecdae, yeni kiacma enacngina kisaranggema kecgecde nga kecbesandae.’
40025031	Kecma Ngicac Medacngo kuc nga kibikperagiagoc nga angero sasawa yenigoc hasikebesandae, naso imohai ye ngictau tataha kibikperagiagoc ihai emma tarude.
40025032	Amma ye bangeha bangehaac ngicngac sasawa deu hama yeac kicfu kpedzucnedacgecde. Kpedzucnegec garengngo rama nga noning medereyunuande, yeng naso imohai ifi isocngoc medereyunuma
40025033	rama foiugeng nga noning ine kanaugeng faiyunuude.
40025034	Ifi amma ngictaungo ngicngac foiugeng yofi edeyunuude, ‘Ngicngac Mannaac kenecgoc, ngeni yei hagec. Ngeni amabangecyombongngina megec, imoc bicngoc bangec hanahema fingerecfunac ngeneac negemma faifaia.
40025035	Ni yakaac homeba ngeni yaka nenggec nga dokuac anenu doku nenggec neai. Nga kuriha kecbare ngeneng nenggareng anenggec.
40025036	Ni wambaac obohoba ngeneng wamba heinenggec. Amma hafei febare ngeni hama wirinugec. Nga witicamau kecbare ngeneng yugucnugec.’
40025037	Ifi deu ngicngac dindingac yeneng yoac yofi meremmigecde, ‘Kebu, ge noc nasou yakaac anggenu gemma gumecguing me noc nasou dokuac anggenu gumecguing?
40025038	Amma noc nasou kuric hana genggareng anggening me wambaac obohona gening?
40025039	Amma noc nasoac hafei me witicamau tacmana gemma yugucguing?’
40025040	Ifi degec ngictaungo yofi edeyunuude, ‘Foracngoc, ngeni munafocna kapiabisic yenearunac mocgunec ubangerec ammigec, imocacsoc ninoc anenggec.’ imoc edengunuduae.
40025041	Ifi dema kanaugeng nanggecde, yeneac yoac yofi edeyunuude, ‘Ngicngac sowecngunungunuya, ngeni wanuma gerec wisic wisickea kpac, imohai kemma kecbisia. Imoc mangana mingina nga angerofora, yeneac amma dzema fede.
40025042	Ni yakaac homeba ngeni yaka mong mi nenggec nga dokuac anenu ngeni doku mong mi nenggec neai.
40025043	Nga ni kuric hama kecbare ngeni nenggareng mong mi anenggec nga wambana kpac kecbare mong mi heinenggec. Ni hafei anenec nga witicamau febare ngeni mi yugucnugec.’
40025044	Ifi edeyunuu yeneng degecde, ‘Kebu, ge noc nasou nenedokuga kpac me wambaga kpac amma kuric kecmana neni gemma ihoc bahoc aning? Me dahai hafeiamau me witicamau femana gemma ihoc bahoc anggening?’
40025045	Ifi degec yeng yofi edeyunuude, ‘Foracngoc, ngeni munafocna kapiabisic yenearunac mocgunec ubangerec mi ammigec, imoc ifingoc ni mi anenggec, imoc edengunuduae.’
40025046	Nga yeneng kopocsicac turunga kpendzeng nasoya kpac kpekecbesandaeac kenggecde. Nga areng dindingac yeneng kekecseriu enggecde.”
40026001	Yesungo yoac imoc sasawa dedaru wisickeu medacfora yofi edeyunuec,
40026002	“Uameme yohockang femanu makekeng naso imocac hombang ammanu imohaingoc ngic yeneng Ngicac Medac mariponnu kpegecdeac demeseri amma suegecde.”
40026003	Anu womonggareng enara nga yudangic yeneac enarafocngina, yeneng womonggarengtoa kpara Kaifa, yeac amaodayagocfu endacma
40026004	Yesu akikic mema kpegecdeac dekiric amma
40026005	yofi degec, “Ngicngac botucnginau dzikac sicsauc fingecbacac ye hombang nasou mi mebesonga.”
40026006	Anu Yesungo Betania amau Simong kukuseriagoc, yeac amau yaka netarec.
40026007	Netacmanu ngac mongngo yearu kemma, kirung mong arabastro hocngo memea, imocac kerecdokuya homung kerengagocngo yeac orucfu kpakema nadzicmiec.
40026008	Nadzicmiu medac yeneng imoc hemma kerecdoku buma yada anecac dehesi ammigec, “Ye nocac wiac buma engena imoc kpedzonggede?
40026009	Imocngo dzo homac kirecgeu ngic makpekpea yemmeni ngereebac.”
40026010	Ifi degec Yesungo imoc negemma yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni nocac ngacac ifi dema ubaebic meficgemidae. Ye faka gombunga nearu meu ngereede.
40026011	Ngic makpekpea yeni nasosoc ngenigoc kecgecde nga neng ine ngenigoc nasosoc mi kecbade.
40026012	Ni homeba tonggonugecde, ye imocac sebina mengerema bic nadzicnende.
40026013	Foracngoc, ngic yeni siduc gombung yomoc bangeha bangeha kemma dekperagigecde, imohai yeng ifi anec, imoc ifingoc degec negenggec febesande.”
40026014	Anu medacfora 12 yenearunac mong Yuda Karioto amaunac degec, yeng womonggareng enara yenearu kemma
40026015	kpesiyemmeec, “Neng Yesu maringinau faibadeu dzo dafiguc nenggecdeac negendae?” Kpesiyemmeu yeneng silwadzo 30 osoma migec.
40026016	Migec, yeng Yesu naso damohai doc meu megecdeac hemmodacma kefec.
40026017	Kecma ic sogong yis kpac, hombang imocac hanac hanaheau medac yeni Yesuaru kemma kpesimigec, “Neni ama dahai kemma makekenggac ramamedaha mengerema ohonenideac negennec?” (Mke 12; Dser 16:1-8)
40026018	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngeni taonnu emma ngic imoc hemma yofi edebisia, ‘Kpoukpouninango geac yofi dede, nasona wegeneu gearu hama ni nga medacfocna neni gegoc makekenggac ramamedaha nenideac negenduae.’ ”
40026019	Nga Yesungo medacfora yoac edeyunuec, imoc tofohodacma makekenggac ramamedaha ohomengere anggec.
40026020	Ama toforeu Yesungo medacfora 12 yenigoc yaka netacma
40026021	yofi edeyunuec, “Foracngoc, ngenearunac mongngo ngaba yeneac mariu fainuude.”
40026022	Ifi deu medac yeni ubangina homac manganeu yenearunac mocgu mocgungo kpesimigec, “Kebu imoc sifu neng mi anduae, me?”
40026023	Kpesimigec yeng yofi deec, “Ngic nigoc kurungterau ic sogong nemuruckedic, yennoc doc faiu menugecde.
40026024	Ngic ye Ngicac Medac doc meude, ye sowehagoc. Ye nonggeaac here manaunac mi fingecbac dede efaimibac. Nga Ngicac Medac neac negemma mitikibiu yoac yofi oho ohoya fede, yeng wangunuma kenudenoc.”
40026025	Ifi deu Yudango Yesu docfu faiudeac negenecmoc, yeng ifingoc kpesimiec, “Kpoukpou, ge neac denec me?” Deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ge geanggaoc imocnoc denec.”
40026026	Anu yeni yaka nemagec Yesungo ic sogong mong mema Anutuac ubangerec dema mendzicma medacfora yofi dema yemmeec, “Ngeni mema negec, yomoc fusina.”
40026027	Ifi dema kpakenec mong mema Anutuac ubangerec ammima numumima yofi dema yemmeec, “Yomocngo dzadzahac gboriaac sacna, imoc ngicngac homac yeneac kopocsic wayemmeudeac kpetic kpetinggea, imocac ngeni sasawango imoc negec.
40026029	Ni edengunuba negenggec, waing gbomeaac dokuya monggoc mi nene kecbarengoc Mannaac eucererennu nenahafoc sing gboriaac arennu nebesandimbe.”
40026030	Nga yeni ubangerec yegec heima amaunac mama edibigeng Oliwatikiu enggec.
40026031	Sinnu kemma Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Tofocnac yomohai ngeni sasawango neac negemma makpema wanudacgecde. Faka imocac yofi oho ohoya fede, ‘Ni gareng kpeba ramahabu yeni sinsararang kpebesandae.’ (Dzek 13:7)
40026032	Nga homecfunac yacmaguc waraingemmema Gariraia bangecfu kemba ngeni ihai habisia.”
40026033	Ifi deu Petorongo edeec, “Goa yeni sasawa geac ifi dema wagugecde nga neng ine naric mi wagubade.”
40026034	Ifi deu yofi edeec, “Ni forangoc edeguba, tofocnac yomohai kokorec mi arohomanu geng sebiheinenna atac harebec anude.”
40026035	Deu deec, “Ge guma ni nubeso degec sebi naric mi heibade.” Petorongo ifi deu medacfora meficgema imocngoc dedacgec.
40026036	Anu Yesungo kengkecma ua bangec mong kpara Gedzemane, ihai kensikema medacfora yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni yei tacmagec ni edi kemma numubade.”
40026037	Ifi dema Petoro nga Dzebedaio medachora meyunuu kenggec. Kemma Yesungo ubaebictoa yombong memanu dzonoma fedeu
40026038	yofi edeyunuec, “Ubaongana ebiriyombonggeu homebeso anende, imocac ngeni yei nigoc ubagbori tacmina.”
40026039	Ifi dema kpesima kemma kicmesuya bangecfu hetutuckema yofi numuec, “Manna, negenna angana andeu ge kpakenec yomoc meickena feracnuu. Amma neac songo kpac, geac songo nga negen negeng imocngo seribeso.”
40026040	Ye ifi numuma medac yenearu dzigene kemma yenenu gau fegec. Gau fegec yenemma Petoro yofi edeec, “Ngeni sifu aua mocguacsoc nigoc gaugbori kecgec.
40026041	Ngeni faitobannu embauac ubagbori kecma numugec. Foracngoc, ongaasungo efaiande nga sebingo ine ebiriude.”
40026042	Nga ye monggoc kemma yofi numuec, “Manggacna, kpakenec yomocngo feracnuudeac negenna mi ngereeu imoc nebare geac yoac seribeso.”
40026043	Ifi numuma hama henu medacfora yeni kicngina gaungoc anu fegec. Femagec yenemma
40026044	monggoc wayunu kemma numuu atac harebec anu yoac warac deec, imocngoc dema numuec.
40026045	Numudacma medac yenearu dzigene hama yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni gaungoc fema kecdae, imoc naric kpac. Naso wegenede, ngic yeni Ngicac Medac kererema kopocsicmeme yeneac mariu faigecde.
40026046	Benukererec ngicngo hadeac amma yacgec kenni.”
40026047	Ye ifi dema nammanu medac 12 yenearunac ogongina Yuda, yeng ngichabutoa kuneng yombong enara waraiyemmeu hagec. Womonggareng enara nga yudangic enarafocngina yeneng sueyunugec wasaibeang nga gbarucnginagoc hasikegec.
40026048	Sikegec benukererec ngic yeng waraima faka anudeac dederecgeyoac yofi bic edeyunuec, “Ngic titikokoc ammibade, ngeni ngic imocnoc mendanggema mebisia.”
40026049	Ifi dema yeng imohaingoc Yesuaru kemma, “Ohec, kpoukpou.” ifi dema titikokoc ammiec.
40026050	Ifi ammiu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ogo, ge noc ua menadeac yei hadang?” Deu yeni hama Yesu maria noboc noboc mema mendanggegec.
40026051	Anu ngic Yesugoc kecgec, yenearunac mongngo wasaibeanga kpedzima womonggarengtoa yeac wanacngic kpema kedzaha noboc herecgeec.
40026052	Herecgeu mau Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ngic mong ye dzikac kpeude turunga dzikacngoc kiude, imoc fingecgembacac wasaibeangga ameau monggoc faina kemeu.
40026053	Neac memeficsing mong mi fede, imoc negemma ifi annec. Nga Manna yagucnoc numumibai dede yeng angero kpetengina 6 tauseng arenga 12, angero habutoa ifia naric sueyunuu mama meficnubau.
40026054	Nga meficnubau dede mitikibiu faka yomoc fingerudeac oho ohoya fede, imoc fora mi fingecbac.”
40026055	Ifi dema ngichabu yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni mendannuma godzungic meandae, ifi isoc wasaibeang nga gbarucnginagoc hadae. Nga ni wenaha wenaha Anutuac womonnu edekpou angemmema kecanduae, imohai ine naric menubau.
40026056	Amma yoc ine profete yeni mitikibiu yoac ohogec fede, imoc fora fingerudeac imoc sasawa fingecdacde.” Ifi deu medacfora sasawango Yesu wama woradacgec.
40026057	Anu mitiac negen negengngic nga yudangic enarafocngina yeni womonggarengtoa Kaifa yeac amau bic kpedzucnema tacgec, ihai Yesu wangecma kenggec.
40026058	Yeni Yesu mendanggema ifi mekemmagec Petorongo ngadenginau hereaungoc Yesu modacma kenec. Kensikema, Yesuac yoac desigecde, imoc negenudeac womonggarengtoaac ama imocac oda manau kemema uamedac yeneac botucfu matarec.
40026059	Anu womonggareng enara nga yudangic tutumangtoaac memba yeni hafoangoc tacma Yesu homecfu faigecde nga ye enacfu faifai ammima boi anggecdeac negengising anggec.
40026060	Ifi anggec ngic homacngo hama enacfu faifaiyoac degec, imocngo Yesu homecfu faigecdeacsoc mi anu hofocmangoc kecma ngic yohockang yereng fingecma boi amma deoc,
40026061	“Yesungo yofi deec, ‘Ni Anutuac womong hembarackema uameme harebec ammanu monggoc mebade, ni kucna imocacsoc fede.’ ”
40026062	Ifi deec womonggarengtoango yacma Yesu kpesimiec, “Geac yoac dedae, imocac noboha mong mi denade me?”
40026063	Ifi deu Yesungo ine waickema nanec. Nanu womonggarengtoango edeec, “Anutu kekec mingina, yeac kicfu kpesigemba ge deserina, geng Messia Anutuac medac me kpac, imoc edenununa.”
40026064	Ifi deu yeng meremma yofi edeec, “Imoc gennoc denec. Nga edengunuba negenggec, yaguc nga namma enude Ngicac Medacngo Kuctoa Minginaac foiaugeng tarude. Amma ye kurumenggac hoeng witiau hau ngeni imoc hembesandae.”
40026065	Ifi deu womonggarengtoango yoac imoc negemmanganema wambaya membarackema yofi deec, “Ye Anutu bic emmidacac yoacninaac boingicac monggoc mi obohonide.
40026066	Ngeneng yoac imoc negemma dafi dedae?” Deu yeneng meremmigec, “Ye homeudeac arennoc.”
40026067	Ifi dema yeni Yesu kicmesuya sofohoma mari tuema kpekpefac ammigec nga goa yeneng dzikacngo kpema
40026068	degec, “Messia, merang gudac, imocac kpefingyoac edenununa.”
40026069	Ifi amma kecmagec Petorongo oda manau ama sobennu tarec. Tacmanu wanac naroang mongngo yearu kemma deec, “Ge gariraiangicnoc Yesugoc kecannec.”
40026070	Deu ye ngic sasawa tacgec, yeneac kicfu sebi heima deec, “Ge yoac denec, imoc obohoduae.”
40026071	Ifi dema naguu kemmanu wanac naroang mongngo hemma ngicngac ihai nanggec, yeni edeyunuec, “Ngic imoc ye Yesu Nadzaretenac, yegoc kecandenoc.”
40026072	Edeyunuu Petorongo Anutuac kicfu serima monggoc busickpema deec, “Ni ngic imoc mi negenduae.”
40026073	Ifi dema nammanu ngic yeneng Petoroaru kemma degec, “Neni ubadzidziga negendimbe, ge foracngoc yeneac arennunac.”
40026074	Edegec ye yengenaoc sowecemema sopecemema deec, “Ni ngic imoc mi negemmiduae.” Deu imohaingoc kokorecngo arohoec.
40026075	Nga Yesungo yoac yofi bic edeec, “Kokorecngo mi arohomanu geng ni mi negennunec dema sebiheina atac harebec anude.” Petorongo yoac imoc negensima kemema ubahodung kuneng negemma kiac hodung kiarec.
40027001	Ama wereckenu womonggareng enara nga yudangic enarafocngina yeni uba mocgu amma Yesu homeudeac deserigec.
40027002	Deserima Yesu maria dedeckema Yudaia bangecac gawana Pirato, yearu mekemma yeac mariu faigec.
40027003	Anu Yesu homeudeac deserigec, Yuda benukererec ngicngo imoc hemma deec, “Ni nocac ifi andua?” Ifi dema ubea manganeu silwadzo 30 migec, imoc mekemma womonggareng enara nga yudangic enarafocngina yeni monggoc merengyemmema
40027004	edeyunuec, “Negenggec, ni kererema ngic kopocsiha kpac, ye sac nadzicmiai.” Ifi deu yeneng degec, “Imoc neneac ebic kpac, imoc geac ebic.”
40027005	Yeni ifi dema dzo wagec, yeng imoc mekemma womonnu ukuu enu wama kemma ubasac neec.
40027006	Nga womonggareng enara yeneng silwadzo imoc kpedzucnema degec, “Dzo imocngo sac bummeec. Imocac amma dzo imoc sesekatapau faifai, imoc singngo mi dede.”
40027007	Dema yeni yoac dedzege amma dzo imocngo kuric yeneac kicsere fingerudeac enang kudzimemengic yeac ua bangec bummegec.
40027008	Bummegec bangec imocac kpara Sacbangec hanahema degec nga imoc yaguc fedengoc.
40027009	Profete Yeremiango yoac yofi deec, imoc imohai foragoc anec, “Faka yofi fingerudeac Kebungo edenuec, ‘Israe medacfora yeni ngic imocac buma kpetea faima, “Ye silwadzo 30 imocacsoc.” ifi degec. Nga yeni dzo imoc mema imocngo enang kudzimemengic yeac ua bangec bummegec.’ ”
40027011	Anu yeni Yesu mekemma gawanaac kicfu faigec nammanu yeng kpesimiec, “Ge yudangic yeneac ngictau me?” Ifi deu Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Imocnoc geanggaoc denec.”
40027012	Anu womonggareng enara nga yudangic enarafocngina yeneng namma haniaya degec Yesungo yoac turunga mong mi merengyemmeu
40027013	Piratongo kpesimiec, “Yeni yoacfu faiguma yoac homac yombong dedae, ge imoc mi negennec me?”
40027014	Deu yeng yoac monnec mong mi merenu gawanango kerectegec yombong anec.
40027015	Anu gawanango hombannu yofi angkefec, yuda ngichabu yeni witicngic monggac kpara kpacgec, yeng ngic imoc yungeru witicamaunac maande.
40027016	Naso imohai godzungic kpara kekena mong witicamau kefec, kpara Baraba.
40027017	Nga ngicngac kpedzucnedacma nammagec Piratongo yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Merac yungecngemmebadeac negendae, Baraba me Yesu, kpara mong Kristo deandae?”
40027018	Yudangic yeni Yesu eng keracmangang ammima yearu faigec, imoc negemmanoc ifi deec.
40027019	Nga Pirato ye desi desi tatahau tacmanu enemango yearu yoac yofi faiu kenec, “Ge ngic kpetiac yomocac yoac mi kpeserena, imoc wana. Ni tofocnac fema gaukpefing hemma yeac amma ubaebic homac medua.”
40027020	Nga womonggareng enara nga yudangic enarafocngina yeneng habu fenggeyemmegec yeneng Baraba yungecyemmeudeac degec nga Yesu ine kpehomegecdeac degec.
40027021	Nga gawanango kpesiyemmeec, “Ngic yohockang nandape yerearunac merac yungecngemmebadeac negendae?” ifi deu yeni imohaingoc degec, “Baraba.”
40027022	Ifi degec kpesiyemmeec, “Ifi anu Yesu, kpara mong Kristo deandae, yeac dafi ambade?” Kpesiyemmeu yeni sasawango degec, “Ye mariponnu kpena homeu.”
40027023	Ifi degec, yeng kpesiyemmeec, “Imoc dafiac nga noc kopocsicac?” Ifi deu yeni arohomumunggema degec, “Ye mariponnu kpebesonga.”
40027024	Ifi dema nanggec hemma Piratongo yoac dindingac deudeac obohoec. Nga yeni ine serima kpacma nanggec kpeborongtoa hanahema fingeru yeng doku mema ngicngac habutoa kicnginau namma maria dzuacma yofi deec, “Ngic yomocac sacac kopocsic, imocngo nearu mi tacbeso, imoc ngenearu febeso.”
40027025	Ifi deu ngicngac yeni sasawango yoara meremma degec, “Yeac sacac kopocsicngo neni nga nambaracfocnina nenearu febeso.”
40027026	Nga Pirato ye Baraba yungecyemmema Yesu ine dzikacngo kpema mariponnu kpegecdeac wasaingic maringinau wayemmeec.
40027027	Anu gawanaac wasaingicfora yeneng Yesu ama manaunac memama ama tegiau wasaingic oda manau kecandae, imohai meemma wasaiareng sasawa hafoangoc kpedzucnegec.
40027028	Kpedzucnedacma Yesu yengena wamba hesimima ngakpi mong kpauc kpauc heimigec kemeu
40027029	somang batihema oruhau heimigec kemeec. Kemeu yasu mong memigec marifoiango mema nanec. Ifi amma kiwau fafoc heima defagoc ammigec, “Ohec, yudangic yeneac ngictau.”
40027030	Amma yeni sofohoma yasu wangecma imocngo oruhau kpegec.
40027031	Defagoc ammikecgec wisickeu yenang ngakpi hesimima yengena wamba monggoc heimigec kemeu mariponnu kpegecdeac hesicke kenggec.
40027032	Mekemma sinnu ngic mong meficgegec, kpara Simong, Kirene taonnunac, yeng Yesuac maripong tofohoudeac ngombonggegec tofohou kenggec.
40027033	Kengkecma bangec buma mong kpara Gorigata, kpara mong Hatasic degec, ihai kensikegec.
40027034	Kensikema waing doku wiac hodungagocngo yerec yerecgea, imoc gumegec ye imoc nenegemma waec.
40027035	Nga yeni ye mariponnu kpegec nammanu wambaya kpeing kpema mederegec.
40027036	Ifi amma garenga tacgec.
40027037	Nga ye nanu oruha witiau maripongau kopocsicac haniaya yofi ohogec, “Yomoc Yesu, yudangic yeneac ngictau.”
40027038	Anu yeni godzungic yohockang yegoc momoc mariponnu yuruma mong foiugeng nga mong kanaugeng, ifi faiyurugec.
40027039	Nga ngic ihai kengha anggec, yeni Yesu deengdema ammima orucngina kpatitickema
40027040	degec, “Ge Anutuac womong hembarackema wenac harebec ammanu medacbesonga denec, ge geangga onggongemena. Nga Anutuac medac kecnec isoc mariponnunac mesiemema mana.”
40027041	Nga womonggareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic amma yudangic enarafocngina yeneng ifingoc desusuic ammigec,
40027042	“Ye ngic goa onggongyunukefec nga yengena ine naric mi onggongemeude. Ye israengic nenang ngictau kecdeu mariponnunac mesiemema mau ye negensinggenide.
40027043	Ye yofi dema negen negensinga Anutuaru faiec, ‘Ni Anutuac medac.’ ifi deu Anutungo yeac ammikecdeu mesibeso.”
40027044	Nga godzungic yegoc momoc yurugec, yeri yoac siriha ifiangoc deendema ammioc.
40027045	Anu wenac dzongiau 12 kiroc ammanu imohai ama kundung kpema kundungngo bangec sokoma fekemmanu 3 kiroc marai anec.
40027046	Nga 3 kiroc imohai Yesungo ubaudumeng kunengngoc kpacma yofi deec, “Eri, Eri rema sabaktani.” Imocac titiha yofi, Anutuna Anutuna, ge nocac wanudang?
40027047	Anu ngic nanggec, yenearunac goango negemma degec, “Ye Eria kpacsambic ammide.”
40027048	Ifi kparu ngic mongngo negemma gereagoc nedzima kemma kondung sobing mong mema waingdoku aengagocfu nemuruckema kpinnu faima Yesu gumeec.
40027049	Nga goango ine degec, “Ngeni imoc wagec, Eria foracngoc hama meficgeu henni.”
40027050	Nga Yesungo monggoc ubaudumeng kunengngoc kparu asuya ereec.
40027051	Ereu homeec, imohaingoc Anutuac womonnu kpoructoa womongmana kpetiac yombong naguyau nanec, imocngo wihacnac botuhaungoc tohoma mama yohockang anec. Amma usoctoa meu fagannu hoctoa toa tohogec.
40027052	Nga kicsere fekenec, imoc anggeu ngic kpetiac warac homegec, yenearunac homacngo sebigoc gborigec.
40027053	Yesungo kicsereaunac gborima yaru yeni ngade kicserenginaunac erema taong kpetiac, imohai hama ngic homac fingecyemmegec.
40027054	Nga wasaigareng nga ngicfora Yesuac gareng nanggec, yeni usoc nga wiac fingerec, imoc hemma damuyunuu wareckema degec, “Foracngoc, ngic yomoc ye Anutuac medacnoc.”
40027055	Nga Yesu kpegec, imohai ngac homacngo araing namma wiac hennegeng anggec. Yeni Gariraia bangecfunac hanahema Yesu modacma hama kingang kpemigec,
40027056	yenearunac ngac goa kpacngina yofi, Maria kpara mong Madara amma Maria mong, Yakobo nga Yosefe, yereac nonggongira amma ngac mong Dzebedaioac medachora, yereac nonggongira, yeneng ngachabu yenigoc nanggec.
40027057	Anu Arimataia taonnunac ngic mong finactoayagoc, kpara Yosefe, yeng Yesuac yoac negemma yeac arennu ifingoc kefec. Ye ama toforebeso ammanu
40027058	Piratoaru kemma Yesuac fareng meudeac kpesimiec. Kpesimiu Piratongo migecdeac deu wamigec.
40027059	Wamigec Yosefengo Yesuac farenga mema linengkporuc mong kongaha, imoc mema imocngo tembonggema mekenec.
40027060	Mekemma yengena kicsere gboria dema hocsirau singa usu usuya feec, Yesuac fareng imohai faima hocyada mong kpedidinggeu kicsere naguya imocngo hedzickeu taru kenec.
40027061	Anu Maria Madara nga Maria ogea yereng kicsere naguya nonongkac ihaigeng fiec kenu taroc.
40027062	Wereckengau sabata asoac anu womonggareng enara nga farisaio yeni kpeturanggema Piratoaru kemma
40027063	degec, “Kunennina, ikocngic imocngo gbori kecmangoc, yoac mong deec, neni imoc negensidimbe, imoc edeguni negenna, ‘Ni homema wenac harebec ammanu Anutungo homecfunac megborinuu monggoc yacbade.’
40027064	Nga medacfora yeneng kemma farenga hamangec meworagec, ifi debauac, ‘Ye homecfunac yacdac.’ imocac ge kicsere garenggegecdeac edeyununa uameme harebec garenggebisia. Warac ikoc mong anec, imoc femanu ngadeac ikocngo witiau enu yadibacac imoc edegudimbe.”
40027065	Ifi degec Piratongo yofi edeyunuec, “Naric, wasaingic ngemmeba ngeni wangecyunu kemma kicsere garenggegecdeac kuc mekecdae, imocac sirihau garenggebisia.”
40027066	Ifi deu yeni kemma kicsereac hocnagu mi kpedidinggegecdeac witiau kpae faigec. Faima wasaingic yeneng gareng nanggecdeac edeyunugec.
40028001	Sabata naso wisickeu sonda gboria hanac hanaheau ama werec wereckenggac Maria Madara amma Maria ogea, yeri kicsere hembesonga kenoc.
40028002	Kemmaec Kebuac angero mongngo kurumennunac mau usoctoa kucbiricngoc meu yeng kicsereac hoc kpedidinggeu kenu witiau emma tarec.
40028003	Tarec, ye siriha pirac pirac siric nga wambaya kongac kongac hoeng isoc.
40028004	Nga gareng yeneng ye hemma kengecyunuu dzonongngina fedeu homebesonga amma fekenggec.
40028005	Nga ngac yeri kensikemaec angerongo yofi edeyuruec, “Ngeri mi kengecnguruu, ngeri Yesu mariponnu kpekpea, ye hembeso hadape, imoc negenduae.
40028006	Nga ye ine yei mi fede. Ye edengunuecmoc, ifi yacdac. Ngeri yoc hama fefea henec.
40028007	Ngereng imoc hemma bic kemma medacfora yofi edeyunuec, ‘Yesungo homecfunac bic yacdac. Ye waraingemmema Gariraia bangecfu kenu ngeni ihai kemma meficgegecde.’ Yoac imoc yagucnoc edenguruba negendape.”
40028008	Ifi anu yeri kicsere wama damu nga sogac sogaitoagoc medacfora siduc edeyunugecdeac nedzima bic kenoc.
40028009	Nedzi kemma Yesugoc ewacgec yeng yofi deec, “Wenacngerec.” ifi deu yeri hoangau ngonducnema haniau mema afeheoc.
40028010	Nga Yesungo yofi edeyuruec, “Ngeri mi kengecnguruu. Ngeri kemma tosofocna Gariraia bangecfu kenggecdeac edeyunuec, yeni ihai kemma nenggecde.”
40028011	Anu ngahoc yeri kemmaec wasai ngichabu kicsere garenggegec yenearunac goango taonnu emma wiac fingerec, imocac siduc womonggareng enara edeyunudacgec.
40028012	Edeyunugec yeni yudangic enarafocngina yenigoc adzorogec. Adzoroma yoac deserima wasaingic kicsere garenggegec, yeni yoac degecdeac dzo imocacsoc yemmema
40028013	yofi dema deracyunugec, “ ‘Neni tofocnac gau femina yeac medacfora yeneng hama farenga hamangec medau.’ ngeni ifi debisia.
40028014	Nga gawanango yoac imoc negemma wiac mong angemmebacac mi kengecngunubeso. Neneng demekiri naric amminide.”
40028015	Ifi dema edeyunugec wasaingic yeni dzo imoc mema yoac ede edeyunuya, imoc deyadigec. Ikocyoacngina imocngo yudangic yenearu sokoma feecngo fedengoc.
40028016	Anu medac 11 yeni Gariraia bangecfu tiki mong Yesungo bic derecgeyemmeec, ihai enggec.
40028017	Emma yengena hemma afehegec nga ngic mocgu mocgungo ine ubayohoc anggec.
40028018	Nga Yesungo kicnginau hama yofi edeyunuec, “Negenggec, bangec nga kurumenggac kuc sasawa ni bic nendac nendara.
40028019	Imocac ngeni kemma ngicngacareng sasawa neac sing negemma yoac modac modacareng anggec ngeneng meyunuma yenenggareng ayemmebisia. Amma ngeneng Manggac nga Medac amma Tiri Asu yeac kpacfu doku nadzicyemmebisia.
40028020	Nga neng yoac sasawa dederecge angemmekefai, ngeni imoc hafoangoc modacdacgecdeac kpouyemmebisia. Amma negendae, ni wenaha wenaha ngenigoc kecbare naso wisickebesande.”
41001001	Yomoc Yesu Kristo Anutuac Medac, yeac siduc gombung hanahema fingerec,
41001002	imocac siduc. Profete Yesaiango yofi ohoec, “Negenggec, ni enacdedena sueba yeng waraigemma singga memengere anudeac habesande. (Mkai 3:1)
41001003	Nga bangec kisiu kpakpac mong yofi fingerude, ‘Ngeni Kebuac sing wisima singa heitumeigec.’ ” (Yes 40:3)
41001004	Yoac imocac sirihau Yohanengo haec. Hama bangec kisiu kecma ngicngac kopocsicngina waudeac ubangina dzigeneu mitidoku nadzicgecdeac edekpou ayemmeec.
41001005	Nga ngicngac yeni Yudaia provins nga Yerusaleng taonnunac amanene yearu kenggec. Kemma kopocsicngina deficgemagec yeng Yodang dokuu namma doku nadzicyemmeec.
41001006	Yohane ye ngakpia kamele dzoeango memea, imoc heima fadenga mong yangseberango memea, imocngo kebangau dzegeec. Amma ye ipua nga kateac kukundzau nekefec.
41001007	Ye ngicngac yoac yofi edekpou ayemmeec, “Ngic neac ngadeu haude, yeac kucngo neac kuc ferahade. Ni ifiango ngonducnema yeac hanitabea witiha yungecba naric mi ngereeude.
41001008	Ni doku nadzicngemmeduae nga yeng hama Tiri Asungo nadzicngemmeude.”
41001009	Naso imohai Yesungo Nadzarete taong Gariraia bangec wama Yodang dokuu hasikeec. Hasikeu Yohanengo doku nadzicmiec.
41001010	Nadzicmiu Yesungo dokuunac eremanu imohaingoc kurumeng anggeu Asungo kebesacac siric amma yearu mau henec.
41001011	Hemmanu kurumennunac enacudumeng mong yofi fingeru negenec, “Ge neac songomedacna, ni gengsongo anggenduae.”
41001012	Nga imohaingoc Asungo Yesu sueu bangec kisiu kenec.
41001013	Kemma uameme 40 kecmanu Satangngo ye tobanggeec. Tobanggeu imohai kateyang yenigoc kecmanu angero yeneng henggareng ammigec.
41001014	Ngic yeneng Yohane witicamau faigec tacmanu Yesungo Gariraia bangecfu kemma Anutuac siduc gombung edekpou ayemmema
41001015	yofi deec, “Naso bic hau Anutuac eucererengngo mewegenengunudeac ngeni ubangina dzigeneu siduc gombung negensinggegec.”
41001016	Anu Yesungo Gariraia dzohong tegiau kengkecma Simong nga munea Anderea yerenu yeri uficngira ukuma nanoc. Nocac yeri kondungyang meme ngic.
41001017	Yeremma Yesungo yofi edeyuruec, “Ngeri hama modacnuec ngic yeneng kondungyang meandae, ngeri ifi isoc ngicmeme ua meecdeac kpoungemecbade.”
41001018	Ifi deu yeri imohaingoc uficngira wama Yesu modaroc.
41001019	Nga yeni kapianec kemma Yesungo Dzebedaioac medachora Yakobo nga munea Yohane yerenec. Yeri gombau uficngira memengere amma taroc.
41001020	Tarec yeng yeremma kpacyuruu yeri negenoc. Negemma imohaingoc mangngira Dzebedaio nga uangicfora gombau tacmagec wayunuma Yesu modaroc.
41001021	Anu yeni Kafanaung taonnu kensikegec. Kensikemagec sabata naso anu Yesungo kpekpeturang amau emma Anutuac yoac kpouyemmeec.
41001022	Kpouyemmeu ngicngac yeneng kpoukpouyoara negemma imoc negenggec engena anec. Ye kpouyemmeec, imoc ngic uakibi mekecdae, yeneac siricfu kuhagoc amma mitiac negen negengngic yeneac dede isoc mi deec.
41001023	Anu naso imohaingoc kpekpeturang amau ngic mong asu seuhagocngo tacma arohoec.
41001024	“Yesu Nadzarete mingina, neneac wiac imoc geac mi ande. Ge memanganenununadeac hanec me? Ni gensiduaenoc, ge Anutuac kpetiac ngic.”
41001025	Ifi deu Yesungo asu seuhagoc ngaba ammima yofi edeec, “Ge waickema ngicfunac erema kenna!”
41001026	Ifi deu asu seuhagocngo ngic mekpefac ammima kucgoc arohoma erema kenec.
