41001027	Kenu ngicngac sasawango kerectegec amma yenaocngoc kpesiemegec, “Imoc noc wiac? Imoc kpoukpou gboria nga yeng ua minginaac kuhagoc kpounemmeu asu seuhagoc ifingoc yoac edeyunuu yeni yoara negemma tofohogec.”
41001028	Nga siduhango Gariraia provinsiu bic kemma sokodarec.
41001029	Anu yeni kpekpeturang amaunac mama Yakobo nga Yohane yerigoc Simong nga Anderea yereac amau kenggec.
41001030	Kemma enggec, imohai Simong sefena sebigerec ammiu feec, imoc Yesu edegec.
41001031	Edegec Yesungo yearu kemma mariau mema miaru imohaingoc hafeia kpac anu yenenggareng ayemmeec.
41001032	Ifi anu wenac kiwa kemeu ama tofore hamanu ngicngac yeneng hafeigoc nga hadehade amma yafinggoc sasawa Yesuaru meyunu kenggec.
41001033	Nga taonggac ngicngac sasawa yeni ama naguyau kpedzucnegec.
41001034	Kpedzucnemagec Yesungo ngicngac hafeingina hania haniagoc mengereyunuma hadehade nga yafingngina homac kporarec. Nga hadehade nga yafing kporacyunuec, yeni haniaya negenggecac yoac degecdeac dederac ayemmeec.
41001035	Anu ama mi wereckemmanu Yesungo kundunnungoc yacma ama wama bangec botuc mong ngiha kpacfu kemma numuec.
41001036	Numuu Simong nga tosofora yeni ye hofockemma meficgema edegec, “Ngicngac sasawango ge hofocgudae.”
41001038	Ifi degec yofi edeyunuec, “Nenang taong goa wegenac tackende, imohai ifingoc kemma yoac edekpou ayemmebade. Nocac ua imocnoc mebadeac hadua.”
41001039	Ifi deu yeni Gariraia bangec yerecge kenggec. Kemma kpekpeturang amasoc yeng yoac edekpou ayemmema hadehade nga yafing kporacyunuec.
41001040	Anu ngic kubecserigoc mongngo yearu hama fafoc heima desambic ammima deec, “Geng negenna naric anu naric medzuacnubang.”
41001041	Ifi deu Yesungo ubea manganeu maria sinema ngic kpeserema yofi deec, “Ngereenadeac songona fede.”
41001042	Demanu imohaingoc kubeha mosiu sebia ngereec.
41001043	Ngereeu Yesungo ngic derahema suema yofi deec,
41001044	“Negenna, sebigau faka fingecdac, imocac ngic mong mi edebesena. Ge womonggareng yearu kemma sebiga edzahema Mosengo seseac deec, imocac sirihau modacma faibesena! Ge ifi faina yeneng sesega hemma negentegecgecde.”
41001045	Ifi deu yeng ine kemma siduc imoc sifu deyadiec. Imocac amma Yesungo taonnu fingec fingec monggoc mi enec. Ye ine ngadeau bangec kisiu kecmanu ngicngac noboc nobocnacngo yearu hakecgec.
41002001	Uameme goa wisickemanu Yesungo monggoc Kafanaung taonnu kenec. Kenu ngicngac homacngo imoc negemma ama wakema naguya hedzickemagec yeng Anutuac yoac edekpou ayemmeec.
41002003	Ammanu ngic 4 yeneng ngic mong hanimaria homemea tofohoma yearu mekenggec.
41002004	Mekenggec ngic homacngo nanggecac hoangau faigecdeac obohoma ama witiau enggec. Emma ama bubuya meickegec titinga fingerec. Fingeru yeni Yesu nanecfu imohai ngicpuring dzakeagoc faigec kemeec.
41002005	Kemeu Yesungo negen negensingngina hemma ngicpuring yofi edeec, “Medacna, kopocsicga imoc bic wawaya.”
41002006	Ifi deu mitiac negen negengngic goa ihai tacgec, yeneng ubanginau yofi negenggec.
41002007	“Ngic imoc ye nocac yoac ifi dema Anutu emmide! Anutu mocgungo kopocsic naric waude.”
41002008	Yeni ifi negenggec Yesungo ongaasuyau negengyemmema yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni nocac negen negeng ifia ubanginango negensidae?
41002009	Damocngo efea ande? Ngic puring yeac debesonga, ‘Kopocsicga bic wawaya ande’, me ‘Ge yacma tofoga mema kenna.’
41002010	Nga Ngicac Medac, yeng bangecfu kopocsic wawaac uayoac nga kuc femide, ngeni imoc negenggecdeac amma yofi deba.” Ye ifi dema ngicpuring yofi edeec,
41002011	“Ni edeguduae, ge yacma dzakega mema amagau kenna.”
41002012	Ifi deu imohaingoc ngic ye yacma dzakea mema ngicngac kicnginau kenec. Kenu ngicngac sasawango imoc hemma kpidohoma kerectegec amma Anutu dengerema degec, “Wiac yomoc mi hehennina yaguc fingeru hendimbe.”
41002013	Anu Yesungo ama imohacnac mama dzohong tegiau kenec. Kenu ngicngac homacngo yearu kenggec kpoukpou ua meec.
41002014	Nga kemma Lewi Arifaioac medac takesimeme ameau taru hemma yofi edeec, “Ge hama ni modacnuna!” Ifi deu yeng yacma modarec.
41002015	Kecma Yesungo Lewiac amau yaka nema tacmanu takesimeme ngic nga manganameme ngic homacngo Yesu nga medacfora yenigoc yaka momoc negec. Ngic ifia homacngo yeni modacyunuma kenggec.
41002016	Ifi anu Yesungo takesimeme nga manganameme yenigoc tacma yaka neu farisaio yenearunac mitiac negen negengngic goa, yeneng imoc hemma medacfora kpesiyemmegec, “Ye nocac takesimeme nga manganameme yenigoc yaka nede?”
41002017	Ifi degec Yesungo negemma yofi edeyunuec, “Ngicngac hafeingina kpac kecdae, yeni dotaac mi ayemmeude. Nga hafeinginagoc, yeneng ine dotaac ayemmeude. Nga ni ngicngac dindingac kpacyunubadeac mi mayai, kpac. Ni ine manganameme ngic kpacyunubadeac mayai.”
41002018	Yohaneac medacfora nga farisaio yakasege kecandae, yenearunac goango hama Yesu kpesimigec, “Yohane nga farisaio medacfocngina yeni yakasege angandae. Nga geac medacfocga yeneng nocac yaka sege mi angandae?”
41002019	Ifi kpesigec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Memeturang ngicngo tosofora yenigoc taru yeneng yakasege naric mi kecgecde. Monggoc deba, yeng yenigoc tacmanungoc yakasege naric mi kecgecde.
41002020	Kecma naso monnu ngic yeneng memeturanggac ngic yenearunac meickegecde, naso imohai yakasege anggecde.
41002021	Ngac mongngo ngakpi eseau kporucsusuc gboria mong mi kpebiude. Kporucsusu gboriango esea taiu dzamema titingtoa fingecbac.
41002022	Nga ngic mongngo waing gboria bokong yangseberango memea eseau naric mi kpeu kemeude, kpac. Waing gboriango bokong esea tindziru yerahafoc manganebaoc. Imocac waing gboria imoc bokong gboriau kpeu kemeude.”
41002023	Naso monnu sabata nasou Yesungo wit ua dzongiau sing modac kemmanu medacfora yeneng witfora mocgu mocgu merecgema megec.
41002024	Merecgegec farisaio yeneng degec, “Henna, yeni nocac sabata nasou faka mi angana andae?”
41002025	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Dawidi nga uamedacfora yeni yakaac obohoma herenginaac homema faka anggec, ngeni imoc osonegeng mi angandae gedang.
41002026	Abiatango womonggarengtoa kefec, naso imohai Dawidingo Anutuac womonnu enec. Emma ic sogong Anutuac sese faifaia, imoc menema uamedacfora ifingoc gumecyunuec. Nga ic sogong imoc womonggareng yenengsac naric negecde, ngictehec yeneng kpac.”
41002027	Ifi dema yofi edeyunuec, “Ngicngo sabataac amma mi fingerec, sabatango ine ngicngac ngeneac amma fingerec.
41002028	Ngicac Medac ye sabataac Kebu kecdengoc.”
41003001	Yesungo naso monnu kpekpeturang amau enu ngic mong maria noboc homemea, ye ihai tarec.
41003002	Nga ngic goa yeni Yesu yoacfu faigecdeac negensigec amma ngic imoc sabata nasou mengereude me kpac, imocac hembikecgec.
41003003	Hembikecgec Yesungo ngic marimangang yofi edeec, “Ge yacma botucninau nanna.”
41003004	ifi dema yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Sabata nasou noc faka naric ambesonga, faka gombunga me mangana? Amma homebeso andae, yeni agengngina tinide me yunuhomenide?” Ifi deu yeneng engsac ning kpegec.
41003005	Ning kpegec yeng ubaseringinaac negenghodungaima herea buu kic fikengfiha amma ngic yofi edeec, “Ge mariga sinena!” deu ngic ye maria sineu ngereec.
41003006	Ngereeu farisaio yeneng naso imohaingoc Herodeac arengfora yenearu ioha kemma dafiu mema kpegecdeac yoac dedzege anggec.
41003007	Anu Yesu nga medacfora yeni amabangec wama Gariraia dzohonnu kemmagec Gariraia bangecfunac habu kunengngo modacyunugec.
41003008	Ngicngac Yudaia bangecfunac nga Yerusaleng taonnunac amma Idumaia bangecfunac nga Yodang edibigeng amma Tiro nga Sidong bangecfunac, habutoa imoc yeni Yesungo faka sasawa meec, imocac siduc negemma yearu hagec.
41003009	Nga Ngicngac homacngo hasikema Yesu igockebauac medacfora yeneng wage wegenac faigecdeac edeyunuec.
41003010	Nga ye ngic homac mengereyunuu hafeigoc yeneng kemma kpeseregecdeac hefacemegec.
41003011	Nga asu seuhagoc yeneng Yesu hemma ngonducnema yofi dema kpacma degec, “Genoc Anutuac medac.”
41003012	Ifi degec hania dekperagibauac Yesungo dederac ayemmeec.
41003013	Anu ye tikiu emma medac goa ubango negengising ayemmeecmoc, deu yearu kenggec.
41003014	Kenggec medac 12 meisingyunuma aposoro kpac yemmeec. Yemmeu yeni yegoc kecmagec yoac edekpou ayemmegecde nga hadehade nga yafing kporacyemmegecdeac uayoac nga kuc yemmeec.
41003016	Ngic 12 meisingyunuec, yeneac kpacngina yofi, Simong, kpara mong Petoro miec, ye
41003017	amma Dzebedaioac medachora Yakobo nga munea Yohane, yereac kpacngira Boanerges yemerec. Imocac titiha, parandanggac medac.
41003018	Nga Anderea amma Firipo nga Batoromaio amma Mataio nga Toma amma Yakobo, imoc Arifaioac medac nga Tadaio amma Simong Kananaio nga Yuda Karioto amaunac, yeng kecma Yesu kerereu megec.
41003020	Anu Yesungo amau kensikeu habutoango hama kpedzucnegec medacforagoc yakaneneac titing mong mi fingerec.
41003021	Wiacfora yeneng yofi negenggec, “Ye ubea sufude.” ifi dema megecdeac kenggec.
41003022	Nga mitiac negen negengngic Yerusalennac hagec, yeneng degec, “Ye hadehade nga yafing yeneac ngictaungina Bedzeburu, yeac kucfu hadehade nga yafing ngicngac yenearunac kporacande.”
41003023	Ifi degec Yesungo kpacyunuma yoac heima yofi edeyunuec, “Satang yengenaocngoc dafi kporacemeude?
41003024	Bangec monggac ngicngac yeni ngaba angemema tohogecdeu bangec imocngo naric mi fekefude, kpac.
41003025	Nga amamana mocgungo tohoma ngaba angemeudeu amamana imocngo kpac anude.
41003026	Nga Satangngo tohoma yengenaocngoc kporacemeudeu ye ifingoc kpac anude.
41003027	Ngic mongngo ngic kuhagoc, yeac amau emma iwaiya naric mi wangerude, kpac. Ye ngic kuhagoc imoc witickemaguc amea manau emma iwaiya tacde, imoc naric wangerude.
41003028	Foracngoc, ngicngac yeni kopocsic hania hania angandae nga wiac hania haniaac deendema nga dedenggbaring angandae, kopocsic ifia sasawa, imocac wawa fede, imoc edengunuduae.
41003029	Nga ngic mongngo Tiri Asu denggbaringgeude, yeac kopocsic ine wawaya mi fede. Kopocsihaac turunga imoc fekengkecbesande.”
41003030	Yeneng degec, “Ye asu seuhagoc.” imocac amma yeng ifi edeyunuec.
41003031	Anu Yesuac nonggo munafora yeneng sobennu kensikema ngic mong suema degec, “Yesu ye mabeso.” ge ifi edena.
41003032	Ifi degec Yesungo habu yeneac botucfu tacmanu ngicngac yeneng edegec, “Nonggo munafocga ngadeau namma ge hofocgudae.”
41003033	Ifi degec yeng merengyemmeec, “Damoc yeneng neac nonggo munafocna?”
41003034	Ifi dema yegoc momoc tacgec, kiwa yenearu fima yofi deec, “Nonggo munafocna imoc ngicngac ngeni yomoc tacdae.
41003035	Nga ngic Anutuac songo nga negen negeng modacma yeac ua mekecdae, yeneng neac nonggo naing nga dacmunafocna.”
41004001	Yesungo dzohong tegiau monggoc kemma ngicngac edekpou ayemmeu homacngo yearu kpedzucnema hagec. Imocac yeng gomba monnu emma ihai tacma edekpou ayemmeec.
41004002	Amma ye yoac heima yoac homac kpouyemmema yofi deec,
41004003	“Negenggec, gbome kpegi kpegingic mongngo gbomea kpegiudeac uau kenec.
41004004	Kemma kpegiu gbome goa mama sinnu heiu neng yeneng hama nedacgec.
41004005	Nga goa harongannu heiu ihai bangec efeanec feecac gbome imoc bic nemonggema ereec.
41004006	Erema godea ine homac mi faiecac wenacngo erema kpeu gbome imoc ururuema homeec.
41004007	Nga gbome goa haseng manau heiu hasengngo yadima heihomeu fora kpac anec.
41004008	Nga gbome goango bangec gombungau heima kpea nemonggema fora gombunga anec. Monggac imoc gbomea 30 nga monggac 60 amma monggac 100, ifi fingerec.”
41004009	Yesungo ifi dema yofi edeyunuec, “Kedzahagoc yeng yoac yomoc negembeso.”
41004010	Anu ngicngac habutoa kenggec medacfora 12 nga ngicngac goa yegoc kecgec, yeneng yoac heihei imocac hania Yesu kpesimigec
41004011	yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Anutuac eucererenggac negen negeng sufu sufuya, imoc ngeni bic ngemmengemmea. Nga ngicngac ngadeau kecdae, yeni ine yoac heiheiusingsac yoac sasawa negenggecde.
41004012	Ifi anu ‘Yeni kicnginango hemma wiac mong ine mi henggecde nga kedzacnginango negemma wiac mong sifu mi negentegecgecde. Imocac yeni ubangina dzigenebacac Anutungo kopocsicngina mi wayemmeude.’ ” (Yes 6:9-10)
41004013	Anu Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ni yoac heima deduae, ngeni imocac hania mi negendaeu yoac heiheiac hania goa monggoc deba imoc ifingoc dafi negentegecgecde.
41004014	Gbome kpegi kpegi ngicngo Anutuac yoac kpegiec.
41004015	Gbome sinnu heiec, imoc ngic goa yeni yoara negenggec nga Satang ye ine bic hama gbome ubanginau kpegi kpegia meickeude.
41004016	Nga gbome harongannu heiec, imoc ngic goa Anutuac yoac negemma heresongogoc bic hoanggegecde.
41004017	Amma yoac ubanginau godea mi meecac naso wegenanecsac taru Anutuac yoacac amma kpendzeng me yunukporac faka fingeru yeni makpegecde.
41004018	Nga gbome hasennu heiec, imoc goa yeni Anutuac yoac negenggec.
41004019	Negemma bangectoa bangec yomocac kekecac fagung nga dzofinacac faitobang nga wiac goaac hensongo angandae, imoc sasawango ubanginau kemema yoac heihomeu fora mong mi fingerude.
41004020	Nga gbome goa bangec kerehagocfu heiec, imoc ngic goango Anutuac yoac negemma mekecgec fora fingerude. Goango 30 nga goango 60 amma goango 100 meficgeude.”
41004021	Yesungo monggoc yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic mongngo kifa kpiacma pake bageau faima mi kperahaude me tatac bageu faiu tarude, imoc kpac. Kifa imoc tatahau faini tacande.
41004022	Wiac sufu sufuu fede, imoc kecma didiu fingectegerude nga wiac seme semea, imoc kecma kperagiau fingectegerude.
41004023	Mong ye kedzahagocngo yoac yomoc negembeso.”
41004024	Amma Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni yoac yomoc negentegecbisia. Ngeni wiac kpetea isinggema ngicngac yemmeandae, ngic yeneng kpete siriha ifiangoc isinggema turung kpoungemmegecde. Yeni kpoungemmema imocac sirihau meemma monggoc ngemmegecde.
41004025	Imoc yofiac, mong ye wiac goa femide, ye wiac monggoc migecde. Nga mong ye wiac mong mi femide, yearunac wiacbisic femide, imoc ifingoc wangecgecde.”
41004026	Amma monggoc yofi deec, “Anutuac eucererenggac siriha, imoc ngic mongngo gbome kpegiec, ifi isoc. Kpegiu hadzing toforec feyac ammanu gbome imoc nesarima ereude. Nga imoc dafiac erede, imoc ngicngo mi negentegecde.
41004028	Nga bangec yengenaoc wiac meyadiu erema tebang angkecde. Amma fora amma wadzima kpaueude.
41004029	Kpaueu fora kpememe naso anu ye semeng bic kperecgeude.”
41004030	Yesungo monggoc yofi deec, “Nenang Anutuac eucererenggac siriha yofi heima deni naric anude.
41004031	Anutuac eucerereng imoc mastet gbomea isoc. Mastet gbomea imoc gbome sasawa yeneac kapiangina. Nga imoc bangecfu faini erema yadima semeng uaac mondzang feracyunuma fawa kuneng angande. Nga sawau neng yeneng imocac nokumucfu hama faec heima tacgecde.”
41004033	Yesungo yoac heima yoac ifia homac dema ngicngac negen negengnginaac sirihau Kebuac yoac edeyunuec.
41004034	Amma yoac deec, imoc ine yoac heimasac edeyunukefec. Edeyunuma medacfora meyunuma tembucfu kemma hania dekperagima edeyunukefec.
41004035	Anu ama marai anu Yesungo medacfora yofi edeyunuec, “Nenang dzohong noboc kenni.”
41004036	Ifi deu yeni ngicngac habutoa wayunuma Yesu gombau bic tacmanu yeni ye wangecma kenggec. Kemmagec gomba goango ifingoc modacyunugec.
41004037	Nga imohai firang engena kpeu tembong kucgoc kpeu dokungo gomba manau erema gomba mewakebeso anec.
41004038	Anu Yesungo gomba ngadeau kparicgang heima gau femanu medacfora yeneng midima degec, “Kpoukpou, kemebesonga andimbe, ge imocac fagung mong mi annec me?”
41004039	Ifi degec ye gauunac yacma firang kpetarimima dzohong yofi edeec, “Ge waickema fena!” ifi deu firang kpac anu dzohong imoc ning kpema eng feec.
41004040	Feu Yesungo medac yeneac yofi deec, “Ngeni nocac kengec andae, negen negensingngina mong mi fede me?”
41004041	Ifi deu yeni kengec nga damutoa yombong amma kpesiemegec, “Ye noc ngic, firang nga dzohongtoa yereng yeac enac tofohodape.”
41005001	Anu dzohong ferecgema Gerasene bangecfu edigeng kenggec.
41005002	Kensikema Yesungo gombaunac mamanu ngic mong asu seuhagocngo kicsereunac hama Yesu meficgeec.
41005003	Ngic imoc ye kicsereu feyac angkefu ngic mongngo ye witickeudeacsoc mi anec. Nga yeni sengngo witickebeso ifingoc obohogec.
41005004	Ngic yeni naso homac hanimaria sengngo witickegec yeng seng kperecgedarec nga hania aiengngo witickegec, imoc ifingoc kperecgedarec. Nga ngic sasawa yeni ye mendanggegecdeac obohogec.
41005005	Ngic imoc ye hadzing toforec kicsereu nga fagannu arohoma yengenaoc sebia hocfu heiherecge angemekefec.
41005006	Amma ye hereaungoc Yesu hemma nedzikemma haniau makpeec.
41005007	Makpema seriangoc arohoma deec, “Yesu Anutu engenatoaac Medac, neac wiac imoc geac mi ande. Ni Anutuac kicfu edeguduae, ge kpendzennu mi fainuna.”
41005008	Yesungo asu seuhagoc kporaru yearunac erema kenudeac edeec, imocac amma ngicngo ifi deec.
41005009	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi kpesimiec, “Ge kpacga merac?” kpesimiu deec, “Ni kpacna habutoa, nocac neni homac.”
41005010	Ifi deu ye kporacyunuu bangec imoc mi wagecdeac seriyombonggema derecgeec.
41005011	Anu bangec botuc imohai berechabutoa mong fagang wegenacfu surukpema kecgec.
41005012	Kecgec asu seuhagoc yeneng yofi dema desambic ammigec, “Ge suenununa berecfu kemeni.”
41005013	Ifi degec Yesungo negengyemmeu yeni ngicfunac erema berechabu yenearu kemegec. Kemegec berec yeni fagannunac nedzima dzohonnu kemema doku nema homedacgec. Nga berec homegec, yeneac kpetengina imoc 2 tauseng isoc.
41005014	Anu berecgareng yeneng kengec worama taonnu nga amabisicfu ngic kecgec, yenearu kemma faka fingerec, imocac siduc edeyunugec yeneng imoc hengecdeac hagec.
41005015	Nga yeni Yesuaru hasikema henggec ngic hadehadehabugoc warac kefec, yeng negentegecma wamba heima taru yeni ye hemma kengecyunuec.
41005016	Nga ngic kicnginango faka imoc henggec, yeneng ngic hadehadegoc, yearu faka fingerec nga berec yeneac siduc momoc ngicngac ayemmegec.
41005017	Nga yeni yoac imoc negendacma Yesungo amabangecngina waudeac edegec.
41005018	Ifi edegec ye gombau emmanu ngic hadehadegoc ngereec, yeng yegoc kenudeac derecgeec.
41005019	Derecgeu Yesungo ine kpetarimima yofi deec, “Ge amagau kemma Kebungo geac ubea manganeu wiac sasawa anggendac, imocac siduc tosofocga ayemmebesena.”
41005020	Ifi deu ye kemma Yesungo faka sasawa yearu meec, imocac siduc Dekapolis bangecfu ngicngac yoac dekperagiyemmeu yeni imoc negemma kerectegec anggec.
41005021	Anu Yesungo gombau emma monggoc dzohong ferecgema hasike nammanu ngicngac homacngo yearu heockema kemma kpedzucnegec.
41005022	Kpedzucnemagec kpekpeturang amaac gareng mong kpara Yairo, yeng hama Yesuac haniau makpema desambic amma deec,
41005023	“Naroanna homebeso ande. Ge hama marigango witiau faina ngereeude.”
41005024	Edeu negemma kemmaec ngicngac habutoango hefacemema yearu hagec.
41005025	Anu ngac mong ihaingoc nanec, ye sacherec amma kecmanu kifa 12 bic anec.
41005026	Amma ye kpendzeng kpema dota homac yenearu kemma hiedzoya eng kpedzonggeu sebiau ngerec ngeree mong ine mi fingecmiu eng monggoc manganeec.
41005027	Amma ngac imoc ye Yesuac siduc negemma ngicngac ngadenginausing kemma yofi negenec, “Ni ngakpia kpeserema ngereebadenoc.” ifi negemma Yesuac ngakpihereha kpesereec.
41005029	Kpesereu imohaingoc sawa gbanggeu sebia nomaneu kpendzenga kpac anu negengemeec.
41005030	Nga Yesungo yofi negenec, kucna tosea ferecgedac, imocac amma habutoa yenearu dzigenema yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Merang ngakpina kpeseredac?”
41005031	Ifi deu medacfora yeneng degec, “Ngicngac homac yeneng hefacgumagec geng merang kpeserenude dema kpesinec, imoc mi heide.”
41005032	Nga Yesu ye ine ngacngo kpesereec, ye hentegerudeac fikengfiha anec.
41005033	Ammanu ngac ye kengec kpeu dzonoma fedeu Yesuac haniau makpema haniaya hafoangoc deficgedarec, nocac sebiau faka fingerec, imoc negenec.
41005034	Deficgeu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Naroang, negen negensinggango mengeregudac. Ge sebiga ngereeu ruaegoc kenna!”
41005035	Anu Yesungo yoac denammanungoc ngic goa yeneng kpebung garenggac amaunac hama Yairo edegec, “Naroangga bic homedac, kpoukpou monggoc ebic mi mina!”
41005036	Ifi degec Yesungo yoacngina wama gareng yofi edeec, “Ge mi kengecguu, eng negensinggena.”
41005037	Ifi dema habu kpetariyemmema Petoro nga Yakobo amma munea Yohane, yeni meyunuu kenggec.
41005038	Kemma garenggac amau kensikema henu ngicngac habu yeni ubahodung amma kpeborongtoa kpema kiacsonggong anggec.
41005039	Nga Yesungo ine ama manau emma ngicngac yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni nocac kpeborong kpema kiacdae? Naroang ye mi homedac, ye gau fede.”
41005040	ifi deu yeni dzomoremigec. Yeng ine ngicngac sasawa kporacyunuu ngadeau madacgec. Magec naroanggac nonggomama nga medacfora harebec meyunuu naroang feec, ihai enggec.
41005041	Emma mariau mema yofi edeec, “Tarita koumi!” imocac titiha yofi, “Ngacbisic, ni edeguduae, ge yacna.”
41005042	Ifi deu naroang ye imohaingoc yacma kengha anu yeneng hemma kpidohoma negenggec imoc wiac engena anec. Naroang imoc ye kifaya 12 anec.
41005043	Nga Yesungo faka fingerec, imoc mi deficgegecdeac seria deracyunuma naroang yaka migec neudeac edeyunuec.
41006001	Yesungo bangec imoc wama yengena amabangehau kenu medacfora yeneng modacgec.
41006002	Nga sabata naso anu ye kpekpeturang amau emma ngic edekpou ayemmeu ngicngac negemma tacgec yeneng kerectegec amma degec, “Negen negeng imoc merang kpoumiec nga uayoac merang miecac mariango faka kuhagoc ifia mekecde?
41006003	Ye Mariaac medac nga amamemengic. Ye Yakobo nga Yosec amma Yuda nga Simong yeneac dacngina nga naingfora yeni nenanggoc kecdae.” Yeni ifi dema dehesi amma wagec.
41006004	Nga Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Profeteac amafora nga sactosofora amma arengfora, yenengsac yeac ewea mi heiandae.”
41006005	Nga ye faka kuhagoc mong yenearu meudeacsoc mi anec. Ye ngic hafeigoc mocgu mocgusac mariango kpesereyunuu ngereegec.
41006006	Nga yeni mi negensinggegecac negenu naric mi anec. Amma ye guruama tackenec, imohai yerecgema edekpou ayemmeec.
41006007	Yesungo medacfora 12 kpacyunuma yohockang yohockang hendzicyunuma asu seuhagoc kporacgecdeac uayoac nga kuc yemmema sueyunuec.
41006008	Amma yeng yofi dema dederecge ayemmeec, “Ngeni singgac mefic mong mi mema yasusac mebisia. Ngeni yaka me hie mi mebisia amma dzo mong fadeng nabehau mi baribisia.
41006009	Ngeni hanitabe faima ngakpi yohockang ine mi mekembisia.”
41006010	Ifi dema yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni kemma ama monnu kensikegec ngic yeneng ama heingemmegec ngeni ama imohai tacyac angkecgec wisickeu wama amabangec monnu kembisia.
41006011	Nga amabangec monnu kenggec ngic yeni mi hoangngunugecde amma yoacngina mi negenggecdeu ngeni haninginaunac yube kpegec mau amabangec imoc wabisia. Nga ngic yeni imoc hemma haniangina negentegecbisia.”
41006012	Yesungo ifi deu yeni kemma ngicngac ubangina merenggecdeac Anutuac yoac edekpou ayemmegec.
41006013	Amma yeni hadehade nga yafing homac kporacyunugec nga ngicngac hafeigoc kerecngo nadzicyemmema mengereyunugec.
41006014	Yesuac siduc imoc bangeha bangeha sokoma kenu ngictau Herodengo yoac imoc negemma yofi negenec, “Yohane dokunadzicngo homecfunac gborima yarecac amma faka kuhagoc meudeac kuc femide.”
41006015	Ifi degec ngic goa yeneng degec, “Imoc Eria.” nga goango degec, “Ye profete. Profete warac kecgec, yeni isoc.”
41006016	Anu Herodengo ine yoac imoc negemma deec, “Yohane ubea kperecgeai, yennoc gboriec kecde.”
41006017	Nga Herodengo munea Firipoac enema kpara Herodia, ye hamangec mema mekefec. Faka imocac amma Yohanengo Herode yofi edeec, “Ge munagaac enema menec, imoc singngo mi dede.” Ifi deu Herodengo ngicfora edeyunuu Yohane mema witickema witicamau faigec.
41006019	Anu Herodiango Yohaneac herebu negenec. Negenu Herode ye ine Yohaneac kengec kpeu garenggeecac amma Herodiango kpeudeac sing obohoec.
41006020	Imoc yofiac, Yohane ye ngic dindingac nga kpetiac, Herodengo imoc negentegecma henggareng ammikefec. Amma ye yeac yoac negemma naso homac negengyohoc meficgema sifu yoara negenudeac ammiec.
41006021	Kecma Herodiaac naso gombunga mong yofi fingerec. Herodengo fingec fingec nasoyau ngickuneng yeac bageau kecgec nga wasaingicforaac enarafocngina amma Gariraia bangecfunac ngicenarafocngina, yeni heitaiyunuma neneyaka ohoyemmegec.
41006022	Ohoyemmema tacmagec Herodiaac naroangngo hama kicnginau yegec fedeec. Fedeu Herode nga ngic yegoc yaka negec, yeneng imoc hemma songo negenggec. Imocac amma ngictaungo naroanggac deec, “Ge wiac monggac negemma derecgenenna imoc naric gembade.”
41006023	Dema nemuya monggac kpacfu yofi deseriec, “Ge wiac sasawa derecgenenna gengyombonggebade nga bangecna nobohaac dena mendzicma gembade.”
41006024	Ifi deu naroang ye kemma nonggea kpesimiec, “Ni noc wiacac debade?” deu nonggeango deec, “Ge Yohane dokunadzicac oruha dena.”
41006025	Ifi deu naroang ye imohaingoc ngictau yearu kemma deec, “Yohane dokunadzicac oruha yagucngoc terau faima nennadeac anende.”
41006026	Ifi deu ngictaungo ubaebic meec. Amma ngic tacgec, yeneac kicfu yoac bic deseriecac amma ine imoc wabesonga negenu naric mi anec.
41006027	Nga ye imohaingoc wasaingic mong sueu Yohaneac hatea mehaudeac witicamau kenec. Kemma Yohaneac ubia kperecgema
41006028	hatea imoc terau faima mehama naroang miu naroangngo imoc mekemma nonggea miec.
41006029	Anu Yohaneac medacfora yeneng siduc imoc negemma kemma farenga mehama tonggogec.
41006030	Aposoro yeni monggoc Yesuaru kpeturangge hama wiac sasawa anggec megec nga edekpou ayemmegec, imocac siduc ammigec.
41006031	Nga ngicngac homac yeneng kengha anggecac tacnegeng nga yakaneneac titing mong mi fingerec. Imocac Yesungo medacfora yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni hagec tembucnina kecnideac nigoc bangec kisiu kemma kecnegembisia.”
41006032	Ifi deu yeni tembucngina gombau emma bangec mong ngiha kpacfu kenggec.
41006033	Kemmagec ngicngac homacngo ine yenemma yenentegecma taong tackenec, imohacnac nedzima warac warac ihai kensikegec.
41006034	Kensikema Yesungo gombaunac mama ngicngac habutoa ifi yenemma yeneac ubahodung negenec. Nocac yeni rama garengngina kpac kecdae, ifi isoc kecgec. Ifi negemma wiac homac edekpou ayemmeec.
41006035	Ayemmema kefu marai anu medacfora yeneng yearu hama degec, “Bangec yomoc ngiha kpac anu naso bic kendacde.
41006036	Imocac ge ngicngac sueyununa ama tackende, imohai kemma yaka bummenec ambisia.”
41006037	ifi degec yeng yofi deec, “Ngeneng yaka yemmegec negec.” Ifi deu merenggec, “Neni kemma 200 denaringo yaka bummehama yemmeni negecdeac denec me?”
41006038	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Ngenearu ic sogong dafiguc fede, ngeni kemma henggec.” Ifi deu kenghemma edegec, “Ic sogong marimong nga kondungyang yohockang metacdimbe.”
41006039	Ifi degec yeng ngicngac kpindzinnu matacgecdeac edeyunuec. Edeyunuu yeni mama goa 100 nga goa 50 ifi habu mema kpindzinnu tackenggec.
41006041	Tacmagec Yesungo ic sogong marimong nga kondungyang yohockang imoc meec. Mema kiwa kurumennu fiu enu kenehema ic sogong tuema medacfora ngicngac gumecyunugecdeac yemmeec. Yemmema kondungyang ifingoc mederema yemmeu medacgec.
41006042	Mema ngicngac sasawango negebec amma
41006043	ic sogong nga kondungyang tosea neti anggec feu kpedzucnegec kemema sakac 12 wakeec.
41006044	Ngic yaka negec, imoc yeneac kpetengina 5 tauseng.
41006045	Nedacgec wisickeu Yesungo ngicngac faiyunuudeac namma medacfora sueyunuu yeni waraima gombau emma Besaida taonnu kenggec.
41006046	Kemmagec ye ngicngac faiyunuma numuudeac tikiu enec.
41006047	Nga ama toforeyemmeu gombango dzohong dzongiau kemmanu Yesungo tembuha yeigeng kefec.
41006048	Kefu medacfora kemmagec ama werec wereckenggac firangngo kenggecfusing haecac puri kpebibiegec. Ifi anggec Yesungo yenemma yenearugeng dzohong witiau titi kemma feracyunubeso anec.
41006049	Ye dzohong witiau titi kenecac yeni hemma ine wosongango hade, ifi negemma kengec amma arohogec
41006050	yeng yofi bic edeyunuec, “Ngeni wosongina makiu, imoc ni, ngeni mi kengecngunuu.”
41006051	ifi dema gombau emma yenigoc taru firang kpac anec. Nga yeni ongangina worau kerectegec anggec.
41006052	Amma yeni herengina dzege dzegea feecac amma yakau faka fingerec, imoc mi negentegecgec.
41006053	Anu yeni dzohong ferecgema Genesarete bangecfu kensikema gombangina dzegegec tarec.
41006054	Taru gombaunac mamagec ngicngac yeneng Yesu bic hensigec.
41006055	Hensima amea amea nedzikemma ngicngac hafeigoc tofou faiyunuma, “Ye ihai me ihai kecde.” imoc negemma ihai meyunu hakecgec.
41006056	Yesungo taonnu nga amabisicfu endaru ngicngac yeneng ngicngac hafeigoc meyunuma didiu faiyunugec ngakpia susiaac witiha kpeseregecdeac derecgegec. Amma kpeseregec, yeni sasawango ngereegec.
41007001	Farisaio nga Yerusalennac mitiac negen negengngic goa yeneng Yesuaru hama kpeturanggema kecgec,
41007002	imohai Yesuac medacfora goa yeni maringina mi dzuac dzuac yaka menec anggec yenenggec.
41007003	Imoc yofiac, farisaio nga yudangic sasawango bangecfocnginaac singyoac modacma maringina dzuacmaguc yaka neandae.
41007004	Amma yeni emenecfunac hama doku nadzic nadziha kpac yaka eng mi menec amma faka goa ifia momoc kpabanggema angandae. Yeni kpakenec nga sokoc amma birikeng ifingoc dzuacmaguc neandae.
41007005	Ifi anu farisaio nga mitiac negen negengngic yeneng Yesu kpesimigec, “Medacfocga yeni nocac bangecfocnina nga esangabofocnina yeneac singyoac mi modacma maringina mi dzuac dzuac yaka eng menec angandae?”
41007006	ifi degec yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Profete Yesaiango ngic ikoha ngeneacnoc kpefing fora yombong yofi ohoec, ‘Ngichabu yomoc yeni enacbibicngo sesehenuandae nga herenginango ine neac hereau kecdae.
41007007	Yeni ngicngac wiac kpouyemmeandae, imoc ngicac singyoac edekpou ayemmeandae amma ni eng dengerenugec hemba fora kpac angkecde.’ (Yes 29:13)
41007008	Ngeni Anutuac dedeseriyoac meickema ngic yeneac singyoac hoanggeandae.”
41007009	Amma monggoc yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni ngenang singyoac hoanggeandaeac Anutuac dedeseriyoac meickeyombonggegecde.
41007010	Mosengo yoac mong yofi deec, ‘Ge nonggomanghocga seseheyurubesena.’ nga ‘Ngic mong ye nonggea me mamaac sowecyoac deude, ye homebeso.’ ” (Mke 20:12; 21:17; Sese 20:9; Dser 5:16)
41007011	Ngeneng ine yofi deandae, “Ngic mongngo nonggea me mama yofi edema deude, ‘Wiac gemba nanggegudeac dedua, imoc bic Anutuac sese dedua.’
41007012	Ifi deu ngeni ngic nonggea me mama meficgeudeac dekpetari ammigecde.
41007013	Amma ngeni singyoacngina kpabanggema Anutuac yoac semema faka goa ifia homac angandae.”
41007014	Yesungo ifi dema ngichabu monggoc kpacyunuu hagec yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni kedzac kpema negentegecdacgec.
41007015	Wiac mongngo ngadeaunac kemeande, imocngo ngic ubahere naric mi heidzadzu kpeude, kpac. Nga ngic heremanaunac wiac ereande, imocngo ine ngic heidzadzu kpeude.
41007016	Ngic kedzahagoc kecde, yeng yoac yomoc negembeso.”
41007017	Ye ifi dema ngicngac wayunuma amau enu medacfora yeneng yoac heima deec, imocac kpesimigec yofi edeyunuec,
41007018	“Ngeni negen negentegecngina kpac, ifi isoc kecdaengoc. Ngadeaunac wiac mong heremanau kemeande, imocngo naric mi heidzadzu kpeude, ngeni imoc mi negentegecdae me?
41007019	Wiac imocngo ubanginau mi kemeandeac hereu kemema isinggeu keractennu kemeude.” Yesungo ifi dema yaka sasawa nenideac desorongaiec.
41007020	Amma torokpema yofi deec, “Wiac mong ngic ubahereunac ereande, imocngo ine heidzadzu kpeude.
41007021	Nga ngic ubahereunac wiac yofia ereande, negen negeng mangana nga kaiserofaka amma hamangecfaka nga ngickpekpe amma eweeneng mewa nga kic hodung amma manganaac areng meme nga ikoc faka amma faka sicsauha nga keracmangang amma desureyoac nga sebiengeng amma ubafong,
41007023	imoc sasawango ubahereunac erema ngic heidzadzu kpeude.”
41007024	Anu Yesungo yacma imohacnac kenec. Kemma Tiro nga Sidong amabangecfu kensikema ama monnu enec. Enu ngicngac yeni taong imohai siduha mi negenggecdeac, ifi negenec amma ye ine sufuma tarudeac obohoec.
41007025	Ammanu imohaingoc Sirofoinikia bangecfunac grikngac mongngo haec. Hama Yesuac haniu makpema naroanga asu seuhagoc kporacmiudeac derecgemiec.
41007027	Derecgemiu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Nambarac yeni yaka warac warac nema gebecyunubeso. Nambarac yeneac yaka wangecyunuma kasi yenearu ukunide, imocngo faka gombunga kpac.”
41007028	Ifi deu ngacngo meremmiec, “Kebu, imoc negenduae, amma kasi yeni sifu nambarac yeneng yaka kisisickegec tebo bageau maande, imocsac neandae.”
41007029	ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ge yoac ifi denecac kenna, hadehade ye naroangga bic wadac.”
41007030	Ifi deu ngac ye ameau kemma henu hadehadengo naroanga bic wau naroang ye fefeau waickema feec.
41007031	Yesungo Tiro bangecfunac dzigenema Sidong taong ferecgema Dekapolis bangecfu sing kemma Gariraia dzohonnu kensikeec.
41007032	Kensikemanu ngicngac yeneng ngic mong kedzacfong nga yoac dedeac enara ebiria, ye mehama Yesu mariango kpesereudeac desambic ammigec.
41007033	Ifi degec negemma ye ngichabu yenearunac meickema ngic ngadeau faiu nanu gbongango kedzahau faima mariau sofohoma nedzaranga kpesereec.
41007034	Kpeserema kurumennu fiu enu asu heima deec, “Effata!” Imocac titiha yofi, “Ge sarina!”
41007035	Ifi deu ngic kedzaha bic sariu nedzaranga monggoc merenu yoac tongganang deec.
41007036	Ifi deu Yesungo faka fingerecmoc, imoc ngicngac yeneng mi deyadigecdeac seria yombong deracyunuu yeni ine imoc monggoc deyadiyombonggema degec.
41007037	Ifi degec ngicngac yeni homac wareckema kerectegec amma degec, “Ye wiac sasawa mema kecde, imoc ngereeyombonggedacde. Ye ngicngac kedzacfong yeneac kedzac mesariude nga yoacngina kpac, yeni yoac meficgeyemmeude.”
41008001	Naso imohai ngicngac habutoa yeni monggoc Yesuaru hama kpeturanggegec. Nga yakangina kpac anu Yesungo medacfora kpacyunuma yofi edeyunuec,
41008002	“Ngicngac yomoc yeni yakangina kpac uameme harebec bic nigoc kecdauac ubana manganede.
41008003	Goa yeni amabangec hereaunac hagecac yakaya kpacfu sueyunuba amanginau kengkecma kicgigi ayemmebacac.”
41008004	Ifi deu medacfora yeneng degec, “Nenang bangec kisi yofiau yaka dafiu meficgema habutoa yemmeni gebecyunuude?”
41008005	ifi degec Yesungo kpesiyemmeec, “Ngeni ic sogong dafiguc mekecdae?” deu yeni “Seweng” degec.
41008006	Ifi degec negemma Yesungo habu bangecfu matacgecdeac edeyunuec. Edeyunuma ic sogong seweng mema Anutuac ubangerec dema tuema medacfora yemmeu yeneng mederema ngicngac arennu yemmegec.
41008007	Amma ye kondungyangbisic bisic goa metacgecmoc, imoc ifingoc Anutu ubangerec edema faiyemmegecdeac edeyunuec.
41008008	Faiyemmegec yeni negec gebecyunuu yaka tosea tarec, imoc mema kpedzucnegec sakac 7 anec.
41008009	Nga ngic 4 tauseng ihai tacgec, yeni negec wisickeu sueyunuu kengha anggec.
41008010	Nga Yesu ye imohaingoc medacforagoc gombau emma Darimanuta bangecfu kenggec.
41008011	Farisaio yeneng hama Yesugoc yoacngina engemmama anec. Yeni kuha isinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc mong kurumennunac meu henggecdeac derecgemigec.
41008012	Ifi degec yeng ongaasuyau ebic meficgema yofi deec, “Naso yomocac ngicngac ngeni nocac faka kuhagoc henggecdeac derecgeandae? Foracngoc, ngicngacareng yomoc ngenearu faka kuhagoc mong naric mi fingecngemmeude, imoc edengunuduae.”
41008013	Ifi dema ngic imoc wayunuma gombau monggoc emma dzohong nobocgeng kenggec.
41008014	Naso imohai medac yeni ic sogong nigecyunuu mocgusac gombau taru mekenggec.
41008015	Nga Yesungo gorongina kpema yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni farisaio nga Herode yeneac yis, imocac henghomema kecbisia.”
41008016	ifi deu yenaocngoc denegeng amma degec, “Nenang ic sogonnina kpac, imocac amma ifi dede.”
41008017	Ifi denegeng anggec ye imoc negemma edeyunuec, “Ngeni ic sogong mi mehadauac denegeng andae nga ngeni yoac imoc wagec. Ngeni herenegen negengngina dzege dzegeaac amma wiac mong mi negentegecdae.
41008018	Ngeni kicnginagocngo wiac mi hengandae nga kedzacnginagoc ammanu wiac mi negengandae.
41008019	Ni ic sogong 5 tuema ngic 5 tauseng gumecyunuba tosea taru sakac dafiguc kpedzucnegec wakeec, imoc bic nigecngunuec me?” Kpesiyemmeu yeni 12 degec.
41008020	“Anu monggoc ic sogong 7 tuema ngic 4 tauseng gumecyunuba tosea taru sakac dafiguc kpedzucnegec wakeec?” kpesiu yeni 7 degec.
41008021	Ifi degec yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni yaguc ifingoc negen negengngina mi ireckedengoc.”
41008022	Anu yeni Betsaida amabangecfu kensikemagec ngicngac yeneng ngic kicpisic mong Yesuaru mehama mariango kpesereudeac desambic ammigec.
41008023	Ifi anggec ye kicpisic mariau mema guruama ngadeau hesicke kemma kiwau sofohoma mariango witiau faima kpesimiec, “Ge wiac mong hennec me?”
41008024	Kpesimiu kicpisic yeng kic fima deec, “Ngic yeni siricngina ic isoc yenemba kengha andae.”
41008025	Ifi deu Yesungo kiwau maria monggoc faiu ngereema wiac sasawa gombunga nga dindingac henec.
41008026	Henu suema yofi edeec, “Ge amagau kemma taonnusing mi embesena.”
41008027	Amma Yesungo medacfora yenigoc Kaisarea Firipo taonnu kenggec. Sinnu kemmagec yeng medacfora yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Ngicngac yeni neac merac deandae?”
41008028	Ifi deu degec, “Ngic goango Yohane dokunadzic deandae nga goango Eria amma goa yeneng ine profete mong esea deandae.”
41008029	Ifi degec yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Anu ngeni ngenaoc ine neac merac deandae?” deu Petorongo deec, “Ge Messia.”
41008030	Ifi deu yeng yoac imoc ngic mong mi edeyunugecdeac deracyunuec.
41008031	Anu Yesungo yofi edekpou ayemmeec, “Ngicac Medac ye kpendzeng homac kpebeso. Yudangic enarafocngina nga womonggareng enara amma mitiac negen negengngic yeneng ye ubango wama kpegec homebeso. Homeu uameme harebec ammanu monggoc gborima yacbeso.”
41008032	Yoac imocac didiu yombong edeyunuu Petorongo ngadeau wangec kemma tembucfu namma kpetarimiyombonggeec.
41008033	Kpetarimiu Yesungo dzigenema kiwa medac yenearu fima Petoro kpetarimima edeec, “Satang, ge ngadenau hakenna. Ge wiac negennec, imoc Anutuarunac kpac, imocngo ine ngicac negen negeng ande.”
41008034	Yesungo habu nga medacfora kpacyunuma yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic mong ye ni modacnubeso negendeu ye yengena ubasebiaac songo memama mariponga miacma tofohoma modacnubeso.
41008035	Imoc yofiac, ngic mong ye kekeha segereudeac negemma uaya mede, ye kekeha sufumiude. Nga ngic mong ye neac amma nga siduc gombunggac amma kekeha waude, ye ine kekeha fingecmiude.
41008036	Imocac ngic mongngo bangectoa bangec yomocac wiac sasawa meficgeecac kekeha ukuu sufuude, imocngo ngic naric mi meficgeude.
41008037	Ngickekec monggoc memeaac sing mong mi fede.
41008038	Imoc yofiac, ngic mongngo neac negenu gameagoc anude amma neac yoacnaac negenu gameagoc ande, yearu yofi fingerude, Ngicac Medacngo Mamaac kuc nga kibikperagiau angero kpetiac yenigoc haude, yeng ngic imoc yeac ifingoc negenu gameagoc ambesande.”
41009001	Yesungo torokpema yofi edeyunuec, “Foracngoc, ngic yomoc nandae, ngenearunac goa mi homemagec Anutuac eucerereng kuhagoc fingectegeru hembesandae, imoc edengunuduae.”
41009002	Anu uameme 6 wisickemanu Yesungo Petoro nga Yakobo amma Yohane meyunuu tikitoa herea monnu tembucngina kecgecdeac enggec. Emma sebia kicnginau heimeremma siriha mong yombong anec.
41009003	Ngakpia hereha kperagima kongac koporarac yombong anec. Bangecfu ngic mongngo wamba kongac kongac ifia naric mi meficgeude.
41009004	Anu imohaingoc Mose nga Eria fingecyemmema Yesugoc yoac denegeng anoc.
41009005	Ifi anggec Petorongo Yesu edeec, “Kpoukpou, yei kecni songea andeac bedzo bedzo harebec meni. Geac mong nga Moseac mong amma Eriaac mong.”
41009006	Yeni homac kengecyunuecac ye noc wiac debeso, imoc obohoec.
41009007	Ifi nammagec hoeng mongngo hama semeyunumanu hoeng manaunac yoacudumeng mong yofi fingerec, “Yomoc neac Songomedacna, ngeni yeac yoac negembisia!”
41009008	Yoac wisickeu imohaingoc yeni fikengfiha amma Yesungosac yenigoc nanu henggec nga ngic mong mi henggec.
41009009	Nga yeni tikiunac mamagec Yesungo deracyunuma yofi deec, “Ngeni wiac hendaumoc, imocac siduc ngic mi edeyunubisia. Kecma Ngicac Medac homecfunac gborima yaruguc ine debisia.”
41009010	Edeyunuu medac yenaocngoc kpesiemegec, “Homecfunac gborima yacyac, imocac hania dafi?”
41009011	Yeni yofi dema kpesimigec, “Mitiac negen negengngic yeni dafiac Eriango waraima haudeac deandae?”
41009012	Ifi degec yofi edeyunuec, “Eriangonoc hama wiac sasawa memengere anude. Nga mitikibiu yofi oho ohoya fede, ‘Ngicac Medac ye kpendzeng homac kpeu desure ammigecde.’ imoc dafiac negensidae?”
41009013	Amma yofi edengunuba, “Eria ye bic haec nga ngic yeni songonginaac arennu faka hania hania ammigec, imoc yeacnoc oho ohoya fede.”
41009014	Yeni tikiunac mama medacfora goa yeneng yenearu hama henggec ngicngac homac yeneac botucfu mitiac negen negengngic yenigoc yoacngina engemmama anec.
41009015	Nga ngicngac nanggec, yeneng Yesu hemma kpidohoma bic nedzikemma wenacngerec demigec.
41009016	Ifi anggec Yesungo kpesiyemmeec, “Ngeni nocac yoacngina engemmama ande?”
41009017	Ifi deu habu yenearunac ngic mongngo deec, “Kpoukpou, hadehade mong yoara kpacngo medacnaac enac mema medzickeu gearu mehaduae.
41009018	Nga hadehadengo naso homac ye mema kpekpefac ammiande. Ammiu ye hanimaria goriu enaraunac nambang sofororoc ereu enara kirandziande. Imocac medacfocga yeneng asu mangana kporacmigecdeac deba yeni kporacbibiema wadau.”
41009019	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi merenec, “Areng yomoc ngeni negen negensingngina kpac yombong. Ni ngenigoc naso herea monggoc tacbadeac modzona tide. Ngeni medac imoc megec hau.”
41009020	Ifi deu mekenggec hadehadengo Yesu hemma medac kpefahau bangecfu makpeec. Makpeu enaraunac nambang nga sofororoc ereec.
41009021	Ereu Yesungo mama kpesimiec, “Hafei yomoc noc nasoac hanahema fingecmiec?” deu mamango deec, “Imoc sabahaungoc fingecmiec.
41009022	Fingecmiu hadehadengo naso homacngoc medac kpehomeudeac gerecfu me dokuu kpefahau kemeande. Nga ge meficnurunadeacsoc andeu sifu ubaga manganeu meficnuruna.”
41009023	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Imoc ambadeacsoc, denec. Ngic mong ye negensinggede, yearu wiac sasawa naric fingerude.”
41009024	Ifi deu imohaingoc medac mamango arohoma deec, “Ni negensingguba negen negensinna wegenedeac geng meficnuna.”
41009025	Ifi deu ngicngac homacngo Yesuaru nedzima kenggec yeng yenemma asu seuhagoc yoac seria ammima yofi edeec, “Asu kedzacfong amma yoacga kpac, ni edeguduae, ge medac imoc wama erema kemma monggoc dzigenema yearu mi kembesena.”
41009026	Ifi deu hadehadengo kucgoc yombong arohoma tima erema kenu medac ye homemea isoc feec. Feu ngic yeneng imoc hemma bic homedac degec.
41009027	Ifi degec Yesungo ine mariau mema miaru yarec.
41009028	Yaru Yesungo amau enu medacfora yeneng tembucfu yegoc tacma kpesimigec, “Neni dafiac hadehade imoc kporacnideac obohoding?”
41009029	Ifi degec yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Hadehade ifia yakasege kecma nunumungo kporacbesonga.”
41009030	Yesu nga medacfora yeni ama imoc wama yofi negemma Gariraia bangec ferecgema kenggec, “Ngicngac yeneng imoc mi negembisia.”
41009031	Nga ye imohai kemma medacfora yofi edekpou ayemmeec, “Ngicngac yeni Ngicac Medac kererema ngic yeneac mariu faigecde. Faigec yeneng ye kpegec homeude. Homeu uameme harebec ammanu gborima monggoc yarude.”
41009032	Ifi deu yeni ine imoc mi negentegecma kpesigecdeac kengecyunuec.
41009033	Anu Yesungo Kafanaung taonnu kensikema amau emma medacfora yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Ngeni sinnu noc wiacac denegeng andau?”
41009034	Kpesiyemmeu waickema tacgec nocac yeni sinnu yenanggarunac merang engena kecde, imocac denegeng anggec.
41009035	Tacgec Yesungo medacfora 12 kpacyunuma yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic mong ye enara kecbeso negende, yeng ngic tosofora sasawa, ngeneac ngadeu kecma ngeneac kingangkpekpe ambeso.”
41009036	Ifi dema nambarac yenearunac mong mema botucnginau faima hoanggema yofi edeyunuec,
41009037	“Ngic mong ye nambarac yenearunac mong yofia neac kpacfu hoanggeude, ye ni hoannuude. Nga ngic mong ni hoannude, yeng nisac mi hoannuude, kpac. Yeng Anutu suenuec, ye ifingoc hoanggeude.”
41009038	Anu Yohanengo Yesu yofi edeec, “Kpoukpou, ngic mong ye geac kpacfu hadehade nga yafing kporacyemmeu hending. Amma ye nenanggoc mi kecdeac kpetarimiding.”
41009039	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngeni mi kpetarimibisia. Ngic mong ye neac kpacfu ua mong kuhagoc meude, yeng kpacna bic mi demanganeude.
41009040	Ngic mong ye neneac ngaba mi ande, yeng ogonina anude.
41009041	Nga ngic mong ye ngeni Kristoac medac dema doku kpakenecfu kpengemmeu negecde, foracngoc, yeng wiac imocac buma mi obohoude, imoc edengunuduae.”
41009042	“Amma nambarac kapia mongngo ni negensinnukecde, ngic mongngo nambarac ifia faka mangana kpoumibacac amma ye yagucnoc dzamandzingtoa ubeau ubahemima kondungtoau ukugec kemeu, imocngo ngic yearu ngereebac.
41009043	Nga mariga mongngo anggenu kopocsic meficgenadeu ge imoc herecgema ukubesena. Mariga yohockanggoc kecma hofeac gerec pisic pisickea kpac, imohai kemebanggac maritegec kecma kekecseriu enna ngereeude.
41009044	‘Hofeu kamangina mi homeude nga gerecngo mi pisickebesande.’ (Yes 66:24)
41009045	Amma haniga mongngo anggenu kopocsic meficgenadeu imoc herecge ukubesena. Haniga yohockanggoc kecma hofeu kemebanggac hanitegec kecma kekecseriu enna ngereeude.
41009046	‘Hofeu kamangina mi homeude nga gerecngo mi pisickebesande.’
41009047	Me kicga mongngo anggenu kopocsic meficgenadeu imoc mesiukubesena. Kicga yohockanggoc kecma hofeu kemebanggac kicga mocgusacgoc kecma Anutuac eucerereng manau enna ngereeude.
41009048	‘Hofeu kamangina mi homeude nga gerecngo mi pisickebesande.’
41009049	Ngicngac kondung hosoandae, ifi isoc ngicngac sasawa gerecngo hosoyunubesonga.
41009050	Kondung imoc wiac gombunga nga imocngo ine kiacma songea kpac anudeu geng songea monggoc naric mi meficgenade. Ngeni kondung songea ubaherenginau mekecma ruaefaka angemmebisia.”
41010001	Yesungo bangec imoc wama Yudaia bangecfu Yodang nobocgengau kenec. Kensikeu ngicngac habutoango yearu monggoc kemma kpeturanggegec. Kpeturanggegec ye fakaya modacma edekpou ayemmeec.
41010002	Nga farisaio goa yeni ye tobanggegecdeac negemma kpesimigec, “Ngic mong ye enema naric waude, imoc singngo dede me kpac?”
41010003	ifi degec yofi merengyemmeec, “Mosengo imocac dedeseriyoac dafi ngemmeec?”
41010004	ifi deu yeneng degec, “Mosengo yofi naric annideac deec, ‘Mong ye ngac wabeso dema yeng wawakibi mima wau kembeso.’ ” (Dser 24:1-4)
41010005	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni ngic ubaseri nga herengina dzege dzegea, imocac Mosengo dedeseriyoac imoc ohongemmeec.
41010006	Nga hanac hanaheau Anutungo siricngira ngic nga ngac anecdeac, ifi meficyuruec. (Fing 1:27; 5:2)
41010007	Imocac amma ngicngo nonggomama wayuruma enemaaru kpeketahau
41010008	yegoc sebi mocgu anecde. Ifi anecdeac yohockang monggoc mi andape, yeri sebi mocgu anecde. (Fing 2:24)
41010009	Anutungo wiac dzegeec, imoc ngicngo naric mi herecgebeso.”
41010010	Nga yeni amau monggoc emma medacfora yeneng imocac kpesimigec
41010011	Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic mongngo enema wama ngac mong meude, ye serofaka enema esea ammiude.
41010012	Nga ngac mongngo ewea wama ngic mong meude, ye serofaka ammiude.”
41010013	Ngicngac goa yeni Yesungo nambaracfocngina mariango kpesereyunuudeac meyunu hagec. Hagec medacfora yeneng ine kpetariyemmegec.
41010014	Ifi anggec Yesungo imoc hemma negenu homac manganeu yofi edeyunuec, “Nambaracbisic yeni nearu naric hagec, ngeni kpae mi heiyemmegec. Kurumenggac eucerereng imoc nambaracbisic yofia yeneac.
41010015	Foracngoc, ngic mong ye nambarac kapia yeni isoc mi anudeu ye Anutuac eucererennu naric mi enude, imoc edengunuduae.”
41010016	Ifi dema nambarac tabucyunuma maria witinginau faima kenecyunuec.
41010017	Yesungo kembesonga kemmanu ngic mongngo yearu nedzikemma yeac kicfu fafoc heima kpesimiec, “Kpoukpou gombunga, ni dafi amba kekecseri imoc neac ambesande?”
41010018	ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ge nocac gombunga denennec? Anutu mocgungo gombunga kecde.
41010019	Ge dedeseriyoac bic negennec, ‘Ge ngicngac mi yunuhomebesena, kaisero mi ambesena, hamangec mi mebesena, enacfu faifai mi ambesena, ngic yeneac wiac mong mi wangecyunubesena, nonggomanghocga seseheyurubesena.’ ” (Mke 20:12-16; Dser 5:16-20)
41010020	Ifi deu yeng meremma edeec, “Kpoukpou, ge denec, imoc sasawa sebigborinaungoc angereai.”
41010021	Ifi deu Yesungo yearu kic fima yeac songo negemma yofi edeec, “Ge wiac mocguac kpedadanggenec. Ge kemma finacga sasawa fegende, imoc suena dzo kirecgeu imoc ngicngac makpekpea yemmebesena. Ifi anna kurumenggac dzofinac fingecgenu hama modacnubesena!”
41010022	Ifi deu ngic ye ubea manganeu negengebirima kenec nocac ye dzofinaha homac femiec.
41010023	Kenu Yesungo fikengfiha amma medacfora yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic dzofinactoanginagoc yeneng Anutuac eucerereng manau enggecdeac ambibieyombonggegecde.”
41010024	Ifi deu medac yeneng yoac imoc negemma kerectegec anggec monggoc yofi edeyunuec, “Nambaracfocna negenggec, ngic finactoayagocngo Anutuac eucerereng manau engeng, imoc uatoayagoc.
41010025	Kamelengo bungic singau engeng, imoc ua efea nga dzofinactoagoc yeng Anutuac eucererennu engeng, imocngo ine uatoayagoc.”
41010026	Ifi deu yeni kerectegec yombong amma degec, “Ifi anu merang naric komoc kpeude?”
41010027	Ifi degec Yesungo kiwa yenearu fima yofi deec, “Ngicngac yeni imoc ambibiema wagecde nga Anutungo wiac sasawa naric mema wiac monggac mi obohoude.”
41010028	Ifi deu Petorongo deec, “Negennec, neni wiacnina sasawa wadacma ge modacguma kecdimbe.”
41010029	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ni fora yombong edengunuba, ngic mong ye amabangeha me daramunea me nonggomama me nambaracfora me amauaya, imoc neac nga siduc gombunggac amma waude,
41010030	yeng turunga mi obohoude. Amma ye wiac wadac, imocac turunga naso 100 monggoc meude. Ngicngac yeni naso yomohai ama nga daramuna amma nonggonasia nga nambaracfora amma amaua migecde, imoc sisic ammima kpekporac ammimagec mekefude. Nga ngade bangec siriha mong haude, imohai Kebungo kekecseri ifingoc mibesande.
41010031	Anu ngic warac warac kecdae, yenearunac homacngo ngadea anggecde nga ngadea kecdae, yenearunac homacngo warac warac anggecde.”
41010032	Anu yeni sing modacma Yerusalennu kengkecmagec Yesungo waraiu medacfora yeni ye modacma negenggec wiac kuneng anec nga goa ye modacgec, yeneng kengec anggec. Nga Yesungo medacfora 12 ngadeau meyunuma wiac fingecmiude, imocac yoac edeyunuec.
41010033	“Negenggec, nenang Yerusalennu endimbe. Enni ngic yeneng Ngicac Medac womonggareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic yeneac mariu faigec, yeneng ye homeudeac desigecde. Desima ye bangec monnunac ngic Anutu mi negemmidae, yeneac mariu faigecde.
41010034	Faigec, yeneng faifagoc ammima sofohoma dzikacngo kpema kpehomegecde. Nga uameme harebec ammanu ye monggoc gborima yarude.”
41010035	Anu Dzebedaioac medachora, Yakobo nga Yohane, yereng Yesuaru kemma deoc, “Kpoukpou, neri wiac monggac derecgede anecmenadeac negendipe?”
41010036	Ifi deec kpesiyemerec, “Ni noc wiac angecmebadeac negendape?”
41010037	Kpesiyemeru deoc, “Kecma kibikperagigau nerearunac mongngo foigau nga mongngo kanagau tacdede, imoc deserinemecna.”
41010038	Ifi deec Yesungo yofi edeyuruec, “Ngeri wiac kpesidape, imocac hania mi negenghomedape. Neng kpendzenggac kpakenecfu nebade, ngeri imoc ifingoc neecdeac dedape nga doku nadzicbade, ngeri imohai nadzirecde me?”
41010039	Ifi deu yereng deoc, “Oc, naric andede.” ifi deec Yesungo yofi edeyuruec, “Ni kpakenecfu nebade, imoc ngeri ifingoc neecde nga doku nadzicbade, imoc ngeri ifingoc nadzirecde.
41010040	Nga merang foinau me kananau tarude, imocac fora ine neng naric mi desibade. Tatac imoc ngic damoc yeneac mengec mengerea fede, yeneng ihai tacgecde.”
41010041	Anu medacfora 10 yeneng imoc negemma Yohane nga Yakobo yereac negenggec manganeec.
41010042	Manganeu Yesungo kpacyunuu kenggec yofi edeyunuec, “Bangec monnunac ngicngac enarafocngina deyecdeyemmea, yeni ngicngac yeneac ngickuneng siricfu yenigoc kecandaeac kuc feyemmede. Nga kunengfocngina yeni kuc feyemmeu ngicngacfocngina yeneng yoacngina modacgecde, ngeni imocnoc negendae.
41010043	Nga ngenearu faka ifia ine mi fingecbeso, kpac. Ngenearunac ngic mongngo engena kecbeso ammide, yeng ine botucnginau kingang kpekpengina kecbeso.
41010044	Amma ngeneac botucfunac mongngo warac warac ambeso ammide, yeng tosofora sasawa, yeneac wanacngic kecbeso.
41010045	Imoc yofiac, ngicngac yeneng Ngicac Medac kingang kpemigecdeac mi maec, kpac. Yeng ine yeneac kingang kpema ngicngac homac yungecyunuma kekeha wau yeneac doudeac maec.”
41010046	Yesu nga medacfora yeni Yeriko taonnu kensikegec. Ihai kecma ngicngac habutoa yenahafoc Yeriko monggoc wagec. Wamagec ngic kicpisic mong kpara Batimaio, imocac titiha Timaioac medac, yeng sing tegiau tacma iwaiac derecgekefec.
41010047	Derecgekefu Yesu Nadzarete taonnunac, yeng hama kende, yeni yoac ifi degec ye imoc negemma kucgoc kpacma deec, “Yesu, Dawidiac bangec, ge neacnec ubaga manganeu.”
41010048	Ye serima ifi kparu ngicngac homacngo waicke tarudeac edegec. Edegec yeng ine seria monggoc kparec, “Dawidiac bangec, ge neacnec ubaga manganeu.”
41010049	Kparu Yesungo namma yofi deec, “Ngeni kpacgec ye nearu hau.” deu ngic yeneng ngic kicpisicac kpacma degec, “Ye kpacgude, ge ubaga ngereeu yacma kenna.”
41010050	Ifi degec ngic ye ngakpihereha ukuma futucke yacma Yesuaru kenec.
41010051	Kenu Yesungo kpesimiec, “Ni noc wiac anggembadeac negennec?” deu ngic kickundungngo deec, “Kpoukpou, kicfifi ambadeac negenduae.”
41010052	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Negen negensinggango mengeregudac imocac naric kenna!” Ifi deu ye imohaingoc kicfifi amma Yesu sinnu modacma kenec.
41011001	Anu yeni kengkecma Yerusaleng taong mewegenebeso amma Oliwatikiu Betefage nga Betani amabangec tarocfu kensikegec. Kensikemagec Yesungo medacfora yenearunac ngic yohockang sueyuruma yofi deec,
41011002	“Ngeri dindingac kemma guruama sing enarau tacde, imohai emma donggi medaha mong ngicngo witiau mi tatara, imoc witickegec nande, ngeri imoc meficgema witic yungecma mema haec.
41011003	Yungerec ngic mongngo kpesingemecma deude, ‘Ngeri dafi anecdeac andape?’ ifi deu yofi edebesera, ‘Kebungo imocgoc ua meudeac dede.’ ifi deec minginango donggi bic faiu haude.”
41011004	Ifi deu yeri kemma donggi medaha sinnu ama naguyau witic witickea nanec, imoc hemma yungeroc.
41011005	Yungerec ngic goa ihai nanggec, yeneng yeremma degec, “Ngeri dafi negemma donggi medaha yungecdape?”
41011006	Ifi degec yeri Yesungo yoac edeyuruec, imoc edeyunuec yeni negemma wayurugec kenoc.
41011007	Kemma donggi Yesuaru mekemma ngakpingira herea hesima donggi medaha witiau tiameec Yesungo imocac witiau tarec.
41011008	Taru ngicngac homacngo ngakpingina herea hesima sinnu tiamegec goango ua tegiaunac ic fawa herecgema sinnu faikenggec.
41011009	Nga ngicngac kiwau kenggec nga ngadeau modacgec, yeneng kpacma yofi degec, “Ohec, ngic Kebuac kpacfu hade, ye kenehagoc, hosanna. (Myeg 118:26)
41011010	Mannina Dawidiac eucerereng hade, imoc kenehagoc. Wi kurumennu kpara dengeregec, ohec waec, hosanna.”
41011011	Yesungo ifi Yerusalennu emma Anutuac womonnu enec. Emma hennegeng andacma ama marai anecac medacfora 12 meyunuu Betania amau kenggec.
41011012	Wereckengau yeni Betania wama mama Yesungo hereaac homeec.
41011013	Homema hereau fima fig ic mong maria tengging tengging henec. Hemma negenu foragoc isoc anu ic haniau kensikema maria meficgeec. Fig nasoya mi anecac ifi anec.
41011014	Nga ye fora hofocma ic yofi edeec, “Gearunac ngic mongngo fora monggoc mi nebeso.” ifi deu medacfora yeneng yoac imoc negenggec.
41011015	Yesungo Yerusalennu kensikema Anutuac womonggac oda manau enec. Emma ngic wiac emekpesi anggec, yeni imohacnac kporacyunuec. Ye ngic hiedzo emekpesi anggec, yeneac tebo heimerenec nga kebesac emegec, yeneac tatac heimeremma
41011016	Anutuac womong manau wiac ifia meenggecdeac kpetariyemmeec.
41011017	Kpetariyemmema yofi edekpou ayemmeec, “Yoac yofi oho ohoya fede, ‘Amana imoc bangeha bangeha ngicngac sasawa yeneac nunumuama, kpara ifi kpacbesonga.’ (Yes 56:7) Nga ngeneng merenggec imoc ine hamangecngic yeneac sufu sufuama ande.” (Yer 7:11)
41011018	Ifi deu womonggareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic yeneng imoc negemma ye kpegecdeac sing hofocgec. Nga habu sasawango yeac kpoukpouyaac negenggec engena anec nga yeni ine yeac kengecyunuec.
41011019	Nga ama marai anu Yesu nga medacfora yeni taong wama kenggec.
41011020	Wereckengau yeni sinnu kemma henggec fig ic imoc godeaunacngoc sokuema nanec.
41011021	Nanu Petorongo imoc hemma negensima Yesu edeec, “Kpoukpou ge henna, ge fig ic soweckedang, imoc bic ururuema nande.”
41011022	ifi deu Yesungo yofi merennec, “Ngeni Anutu negensinggebisia.
41011023	Foracngoc, ngic mong ye ubeau negengyohoha kpac kecma wiac mong me mong dema imocac fora fingerudeac negensiudeu yeng tiki edimoc yacma kondunnu kemeu deu imoc foranoc fingerude, imoc edengunuduae.
41011024	Ni imocac amma yofi edengunuduae, ngeni wiac imocac me imocac negensima menide, ifi negemma negensinggema numugec wiac imoc fingecngemmeude.
41011025	Anu ngeni namma numuandae, imohai ngic monggac wiac me monggac ngaba mekecdaeu kopocsiha wabisia. Ifi anggec kurumeng Mangnginango ngeneac kopocsic ifingoc waude.
41011026	Nga ngeni ngic yeneac kopocsic mi wagecdeu ine Kurumeng Mangnginango ngeneac kopocsic ifingoc mi waude.”
41011027	Yesu medacforagoc yeni Yerusalennu dzigene enggec. Emma Yesungo Anutuac womong manau yerecgemanu womonggareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic amma enarafocngina, yeneng yearu hama kpesimigec,
41011028	“Ge noc kucfu ua yomoc menec nga merang ua imoc menadeac uayoac genec?”
41011029	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Ni yoac mong kpesingemmeba turunga edenugecguc ni ifingoc uakibinaac hania imoc edengunubade.
41011030	Yohanengo dokunadzic ua mekefec, ua imoc kurumennunac me ngicfunac, ngeni imoc edenugec negemba.”
41011031	Ifi deu yeni yenaocngoc denegeng amma degec, “ ‘Imoc kurumennunac.’ ifi denideu yeng yofi kpesinemmeude, ‘Ifi negemmaguc ngeni nocac ye mi negensinggegec?’ ”
41011032	Nga ngicfunac, imoc debesonga ngic yeneac amma kengecyunuec. Nocac ngic yeni sasawango Yohane ye profete fora, ifi negenggec.
41011033	Imocac yeni Yesu meremmigec, “Imoc mi negendimbe.” degec Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Ifi degec, ni ifingoc noc uayoacac kucfu ua mekecduae, imoc mi edengunubade.”
41012001	Yesungo monggoc yoac heima yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic mongngo waing ua gboria mong homecma oda dzegeec. Dzegema waing tidzoc tidzohoac teng usuma gareng yeneac kicfifiac amaherec meec. Meu wisickeu waing ua garenggegecdeac ngic meficyunuma yenigoc yoac dedzege anggec nga yengenaoc ine bangec hereau kenec.
41012002	Kemma kecmanu fora kpememe naso hau wanacngiha mong sueu waingngic yenearunac waing uaac fora noboha yeac anec, imoc meudeac kenec.
41012003	Kensikemanu waingngic yeni wanacngic mema dzoboya kpema entegeng suegec kenec.
41012004	Kenu minginango wanacngic mong yenearu sueu kenu yeneng ye kpekpatanggema desofoc ammigec.
41012005	Ifi ammigec ua minginango serima wanacngic monggoc mong sueu yenearu kenu ye kpehomegec. Kpehomegec ua minginango wanacngic homac sueyunuu kenggec uangic yeneng medac goa dzoboyunugec nga goa ine yunuhomegec.
41012006	Wisic wisickeau ua minginango songomedacyombonga mocgu kefec, ye yofi negemma sueec, ‘Yeni sifu medacyombonna eweheimigecde.’
41012007	Ifi negemma sueu uangic yeneng ine medacyombonga hemma denegeng amma edeemegec, ‘Yeng kecma ua yomoc tiu enude, imocac ngeni hagec kpeni bangeha nga maridzominga imoc nenang ambeso.’
41012008	Yeni ifi dema ua minginaac medacyombonga mema kpehomema farenga waing ua ngadeau ukugec kemema feec.
41012009	Anu ua minginango dafi anude? Ye hama waing uangic yunuhomema waing uaya imoc uangic areng mong yemmeude.
41012010	Mitikibiu yoac yofi oho ohoya fede, ‘Amameme ngic yeneng hoc mong mangana dema ukugec. Nga hoc imocngo amaac hoc wotung amma seria nanude nga nambesande.
41012011	Kebu yengenaoc faka imoc meu imocngo nenang kicfu wiac bibiagoc ande.’ Ngeni yoac imoc osonegeng angandae.” (Myeg 118:22-23)
41012012	Nga Yesungo enara yeneac negemma yoac imoc heima deec, yeni imoc bic negenggec. Nga yeneng ye mendanggegecdeac sing ine hofocgec. Nocac yeni ngicngac yeneac kengecyunuu wama kenggec.
41012013	Ngicenara yeneng Yesu tobanggegec yoacdedeau makpeu yoacfu faigecdeac negemma yofi anggec. Yeni farisaio nga Herodeac arennunac ngic goa yearu sueyunugec
41012014	yeneng Yesuaru hama degec, “Kpoukpou, yoac fora dema ngic engena me mamea yeneac mi negensiannec. Ge ngicngacareng socfungoc ayemmekecnec, imoc negendimbe. Nga ge Anutuac sing dindingac edekpou anemmekecnec. Ifi anu ngictau Sisa takesi mibesonga me mi mibesonga, singngo dafi dede? Nenang ngictau Sisa takesi naric minide me kpac?”
41012015	Ifi degec Yesungo ikocfakangina negentegecma yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni nocac faitobannu fainudae? Ngeni dzo mong meficgema edzacnugec hemba.”
41012016	Ifi deu yeni dzo mong migec yeng imoc hemma yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Onga nga kibi yoc, imoc meracac?” kpesiyemmeu degec, “Imoc Sisaac.”
41012017	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Imocac ngeni Sisaac wiac, imoc Sisa mibisia nga Anutuac wiac, imoc Anutu mibisia!” Ifi edeyunuu negemma kpidohogec.
41012018	Sadukaio areng yeni homecfunac yacyac mi fede, ifi dekecdae. Nga yenearunac ngic goa Yesuaru hama kpesimigec,
41012019	“Kpoukpou, Mosengo dedeseriyoac yofi ohonemmeec, ‘Ngic mong ye ngac mema gboriha mong mi kpeficge kecma homeudeu ngac ye kefu muneango daraac hotsec mema gboric kpeficgema daraac kpac miacbeso.’
41012020	Naso monnu daramuna seweng yeni kecgec. Nga waracdacnginango ngac mong mema gboriha kpac kecma homeec.
41012021	Homeu muneango ngac imoc mema ye ifingoc gboriha kpac kecma homeec. Homeu munea mongngo faka imocngoc anec.
41012022	Nga daramuna seweng yeni ngac imocngoc mema gboricfocngina kpac kecma homedacgec. Homedacgec hotsecngina kecma ngade homeec.
41012023	Homeu ngic seweng yeneng ngac imocngoc megecac kecma yacyac nasou homecfunac yacgecde, imohai ngac imoc meracac enema ambesande?”
41012024	Ifi degec Yesungo meremma yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni mitikibi nga Anutuac kuc, imoc mi negentegecdae, imocac amma yoac desufudae.
41012025	Kecma homegec yeneng homecfunac yacgecde, imohai ngicngac yeni mi meemegecde. Nga manggac mongngo ‘Ni naroanna ngic mibade.’ imoc naric mi deude. Yeni imohai kurumenggac angero, yeni isoc anggecde.
41012026	Nga homecfunac yacyac deba, ngeni yoac yomoc Moseac kibiu imoc osoandae, Mosengo icfu gerecborang fingeru hemma ihai kenu Anutungo yofi edeec, ‘Ni Abrahang nga Isaka amma Yakobo, yeneac Anutu.’ (Mke 3:2, 6)
41012027	Nga ye ngic homemea yeneac Anutu kpac. Ye ngic gbori kecdae, yeneac Anutu. Ngeni sing homac yombong segema kecdae.”
41012028	Anu Yesugoc demereng anggec, yeng turunga gombunga merengyemmeu mitiac negen negengngic yenearunac mongngo imoc hemma Yesuaru hama kpesimiec, “Dedeseriyoac damocngo engena yombong ande?”
41012029	Ifi kpesimiu Yesungo yofi deec, “Dedeseriyoac engenangina yofi fede, ‘Israengic ngeni negenggec, Kebu Anutunina ye mocgu nga
41012030	ge ubaherega nga ongaga amma negen negengga nga kucga sasawa, imoc hafoangoc Kebu Anutugaac heresongo negemma kecbesena.’ (Dser 6:4-5)
41012031	Nga mong yofi, ‘Ge geangga anggengande, siriha imocngoc ngicngac gegoc wegenac kecdae, yeni heresongogoc hoangyunubesena.’ (Sese 19:18) Dedeseriyoac imoc yereac engena mong mi fede.”
41012032	Ifi deu mitiac negen negengngicngo meremmiec, “Gombunga kpoukpou, ge fora yombong denec. Anutu ye mocgu, mongngo ye isoc mi kecde.
41012033	Nga ubaherega hafoangoc nga negen negengga hafoangoc amma kucga hafoangoc yeac songo heregoc negemma kecbesena amma geangga anggengande, siriha imocngoc ngicngac gegoc wegenac kecdae, yeni heresongogoc hoangyunubesena, wiac imocngonoc Anutuac hosuc heihei amma sese hania hania ferahade.”
41012034	Ngic ye gombunga yombong merenu Yesungo negemma yofi edeec, “Ge Anutuac eucererenggac hereau mi kecnec.” Ifi deu yeni Yesu monggoc kpesimigecdeac kengecyunuu wagec.
41012035	Yesungo Anutuac womonnu edekpou ayemmema yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Mitiac negen negengngic yeneng Messia ye Dawidiac kisicfunac nocac deandae?”
41012036	Dawidi ye Asungo meefaiu yengenaoc yofi deec, “ Kebungo neac Kebu edeec, ‘Ge foinaugeng tacmana ngabafocga hanigaac bageau faiyunuba yeni hanititiga ambesandae.’ (Myeg 110:1)
41012037	Dawidi yengenaoc ‘Neac Kebu’, kparec. Nga Messia ye dafiu Dawidiac bangeha ande?” Ifi deu ngicngac habutoa yeneng negendzidziegec.
41012038	Ifi anggec Yesungo edekpou ayemmema yoac yofi torokpema edeyunuec, “Ngeni mitiac negen negengngic yeneac henghomema kecbisia. Yeni songonginaac amma ngakpi herea heima kecgec ngicngac yeneng wenacngerec deyemmegecdeac emenecfu kenghaandae.
41012039	Amma kpekpeturang amau nga yakatoa nasou warac warac tatacfu tacbesonga songongina angkecde.
41012040	Amma yeni ine ngachotsec ewefocngina homemea yeneac ama wangecyunuandae. Amma negen ngereengunugecdeac nunumu herea here numuandae. Yeni ikocfaka ifia angandaeac turunga ebiriangoc megecde.”
41012041	Anu Yesungo womonggac sesekatapa nobohau tacma henu ngicngac homacngo dzo imohai faigec kemeu ngic finactoagoc homacngo hama dzo ebiriangoc faigec kemeec.
41012042	Anu ngachotsec ewea homemea mongngo ifingoc hama hocdzo sacsac yohockang faiu kemeec, imoc toea mong kapianecsac.
41012043	Faiu Yesungo medacfora deu hagec yofi edeyunuec, “Foracngoc, ngachotsec hiedzoya kpac yombong dzo faidacmoc, yeng ngicngac sasawa sese faidau, yeni feracyunude, imoc edengunuduae.
41012044	Ngicngac tosea sasawa, yeneng finactoangina wakema made, imohacnac sesengina faidau. Nga ngac ye ine wiac femidac, imocnoc hafoangoc faidacma entegeng kecde.”
41013001	Anu Yesungo Anutuac womonnunac mama kemmanu medacfora yenearunac mongngo edeec, “Kpoukpou, hoc gombunga gombunga nga ama kuneng kuneng tackende, imoc henna.”
41013002	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ama kuneng kuneng tackenu hennec, imoc kecma naso mong haude, imohai wasaingic yeneng imoc sasawa hembarackegecde. Hembarackegec hoc mongngo monggac witiau wagec mi tacbesande.”
41013003	Yesungo Oliwatikiu Anutuac womong kiwa dindingacfu tacmanu Petoro nga Yakobo amma Yohane nga Anderea, yeneng yegoc tembucfu kecma kpesimigec,
41013004	“Ge yoac dedang, imoc noc nasoac fingerude nga naso imohai noc soi fingecmanu yoac sasawa imoc seribesande?”
41013005	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic mongngo ikocfu wangecngunubacac ngeni henghomema kecbisia.
41013006	Ngic homac yeneng hama neac kpac kpacma degecde, ‘Ni Messia.’ ifi dema ngicngac homac uba mesufu ayemmegecde.
41013007	Dzikactoaac siduc bangec wegenacfunac nga bangec hereaunac hau ngeni imoc negemma mi kpidohobisia. Foracngoc, faka ifia fingecbeso. Nga naso wisic wisickea ine imohai bic mi habesande.
41013008	Bangecareng goa yeneng bangecareng ogofocnginagoc dzikac kpema kecgecde. Nga ngictau monggac arengngo ngictau monggac areng yenigoc ngaba angemegecde. Bangec monnu nga monnu usoc meude amma bodinaso fingeckenude. Nga faka yomoc, imoc wiac gboria fingecbeso andeac ngac gadze kiude ifi isoc ande.
41013009	Imocac ngeni ngenaocngoc garengemema kecbisia. Ngic yeni yoacfu faingunugecde amma kpekpeturang amau dzikacngo ngunugecde. Amma yeni neac amma ngictau nga gawana yenearu yoacfu faingunugec ngeneng ihai namma ni dekperaginubisia.
41013010	Ngeni bangeha bangeha ngicngac siduc gombung edekpou ayemmegec negendacgecguc
41013011	ngic mengunuma ngic goa yeneac mariu faingunugecde, ngeni naso imohai, ‘Dafi denide?’ dema mi negengebiribisia. Tiri Asungo naso imohai yoac enacnginau faiude, ngeni imoc debisia. Ngeni yoac imohai degecde, imoc Tiri Asuarunac ambeso.
41013012	Anu dac mongngo munea enara yeneac mariu faiu yeneng homecfu faigecde nga manggac mongngo medahaac imocngoc anude. Nga nambarac yeneng nonggomangfocngina deendema ayemmema homecfu faiyunugecde.
41013013	Nga ngicngac sasawa yeneng neac kpacnaac amma ngeni ubango ukungunugecde. Nga ngic mong ye seserigoc kecmanu nasotoa haude, yeng komoc kpebesande.
41013014	Anu ngic mong ye yoac yomoc osoude, yeng imoc negentegecbeso. Wiac mangac manganea wiac sasawa kpetotieude, imocngo ama kpaeagocfu emma nanu henggecde, faka imoc fingeru ngicngac Yudaia bangecfu kecdae, ngeni worama tikiu embisia.
41013015	Nga mong ye ama witiau tacde, ye kemema ama manau emma wiac mong mi mebeso.
41013016	Nga mong ye semeng uau nande, ye ngakpi hereha meudeac mi dzigenebeso.
41013017	Amma ngac heregoc kecdae nga nenggac sabac namuu meyunukecdae, yeni naso imohai ebictoanginagoc anggecde.
41013018	Naso imohai kpendzeng kuneng siriha mong yombong figerude. Anutungo hanac hanaheaunac bangec sasawa meficgeecfunacngoc erema yaguc kecdimbe, naso imocac manau kpendzeng ifia mong mi fingerec amma ngade naric mi fingecbesande. Imocac amma ngeni wiac imoc nomannasou mi fingerudeac numubisia.
41013020	Kebungo naso imoc mi mewegenebac dede ngic mongngo komoc naric mi kpebac. Ngic meisingyunuyunuya, yeneac amma naso imoc bic herec herecgea fede.
41013021	Naso imohai yoac yofi fingecbesande, ‘Henggec, Messia yei fingecde.’ me, ‘Ye edi fingecde.’ Ngicngac ifi degecdeu ngeni mi negensingyunubisia.
41013022	Imoc yofiac, ngicngac fingecma ikoc amma degecde, ‘Ni Messia.’ yeni nga profete ikoha yeneng fingecma ngicngac uba mesufu ayemmegecdeac ngicngac tobangyunuma faka kuhagoc nga morora megecde. Amma yeni sing meficgegecdeu ngicngac meisingyunuyunuya ifingoc ikocfu wangecyunugecde.
41013023	Faka sasawa imoc mi fingecmanu imoc bic edengunuduae. Ngeni imocac negemma henghomebisia.
41013024	Anu kpendzeng imoc wisickemanu imohai ‘wenackiwa kundung kpeu afokperagia mi fingerude.
41013025	Nga asomeng yeni kurumennunac fotockema magec kurumenga kurumenga yeneac kuc sasawa kpemindzahegecde.’ (Yes 13:10; 34:4)
41013026	Naso imohai ngeni Ngicac Medac henggec yeng kuctoaya nga kibikperagitoayagocngo hoennu habesande.
41013027	Hama angerofora sueyunuu bangec nga kurumeng tegia noboc noboc wisickede, imohai kenggec yengenaoc ngicngac meisingyunuec, yeni kpedzucyunugecde.
41013028	Fig icngo hania edekpou angemmeu ngeni imoc negenghomebisia. Fawaya doku doku amma besaiu ngic ngeni yofi negengandae, wenac naso ande.
41013029	Nga ngeni wiac dedua, imoc fingeru hemma ifingoc yofi negembisia, Ngicac Medac nasoya bic wegenema hama nagu ngadeau nandenoc.
41013030	Foracngoc, areng yomoc ngeni mi homemagec wiac yomoc fingecdarude, imoc edengunuduae.
41013031	Foracngoc, bangec nga kurumeng yeri kecma kpac anecde nga neac yoac ine mi kpac ambesande.
41013032	Nga faka imoc noc uamemeu amma aua nofu fingerude, imoc mongngo naric mi negenude. Kurumenggac angero yeni imoc mi negenggecde nga Medacngo ifingoc mi negenude. Manggacngosac naso imoc negende.
41013033	Ngeni garengngina mema ubagbori kecbisia. Nocac ngeni naso mi negendae.
41013034	Imohai faka yofi isoc fingerude, ngic mongngo amea wama bangec monnu kenudeac negenec. Ifi amma ye amagareng wanacngicfora amaac wiac uanginaacsoc garenggegecdeac uayoac deyemmema nagugareng naguu kicfifi nanudeac edeec.
41013035	Imocac ngeni ubagbori kecbisia. Minginango ama toforemanu me tofocnac dzongiau me ama werec wereckenggac me asoac nasou dzigeneude, ngeni imoc mi negendae.
41013036	Ngeni gaufemagec hama ngenembacac yoac yomoc ngeni nga ngicngac goa sasawa edengunuduae. Ngeni imoc negemma ubagbori kecbisia.”
41014001	Makekenggac naso nga ic sogong yisya kpac nene, imocac hombanggac uameme yohockang feec. Femanu womonggareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic yeni Yesu nofusing kic mesufu ammima mema kpegec homeudeac sing hofocma
41014002	yofi degec, “Ngicngac yenearu dzikac sicsauc fingecbacac amma ye hombang nasou mi mebesonga.”
41014003	Anu Yesungo Betania amau ngic mong kpara Simong kubecserigoc, yeac amau yaka netarec. Netacmanu ngac mongngo alabastros kirung mong kerecdoku homung kerengagoc metarec, imoc mehaec. Doku imoc narda foraunac memea amma buma engena yombong. Ngacngo imocnoc mehama kirung ubea kpetackema Yesuac oruhau kpakema nadzicmiec.
41014004	Nadzicmiu ngic goa ihai tacgec, yeneng imoc hemma dehesi amma degec, “Ye nocac wiac buma engena ifi kpedzonggede?
41014005	Doku homuna gombunga ifiango kifa mocguac uabung ferahema kirecgeu yeni imoc ngicngac makpekpea yemmegec ngereebac.” Ifi dema ngac yoac gereagoc ammigec.
41014006	Ifi ammigec Yesungo yoacngina negemma yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni nocac ngacac ifi degec ubaebic meficgeude? Ngeni faka imoc wagec. Ye faka gombunga yombong anende.
41014007	Ngic makpekpea yeni nasosoc ngenigoc kecgec ngeni meficyunubeso angemmeu naric meficyunukecgecde. Nga neng ine ngenigoc nasosoc mi kecbade.
41014008	Ngac yomocngo sebina doku homunagocngo nadzicmiu ngeni farenna tonggogecde, imocacnoc yeng hanahema meefainude. Meefainuma yeac uaareng fede, imoc bic mesiude.
41014009	Foracngoc, ngicngac yeneng siduc gombung bangectoa bangec, imohai kemma ngicngac edekpou ayemmegecde, imohai ngac yomocngo faka anec, imoc ifingoc degec negenggec feude nga febesande, imoc edengunuduae.”
41014010	Anu medacfora 12 yenearunac mong kpara Yuda Karioto amaunac, yeng Yesu meyemmeudeac dema womonggareng enara yenearu kenec.
41014011	Kenu yeni ubangerec negemma dzo migecdeac degec. Ifi degec Yudango naso gombung damohai Yesu doc mema yereac mariu faiude, imocac kicfifi kefec.
41014012	Ic sogong yis kpac, hombang imocac hanac hanaheau makekenggac ramamedaha kpeherecge angandae, naso imohai Yesuac medacfora yeneng Yesu kpesimigec, “Neni dahai kemma makekenggac ramamedaha nenideac memengere annideac negennec?”
41014013	Ifi kpesimigec yeng medac yohockang yofi dema sueyuruec, “Ngeri taonnuu emma ngic mong dokuenanga tofohoma hau yegoc ewacma ye modacbesera.
41014014	Modarec kemma amau enude, ama imohai ama mingina yofi edebesera, ‘Kpoukpoungo yofi kpesigende, “Ama mana damohai mengerenenna ni medacfocnagoc makekenggac ramamedaha nenide?” ’
41014015	Ifi deec yeng ama witiau amamana mong kuneng ihai wiac bic mengec mengerea tacdacde, imoc edzacnguruu ngeri imohai iwainina mengerebesera.”
41014016	Ifi deu medac yeri ama wama taonnu enoc. Emma Yesungo edeyuruec, imocac sirihau wiac meficgedacma makekenggac ramamedaha ohomengere anoc.
41014017	Anu ama toforemanu Yesu nga medacfora 12 yenigoc kensikegec.
41014018	Kensikema yaka netacma Yesungo yofi deec, “Foracngoc, ngenearunac mongngo ni ngaba yeneac mariu fainuude, yennoc nigoc yaka nede, imoc edengunuduae.”
41014019	Ifi deu medac yeni negengebirima tembuc tembuc kpesimigec, “Ge imoc neac denec me?”
41014020	Ifi degec, yeng yofi merengyemmeec, “Imoc medac 12 ngenearunac mong anu yeng nigoc ic sogong terau nemuruckede.
41014021	Ngicac Medac ye wangunuma kenude, imoc neac negemma oho ohoya bic fede. Nga ngic ye Ngicac Medac doc meude, ye ine sowehagoc. Ye nonggeaac here manaunac mi fingecbacfu efaibac.”
41014022	Anu netacmagec Yesungo ic sogong mong mema Anutu ubangerec edema ic sogong imoc mendzicma medacfora yemmema yofi deec, “Ngeni yomoc megec, imoc fusina.”
41014023	Ifi dema kpakenec mong mema Anutuac ubangerec dema sasawa yemmeu negec.
41014024	Negec yofi edeyunuec, “Yomoc neac sac, imocngo dzadzahac amma imoc ngicngac homac yeneac amma kpetic kpetinggea.
41014025	Foracngoc, ni waing gbomeaac dokuya monggoc mi nene kecbarengoc Anutuac eucerereng manau waing gboria nebesandua, imoc edengunuduae.”
41014026	Anu yeni Anutuac yegec heigec, Heima taong wama Oliwatikiu enggec.
41014027	Emma Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni sasawango neac negemmangang amma wanugecde, imoc yofi bic oho ohoya fede. ‘Ni ramagareng kpeba yeni sasawango sinsararang kpebesandae.’ (Dzek 13:7)
41014028	Anu neng ine gborima yacma waraingemmema Gariraia bangecfu kembade.”
41014029	Ifi deu Petorongo deec, “Ngicngac sasawango negemmangang amma wagugecdeu neng ine imoc naric mi ambade.”
41014030	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Foracngoc, yaguc tofocnac kokorecngo arohou atac yohockang mi ammanu geng neac busickpena harebec bic anude, imoc edeguduae.”
41014031	Ifi deu Petorongo serimangoc deec, “Ni gegoc homebade isoc sebi ine naric mi heibade.” Ifi deu ogofora yeni sasawango imocngoc degec.
41014032	Yesu nga medacfora yeni ua bangec mong kpara Gedzemane, imohai kenggec. Kensikema yeng medacfora yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni yei tacmagec ni numubade.”
41014033	Ifi dema Petoro nga Yohane amma Yakobo meyunuu kenggec. Kemma negen negenga fonggou negengebirima
41014034	yofi edeyunuec, “Ubaonganango ebiriyombonggeu homebeso anende, imocac ngeni yei garengngina meemema tacgec.”
41014035	ifi dema kpesima kemma bangecfu makpefema yofi numuec, “Imoc naric anu naso imocngo feracnubeso.” ifi
41014036	numuma yofi deec, “O Manggac manna, gearu wiac sasawa imoc efea. Ge kpakenec yomoc wangecnuna. Anu neac songo ine mi seribeso, kpac. Geac songo nga negen negeng imoc seribeso.”
41014037	Ifi numuu wisickeu dzigenema medacfora yenearu hama yenenu yeni gau fegec Petoro yofi edeec, “Simong, ge gau fenec, ge naric aua mocguac manau gaugbori kecbang me?
41014038	Nga faitobannu embauac ngeni ubagbori kecma numugec. Ongaasungo efaide nga sebingo ine ebiride.”
41014039	Ye ifi dema monggoc kemma nunumu imocngoc numuec.
41014040	Numuma hama yenenu yeni monggoc gau fegec. Nocac yeni kicngina ebiriec. Nga ye yoac deu yeni meremmigecdeac obohogec.
41014041	Nga ye atac harebecfu dzigene hama yenemma yofi deec, “Ngeni gau femangoc kecdae, imoc naric mi ande. Yaguc ine wisickede nga naso bic hadac. Negenggec, ngic yeni Ngicac Medac kererema kopocsicmeme yeneac mariu faigecde.
41014042	Benukererec ngicngo hadeac amma ngeni yacgec kenni!”
41014043	Anu Yesu ye ifi demanungoc medac 12 yenearunac mong Yuda, yeng hau habu kunengngo wasaibeang nga gbarucnginagoc ye modacgec. Anu yeni womonggareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic amma yudangic enarafocngina sueyunugec, yenearunac hagec.
41014044	Hagec benukererec ngicngo yofi derecgeyemmeec, “Ni ngic muduckebade, ngeni yenoc mendanggema garenggeyombonggema mekembisia.”
41014045	Anu Yuda ye hama Yesuaru bic kemma, “Kpoukpou.” dema muduckeec.
41014046	Muduckeu yeni Yesu maria noboc noboc mema mendanggegec.
41014047	Mendanggegec medac yenearunac mongngo ine wasaibeang kpedzima womonggarengtoaac wanacngic kpema kedzaha noboc herecgeec.
41014048	Nga Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ni wenacsoc ngenigoc kecma womonnu edekpou angemmeba ngeni imohai ine mi menugec. Nga yaguc ine godzungic meandae, ngeni ifi isoc wasaibeang nga gbaruc mema menugecdeac hadae.” Yoac mitikibiu fede, imoc sasawango ine fingecdacbeso.
41014050	Yesungo ifi deu yeac areng sasawango ye wama kengec woragec.
41014051	Anu sebigborimedac mongngo kporuc linengngo memea imocsac kpeec, yeng Yesu modaru megec.
41014052	Memagec, yeng kporuc kpesima senggang worama kenec.
41014053	Anu yeni Yesu mema womonggarengtoa yenearu mekenggec. Mekenggec womonggareng enara sasawa nga enarafocngina amma mitiac negen negengngic, yeni kpeturanggema hagec.
41014054	Nga Petoro ye ngadenginau hereaungoc modacyunu kemma womonggarengtoa yeac amaac oda manaungoc enec. Emma imohai uamedac yenigoc gerec dzeunegemma tarec.
41014055	Anu womonggareng enara nga yudangic yeneac tutumangtoa memba sasawa adzorogec. Adzoroma yeni Yesungo faka mangana dafi anec dema kpehomegecdeac manganaac kopocsicac yoac anggecdeac obohogec.
41014056	Nga ngic homacngo ikoc amma yeac enacfu faifaiyoac degec nga gubeyoacnginango socfungoc mi anec.
41014057	Ngic goa yeneng kicnginau emma namma yofi dema enacfu faifai ammigec,
41014058	“Ye yoac mong yofi deu negening, ‘Ni womong yomoc ngicmaringo memea, imoc hembarackema uameme harebecac manau mong ngicmaringo mi memea mebade.’ ”
41014059	Nga kopocsicac yoacngina imocngo ine ifingoc socfu mi anec.
41014060	Anu womonggarengtoango yacma botucnginau namma Yesu yofi kpesimiec, “Geac yoac dedae, imocac noboha mong mi denade me?”
41014061	Ifi deu Yesungo ine waicke namma turunga mong mi merennec. Nga womonggarengtoango monggoc kpesimiec, “Ge Messia, Kenec keneheac medac me?”
41014062	Ifi deu Yesungo deec, “Ni imocnoc. Anu kecma ngeni Ngicac Medac Kuctoa mingina yeac foiaugeng tacma kurumenggac hoennu kicnginau hau hembesandae.” (Mitiyegec 110:1; Danie 7:13)
41014063	Ifi deu womonggarengtoa yeng ngakpihereha membarackema deec, “Yoacninaac boingicac monggoc mi obohonide.
41014064	Ye Anutu emmima deu bic negendau, imocac dafi negendae?” Ifi deu sasawango ye kopocsihagoc negemma homeudeac deserigec.
41014065	Ifi deserigec ngic goa yeneng sofohoma kiwa kporucngo biranggema marigbung gbungngo heima degec, “Ge kpefingyoac dena!” degec gareng nanggec, yeneng ye mema kpegec.
41014066	Anu Petorongo oda manau nammanu womonggarengtoaac wanac naroang mongngo ihai haec.
41014067	Hama henu Petoro ye gerec dzeunegemma taru kiwa yearu fima deec, “Ge ifingoc Yesu Nadzaretenac, yegoc kefoc.”
41014068	Ifi deu Petorongo ine sebi heima deec, “Ye mi negemmiduae nga yoac denec, imoc mi negentegecduae.” Ifi dema ama naguyau kemeu kokorec arohoec.
41014069	Arohou wanac naroangngo Petoro hemma ngic wegenac nanggec, torokpema yeni monggoc edeyunuec, “Ngic yomoc ye yenearunac mong.”
41014070	Ifi deu Petorongo ine monggoc busickpeec. Nga naso mi hereemanu ngic imohai nanggec, yeneng monggoc degec, “Foracngoc, ge yenearunac mong. Ge Gariraia bangecfunacngoc.”
