41014071	Ifi degec ye yengenaoc sowecemema desopec amma deec, “Ngeni ngic dedae, ye mi negemmiduae.”
41014072	Ifi deu imohaingoc kokorecngo arohou yohockang anec. Anu Petoro ye Yesungo yoac edeec, imoc negensiec, “Kokorecngo arohou atac yohockang mi ammanu geng neac busickpena harebec bic anude.” Petorongo imoc negensima ubahodung kuneng mema kiachodung kiarec.
41015001	Asoacngoc yombong womonggareng enara nga yudangic enarafocngina amma mitiac negen negengngic nga yudangic yeneac tutumangtoa memba sasawa, yeneng yoac deserigec. Deserima Yesu maria dedeckema Piratoaru mekenggec.
41015002	Mekenggec Piratongo Yesu kpesimiec, “Ge yudangic yeneac ngictau me?” ifi deu merenec, “Imocnoc geanggaoc denec.”
41015003	Nga womonggareng enara yeneng Yesu yoacfu faima yeac haniaya homac degec.
41015004	Ifi degec Piratongo monggoc kpesimiec, “Yeni geac yoac homac yombong dedaemoc, imoc negemma turunga mong mi merennade me?”
41015005	Ifi deu Yesungo turunga monggoc mi merenu Piratongo negen negeng ua homac meec.
41015006	Anu makekeng nasousoc ngic mong witicamau takefu yudangic yeneng yeac kpara kpacgec Piratongo yenoc witicamaunac wau makefec.
41015007	Amma ngic goa warac ngicngac here miac miac faka amma ngic goa yunuhomegec witicamau faiyunugec, yenearunac ngic mong kpara Baraba.
41015008	Nga womonggareng enara yeni Yesuac keracmangang amma yeac mariu mekenggec, Piratongo imoc bic negenec. Ifi negenu habutoa yeneng hama Piratongo angkefec, ifi isoc anudeac kpesimigec yeng meremma yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Yudangic ngeneac ngictau yungecngemmebadeac negendae me?”
41015011	Ifi deu womonggareng enara yeneng habu fenggeyemmegec yeneng Yesu wama ine Baraba naric yungecyemmegecdeac degec.
41015012	Ifi degec Piratongo monggoc meremma kpesiyemmeec, “Anu ni yudangic ngeneac ngictau dedae, yeac dafi ambade?”
41015013	Kpesiyemmeu yeneng arohogec, “Ge ye mariponnu kpena homeu.”
41015014	Ifi degec Piratongo monggoc kpesiyemmeec, “Nga ye noc kopocsic meec?” deu ine yeneng monggoc seriangoc arohogec, “Ye mariponnu kpebesena.”
41015015	Ifi degec Piratongo habu yeneac negen negeng modarudeac negemma Baraba wau kenec. Nga yeni Yesuac sebia dzikacngo kpemaguc mariponnu kpegecdeac wasai maringinau wayemmeec.
41015016	Anu wasaingic yeneng Yesu mema gawamang yeneac amaoda manau emma wasaingic sasawa hafoangoc kpedzucnegec.
41015017	Kpedzucnedacma ngakpiherec mong giweng giweng heimima somang batihema ira isoc oruhau heimigec kemeec.
41015018	Kemeu eweheihei siricfu kpacma edegec, “Ohec, yudangic yeneac ngictau.”
41015019	Dema yasungo oruhau kpema sofohoma haniau fafoc heima numumigec.
41015020	Anu yeni defagoc ammigec wisickeu ngakpiherec sacsac imoc hesima yengena wamba heimigec kemeu mariponnu kpegecdeac mema ngadeau kenggec.
41015021	Kemmagec Kirene taonnunac ngic mong kpara Simong, ye Aresande nga Rufu yereac mangngira, yeng semeng uaunac sinnu hamanu wasaingic yeneng Yesuac maripong tofohoudeac ngombonggegec tofohoec.
41015022	Tofohou yeni bangec buma mong kpara Gorigata, titiha hatasic, imohai Yesu mekenggec.
41015023	Mekemma sopo mong aengagoc kpara mira, imoc wainggoc yerecgema migec nga yeng ine imoc waec.
41015024	Anu yeni ye mariponnu kpema wambaya mederema wiac mong me mong merang meude, imocac kpeing kpegec.
41015025	Yeni asoac 9 kirocfu Yesu mariponnu kpegec.
41015026	Kpema ye yoacfu faigec, imocac hania tafebisicfu yofi ohogec, “Yudangic yeneac ngictau.”
41015027	Anu yeni godzungic yohockang, mong foiau nga mong kanayau yegoc mariponnu momoc yunugec. Ifi anggec yoac mitikibiu oho ohoya yomoc seriec, “Ye manganameme yenearunac mong, ifi negenggec.” (Yes 53:12)
41015029	Anu ngic ihai kengha anggec, yeni Yesu deendema ammima orucngina kpatitickema degec, “Ngeni ngic imoc henggec, yeng womong hembarackema wenac harebecac manau monggoc meudeac deec.
41015030	Ge geanggaoc onggongemema mariponnunac mesiemema mana!”
41015031	Anu womonggareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic, yeneng ifingoc ye desusuic ammima denegeng amma degec, “Ye ngic goa onggongyunukefec nga yengena ine naric mi onggongemeude.
41015032	Ye Messia, Israe neneac ngictau kecdengo yaguc mariponnunac mau hemma negensinggenide.” Nga ngic yohockang mariponnu ifingoc yurugec, yereng ifingoc deendema ammioc.
41015033	Wenac dzongiau 12 kiroc ammanu imohai ama kundung kpema kundungngo bangec sokoma fekemmanu 3 kiroc marai anec.
41015034	Imohai Yesungo ubaudumeng kunengngoc kpacma yofi deec, “Eroi, Eroi rama sabaktani.” Imocac titiha yofi, “Anutuna Anutuna, ge nocac wanudang.”
41015035	Ye ifi kparu ngic wegenac nanggec, yenearunac goango imoc negemma degec, “Negenggec, ye Eria kpacsambic ammide.”
41015036	Ifi degec ngic mongngo nedzikemma kondung sobing mong mema waing aengagocfu nemuruckema yasuu faiu Yesuac enarau enu deec, “Tomai namma henni, Eriango hama mesiude me kpac!”
41015037	Ifi demanu Yesungo ine ubaudumeng kunengngoc kparu asuya ereec.
41015038	Ereu womonggac kporuc kuneng imoc dzongiausing wihacnac tohoma mau yohockang anec.
41015039	Anu wasaigareng yeac kicfu nanec, yeng Yesungo kparec nga homeec, imoc hemma yofi deec, “Foracngoc, ngic yomoc ye Anutuac medacnoc.”
41015040	Nga ngac goa ifingoc hereau namma faka fingerec, imoc henggec, yeneac botucfu Maria kpara mong Madara nga Maria, Yakobo mong munea deandae, ye nga Yosec yereac nonggongira amma Sarome, yeni yenahafoc nanggec.
41015041	Yesungo Gariraia bangecfu kefu ngac imoc yenennoc ye modacma meficgekecgec. Amma ngac tosea homac, yeni Yerusalennu yegoc bic kemma ihai ye hemma nanggec.
41015042	Marai bic anu hombanggac memengereac naso wegene hau sabataac naso femanu
41015043	Yosefe Arimataia taonnunac, yeng ihai haec. Ngic ye kpactoayagoc yudangic yeneac tutumangtoa, imocac membangina mong amma ye Anutuac eucererenggac tomai kefec. Yeng kengeha kpac Piratoaru kemma Yesuac fareng meudeac kpesimiec.
41015044	Kpesimiu Pirato ye Yesungo bic homeec, imocac kpidohoma wasaienara kpacma Yesu bic homedac me kpac, imocac kpesimiec.
41015045	Kpesimiu Yesu bic homedac deu Yesuac fareng Yosefe desimiec.
41015046	Desimiu Yosefengo linengkporuc mong bummema Yesuac farenga mariponnunac mesiu mau kporucngo tembonggema kicsereu mekenec. Kicsere imoc hocsirau singa usu usuya, imohai farenga faima hoctoa mong kpedidinggeu singa hedzickeec.
41015047	Anu Maria Madara nga Maria Yosec nonggea, yereng Yesuac farenga dahai faiec, imoc henoc.
41016001	Sabata tatac naso wisickeu imohai Maria Madara nga Maria Yakoboac nonggea amma Sarome, yeneng kemma Yesuac fareng nadzicmigecdeac kerec homunagoc bummegec.
41016002	Bummema sonda gboria hanac hanaheau asoacngoc ama wereckenu kicsereu kemmagec wenac ereec.
41016003	Anu kemma yenaocngoc denegeng amma degec, “Merang hocsingaac naguya imohacnac hoc kpedidinggenemmeude?”
41016004	Ifi dema kic fima henggec hoctoa imoc ine bic kpedic kpedidinggea. Nga hoc imoc kunengtoa yombong.
41016005	Hemma kicsereu emma henggec medac mongngo ngakpihereha kongac kongac mong heiec, yeng foiugeng taru hemma kpidohoma kerectegec anggec.
41016006	Ifi anggec yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni mi kengecngunuu. Yesu Nadzaretenac mariponnu kpegecmoc, ngeni ye hembeso hadae nga ye bic gborima yacdac, yei mi fede. Faigec fedac, fefea imoc henggec.
41016007	Ngeni kemma medacfora nga Petoro yofi edeyunugec, ye waraingemmema Gariraia bangecfu kende. Anu ngeni imohai kemma ye meficgegec, yengenaoc edengunuec, ifi isoc.”
41016008	Ifi edeyunuu yeni kpidohoma dzonongngina fedeecac kicsereunac worama kenggec. Amma yeni homac yombong kpidohoma kengecyunuecac amma ngic mong mi edeyunugec.
41016009	Yesungo sondau yarec, naso imohai hanahema Maria Madara fingecmiec. Ye warac hadehade 7 yearunac kporarec, ngac imocnoc fingecmiec.
41016010	Fingecmiu Mariango kemma ogofora yegoc momoc kecgec, yeni ubahodung negemma kiac kecmagec yofi edeyunuec,
41016011	“Yesungo bic yacdac kecde, ni hendua.” ifi deu yeneng ye mi negensinggegec.
41016012	Anu imocac ngadeau ngic yohockang yeri amabangec monnu kembesonga kemmaec ye siriha mong amma fingecyemerec.
41016013	Fingecyemeru yeri dzigenema goa edeyunugec, yeneng ine mi negensinggegec.
41016014	Anu medacfora 11 yeni yaka nema tacmagec Yesungo fingecyemmeec. Nga ye yarec hemma edeyunugec, imoc mi negensinggegec nga ubangina seriecac amma ngaba siricfu yoac edeyunuec.
41016015	Edeyunuma yoac yofi deec, “Ngeni bangectoa bangec, imohai kemma wiac sasawa Anutungo deu fingerec, yeni siduc gombung edekpou ayemmebisia.
41016016	Anu ngic me ngac mong negensinggema mitidoku nadziru Anutungo ye ebicfunac mesiu komoc kpeude. Nga mong ye mi negensinggeude, yeng ine yoacfu makpeude.
41016017	Nga negensinggegecde, ngenearu faka kuhagoc yofi fingerude. Ngeni neac kpacfu hadehade nga yafing kporacyunugecde amma nedzarangyoac uba gboriausing degecde.
41016018	Ngeni boidzoc maringo megecde nga doku hodungagoc ngic memanganeyunuande, ngeni imoc negecdeu, imocngo mi memanganengunuude. Nga ngeni ngicngac hafeigoc yenearu mari faigec, yeni ngereegecde.”
41016019	Kebu Yesungo yoac ifi edeyunuu wisickeu Anutungo ye kurumennu meenu yeac foiau tacde.
41016020	Anu medac yeni noboc noboc kemma siduc gombung ngicngac edekpou ayemmegec. Nga Kebungo yenigoc kefu yeni ua megec faka kuhagoc fingerec, imocngo yoara meseriec.
42001001	Kunenna Teofiro, profete yeneng yoac degec, imocngo botucninau fora fingerec, imocac siduc ohogenduae. Ngicngac yeni hanac hanaheaunacngoc erema kicnginango faka fingerec, imoc hemma yeni siduc gombunggac kingangkpekpefora anggec. Yeni faka fingerec, imocac siduc edenunugec homacngo imoc hanahema ohogec. Imocac siduc edenunugec amma ohogec, imoc isinggema hanac hanaheaunac erema fingerecmoc, imoc dindingac arenggema ohogemba naric anudeac negensiai.
42001004	Ge yoac yomoc osoma yoac kpougenggec, imocac fora ande, imoc naric negennade.
42001005	Yuda bangecac ngictau Herode yeac nasou Abia ua arennunac womonggareng mong kefec, kpara Dzekaria. Yeac enema kpara Erisabete ye Aronggac fingecsahe, imohacnac.
42001006	Ngicngahoc imoc yeri Anutuac kicfu dindingac yombong kecma dedeseriyoac nga singyoac sasawa modacma ikocngira kpac amma kpetiac kefoc.
42001007	Yeri kufing kefocac amma Erisabetengo sabaha kpac kefu yeri kecma ngicngac yada bic anoc.
42001008	Nga naso botuc ihai Dzekariango Anutuac kicfu uaarengfora yenigoc ua megec
42001009	yeni fakangina modacma merang sesegerec homuna gombunga kpedzereckeude, imocac kpeing kpegec Dzekaria heficgeec.
42001010	Heficgeu sesegerec imoc kpedzereckebesonga nasoya hau ye Anutuac womong manau enec. Enu ngicngac habutoa yeni ngadeau numuma nanggec.
42001011	Ifi ammagec Kebuac angero mongngo hosuc heiheiac arata, imohai Dzekaria fingecmiec. Fingecmima foiaugeng nanec.
42001012	Nga Dzekariango hemma kpidohoma kengec ebiria anu
42001013	angerongo yofi edeec, “Dzekaria, ge mi kengecguu, Anutungo nunumuga bic negendac nga enengga Erisabetengo medac mong kpenanggema megenude. Ge kpara Yohane, ifi kpacbesena.
42001014	Yeng geac ubangerec nga sogac sogai anude. Nga ngicngac homacngo ye fingerecac amma ifingoc ubangerec negenggecde.
42001015	Imoc yofiac, yeng Kebuac kicfu kuneng anude. Amma waing doku me doku seria mong naric mi neude. Ye nonggo heremanaunacngoc Tiri Asu wake wakeagoc amma
42001016	Israe ngicngacfora homac wangecyunuu yeni ubangina Kebu Anutungina, yearu merenggecde.
42001017	Amma medac ye manggac wangecyunuu ubangina meremma heregoc nambaracfocngina yeneac songo negenggecde. Amma yoackpekpe yeni negen negeng dindingac meficgeyemmeudeac ua meude. Nga yeng Kebuac kicfu kecma Eriaac onga nga kucfu uaya mekefude. Ifi mekecma ngicngac meefaiyunuu yeni Kebuac kicfu efaima yeac ngicngacfora ambesandae.”
42001018	Ifi deu Dzekariango angero yofi edeec, “Ni neanna ngicyada nga enenna ifingoc, ye kifaya bic homac ammanu geac yoac dafiugeng negemba fora anude?”
42001019	Ifi deu angerongo deec, “Ni Gabirie. Anutuac kicfu nanganduae nga ye yengenaoc yoac edegubadeac suenuu hama siduc gombung yomoc edeguduae.
42001020	Negennec, yoac deduae, imocac nasoya hau foraya fingerude. Nga ge yoacna imoc mi negensinggedanggac ge yoacga kpac anu ifi kecmana wiac deduaemoc, imocac nasoya hama fingerude. Fingeru wenac imohaingoc yoacgagoc monggoc annade.”
42001021	Anu ngicngacareng yeni Dzekariaac tomai namma ye Anutuac womonnu naso herea yombong nanecac kerectegec anggec.
42001022	Ifi anggec ye ngadeau mau yoara kpac anu yoac edeyunuudeac obohou yeni bic negentegecgec, “O, ye womonnu emma onga mong hendac.” Kecma ye yoara kpac anu mariangosac faka anec.
42001023	Anu Dzekariaac womonggarenggac ua nasoya wisickeu ye mama ameau monggoc dzigenema kenec.
42001024	Kenu naso mi hereemanu enema Erisabete ye hereagoc amma afo 5 sufu sufuu kefec. Kecma yofi negenec,
42001025	“Yomoc Kebuac faka mong, yeng neac negensima naso yomohai gamena mesawerema faka yomoc anendac. Nga ngicngac yeneng neac deendema monggoc mi anggecde.”
42001026	Anu Erisabeteac afoya 6 ammanu Anutungo angero mong kpara Gabirie sueu Gariraia provinsiu taong mong kpara Nadzarete, ihai kenec.
42001027	Kemma ngac naroang kpara Maria, ye fingecmiec. Maria ye ngic mong kpara Yosefe, yeac enema anude, imoc bic deserigec amma Yosefe ye Dawidiac kisicfunac.
42001028	Angerongo Mariaac yofi deec, “Ohec, Kebungo gegoc kecde, wosoefactoayango gearu fedeac ubangerec negembesena.”
42001029	Ifi deu Maria ye imoc negemma kerectegec kuneng anec, “Angerongo noc wiacac negemma ifi edenude?” imoc negenu obohou negen negeng ua homac meec.
42001030	Memanu angerongo yofi edeec, “Maria, ge mi kengecguu, Kebungo geac negenu ngereeande.
42001031	Amma negenna, ge sabac mong kpenanggema menade. Amma ge medac yeac kpara Yesu kpacbesena.
42001032	Medac imocngo engena yombong anude. Yeng Anutu Engenatoaninaac Medac, yeac kpara ifi kpacgecde. Nga Kebu Anutungo ye kisiha Dawidi yeac ngictauac tatac miu ihai tarude.
42001033	Amma yeng Yakoboac kisicfora yeneac ngictau amma nasoya kpac kefude nga amabangeha garenggeude, imoc wisic wisickea kpac feeng kecbesande.”
42001034	Ifi deu Mariango angero edeec, “Ni ngicgoc mong mi fedua nga imoc dafiugeng fingerudeac denec?”
42001035	Ifi kpesimiu yofi deec, “Tiri Asungo gearu mau Engenatoaac kucngo geac nokumuc amma kperacguude. Imocac amma sabacga kpetiac fingerude, yeac kpara Anutuac Medac degecde.
42001036	Negenna, geac areng mocgu Erisabete, ye ngacyada amma sifu medac kpenanggeec. Ngicngac yeni ye kufing kecde, ifi degec nga yeng hereagoc anu afoya 6 bic ande.
42001037	Anutuaru faka kpungge kpunggea mi fede.”
42001038	Ifi deu Mariango deec, “Negenna, Anutu ye neac minginna imocac ge yoac dedang, imoc naric fingecnembeso.” Ifi deu angerongo wama kenec.
42001039	Naso mi hereemanu Mariango efaima Yudaiaac sifec bangecfu taong monnu kenec.
42001040	Kemma Dzekariaac amau emma Erisabete wenacngerec demiec.
42001041	Nga Erisabetengo Mariaac yoac negenu sabac hereau tarec, imocngo kpidohoec. Kpidohou Tiri Asungo Erisabetearu wakeu
42001042	ye kunengngoc kpacma deec, “Ge ngac botucninau kenecgagoc nga sabac heregau tacde, ye kenehagoc.
42001043	Kebunaac nonggeango nearu hau faka yomoc fingecnende, imoc faka kuneng.
42001044	Negenna, ge wenacngerecyoacga dena kedzacnango negembare sabacngo herenau sogaima yuengyuma andac.
42001045	Ngac ye Kebungo yoac edeu imocngo fora fingerudeac negensinggeude, ngac imoc ye kenehagoc.”
42001046	Ifi deu Mariango deec, “Anutu, ge kicga fima nenna wanac naroangga mamea yombong amma kefai. Imocac amma ubaonganango Kebu heiwayong anggenu
42001047	Anutu memengerecna, ongaasunango geac amma sogaide.
42001048	Yeng kingang naroang mamea kecde, imoc hentegecdac nga yofinenggac namma feengkefude, ngicngacareng sasawango negennemma yofi degecde, ‘Ye kenehagoc.’
42001049	Kuctoa Minginango fakatoaya kuneng yombong anendac nga yeac kpara kpetiac.
42001050	Kisicfunac kisic yeac ewea heimiandae, yeneac witiu yeac ubamangangngo feengkefude nga feengkecbesande.
42001051	Nga ngicngac yenang uba negen negengnginaac negenggec engena ande, yenearu kucfakaya mema maria sinema medereyunuu singsararang kpegecde.”
42001052	“Ye ngictau kucnginagoc, yeni tatacnginaunac meicyunuma ngic kpac kuneng mong mi mekecgec, yeni memiacyunuec.
42001053	Nga ngicngac here home homegoc kecdae, yeng yeni yengena wiac gombunga yemmema mewakeyunuec amma finactoanginagoc, yeni ine maringinau wiac mong mi faima eng sueyunuu kenggec.
42001054	Anutungo yoara bangecnina Abrahang nga fingecsaheyaac edeyunuec, imoc mi nigeckpeec, kpac. Ye kingangkpekpefora Israe siriha ifiangoc meficyunuma wosoefac ayemmeude.”
42001056	Amma Mariango afo harebec isoc Erisabetegoc kecma monggoc ameau dzigene kenec.
42001057	Kenu Erisabete ye sabac fingec fingec nasoya wegeneu medac meec.
42001058	Meu amafora nga yengena arengfora yeneng Kebungo yearu wosoefactoa ammiec, imocac negemma yegoc momoc sogaigec.
42001059	Anu uameme 8 ammanu yeni medac sebi tosea herecgegecdeac hama ngic yeneng yeac kpara Dzekaraia, mamaac wase megecdeac degec.
42001060	Ifi degec nonggea Erisabetengo kpetarima deec, “Yeac kpara Yohane kpacbesonga.”
42001061	Ifi deu yeneng degec, “Geac arengfocga yenearunac kpac ifia mong mi kpacgec fede.”
42001062	Ifi dema yeni maringo faka amma medac kpara merac kpacnide, imocac mama kpesimigec.
42001063	Kpesimigec Dzekariango kibi oho ohoac tafe, imocac kpesiyemmeu migec yofi ohoec, “Medac yeac kpara Yohane.” Ifi ohou yeni sasawango kerectegec anggec.
42001064	Nga naso imohaingoc Dzekariaac enara anggeu nedzaranga heimerenu ye monggoc yoacdede amma Anutu dengerema kefec.
42001065	Anu amafora yeni sasawango kengec anggec nga ngicngac Yudaia sifec bangectoau kecgec, yeni faka fingerec, imocac denegeng amma kecgec.
42001066	Nga ye Kebuac kucngo sabacgoc kefec, imocac amma ngicngac siduc negenggec, yeneng yoac imoc negen negenginau faima yofi negemma kpesiemegec, “Sabac imocngo kecma dafi ambesande?”
42001067	Anu Tiri Asungo sabacac mama Dzekariaaru wakeu, yeng kpefingyoac yofi deec,
42001068	“Kebu Israeac Anutu kenehebisina. Yeng ngicngacfora nenannu hama witicfunac bic yungecnunuec.
42001069	Amma ye bicngoc yombong profete yeneac enacfu yoac faiu degecmoc, imoc modacma kingangngiha Dawidi, yeac fingecsaheunacngo ngic mong ebicfunac yungecnunuuu komoc kpenide, ye meficgenemmeec.
42001071	Yeng ngabafocnina kecdae nga ubango ukununuandae, yeneac mariunac mesinunuudeac negenec.
42001072	Nga Anutungo kisicnina Abrahanggoc yoac deserima deec, imoc negensima dzadzahac kpataninga modacma kisicfocnina wosoefac ayemmema
42001074	ngabafocnina yeneac mariunac mesinunuu kecma kengeha kpac eweheimima kecnide.
42001075	Kecni kekecnasonina fedesoc, imohai yeac kicfu kpataning nga dindingac kecnideac ifi anemmeec.
42001076	Anu sabacna gennoc waraima Kebuac sing mengerema singa heitumeinadeac amma Engenatoa yeac profete, ifinoc kpacgugecde.
42001077	Ge yeac ngicngacfora kopocsicngina wawaya anudeac kpouyemmenade nga yeni ebicfunac mesi mesi nga komoc kpegecdeac sing, imoc naric negentegecgecde.
42001078	Nga Anutuninango songo nga wosoefac engena yombong anemmekecdeac ifi fingerude. Yeac songotoayaac kuc imoc wenac isoc erema nenanggaru mama ngicngac
42001079	kundung manau nga homecac nokumucfu kecdae, yeni mekperagiyunuu nenang ruaeac sinnu kennideac hanianina garenggema sing imoc edzacnunubesande.”
42001080	Anu sabac ye sebiugeng nga asuu yadiseri amma bangec kisiu kecma Israe ngicngac yeneac kicfu fingectegerudeac nasoac tomai kefec.
42002001	Kwiriniungo Siria bangecac gawana kefec, naso imohai Roma bangecac ngictau Sisa Agustongo bangeha bangeha kpacarengngina mengeregecdeac yoac faiu kendarec. Nga imocngo osokporeng hanac hanahea anec.
42002003	Ifi anu ngicngac sasawango kpacarengngina mengeregecdeac taongngina fekenec, imocacsoc kendacgec.
42002004	Yosefe ye Dawidiac kisicfunac, imocac amma yeng Gariraia provinsiunac erema Nadzarete wama Yudaia provinsiu Dawidiac taongbisic kpara Betereheng, ihai kenec.
42002005	Nga enembingeha Maria ye hereagoc anu yegoc yerahafoc kpacngira kpacarennu ohogecdeac kenoc.
42002006	Yeri ihai kecmaec sabacac fingec fingecnaso haec.
42002007	Anu yeri amatatacfu titinga mong mi feecac yeri ngadeau tacmaec morocmedacngira fingeru Mariango sangohoma ramaburumaka otou ihai faiu keema feec.
42002008	Anu toforecfu ramagareng goa yeni Betereheng ama wegenacfu ramafocngina garengyunuma kecgec.
42002009	Kecmagec Kebuac angero mongngo fingecyemmeu Kebuac kibikperagitoayango mekperagiyunuu yeni kengec ebiria anggec.
42002010	Ifi anggec yeng edeyunuec, “Ngeni kengec mi anggec. Imoc yofiac, yaguc yombong ngeneac amma Dawidiac taonnu Messia Kebungina fingecdac, ye ebicnginaunac mesingunuude. Nga ngicngac sasawa yeac amma ebiriangoc sogaigecde, ni siduc gombung imoc dekperagingemmeduae.
42002012	Sabac ye merac imoc negenggecdeac ma yomoc ngemmebade, ngeni kemma ramaburumaka otou sabac mong kporucngo birac biranggea feu meficgegecde.”
42002013	Ye ifi demanu imohaingoc kurumenggac angerohabu kuneng, yeneng fingecma yegoc namma Anutu dengerema yofi degec,
42002014	“Anutu ohec, wi kurumennu febeso nga bangecfu ruae fingecbeso. Anutungo ngicngac wosoefac ayemmede.”
42002015	Ifi dema angero yeni kurumennu dzigenema enggec ramagareng yeni yenaocngoc denegeng amma degec, “Betereheng taonnu faka fingeru Kebungo edenunudac, imoc bic kemma henni.”
42002016	Ifi dema yeni bic kemma Maria nga Yosefe amma sabac oto manau feec, yeni meficyunuma yenenggec.
42002017	Yenemma angerongo sabac yeac yoac deecmoc, imoc edeyunugec negendacgec.
42002018	Nga ramagareng yeneng siduc anggec nga ngicngac imoc negenggec, yeni kerectegec andacgec.
42002019	Mariango ine faka fingechaec, imoc hereau faima negensima kefec.
42002020	Nga angerongo yoac ramagareng edeyunuec, yeni imoc sasawa fora hemma negemma dzigenema Anutu afec afehe kenggec.
42002021	Uameme 8 wisickeu sabac sebi tosea herecgegecdeac nasoya hau yeni kpara Yesu kpacgec. Kpac imoc ye nonggeango mi kpenanggemanu angerongo bic kparec.
42002022	Kecma Moseac dedeseriyoac modacma dzuac dzuacnasoac mitikibiu oho ohoya nande, nasongina imoc wisickeu yeni sabacngo Kebuac kicfu fingerudeac Yerusalennu meenoc.
42002023	Kebuac dedeseriyoacfu yoac yofi oho ohoya fede, “Waracmedac fingeckecgecdesoc yeni Kebuac kpataning areng.”
42002024	Nga sese faibesonga, imoc kebesac yohockang me gomoc gomocmedaha yohockang faibesonga, imoc Kebuac dedeseriyoacfu fede nga yeri imoc modacma mekenoc.
42002025	Naso imohai ngic mong Yerusalennu kefec, kpara Simeong. Ye ngic dindingac amma Anutu eweheimima Tiri Asugoc kefec. Amma ye Israengic yenearu memeseri fingerudeac tomai anec.
42002026	Nga Asungo warac yofi deficgema edeec, “Ge mi homemana Anutuac Messia fingeru hennade.”
42002027	Nga Yesuac nonggomama yereng dedeseriyoac feec, imoc modacma sabacngira Anutuac womonnu meenoc. Meenec Asungo Simeong bic wangeru womong manau emma
42002028	sabac menamma Anutu dengerema yofi deec,
42002029	“Kuctoa minginna, ni wanacngicga kicnango Memengerecga hembadeac denec, imoc bic henduaac ruaegoc kekecna mewegenena kembade.
42002031	Ge ngicngac sasawa yeneac kicfu sing imoc bic mengeredang.
42002032	Nga yeng bangeha bangeha ngicngac ge mi negensinggudae, yeni mekperagiyunuma kperagingina ambesande amma ye israengicngacfocga yeneac kibikperagitoa.”
42002033	Ifi deu sabac nonggomama yeri yeac yoac imoc negemma kerectegec anoc.
42002034	Nga Simeongngo kenecyunuma sabac nonggea Maria yofi edeec, “Negenna, Israengic homacngo medac yomocac amma mayunuude nga homacngo yeac amma yacma nanggecde, ifi fingerudeac Anutungo meisinggeec. Nga ngic homac yeni ye hemma yeac ngaba amma deendema ammigecde.
42002035	Ammigec geac ubaherega ifingoc dzikacac beangngo herecgeude. Ifi anu ngicngac homac yeneac negen negeng sufuma feec, imoc didiu fingecbesande.”
42002036	Anu profete ngac mong kpara Hanna, ye ifingoc womonnu kefec. Ye Fanuereac naroang Aseac kisicfunac. Amma ye ngic mema yegoc kifa 7 kecmanu ewea homeec.
42002037	Homeu ye hotsec kecmanu kifaya 84 anec. Amma yeng womong mi wawa hadzing toforec yaka segekecma Anutu numumikefec.
42002038	Kecma naso imohaingoc yenigoc wegenac namma Anutu dengereec. Dengerema ngic Yerusalenggac tembuckekecngina fingerudeac tomai kecdacgec, yeni sabacac siduc dekperagiyemmeec.
42002039	Yosefe nga Maria yeri Kebuac dedeseriyoacngo dede, imoc sasawa andarec wisickeu Gariraia provinsiu dzigenema Nadzarete amanginau kemma kecgec.
42002040	Kecgec medacngo yadiu Anutuac ubangerecngo yearu feu yeng kuc nga negen negentegec wake wakea meec.
42002041	Yesuac nonggomama yeri makekenggac hombang henecdeac kifasoc Yerusaleng taonnu engkefoc.
42002042	Amma yeni hombanggac faka modacma Yesungo kifaya 12 ammanu yenahafoc hombannu kenggec.
42002043	Kemma kecmagec hombang naso wisickeu dzigene hagec Yesungo Yerusalennu tarec. Taru nonggomama yereng imoc mi negemma hama
42002044	yofi negenoc, “Ye habu yenigoc sinnu kecde.” Ifi negemma yeri uameme mocgu sinnu eng kenggec wisickeu Yesu hoforoc. Hofocma tosofocngina nga arengfocngina yenearu yerecgema
42002045	mong mi meficgeocac monggoc dzigenema Yerusalennu meficgeecdeac kenoc.
42002046	Uameme harebec wisickeu Anutuac womong manau emma Yesu meficgeoc. Meficgeec yeng kpoukpou yeneac botucfu womonnu tacma negengyemmema dekpesi ayemmeec.
42002047	Amma Yesungo negen negenggoc yombong ngic sasawa yoacngina merenecac yeni kpidohoma imoc wiac engena ande, ifi negenggec.
42002048	Nga nonggomama yereng ye hemma kpidohoma nonggeango yofi edeec, “Medac, ge nocac faka ifia anecmenec? Manggagoc nereng negengyohoc amma hofocgukecdic.”
42002049	Ifi deu yeng edeyuruec, “Ngeri nocac hofocnudape? Mannango ua mekecde, ua imoc mebadeac denenec, imoc mi negendape me?”
42002050	Ifi deu yeri yoac imocac obohooc.
42002051	Nga ye nonggomama yerigoc dzigenema Nadzarete taonnu kemma imohai enacngira tofohoma kefec. Nga nonggeango faka sasawa fingerec, imoc negen negengau faiu feec.
42002052	Nga Yesungo negen negeng nga kifayaac arennu yadiseri anu Anutu nga ngic yeni yenahafoc hendzidziegec.
42003001	Ngictau Sisa Tiberiongo kifa 15 tatahau bic tackefec. Nga Pontio Piratongo Yudaia bangecac gawana kefec. Kecmanu Herodengo Gariraia bangecac gareng anec nga munea Firipongo Ituraia nga Trakoniti bangecac gareng anec amma Risaningo Abireneac gareng, ifingoc kecgec.
42003002	Ifi kecmagec Hannas nga Kaifa yereng womonggarengtoa kefoc. Naso imohaingoc Dzekariaac medac Yohanengo bangec kisiu kefu Anutuac yoacngo yearu haec.
42003003	Yohanengo Yodang doku noboc noboc bangec fekende, imohai yerecgema ngicngac yofi dekperagiyemmeec, “Ngeni Anutungo kopocsicngina waudeac ubangina dzigeneu mitidoku nadzicbisia.”
42003004	Profete Yesaiango yoac imoc deec, yeac kibiu yofi oho ohoya fede, “Bangec kisiu kpakpac mong yofi fingecde, ‘Ngeni Kebuac sing wisima singa heitumegec.
42003005	Yeni kperemeng sasawa semegecde nga tikifagang sasawa imoc heitumegecde amma sing gbaring gbaring mengeregec dindingac anude nga sing kopocsiragoc heisorongaigec
42003006	Anutungo ngicngac manganaunac mesinunuude, imoc ngiha ngihango hendacbesandae.’ ” (Yes 40:3-5)
42003007	Ifi anu ngicngac homacngo Yohanearu kenggec. Kemma doku nadzicyemmeudeac edegec Yohanengo yofi edeyunuec, “Boidzocac gboricfora, Anutuarunac turunga habeso ande, ngeni imohacnac woragecdeac sing fede, merang goroyoac imoc edengunuec?
42003008	Imocac ngeni doku nadzicma ubamerenggac siricfu fora meficgebisia. Nga ngeni yofinenggac ngenanggac yofi mi negengemebisia, ‘Abrahang ye bangecnina.’ Anutungo hoc yomoc yenearu faka meu yenearunac Abrahanggac bangecfora naric fingecgecde.
42003009	Naka ye bic ic haniau tacdeac ic goa fora gombunga mi anggecde, imoc sasawa heiu kpeu gerecfu ukuyunuude.”
42003010	Ifi deu ngicngac yeneng kpesimigec, “Ifi anu neni dafi annide?”
42003011	Ifi degec yofi merengyemmeec, “Ngic mongngo ngakpia yohockang mekecde, ye mong hesima ngakpia kpac kecde, ye meficgebeso. Nga nenesemengagoc kecde, yeng faka imocngoc ambeso.”
42003012	Nga takesimeme goa yeneng ifingoc hama doku nadzicyemmeudeac hama degec, “Kpoukpou, neni dafi annide?”
42003013	ifi degec Yohanengo edeyunuec, “Ngeni hiedzo megecdeac dengemmegec, imoc mi ferahema sirihausac mebisia.”
42003014	Nga wasaingic goa yeneng ifingoc kpesimigec, “Anu neni dafi annide?” Ifi degec deec, “Ngeni godzufaka me ikocfu amma degbedicfu monggarunac hiedzo mi mebisia. Ngeni uanginaac bummekecdae, hiedzo imocsac fengemmebeso.”
42003015	Anu ngicngac yeni Messiaac tomai kecgecac amma ubaherenginau negenggec, “Yohane yenoc Messia gedang.”
42003016	Ifi negenggecac Yohanengo yofi merengyemmeec, “Ni doku nadzicngemmeduae nga ngic ngadenau hade, yeng ine Tiri Asu nga gerecgoc nadzicngemmeude. Nga yeac kucngo neac kuc ferahade, ni ifiango yeac hanitabea witiha yungecba naric mi ngereeude.
42003017	Ye meic meicke saraha mariau mehama wit seuhagoc meic meicke sobengau feu, imoc fima seuha meickema fora mekpedzuc amma ameau faiude. Faima seuha wanggema gerec pisic pisickea kpac, imohai ukuu dzeude nga dzebesande.”
42003018	Yohanengo yoac siriha homac dema ngicngac dederecge ayemmema siduc gombung edeyunukefec.
42003019	Anu ngictau Herodengo ine muneaac ngac kpara Herodia hamangec mema faka mangana goa homac angkefecac Yohanengo faka mangana imocac nonoyoac ededarec.
42003020	Edeu Herodengo yoara negemma monggoc Yohaneac ngaba amma witicamau faiec.
42003021	Ngicngac sasawango mitidoku nadzicmagec Yesungo ifingoc mitidoku nadzirec. Nadzicma numuma nammanu kurumeng anggeu
42003022	Tiri Asungo kebesacac siric amma yearu maec. Mau kurumennunac enacudumeng mong yofi fingerec, “Ge songomedacna, ni gengsongo anggengkecduae.”
42003023	Yesungo kifaya 30 ammanu uaya hanaheec. Nga ngicngac yeneng yofi negenggec, ye Yosefeac medac. Nga Yosefe ye Heriac medac
42003024	nga Heri ye Matataac medac. Matata ye Lewiac medac nga Lewi ye Merikiac medac. Meriki ye Yanaiac medac nga Yanai ye Yosefeac medac.
42003025	Yosefe ye Matatiaac medac nga Matatia ye Amosiac medac. Amosi ye Nahunggac medac nga Nahung ye Esiriac medac. Esiri ye Nagaiac medac
42003026	nga Nagai ye Mahataac medac. Mahata ye Matatiaac medac nga Matatia ye Semeinggac medac. Semeing ye Yosekeac medac nga Yoseke ye Yudaac medac.
42003027	Yuda ye Yohananggac medac nga Yohanang ye Resaac medac. Resa ye Dzorobabeac medac nga Dzorobabe ye Saratiereac medac. Saratiere ye Neriac medac
42003028	nga Neri ye Merikiac medac. Meriki ye Adiac medac nga Adi ye Kosanggac medac. Kosang ye Erimadanggac medac nga Erimadang ye Eriac medac.
42003029	Eri ye Yesouac medac nga Yesou ye Eriedzeac medac. Eriedze ye Yoringgac medac nga Yoring ye Matataac medac. Matata ye Lewiac medac
42003030	nga Lewi ye Simeonggac medac. Simeong ye Yudaac medac nga Yuda ye Yosefeac medac. Yosefe ye Yonanggac medac nga Yonang ye Eriakinggac medac.
42003031	Eriaking ye Mereaac medac nga Merea ye Menaac medac. Mena ye Matataac medac nga Matata ye Natanggac medac. Natang ye Dawidiac medac
42003032	nga Dawidi ye Isaiac medac. Isai ye Obedeac medac nga Obede ye Boasac medac. Boas ye Saraac medac nga Sara ye Nasonggac medac.
42003033	Nasong ye Aminadaac medac nga Aminada ye Adaminggac medac. Adaming ye Araniac medac nga Arani ye Hesoronggac medac. Hesorong ye Pereseac medac nga Perese ye Yudaac medac.
42003034	Yuda ye Yakoboac medac nga Yakobo ye Isakaac medac. Isaka ye Abrahanggac medac nga Abrahang ye Taraac medac. Tara ye Nahoreac medac
42003035	nga Nahore ye Seruguac medac. Serugu ye Ragauac medac nga Ragau ye Peregeac medac. Perege ye Ebereac medac nga Ebere ye Seraac medac.
42003036	Sera ye Kenanggac medac nga Kenang ye Arapakisaac medac. Arapakisa ye Senggac medac nga Seng ye Noaac medac. Noa ye Ramecac medac,
42003037	nga Ramec ye Metuseraac medac. Metusera ye Enokoac medac nga Enoko ye Yaredeac medac. Yarede ye Maharareac medac nga Maharare ye Kenanggac medac.
42003038	Kenang ye Enosiac medac nga Enosi ye Seteac medac. Setengo Adanggac medac nga Adang yeng ine Anutuac medac.
42004001	Anu Tiri Asungo Yesu mewakeu Yodang dokuunac dzigene eremanu yeng bangec kisiu wangeru kenoc.
42004002	Yesungo ihai kemma kecmanu uameme 40ac manau mangana minginango ye tobanggeec. Tobanggemanu imohai Yesungo yakaya kpac kecmanu uameme 40 wisickeu hereaac homeec.
42004003	Hereaac homema kecmanu mangana minginango edeec, “Ge Anutuac medac kecnecfu hoc yomoc dena imoc ic sogong anu.”
42004004	Ifi deu Yesungo meremmiec, “Yoac yofi oho ohoya fede, ‘Ngicngo ic sogonggacsac mi kefude, kpac.’ ” (Dser 8:3)
42004005	Ifi deu yeng Yesu bangecbuma monnu wangec enu piratac isoc fingeru bangeha bangeha gawamangnginagoc edzahema
42004006	deec, “Bangeha bangeha yomocac kibikperagia nga imoc garenggebadeac kuc bic nenggec. Nga ni imoc ngic mong me mong mibadeac kuc fenende.
42004007	Imocac ge eweheinennadeu ni imoc sasawa waba geac andarude.”
42004008	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Yoac yofi oho ohoya fede, ‘Ge Kebu Anutuga mocgu eweheimima kingang kpemibesena.’ ” (Dser 6:13-14)
42004009	Ifi deu yeng Yesu monggoc wangecma Yerusalennu kemma Anutuac womong imocac oda herea wi yombong nande, imocac bumau faiu nanu edeec, “Ge Anutuac Medac fora kecnecfu geanggaoc yomohacnac yuma kemena.
42004010	Yoac yofi oho ohoya fede, ‘Ye angerofora uayoac yemmeu yeneng ge sing sasawa kengkecnec, imohai garenggugecde.’
42004011	amma ‘Ge haniga hocfu heibanggac yeneng maringina witiau sesehegugecde.’ ” (Myeg 91:11-12)
42004012	Ifi deu Yesungo deec, “Yoac yofi dedea fede, ‘Ge Kebu Anutuga faitobannu mi faibesena.’ ” (Dser 6:16)
42004013	Ifi deu mangana minginango faitobang ammidaru wisickeu wama kemma naso monggac tomai kefec.
42004014	Anu Tiri Asungo Yesuaru wakema feu ye Gariraia bangecfu monggoc dzigeneu bangec fekende, imocac ngicngac sasawango siduha negendacgec.
42004015	Nga yeng kpekpeturang amanginau emma kpouyemmeu ngicngac sasawango dengeregec.
42004016	Anu Yesungo yadi yadibangeha Nadzarete, imohai kemma kpekpeturang amau engande, faka imoc modacma ihai enec. Emma mitikibi osoudeac nanu
42004017	yeni profete Yesaiaac kibi kpou kpouya migec ye imoc yungecma kibiu yoac yofi feec, imoc meficgeec.
42004018	“Kebuac Asungo nigoc kecde nga neng ngicngac makpekpea siduc gombung edeyunubadeac Kebungo dzimbonga nadzicnenec. Ngic witicfu kecdae, yeni witicngina kpac anude nga kicpisicngo kicfifi anggecde, imoc edeyunubadeac yeng suenuec. Suenuu hama ebicgoc kecdae, yeni ebicngina meickema wangecyunubade.
42004019	Nga Kebuarunac naso gombunga hangemmeude, imoc ifingoc dekperagibesandua.” (Yes 61:1-2)
42004020	Yesungo kibi imoc monggoc kpouma kibigareng miec. Mima mataru kpekpeturang amau ngicngac tacgec, yeni kicngina yearu sasawa fidacgec.
42004021	Figec yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Yoac mitikibiu osoba negendau, imocac fora yaguc hafoangoc fingecngemmede.”
42004022	Nga yeac enacfunac yoac dedea imocngo wosoefac nga kuhagoc anecac ngicngac sasawango yeac negenggec naric anu kerectegec amma yeac kpesiemegec, “Ngic yomoc ye Yosefeac medacngo ifi dede.”
42004023	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “ ‘Dota, ge geanggaoc mengereemena.’ Yoac heihei imoc fede nga ngeni imoc bic edenubeso andae. Amma monggoc yofi, ‘Ge Kafanaung taonnu ua mena siducga negengandimbe, imoc yei bangecgau ifingoc mena henni.’ ”
42004024	Dema monggoc torokpema deec, “Foracngoc, profete mong ye yengena bangecfu kenu ngicngac yeneng naric mi hoanggegecde, imoc edengunuduae.
42004025	Eria bic kefec, naso imohai Israe bangecfu ngachotsec ewefocngina homemea homacngo kecgec. Kecmagec kurumeng nagu heiu kia mi kpeec, kifa harebec nga afo 6 bangec imohai boditoa fingerec.
42004026	Fingeru Anutungo Eria sueu Israe ngachotsec yenearu mong mi kenec. Nga ye Sidong bangecac Sarepac taonnu ngachotsec mong ewea homemea kefec, yearu sueec.
42004027	Nga profete Erisango Israe bangecfu kefec, naso imohai ngicngac homacngo kukuserigoc kecgec, yenearunac mongngo mi ngereec, kpac. Nga Siria bangecfunac ngic mong kpara Naimang, yengsac ine ngereec.”
42004028	Ifi deu ngicngac sasawa kpekpeturang amau tacgec, yeni imoc negemma herengina buu
42004029	yacma Yesu igockema meickema taong ngadeau kemegec. Kemema taongngina tikiu tarec ihai hofe mong nanec, imohai kemma ukugec kemeudeac negemma wangecma kenggec.
42004030	Kenggec, yeng ine ngicngac botucnginau nedereyunuma kenec.
42004031	Yesungo Gariraia bangecac taong mong kpara Kafanaung, ihai kemema sabata nasou ngicngac Anutuac yoac kpouyemmeec.
42004032	Nga yeac kpoukpoungo ngicngac uakibi mekecdae, yeneac siricfu kuhagoc yombong ngicngac yeneng imoc negenggec engena anec.
42004033	Amma kpekpeturang amau ngic mong yafing seuhagoc kefec, yeng yoac kuhagoc kpacma deec,
42004034	“Ah, Yesu Nadzaretenac, neneac wiac imoc geac mi ande. Ge memanganenununadeac hanec me? Gensiduaenoc, ge Anutuac kpetiac ngic.”
42004035	Ifi deu Yesungo yafing yoac seria ammima yofi edeec, “Ge waickema ngicfunac erema kenna!” Ifi deu yafing ye ngic kpefaheu botucnginau makpeu yearunac erema kenec. Nga ye ngic imoc mong mi memanganeec.
42004036	Ngicngac sasawango imoc hemma kerectegec amma denegeng amma degec, “Ye noc yoac mekecde? Ngic yomoc ye kuc mimia nga kuhagoc yombong, yeng asu seuhagoc edeyunuu erema kendae.”
42004037	Ifi fingeru Yesuac siducngo bangec imocac tegia noboc noboc amasoc kendaru negenggec.
42004038	Yesungo kpekpeturang ama wama Simonggac amau kenec. Nga Simong sefena sebigerectoa ammiu feu Yesungo sefena mengereudeac edegec.
42004039	Edegec Yesungo namma ngac feu hemma sebigerec yoac seria edema kpetarimiu sebigerecngo ngac wama meickeec. Meickeu ngac ye naso imohaingoc yacma yenenggareng anec.
42004040	Anu wenackiwa keme kemeac ngicngac sasawango ogofocngina hafei hania hania ayemmeec, yeni meyunuma Yesuaru hagec. Hagec Yesungo ngicngac hafeinginagoc sasawa maria witinginau faima mengereyunudarec.
42004041	Mengereyunumanu yafing nga hadehade ifingoc ngicngac homac yenearunac erema yofi kpacgec, “Ge Anutuac Medac.” Nga ye Messia, imoc negenggecac yeneng yoac imoc mi degecdeac deracyunuec.
42004042	Wereckengau Yesungo taong wama bangec botuc mong ngiha kpacfu kenu ngicngac yeneng ye hofocgec. Hofocma meficgema yeng yenigoc kefudeac negemma ye monnu mi kembeso degec.
42004043	Ifi degec ine edeyunuec, “Taong goa fekendae, ni imohai ifingoc kemma Anutuac eucererenggac siduc gombung dekperagiyemmebesare. Anutungo imocacnoc suenuec.”
42004044	Ifi dema Yudaia bangecfu kpekpeturang amangina fekenec, imohai Anutuac yoac dekpou ayemmema kefec.
42005001	Naso monnu Yesungo Genesarete dzohong tegiau nammanu ngicngac yeneng Anutuac yoac negenggecdeac hama igocemema oronggegec botucnginau nanec.
42005002	Namma kic fima henu gomba yohockang dzohong tegiau taroc. Nga kondungyang memengic yeneng gombangina faigec taru uficngina dzuacma nanggec.
42005003	Nanggec Yesungo gomba mong, Simonggac gomba, imohai emma tacma Simong edeu yeng gomba kapianec kpesiu dzohonnu kenu ngicngac edekpou ayemmeec.
42005004	Wisickeu Simong yofi edeec, “Kondungyang mebesonga dzohonnu doku keme kemea fede, ngeni ihai kemma uficngina ukuma kondungyang megec.”
42005005	Ifi deu Simongngo meremmiec, “Kunenna, neni tofocnac yomohai hafoanoc uatoa mema kondungyang mong mi meding nga geng denecac ine kemma ufic ukubade.”
42005006	Ifi deu yeni uficngina ihai ukuma kondungyang homac yombong megecac uficngina wakema barackebesonga anec.
42005007	Ifi anu yeni ogofocngina gomba monnu tacgec, yeni marikarac heiyemmegec hama meficyunugec. Meficyunuma kondungyang gomba yohockang mewakegecac gomba yereng kondunnu kemebesonga anoc.
42005008	Simong Petorongo faka imoc hemma Yesuac haniu makpema fafoc heimima deec, “Kebu, ni ngic kopocsicnagoc anduaeac wanuma kenna.”
42005009	Simong nga ngic yegoc kecdacgec, yeneng kondungyang homac yombong megecac amma kerectegec anggecac ifi deec.
42005010	Nga Sebedaioac medachora, Yakobo nga Yohane, yeri Simonggoc kondungyang mema kecma ifingoc imoc hemma negenec wiac engena yombong anec. Nga Yesungo Simong edeec, “Ge mi kengecguu. Ge kondungyang meme nga yaguc ngicmeme annade.”
42005011	Ifi deu yeni gombangina mema tegiau faima wiac sasawa wama Yesu modacgec.
42005012	Anu Yesungo taong monnu kecmanu ngic mong kukuseringo sebia semedaru manganeyombonggeec, yeng ihai kecma Yesu hemma makpema kiwa bangecfu hetutuckema kpacsambic ammima deec, “Kebu, ge negenna naric anu medzuacnubang.”
42005013	Ifi deu Yesungo maria sinema kpeserema deec, “Ge ngereenadeac songona fede.” Ifi deu imohaingoc kukuseringo ngic imoc waec.
42005014	Wau Yesungo derahema deec, “Sebigau faka fingecdac, imocac ngic mong mi edebesena. Ge womonggareng yearu kemma sebiga edzahena. Amma Mosengo seseac deec, imocac sirihau sese faina ngicngac yeneng sesega imoc hemma negentegecgecde.”
42005015	Nga Yesuac siduc, imoc ine kuneng yombong yadima kenu ngicngac habutoa homac yeneng yeac yoac negenggecde nga yeng hafeingina mengereudeac hagec.
42005016	Ifi anggec Yesungo naso homac kperecge tegecma bangec goa ngiha kpacfu kemma numukefec.
42005017	Kecma naso monnu Yesungo Anutuac yoac edekpou ayemmemanu farisaio nga dedeseriyoacac kpoukpoungic goa Gariraia nga Yudaia amabisic sasawa amma Yerusalennac hama tacgec. Nga hafei mengec mengereac kuc Kebuarunac, imocngo Yesuaru feec.
42005018	Ifi femanu ngic goango hama ngic mong hanimaria homemea dzakeu faima tofohoma ama manau Yesuac kicfu faigecdeac negemma mekenggec.
42005019	Mekenggec ngicngac homacngo hedzickema nanggecac yeni Yesuac kicfu faigecdeac sing hofocma ngic imoc amabubuyau tofoho emma ama bubuya hesarima ihacsing ngic botucnginau Yesuac hoannu dzakeagoc faigec kemeec.
42005020	Kemeu Yesungo negen negensingngina hemma yofi deec, “Ngic, kopocsicga imoc bic wawaya.”
42005021	Ifi deu mitiac negen negengngic nga farisaio yeni yenaocngoc yofi negenggec, “Ngic imoc noc ngicngo Anutu emmide? Anutu mocgungo kopocsic naric waude.”
42005022	Ifi negenggec Yesungo wiac ubanginau negensigec, imoc hemma yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni nocac ubanginau ifi negensidae?
42005023	Yoac damocngo deni efea ande, ‘Kopocsicga bic wawaya ande.’ me yofi, ‘Ge yacma kenna.’
42005024	Ngicac Medac ye bangecfu kopocsic wawaac uayoac nga kuc femide, ngeni imoc negenggecdeac amma yofi deba.” Ye ifi dema ngic puringgac yofi deec, “Ni edeguduae, ge yacma dzakega mema amagau kenna.”
42005025	Ifi deu yeng imohaingoc ngicngac sasawa yeneac kicfu yacma fefea feande, imoc mema Anutu dengerema ameau kenec.
42005026	Kenu ngicngac sasawango homac yombong kpidohoma kerectegec amma Anutu dengeredacgec. Nga kengecngo mewakeyunuu degec, “Neni faka morora mi hengennina yaguc kicninango hending.”
42005027	Anu Yesungo imohacnac mama kemma takesimeme ngic mong kpara Lewi, ye takesimeme amau tacmanu hemma yofi edeec, “Ge hama ni modacnuna.”
42005028	Ifi deu Lewingo yacma wiac sasawa wadacma Yesu modarec.
42005029	Nga Lewi ye Yesuac amma ameau yaka kuneng ohou takesimeme nga ngicngac homacngo yenigoc tacma yaka negec.
42005030	Ifi anggec farisaio nga miti negen negengngicfocngina yeneng negenggec naric mi anu Yesu medacfora yeneac yoackpekpengina kpema degec, “Ngeni nocac takesimeme nga manganameme yenigoc nenedoku nedae?”
42005031	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Ngicngac sebingina hafeia kpac kecandae, yeni dotaac mi ayemmekecde. Hafeinginagoc, yeneng ine dotaac ayemmekecde.
42005032	Ni ngicngac dindingac kpacyunubadeac mi mayai, kpac. Ni ine manganameme yeni ubangina merenggecdeac kpacyunubesonga mayai.”
42005033	Ngicngac goa yeneng Yesu kpesimigec, “Yohaneac medacfora nga farisaio yeneac medacfocngina yeni naso homac yakasege kecma nunumu ua meandae. Nga geac medacfocga yeneng ine nenedoku nekecdae.”
42005034	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Memeturang ngicngo ogofora yenigoc kecma yakasege anggecdeac naric mi deude.
42005035	Kecma naso monnu memeturanggac ngic yenearunac meickegecde, naso imohai ine yakasege anggecde.”
42005036	Yesungo torokpema yoac mong heima yofi edeyunuec, “Mongngo kporuc gboriaunac sintaha herecgema mema eseau naric mi faima kpebiude. Ifi anudeu kporuc gboria manganeude amma gboria nga esea kpeturangyuruu siriha naric mi fingerude.
42005037	Nga ngic mongngo waing gboria bokong yangseberango memea eseau naric mi kpeu kemeude, kpac. Ifi anudeu waing gboriango bokong esea imoc tindziru manganeu dokuya maude.
42005038	Imocac waing gboriango bokong gboriau kpeni kemeu naric ande.
42005039	Amma ngic mongngo waing esea bic neec, yeng waing gboria neudeac songo naric mi negenude, kpac. Ye yofisac deude, ‘Waing esea imoc gombunga yombong.’ ”
42006001	Yesungo sabata naso monnu wit uausing kemmanu medacfora yeneng witfora merecgema sebera kpetima asasahema negec
42006002	farisaio goango yenemma kpesiyemmegec, “Ngeni sabata nasou faka mi angana imoc nocac andae?”
42006003	Kpesiyemmegec Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Dawidingo uamedacforagoc herenginaac homema faka anggec, ngeni imoc mi osonegeng angandae gedang.
42006004	Ye Anutuac womonnu emma ic sogong Anutuac sese faifaia, imoc mema yengena nema uamedacfora ifingoc yemmeec. Nga ic sogong imoc womonggareng yenengsac naric neandae, ngictehec yeneng kpac.” (1 Samue 21:1-6)
42006005	Ifi dema yofi edeyunuec, “Ngicac Medac ye sabataac Kebu.”
42006006	Sabata naso monggac Yesungo kpekpeturang amau emma Anutuac yoac kpouyemmeec, imohai ngic mong marifoia homemeango yenigoc tarec.
42006007	Nga Yesungo sabata nasou hafeigoc memengerecua mong meu yeni haniaya mong meficgema yoacfu faigecdeac miti negen negengngic nga farisaio, yeni garemmema nanggec.
42006008	Yesungo ine negen negengngina hemma ngic yeac yofi deec, “Ge yacma erahama botucninau nanna.” Ifi deu ngic ye yacma ekemma botucnginau nammanu
42006009	Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Wiac mong kpesingemmeba, sabatanasou damocngo angana ande? Faka gombunga me faka mangana ayemmebesonga amma homebeso andae, agengngina tigecdeac dede me goa memanganeyununideac dede?”
42006010	Ye ifi dema kiwa fikengfiha amma yenendacma ngic yeac deec, “Mariga sinena.” Ifi deu ngic ye maria sineu maria ngereec.
42006011	Ngereeu yeni herebutoa yombong negemma yenaocngoc Yesu dafi ammigecdeac denegeng anggec.
42006012	Yesungo naso imohai numuudeac tikiu emma tofocnac hafoa Anutu numumima kecmanu
42006013	ama wereckenu medac kpacyunuu kenggec medac 12 meisingyunuma aposoro kpac imoc yemmeec. Nga aposoro yeneac kpacngina yofi:
42006014	Simonggac kpara mong Petoro kparec nga yeac munea Anderea, Yakobo nga Yohane, Firipo nga Batoromaio.
42006015	Mataio nga Toma amma Arifaioac medac Yakobo nga Simong, yeac kpara mong Dzerote.
42006016	Amma Yuda, Yakoboac medac nga Yuda Karioto taonnunac, yeng kecma Yesu kerereu megec.
42006017	Anu Yesungo tikiunac medacfora 12 yenigoc mama bangec tumia monnu medacfora homac yenigoc nanec. Nanu ngicngac habu kunengngo Yudaia bangec noboc noboc nga Yerusalennac amma Tiro nga Sidonggac kondunnu amabangec fekende, imohacnacngo hagec.
42006018	Hama Yesuac yoac negenggecde nga yeng hafeingina mengereudeac hagec. Amma ngicngac asu seuhagoc hama yeneng ifingoc ngereegec.
42006019	Nga kucngo yearunac yenearu kemma ngicngac sasawa mengereyunuecac yeni sasawango ye kpeseregecdeac negenggec.
42006020	Ifi anggec Yesungo kiwa medacfora yenearu fima deec, “Ngicngac wanac kecdae, ngeni kenecnginagoc, nocac Anutuac eucerereng imocnoc ngeneac.
42006021	Nga ngicngac yaguc herenginaac homedae, ngeni kenecnginagoc, ngeni yaka nema gebecngunuude. Amma kiac ubahodunggoc yaguc kecdae, ngeneng kenecnginagoc, ngenennoc kecma dzomoregecde.
42006022	Nga ngicngac yeneng Ngicac Medacac amma ngeni ubango ukungunuma demanganengunuma ngadeau faingunuma kpac mangana kpacngunugecde, imoc ngeni kenecnginagoc.
42006023	Ngeni naso deduaemoc, imohai ubangerec negemma yuengyuma amma sogaibisia, nocac kurumennu bungngina kuneng tomaingina fede. Nga ngic yeneac bangecfocnginango warac profete faka imocngoc profete ayemmegec.
42006024	Ngicngac dzofinacgoc kecdae, ngeni sowecnginagoc, nocac ngeni wiacngina songeagoc hafoa bic megec wisickeec.
42006025	Nga ngicngac semeng negebec yaguc angkecdae, ngeni sowecnginagoc. Ngeni kecma herenginaac homegecde. Nga yaguc dzomocgoc kecdae, ngeni sowecnginagoc. Ngeni kecma ubamangang negemma kiacgecde.
42006026	Amma ngicngacngo dengerengunukecdae, ngeneac deduae, ngeni sowecnginagoc, nocac yeneac bangecfocnginango warac profete ikoha ifingoc dengereyunukecgec.
42006027	Ngicngac yoacnaac kedzac kpeandae, ngeni ine yofi edengunuduae, ngeni ngabafocngina heresongogoc hoangyunubisia amma ngic ubango ukungunuandae, yeni faka gombunga ayemmebisia.
42006028	Nga ngic sowecyoac edengunuandae, ngeni yeni kenecyunubisia amma memanganengunuandae, ngeni yeneac numubisia.
42006029	Nga ngic mongngo munggungga noboc kpeudeu ge munggungga noboha ifingoc wamibesena nga mongngo ngakpiga witiau meudeu ngakpiga mana ifingoc wana mebeso.
42006030	Nga ngic yeneng gearunac wiac monggac derecgeandae, ge wiac imoc yemmebesena amma mongngo geangga wiac wangecguu monggoc meremma genudeac mi hatahemibesena.
42006031	Ngic yeneng noc faka angemmegecdeac negensiandae, ngeni faka siriha imocngoc ayemmebisia.
42006032	Nga ngic goa yeneng ngeneac songo negenggec ngeneng yeneac songo negenggecdeu ngeneac ubangerecyoac homac mi debesonga. Kopocsicmeme ngic yeneng ifingoc ngic damoc yeneac songo negengandae, yeneac songo negenggecde.
42006033	Nga ngicngac goa faka gombunga angemmekecgec ngeni faka gombunga ayemmegecdeu ngeneac ubangerecyoac homac mi debesonga. Kopocsicmeme ngic yeni imoc ifingoc angandae.
42006034	Anu ngic ngenearu turung anggec ngeni turunga ifiangoc kpoungemmegecdeac negensigecdeu ngeneac ubangerecyoac homac mi debesonga. Ngic kopocsicnginagoc yeni ifingoc manganameme ogofocngina wiacngina turungagoc yemmeandae.
42006035	Anu ngeni ine ngabafocngina heregoc yeneac songo negemma faka gombunga ayemmebisia. Amma ngeni turungngina wagec yenearu febeso nga kpougecdeac mi negembisia. Ngeni ifi anggecdeu faka gombungaac bungngina kuneng feude nga ngeneng Mangngina Anutu Engenatoa yeac nambaracfora anggecde. Yeng ngicngac ihoc bahoha nga kichodungnginagoc nga ngic mangana faka gombunga ayemmeude.
42006036	Mangnginango ngicngac wosoefac ayemmekecde, ngeneng ifi isocngoc wosoefac ayemmebisia.”
42006037	“Ge ngicngac mi demanganeyunubesena, yoac imoc modacnadeu ngic yeneng ifingoc mi demanganegugecde. Amma ge ngicngac mi isingyununa nga mi desiyunubesena, yoac imoc modacnadeu ngic yeneng ifingoc mi isinggugecde nga mi desigugecde. Nga ngicngac kopocsicngina wana. Ifi anna yeni ifingoc geac kopocsic wagecde.
42006038	Ngeni wiacngina ngicngac naric yemmebisia, ifi anggecdeu, Kebungo wiacngina turunggeu kemeu kpemindzaiude. Amma monggoc kpakeu wakema kpetinggeu noboha tabunginau mau megecde. Nocac ngeni wiac kpetengina isinggema ngicngac yemmeandae, kpete siriha ifiangoc yeni isinggema turung kpoungemmegecde.”
42006039	Yesungo monggoc yoac heima yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic kicpisic mongngo kicpisic ogea mong naric mi wangerude, yeri ifi amma yerahafoc tennu kemeecde.
42006040	Nga negen negengmeme medac mongngo kpoukpouyaac engena mi anude. Kpoukpoungo medacfora hafoangoc kpouyemmedaru wisickeu yeni yeac siric andacgecde.
42006041	Anu ge tosogaac kicfu gocbisic mong tacdemoc, imoc hemma geangga kicfu ic kebanga fede, imoc ine mi negensiannec, faka imoc naric mi ande.
42006042	Ifi amma ogogaac yofi mi debesena, ‘Toso, ge negemmana kicgau gocbisic tacde, imoc meickebadeac negenduae.’ Ikocngic, geangga kicfu ic kebanga kuneng fede mi hemma imoc naric mi annade. Ge geangga kicfunac ic kebanga meickemaguc ogogaac kicfu gocbisic tacde, imoc hentegecma naric meickenade.
42006043	Ic mong gombungau fora mangana naric mi fingerude nga ic manganau fora gombunga naric mi fingerude.
42006044	Ic sasawa yeni foranginango haniangina mekperagigecde. Ge witic waeyagoc, imohacnac fig icac fora naric mi mesinade nga wainggac fora imoc fareng nga gberafecfunac naric mi mesinade.
42006045	Wiac gombunga ngic gombungaac ubatohong gombungaunac ereude. Nga ngic mangana yeac tohong manganaunac wiac mangana ereude. Wiac ngic ubahereau wakema fede, enarango imocnoc dekperagiude.
42006046	Ngeni nocac Kebuna Kebuna kpacnuandae nga yoacna wama mi modacnugecde?
42006047	Ngic mong ye hama yoacna negemma imoc modacma uaya ifingoc meudeu, ye ngic dafia, imoc edzacngunubade.
42006048	Ngic mong ye ama meudeac dema bangec usuu peperandzi fingeru imocac witiau wotunga ukuu kemeec, ngic imoc ye isoc. Ye ama seria meecac kia tunggbaungtoango hama ama imoc memanganeudeacsoc mi anec.
42006049	Nga ngicngac goa yoacna negemma uaya mi meandae, yeni ngic mong ye ama meudeac dema wotunga bangec pereckeau ukuu kemeude, ye isoc. Kia kpeu doku yadima ama imoc kpeu ama imocngo bic barackema mama kpedzamedarec.”
42007001	Yesungo yoac imoc sasawa ngicngac edeyunudaru negenggec wisickeu Kafanaung taonnu kenec.
42007002	Kemma ihai wasai gareng monggac wanacngic ye homebesonga amma feec. Amma ye ngic gombungango mingina yeac ewea heimiande.
42007003	Nga wasai garengngo Yesuac siduc negemma yudangic enarafocngina goa Yesuaru sueyunuu kemma ngombonggema degec, “Ge wasai garenggac wanacngic mong mengerenadeac hana. Wasai gareng ye ngic gombunga, ye naric meficgena.
42007005	Ye israengic nenanggac songea negengande nga yeng kiwa amma kpekpeturang amanina meec.”
42007006	Edegec Yesungo yenigoc kemma ama mewegenemanu wasai garengngo ogofora goa sueyunuu yofi edegecdeac kenggec, “Kunenna, nasoga homac mi wana. Ge noc gombunnaac amawarocnau erenade, ni ifiango gearu naric mi habade, imocac ge ihai namma yoac dena medacna ngereeu.
42007008	Imoc yofi, ni ifingoc ngic kucnginagoc yeneac bageu kecbadeac fainugec. Amma neac bageu wasaifocna kecandae. Nga monggac kenna deba kenude nga monggac hana deba haude. Amma wanacngicnaac yomoc mena deba meudenoc.”
42007009	Ifi deu Yesungo imoc negemma kerectegec amma dzigenema habu modacgec, yeni yofi edeyunuec, “Ni wiac mong edengunuba negenggec, Israe bangecfu negen negensingngina kuhagoc yofia mong mi henai.”
42007010	Nga ngic sueyunuyunuya, yeni garenggac amau dzigenema kemma henggec wanacngiha ye hafeia kpac anec.
42007011	Anu Yesungo taong mong kpara Naing, ihai kenu medacfora nga ngicngac homacngo ye modacgec.
42007012	Kemma taongodaac nagutoayau kensikemanu ngic yeni medac mong homeec, yeac farenga tofohoma magec. Medac imoc ye ngachotsec mong ewea homemea yeac medac mocgusac anu ngicngac habu homacngo ye modacma taonnunac magec.
42007013	Ifi magec Kebungo ngac imoc hemma ubea manganeu deec, “Ge mi kiacna.”
42007014	Ifi dema kemma katapa imoc kpesereu ngic tofohogec, yeni wama nanggec Yesungo deec, “Medac, ni edeguduae, ge yacna.”
42007015	Ifi deu homemeango yacma yoac deec. Nga Yesungo medac imoc nonggea monggoc miec.
42007016	Nga ngicngac yeneng imoc hemma kpidohoma homac kengecyunuu Anutu dengerema degec, “Profete kuneng mongngo nenannu fingecma kecde nga Anutungo ngicngacfora nenang yugucnunuma kecde.”
42007017	Siduc imocngo Yudaia bangecfu nga bangec goa nobohau tacdae, ihai kenu sasawango yoac imoc negenggec.
42007018	Yohaneac medacfora yeneng kemma siduc imoc ammigec Yohanengo medachora yohockang kpacyuruu haec yeri Kebuaru kemma yofi dema kpesimiecdeac sueyuruec, “Hanemmeudeac dedea, imoc ge me neni ngic monggac tomai kecbisina?”
42007020	Ifi dema sueyuruu yeri Yesuaru kensikema yofi dema kpesimioc, “Hanemmeudeac dedea, imoc ge me neni ngic monggac tomai kecbisina? Yohane dokunadzicngo imoc kpesigendedeac suenurude.”
42007021	Sueyuruec, naso imohaingoc Yesungo ngicngac homac hafeinginagoc nga kucmama amma asu manganagoc mengereyunuec amma kicpisic homac mengereyunuu kicfifi anggec.
42007022	Nga ngihoc yereng ifi edeec Yesungo deec, “Ngeri kemma wiac hennegeng andaoc, imocac siduc Yohane ammibesera. Ngic kicpisic yeni kicfifi andae nga hanimangang yeni sing kendae amma kukuseringinagoc yeni sebingina ngereede. Nga kedzacfong yeni yoac negendae amma homemea, yeneng gboridae nga ngicngac makpekpea yeneng siduc gombung negendae.
42007023	Nga mongngo neac amma negemmangang mi angande, ye kenehagoc.”
42007024	Anu Yohaneac medachora kemmaec Yesungo yeac yofi dema habu edeyunuec, “Ngeni bangec kisiu noc wiac henggecdeac kenggec? Komba mong firangngo kpeu kockpac anu, imoc henggecdeac kenggec me?
42007025	Imoc kpac anu noc wiac hembesonga kenggec? Ngic mong wambaya kibiagoc me? Negenggec, ngic wambangina kibia gombunga gombunga heiandae nga bangecac songotoagoc kecandae, yeni ngictau amau kecandae.
42007026	Ngeni profete mong hembesonga kenggec me? Yeng profete goa sasawa feracyunude, ifinoc deduae.
42007027	Yeacnoc yofi oho ohoya fede, ‘Negenggec, ni enacdedena sueba yeng waraigemma singga memengere anudeac habesande.’ (Mkai 3:1)
42007028	Ni yofi deba negenggec, ngic ngacfunac fingecgec, yenearunac mongngo Yohane naric mi ferahaec. Anu Anutuac eucererenggac manau mamea, yeng ine Yohaneac engena.”
42007029	Ngicngac sasawa nga takesimemengic momoc, yeni imoc negemma yofi negenggec, Anutu ye yoac fora nga dindingacac mingina, ifi dema Yohanearu kemma mitidoku nadzicgec.
42007030	Nga Farisaio amma dedeseriyoacac negen negengngic yeni ine Anutungo sing deyemmeec, imoc ngadehema Yohanearu mitidoku mong mi nadzicgec.
42007031	Anu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngicngac yofinenggac kecdae, ngeneac fakangina yofi.
42007032	Ngeni nambarac sobenu takecdae isoc. Yeni tacma yenaocngoc yofi dema kpacemeandae, ‘Neni kungac fifini ngeni nocac yegec mi fededau nga ubahodung yegec heini nocac mi kiacdau?’
42007033	Yohane dokunadzicngo hama ic sogong nga waing mong mi neec, imohai ngeni yofi degec, ‘Ye yafingagoc.’
42007034	Nga Ngicac Medac ye hama nenedoku neande, imohai yofi deandae, ‘Henggec, ye nenedoku efea mi nekecde nga takesimeme nga manganameme yeneac tosongina.’
42007035	Nga Anutuac negen negentegec imoc gombunga ande imocac nambaracfora yeneac fakanginau ireckeude.”
42007036	Farisaio mong kpara Simong ye Yesugoc yaka neudeac ameau heitaiu yeac amau emma taroc.
42007037	Tarec manganamemengac mongngo taong imohai kefec, ye yoac yofi degec negenec, “Yesungo Simonggac amau tacde.” ifi degec negemma kirung mong arabastro hocngo memea kerecdokuyagoc homuna gombunga, imoc mekenec.
42007038	Mekemma Yesuac ngadeaugeng haniau namma kiaru kickumiango mama Yesuac hani heiu urucsusiango imoc mekerenggema hania titikokoc ammima kerecdoku homuna gombunga imocngo hania nadzicmiec.
42007039	Nadzicmiu farisaio Yesu heitaiec, yeng imoc hemma yengenaocngoc yofi negenec, “Ngac hadac ye manganamemengac. Nga ngic yomocngo profete fora ambac dede ye dafiugeng kpeserema faka yomoc ande, imoc negemmibac.”
42007040	Ifi negenu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Simong, ni yoac mong edegubeso negenduae.” ifi deu deec, “Oc, kpoukpou dena.”
42007041	Ifi deu yofi edeec, “Ngic yohockang yeri dzogareng mong yearunac turung anoc, mongngo 500 denari nga mongngo 50.
42007042	Amma yeri turung imoc kpoumiecdeac osima kefecac turungngira waec. Wau yerearunac damocngo dzogarenggac songo homac negenude?”
42007043	Kpesimiu Simongngo merenec, “Dzo homac wamiec yeng, ifi negenduae.” deu Yesungo deec, “Negengising amma yoac dindingac denec.”
42007044	Anu yeng ngac yearu dzigenema Simong yofi edeec, “Ge ngac yomoc henna. Ni amagau ereba ge haninaac doku mong mi nendang, yeng ine kickumiango hanina dzuacma yengena orucsusiango hanina mekerenggedac.
42007045	Nga amagau haba geng ubangerecac titikokoc mong mi anendang nga yeng hadua, imohacnacngoc haninau titikokoc anendac.
42007046	Nga geng orucna kerecdokungo mong mi nadzicnendang nga yeng hanina kerecdoku homunagocngo nadzicnendac.
42007047	Imocac edeguba negenna, ye heresongoya hafoangoc edzacnudacac kopocsiha hafoangoc ifingoc wamiba kpac andacde. Mong ye kopocsiha kapianec wawaya, ye ine songo kapianecsac femide.”
42007048	Ifi dema ngac yofi edeec, “Kopocsicga imoc bic wawaya.”
42007049	Ifi deu ngicngac goa tatacfu tacgec, yeni yenaocngoc denegeng amma degec, “Yomoc merac ngic? Ye kopocsic ifingoc wayemmede.”
42007050	Nga Yesungo ngacac yofi deec, “Ge ruaegoc kenna. Negen negensinggango ebicfunac mesigudac.”
42008001	Yesungo taong nga amabisicfu yerecge kemma Anutuac eucererenggac siduc gombung edeyunukefec. Ifi kenu medacfora 12
42008002	nga warac ngac goa asu mangana nga hafeinginagoc mengereyunuec, yeneng yegoc momoc kengkecmagec dzofinacnginango meficyunugec. Ngac homac ifi anggec yenearunac mong kpara Maria kpara mong Madara, Yesungo warac yearunac hadehade 7 kporacmiec. Nga mong Yoana, ye Herodeac gareng Kusaac enema amma mong kpara Susana.
42008004	Ngicngac homac yeni taong tackenecsoc, imohacnacngoc Yesuaru hama habu kuneng anggec yeng yoac mong heima yofi edeyunuec,
42008005	“Gbome kpegi kpegingic mongngo gbome kpegiudeac uau kenec. Kemma gbome kpegiu gbome goango mama sinnu heiu ngic yeneng witiau tigec nga neng yeneng hama nedacgec.
42008006	Nga goa harongannu heima nemonggema ereu bangec dokuya kpac anecac sokuema homeec.
42008007	Amma gbomea goa haseng manau heiu haseng nga gbomea yerahafocngoc yadiec hasengngo imoc heihomeec.
42008008	Nga gbome goango bangec gombungau heima kpea nemonggema fora 100 sasawa fingecdarec.” Ifi dema kunengngoc yofi kpacma edeyunuec, “Kedzahagoc yeng yoac yomoc negembeso.”
42008009	Anu medacfora yeneng yoac heiheiac hania, imocac kpesimigec
42008010	yofi merengyemmeec, “Anutuac eucererenggac negen negeng sufu sufuya, imoc ngeneng negentegecgecdeac bic ngemmengemmea. Amma goa yeni kicngina fikecma mi henggecde nga kedzacnginango negengkecma naric mi negentegecgecde, imocac yoac heiheiausing yoac sasawa yemmeyemmea.”
42008011	“Yoac heiheiac hania imoc yofi, gbome imoc Anutuac yoac.
42008012	Nga gbome sinnu heiec, imoc ngicngac goa yeni yoara negenggec. Nga mangana minginango hama yoac imoc ubanginaunac meickeu yeni negensinggebeso obohoma komoc mi kpegecde.
42008013	Gbome harongannu heiec, imoc ngic goango Anutuac yoac negemma heresongogoc bic hoanggegecde nga yoacngo ubanginau godea mong mi meecac naso wegenanecsac taru faitobannaso hau yeni wagecde.
42008014	Nga gbome hasennu heiec, imoc ngic goango Anutuac yoac negenggec, yeni kekecnginaac negengyohoc nga dzofinacac faitobang amma bangecac kekec hensongo angkecgec, imocngo yoac heihomeu fora mangana amma kpac angkecde.”
42008015	“Anu gbome bangec kerehagocfu heiec, imoc ngic goa yeneng Anutuac yoac negemma ubaherenginau faima sing dindingac nga gombunga mekecgecde. Mekecma seserigoc kecma fora meficgegecde.”
42008016	“Ngic mongngo kifa kpedzereckema tera bageau faima mi kperahaude nga fefe bageau faiu mi tarude. Imoc kpac, ye kifa tatahau faiu tacma ngicngac amau eregecde, yeneng kperagi hendacgecde.
42008017	Imoc yofiac, wiac sasawa sufu sufuya fede, imoc didiu fingectegerude nga wiac seme semea fede, imoc kecma kperagiau fingectegerude. Imoc sufu sufu mi kengkefude.
42008018	Ngic mong ye wiac goa femide, ye wiac monggoc migecde nga mong ye wiac mong mi femide, yearunac wiac fenende dema negende, imoc ifingoc wangecgec eng kefude. Imocac amma ngeni yoac negendae, imoc henghomema negemma kecbisia.”
42008019	Anu Yesuac nonggo munafora yeneng yearu kenggec ngicngac homacngo hedzickegecac amma naric mi henggec.
42008020	Ifi anggec goa yeneng Yesuaru yofi degec enec, “Nonggo munafocga yeni hama genggecdeac ngadeau nandae.”
42008021	Ifi degec Yesungo deec, “ngicngac Anutuac yoac negemma modackecdae, yeneng nonggo munafocna andae.”
42008022	Naso monnu Yesungo medacfora yenigoc gombau emma yofi edeyunuec, “Nenang dzohong noboc kenni.” Ifi deu kemmagec
42008023	Yesungo gau feu kia firangtoango hama dzohongtoa kpeu dokungo gomba mewakebeso anu yeni kemebeso anggec.
42008024	Amma medac yeneng Yesuaru kemma midima degec, “Kunennina, Kunennina, neni kemebesonga andimbe.” Ifi degec Yesungo yacma firang nga dokuac siritembong dekpetari ayecmeu firang kpac anu dzohongngo ning kpema feec.
42008025	Feu medacfora yeneac deec, “Ngeni negen negensingngina kpac, ifi isoc ande.” Ifi deu medac yeni kengecyunuu kerectegec amma yenaocngoc denegeng amma degec, “Ye noc ngic? Yeng firang nga dzohong yoac edeyuruu yeac enac tofohodape.”
42008026	Yesu nga medacfora yeni dzohong ferecgema Gerasene bangecfu kenggec. Bangec imoc Gariraia dzohong noboc.
42008027	Kensikema Yesungo gombaunac mama taong imocac ngic mong hadehadeforagoc meficgeec. Ngic imoc ye naso herea bic senggang kecma amau ngisitataha kpac kicsereu kecande.
42008028	Ngic imocngo Yesu hemma seriangoc arohoma Yesuac hoannu makpema yofi kparec, “Yesu Anutu engenatoaac Medac, neac wiac imoc geac mi ande. Ni desambic anggenduae, ge kpendzennu mi fainubesena.”
42008029	Nga Yesungo asu seuhagoc yearunac kporaru erema kenudeac bic edeec, imocac ifi deec. Asu seuhagoc imocngo naso herea ammiu ngic yeneng mema sengngo hanimaria kpema garenggegec. Nga ye seng kperecgedacma asu seuhagocngo wangecma bangec kisiu kengkefec.
42008030	Nga Yesungo kpesimiec, “Ge kpacga merac?” Kpesimiu deec, “Habutoa.” Hadehade homacngo yeac hereu kemema kecgecac amma yeng ifi deec.
42008031	Nga hadehade yeneng Yesu desambic ammigec, “Ge hofeu suenununa mi kemeni.”
42008032	Nga bangec imohai berechabu kunengngo fagannu surukpema kecgec. Anu yeni kporacyunuu berecfu kemegecdeac desambic ammigec yeng ifi anggecdeac negengyemmeec.
42008033	Negengyemmeu yeni ngicfunac erema berec habu yenearu kemegec berec yeneng fagannunac nedzima dzohonnu kemema doku nema homedacgec.
42008034	Homedacgec berecgareng yeneng faka fingerec, imoc hemma kengec worama siduc deyadigec taonnu nga bedzou kenec.
42008035	Kenu ngicngac yeneng imoc negemma faka fingerec, imoc henggecdeac Yesuaru hagec. Hama ngic hadehadeagoc kefec, ye henggec. Yeng negentegecma wamba heima Yesuac haniu tarec. Ifi taru yeni hemma kengecyunuec.
42008036	Nga ngic hadehadeforagoc kefecngo dafiu ngereedac, imoc ngic kicnginango faka fingeru henggec, yeneng siduc ayemmegec.
42008037	Ayemmegec gerasenengic yeneac amabangec, imocac ngicngac sasawango kengec homac yunuecac amma Yesungo wayunuudeac edegec. Edegec Yesungo dzigenema kenudeac gombau enec.
42008038	Enu ngic hadehade kporacmiec, yeng Yesugoc kenudeac derecgeu Yesungo ine suema yofi edeec,
42008039	“Ge amagau dzigene kemma Anutungo fakatoa anggendac, imoc dekperagibesena.” Ifi deu ngic ye kemma Yesungo yearu fakatoa meec, imoc taong hafoangoc dekperagiyemmedarec.
42008040	Yesungo dzohong noboc kensikemanu ngicngac yeneng ye heitaigec. Yeni sasawango yeac tomai kecgec.
42008041	Nga kpekpeturang amaac gareng mong kpara Yairo, yeng haec. Ye naroanga mocgusac, kifaya 12 ammanu homebesonga anecac amma ngic ye hama Yesuac haniau makpema ameau kenudeac desambic ammiec. Ammiu yeni kemmagec ngicngac habutoango noboc noboc hedzickegec.
42008043	Anu ngac mong ye sacherec amma kecmanu kifaya 12 anu ye dzofinaha sasawa dota hania hania yemmeu mongngo ye mengereudeac sing mi meficgeec.
42008044	Ngac imoc ye habu yeneac botucfu Yesuac ngadeausing kemma ngakpiherehaac witic susia kpesereu sawa bic gbanggeec.
42008045	Gbanggeu Yesungo kpesiec, “Merang kpeserenudac?” Ifi deu yeneng degec, “Imoc mi negendimbe.” nga Petorongo edeec, “Kebu, ngicngac homacngo orongguma hedzicgudae.”
42008046	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Mongngo kpeserenudac, kuc wanuma monggaru kenu negendua.”
42008047	Ifi deu ngac ye yofi negenec, “Ye bic meficgedac.” Ifi negemma sufu sufu worabeso osima dzonoma fedeu hama Yesuac haniau makpeec. Amma ye Yesu kpeseredac nga dafiu ngerec ngeree bic yombong fingecmidac, ngicngac yeneac kicfu imoc dekperagidarec.
42008048	Dedaru Yesungo yofi edeec, “Naroanna, ge ruaegoc kenna. Negen negensinggango mengeregudac.”
42008049	Amma ye yoac denammanungoc kpebung gareng, yeac amaunac yoac yofi haec, “Naroangga bic homedac, ge kpoukpou monggoc ebic mi mina.”
42008050	Ifi degec Yesungo imoc negemma Yairo edeec, “Ge mi kengecguu eng negensinggena. Ye kekec monggoc meficgeude.”
42008051	Yesungo ifi dema amau kensikema ngic mongngo amau mi enudeac kpetarima Petoro nga Yohane amma Yakobo nga naroanggac nonggomama, yenigocsac enudeac deec.
42008052	Dema ngicngac hafoangoc yeni naroanggac kiacsonggong anggec yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni kiac wagec, naroang ye mi homedac, ye gau fede.”
42008053	ifi deu yeni dzomoremigec. Naroang ye bic homedac, ifi negenggec.
42008054	Nga ye ine naroanggac mariau mema kpacma deec, “Naroang, ge yacna.”
42008055	Ifi deu asuya monggoc kpoduu imohaingoc yacma taru Yesungo yaka migecdeac edeyunuec.
42008056	Nga nonggomama yereng kerectegec anec Yesungo ine ngic mong mi edeyunuecdeac kpae heiyemerec.
42009001	Yesungo medacfora 12 kpacyunuu hadacgec hadehade nga yafing sasawa kporacyunugecdeac nga hafei hania hania mengeregecdeac uayoac nga kuc yemmeec.
42009002	Yemmema Anutuac eucerereng dekperagigecdeac nga hafeigoc mengereyunugecdeac sueyunuma
42009003	yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni singgac mefic mong mi mekembisia, hie nga yaka amma yasu nga dzo mong mi mebisia nga ngakpi yohockang mi mekembisia.
42009004	Nga ama monnu kensikegec, ngic yeneng ama heingemmegec ngeni ama imohai tacyac angkecgec wisickeu taong monnu kembisia.
42009005	Nga taong mong imocac ngicngac yeneng mi hoangngunugecdeu ngeni taong imoc wama haninginaunac yube kpegec mau yeni imoc henggec faka imocngo manganangina edzacyunubeso.”
42009006	Ifi deu yeni amea amea kemma siduc gombung dekperagikecma hafeinginagoc mengereyunugec.
42009007	Ifi anu Gariraia bangecac gawanatoa kpara Herode, yeng wiac sasawa fingerec, imocac siduc negenu obohoec. Nocac ngic goa yeneng yofi degec, “Yohane dokunadzicngo homecfunac gborima yacma kecde.”
42009008	Ifi degec goango yofi degec, “Eriango fingecma kecde.” nga goa yeneng degec, “Profete bicngoc yombong kecgec, yenearunac mongngo hadac.”
42009009	Nga Herodengo deec, “Neng Yohane ubea bic kperecgeai nga yomoc ine merac ngicac siduc negengkecduae.” Dema Yesu henudeac kicfifi kefec.
42009010	Anu aposoro yeni dzigenema ua megec, imocac siduc Yesu ammidacgec. Ammigec yeng meyunuma meickema tembuha tacbesonga taong mong kpara Betsaida, imohaigeng kenggec.
42009011	Kenggec habutoa yeneng imoc negemma ye modacgec. Modacgec, yeng hoangyunuma Anutuac eucerereng dekperagiyemmema ngerec ngereeac ayemmeec, yeni mengereyunuec.
42009012	Ama marai anu medacfora 12 yeneng Yesuaru hama degec, “Bangec yomoc ngiha kpacfu kecmina ama marai andeac habu sueyununa amabangec tackende, imohai kemma yaka meficge nema imohai febisia.”
42009013	Ifi degec deec, “Ngeneng yaka yemmegec negec.” Ifi deu merenggec, “Neni ic sogong marimong nga kondungyang yohockangsac mekecdimbe. Neni yaka mong mi bummebing dede habu sasawa yeneacsoc naric mi ambac.”
42009014	Ngic imoc yeneac kpetengina 5 tauseng, ifi isocngo kecgecac amma ifi degec Yesungo medacfora yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni ngicngac edeyunugec, yeni 50 habusoc ifi kpedzucnema tackenggec.”
42009015	Ifi deu medac yeneng ngicngac ifi anggecdeac edeyunugec sasawango matacgec.
42009016	Matacgec Yesungo ic sogong marimong nga kondungyang yohockang, imoc mema kiwa kurumennu fiu enu kenehema mendzirec. Mendzicma ngicngac mederema yemmegecdeac medacfora yemmeu
42009017	yeneng imoc mederema ngicngac yemmegec. Yemmegec ngicngac sasawango negebec amma yaka tosea neti anggec, imoc kpedzucnegec kemema sakac 12 wakeec.
42009018	Yesungo naso monnu yengenaocngoc numuudeac kecmanu medacfora yegoc kecgec yeni kpesiyemmeec, “Ngicngac yeni neac merac deandae?”
42009019	Ifi deu degec, “Goango Yohane dokunadzic nga goango Eria amma goa yeneng ine profete mong esea, yeng gborima kecde deandae.”
42009020	Ifi degec deec, “Nga ngeni ngenaoc ine neac merac deandae?” Ifi deu Petorongo deec, “Ge Anutuac Messia.”
42009021	Ifi deu, yeni yoac imoc ngic mong mi edeyunugecdeac deracyunuec.
42009022	Nga Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngicac Medac ye kpendzeng homac kpebeso. Yudangic enarafocngina nga womonggareng enara amma mitiac negen negengngic yeneng ye ubango wama kpegec homebeso. Homeu uameme harebec ammanu monggoc gborima yacbeso.”
42009023	Yesungo habu sasawa yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic mong ye ni modacnubeso negendeu ye yengena ubasebiaac songo memama wenacsoc mariponga miacma tofohoma modacnubeso.
42009024	Ngic mong ye yengena kekeha segereudeac negemma uaya mekecde, ye kekeha sufumiude. Nga mong ye neac amma kekeha waude, ye ine kekeha fingecmiude.
42009025	Imoc yofiac, ngic mong ye bangecac wiac sasawa meficgema mekecde, ye ine kekeha sufumidarude nga yengena memanganeemeu kekeha imoc fora kpac anude.
42009026	Nga ngic mongngo neac negenu gameagoc ande amma neac yoacnaac negenu gameagoc anude, yeac siduc yofi, Ngicac Medac ye Mamaac nga angeroforaac amma yengena kibikperagitoagoc haude, naso imohai yeng ngic imoc yeac ifingoc negenu gameagoc ambesande.
42009027	Nga ngic yomoc nandae, ngenearunac goa yeni mi homemagec Anutuac eucerereng hau hembesandae, imoc forangoc edengunuduae.”
42009028	Anu yoac imoc deec, imocac sonda mocgu isoc wisickemanu Yesungo Petoro nga Yakobo amma Yohane meyunuu numugecdeac tikiu enggec.
42009029	Emma numumanu kicmesuya heimerenu siriha mong anu wambaya kperagima kongac koporarac yombong anec.
42009030	Ifi ammanu imohaingoc ngic yohockang, Mose nga Eria yereng fingecma yegoc denegeng anoc.
42009031	Yeri kibikperagitoangiragocngo fingecma Yesungo Yerusalennu kemma kekeha mesima wayunuma enudeac denegeng anggec.
42009032	Nga Petoro ogohoragoc, yeni gautoa fegec. Fegecfunac gborima yacma Yesuac kibikperagitoa nga ngic yohockang yegoc nanec yenenggec.
42009033	Nga ngic yohockang yeri Yesu wama kemmaec Petorongo Yesu edeec, “Kunenna, yei kecni songea andeac bedzo bedzo harebec meni, geac mong, Moseac mong nga Eriaac mong.” Ye wiac imoc mi negentegecma eng ifi deec.
42009034	Yoac denammanu hoeng mongngo fingecma mama semeyunuu kengec amma hoeng manau kemmagec
42009035	hoeng manaunac ubaudumeng mong yofi kpacma deec, “Yomoc neac Meisingmedacna, ngeni yeac yoac negembisia.”
42009036	Ubaudumeng imoc kpac anu yeni kic fima Yesu tembuha nanu henggec. Hemma medac yeni yoacngina waickema nanggec. Nga naso imohai wiac henggec, imocac ngic mong mi edegec.
42009037	Wereckengau Yesungo medacfora harebec yenigoc tikiunac kememagec ngicngac habu kunengngo meficgegec.
42009038	Anu habu yeneac botucfunac ngic mongngo Yesuac kpacma derecgema deec, “Kpoukpou, ge hama medacna henna, ye medacna mocgusac.
42009039	Hadehade mongngo medac mendanggeu ye arohou asu manganango mema kpekpefac ammima sebia mekuc kpekutung meu enaraunac sofororoc ereande. Asu imocngo medac mi wama naso homac memanganeyombonggeande.
42009040	Nga medacfocga yeneng kporacmigecdeac edeyunuba yeni kporacbibiema wadau.”
42009041	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngicngacareng yomoc ngeni negen negensingngina kpac amma fakangina sicsauha. Naso herea ngenigoc monggoc tacbadeac modzona tide. Ge medacga nearu mehana.”
42009042	Ifi deu medac ye wegenac kemmanu asu seuhagocngo medac kpefaheu bangecfu makpeu yeac sebia mekuc kpekutung meu Yesungo asu seuhagoc yoac seria ammima medac mengerema mama monggoc miec.
42009043	Miu ngicngac yeneng Anutuac kuctoa imoc hemma kerectegec amma negenggec wiac engena anec. Amma yeni Yesuac ua sasawa hemma kerectegec anggec. Ifi ammagec yeng medacfora yofi edeyunuec,
42009044	“Ngeni kedzac kpema yoac yomoc negenggec. Naso mi hereemanu yeni Ngicac Medac kererema ngicngac yeneac mariu faigec kpegecde.”
42009045	Ifi deu medac yeni yoac imoc mi negentegecgecdeac Anutungo uba negen negengngina hedzickeec. Hedzickeu yeni Yesuac yoac obohoma imocac hania kpesimigecdeac kengecyunuec.
42009046	Anu medac yenearunac merang engena ande, imocac yenaocngoc yoacngina engemmama anec.
42009047	Ifi anggec Yesungo negen negeng ubanginau feec, imoc bic negemma medacbisic mong mema yegoc faiu nanu
42009048	yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic mong ye kpacna negemma medac yomoc hoanggeude, yeng ni ifingoc hoannude. Nga ni hoannude, yeng Kebu suenuec, ye ifingoc hoanggeude. Imoc yofiac, ngeneac botucfunac ngic mong mamea kecande, yeng engena ande.” Ifi deu
42009049	Yohanengo deec, “Kebu, ngic mongngo geac kpacfu hadehade nga yafing kporacyemmeu neni imoc hemma nenanggoc mi kecdeac amma kpetarimiding.”
42009050	Ifi deu yofi deec, “Ngic mong ye uanginaac ngaba mi ande, yeng ogongina ande. Imocac ngeni ye mi kpetarimibisia.”
42009051	Yesungo kurumennu enudeac nasoya wegene hau negen negenga Yerusalennu sueu kenec.
42009052	Kenu ngic goa sueyunuu yeni waraima nenesemeng nga amagerec mengeregecdeac Samariaac guruama monnu kensikegec.
42009053	Kensikegec Yesungo Yerusalennu kenude, ngicngac yeneng imoc negenggecac Yesu ama mong mi heimigec.
42009054	Ifi anggec medachora Yakobo nga Yohane yereng imoc hemma yofi deoc, “Kebu, neni kurumennunac gerec deni mama ngic yomoc yonohodaru, imoc naric ambing me?”
42009055	Deec Yesungo dzigenema yoac ifia negembesonga kpae heiyemeru
42009056	medacforagoc guruama monnu kenggec.
42009057	Sinnu kemma ngic mongngo Yesu edeec, “Ge ihai me ihai kennadesoc modacguma gegoc kembadeac negenduae.”
42009058	Ifi deu yeng yofi meremmiec, “Katekasi yeni bangec manau fefenginagoc nga sawa neng yeni faecnginagoc amma Ngicac Medacngo ine kparicganga kpac.”
42009059	Ye ngic mong yofi edeec, “Ge hama ni modacnuna.” Ifi deu yeng deec, “Kebu, negennemmana kemma manna tonggomaguc habade.”
42009060	Ifi deu meremmiec, “Homec yeni yenaocngoc tonggoemegec nga geng ine wayunuma kemma Anutuac eucerereng dekperagima kecbesena.”
42009061	Nga ngic mongngo deec, “Kebu, ni modacgubadeac negenduae nga kemma arengfocna edeyunumaguc ine habade, imoc naric me?”
42009062	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ngic mong ye negen negenga bic suemaguc dzigenekpe ande, ngic ifiango Anutuac eucererenggacsoc mi ande.”
42010001	Imoc wisickeu Kebungo ngic 72 meisingyunuma yohockang yohockang hendzicyunuec. Hendzicyunuma yengena taong nga amabisic kembesonga negensiec, imohai yeneng waraimigecdeac sueyunuma yofi edeyunuu kenggec,
42010002	“Semeng fora homacngoc kpauedac fede nga uangic ine efeanecsac kecdae. Imocac ngeni semeng mingina numumigec yeng uangic sueyunuu yeneng kemma foraya mekpedzuc ambisia.
42010003	Negenggec, ramamedahango katekasi yeneac botucfu kecdae, siriha imocacsoc suengunuba kembisia.
42010004	Ngeni dzobirang me hie nga hanitabe mi mema kembisia. Amma sinnu ngic mong meficgema yoac mi mebisia.
42010005	Amma ngeni ama imohai me imohai enggecde imohai emma yofi debisia, ‘Ruae ngenearu febeso.’
42010006	Ifi degec ruaengic mong imohai kecdeu ngeneac ruaengo ye hoanggeude nga mi kecdeu ruae imoc monggoc ngenanu dzigeneude.
42010007	Ngicngac ama ngemmegec ngeni imohaingoc tacbisia. Nga yeni yaka nga doku ngemmegec ngeni imocnoc nebisia. Ngeni amayuguc mi kembisia. Uango uangic uabungngina meficgeyemmebeso, imocngo ngereeude.
42010008	Ngeni taong monnu kenggec ngic yeneng ama heingemmema wiac mong negecdeac ngemmedae, ngeni imoc nebisia.
42010009	Ngeni taong imohai ngicngac hafeinginagoc mengereyunuma yofi edeyunubisia, ‘Anutuac eucererengngo ngenearu bic mewegenengunuma hama fede.’
42010010	Nga ngeni taong monnu enggec ama mi heingemmegecdeu ngeni ine amasingnginau kemma yofi edeyunubisia,
42010011	‘Taongnginaac yubengo hanininau mendanggedac, neni imoc ifingoc kpeni mama imocngo manganangina edzacngunubeso. Nga ngeni ine yofi negembisia. Anutuac eucererengngo yei bic mewegenengunuma hama fede.’
42010012	Amma nasoya hau taong imocac turunga ebiria yombong haude, imoc Sodong amabangec ferahema fingerude, imoc edengunuduae.
42010013	Korasing nga Besaida ngicngac, ngeni sowecnginagoc. Ngenearu kucfaka homac bic fingerec. Amma kucfaka ifia Tiro nga Sidong taonnu fingecbacfu yeni kopocsicnginaac ubahodunggac wamba bic heima hama nadzicma tacma ubamereng ambau.
42010014	Nga ising ising nasotoau Anutungo Tiro nga Sidong areng, yeneac ubamangang negemma turunga efeanec yemmema ngeni ine turunga ebiriangoc ngemmebesande.
42010015	Amma Kafanaung taong, yeni kurumennu miacgugec ennadeac ifi negengannec, imoc kpac yombong. Yeni homecac amau megu keme kemeac siric annec.
42010016	Ngic mong ye kedzaha ngenearu faide, yeng kedzaha nearu faide. Nga ngeni ngadengunuude, yeng ni ngadenuude nga Kebu suenuec, ye ifingoc ngadeheude.”
42010017	Anu ngic 72 yeni sogac sogaigoc dzigenema degec, “Kebu, neni kpacga kpacni hadehade nga yafing yeneng yoacnina tofohoma woragecde.”
42010018	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Ni Satang hemba yeng piratac isoc heima kurumennunac maec.
42010019	Negenggec, ni uayoac nga kuc bic ngemmeai. Ngemmeba ngeni boudzoc nga weme weme witinginau naric tigecde amma ngabanina nga yeac arengfora sasawa yeneng ngeneac bageu kecgecde. Nga wiac mongngo ngeni naric mi memanganengunuude, kpac.
42010020	Nga hadehade nga yafingngo enacngina tofohoma woraandae, ngeni imocac homac mi sogaibisia. Nga kpacarengngina kurumennu oho ohoya fede, ngeni imocac homac yombong sogaibisia.”
