42010021	Naso imohaingoc Tiri Asungo Yesu ammiu sogac sogai songongo mewakemiu yoac yofi deec, “Manggac, kurumeng nga bangec mingina, geng wiacga sasawa yomoc mesufuyemmenecac ngicareng negen negentegecnginagoc nga fitira kecdae, yeni imoc mi hennegeng andae. Amma nambaracbisic bisic, yeni wiac yomoc mekperagiyemmenec, imocac dengereguduae. Manggac, ge imoc hemma ubaga ngereede, imoc fora.
42010022	Mannango wiac sasawa nenec imoc mekecduae. Nga mongngo Medahaac hania naric mi negende, Manggacngosac negemmide. Ifi isocngoc mongngo Manggacac hania naric mi negende, Medacngosac ye negemmide. Amma Medacngo ngicngac meisingyunuma Manggac edzacyunude, yeneng ifingoc ye negemmigecde.”
42010023	Anu Yesungo medacfora yenearu dzigenema yeneacsac yofi dema edeyunuec, “Faka yomoc fingeru kicnginango hengkecdae, ngeni kenecnginagoc.
42010024	Ni edengunuba negenggec, warac profete nga ngictau homac yeneng ngeni wiac hengandae, imoc hembeso negemma sifu mi henggec. Nga ngeni wiac yomoc kedzacnginango negengandae, yeneng imoc ifingoc negembeso ayemmeu mong mi negenggec.”
42010025	Anu dedeseriyoac negen negengngic mongngo hama Yesu faitobannu faiudeac negemma deec, “Kpoukpou, dafi amba kekecseri imoc neac ambesande?”
42010026	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Dedeseriyoacfu yoac oho ohoya fede, ge kibi imohai dafi osonegeng angannec?”
42010027	Ifi deu ngicngo meremmiec, “Ge ubaherega nga ubaongaga nga kucga amma negen negengga hafoangoc Kebu Anutuga heresongogoc hoanggebesena.” (Dser 6:5) Amma, “Ge geangga anggengande, siriha imocngoc gegoc wegenac kecdae, yeni heresongogoc hoangyunubesena.” (Sese 19:18)
42010028	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ge yoac dindingac dema merennendang. Ifi amma kecengkecbesannec.”
42010029	Nga ngic ye Yesungo yeac ngic dindingac debeso, ifi negemma kpesimiec, “Nga ngicngac neac wegenac kecdae, imoc merac yombong?”
42010030	Kpesimiu Yesungo meremmiec, “Ngic mongngo Yerusalennac Yeriko taonnu kemeudeac kemma godzungic yeneac mariu heiec. Heiu yeneng wambaya hesima kpegec homebeso anu ukugec feu woragec.
42010031	Femanu womonggareng mongngo imohacsing kemema ngic feec, ye hemma kpegegenggema nobocsing kenec.
42010032	Kenu womonggareng yeneac memefic ngic mongngo ifingoc imohai kemeec. Kemema ngic imoc henu feu ye ifingoc kpegegenggema nobocsing kenec.
42010033	Anu samariangic mongngo sing imocngoc modacma kemema ngic feec, ye hemma yeac ubea manganeec.
42010034	Manganeu yearu kemma kerec doku nga waing dokuya kubehau kpakema kubeha biranggemiec. Biranggema yengena donggi witiau faima kiangamau mekemma henggareng ammiec.
42010035	Amma wereckengau silwadzo yohockang kiangamaac gareng mima yofi edeec, ‘Ge ngic yomoc henggareng ammima kecbesena. Ni monggoc dzigeneba dzo imocngo mi heiude isoc, imohaingoc imocac turunga gembade.’ ”
42010036	Ifi dema Yesungo dedeseriyoac negen negengngic yofi kpesimiec, “Ge dafi negennec? Ngic ye godzungic yeneac mariu manganeec. Nga ngic harebec yenearunac ngic merang yeac ogo amma wegenac kefec?”
42010037	Ifi kpesimiu yeng meremmiec, “Yeac ubamangang negemma meficgeec, yeng.” Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ge geanggaoc kemma ye anec, ifi isoc angkecbesena.”
42010038	Yesu nga medacfora yeni kengkecma guruama monnu kensikegec. Kensikema ngac mong kpara Mata, yeng Yesu ameau enudeac heitaiec.
42010039	Heitaiu Mataac munea kpara Maria, yeng Kebuac haniu matacma yoara negenec.
42010040	Negemmanu Matango ine dzandzung namma yenigoc mi tacma ha namma Yesu edeec, “Kebu, ge neac negengyohoc mi annec. Ni tembucna ngenenggareng ua mebadeac munana wanudac, ye edena meficnuu.”
42010041	Ifi deu Kebungo yofi meremmiec, “Mata Mata, ge wiac homacac negengyohoc amma ebic mekecnec.
42010042	Amma wiac mocgusac imoc megec ngereeude. Maria ye wiac gombunga isinggema mekecde, imoc mongngo yearunac naric mi meickeude.”
42011001	Yesungo naso monnu kemma botuha monnu numuu wisickeu medacfora yenearunac mongngo deec, “Kebu, Yohane ye medacfora numugecdeac sing kpouyemmeec, ge ifingoc ifia goa kpounemmena.”
42011002	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngeni yofi dema numubisia, ‘Manggac, geac kpac kpetiac febeso. Anu eucererengga imocngo hanemmebeso.
42011003	Ge wenacsoc yaka socnina nemmebesena.
42011004	Kopocsicnina wanemmena. Neni ifingoc ngic yeneac kopocsicnginaac turung kpoukpouac wayemmekecdimbe. Faitobannu mi fainunubesena.’ ”
42011005	Ifi dema yofi edeyunuec, “Ngenearunac mongngo tofocnac dzongiau ogea monggac amau kemma debac, ‘Ogona, ge ic sogong harebec meficnuna turunga ngade gembade.
42011006	Ogona mongngo sing hereaunac hama tofocnac amanau hau yakana kpac anu noc gumebadeac obohoduae.’
42011007	Ifi deu ogea ama manau tacma debac, ‘Ge ebic mi nenna. Nagunina bic meserima nambaracfocnagoc gaufedimbeac naric mi yacma megembade.’
42011008	Ni edengunuba, ye ogeaac amma ic sogong mi mibac dede yeng ngombonggema engngoc kpesimibac, imocac amma ye sifu yacma ic sogong miude.
42011009	Ngic mong ye numukecde, yeng wiac imoc meude nga hofockecdengo wiac imoc meficgeude amma naguu heiande, yeac nagu witimigecde. Imocac ngeni numugec turunga ifi ngemmeude nga ngeni hofocma foraya meficgegecde amma naguu heigec nagu witingemmegecde.
42011011	Ngeneac botucfu manggac monggac medahango kondungyanggac kpesimiu yeng boidzoc mangana naric mi miude.
42011012	Nga ye kokorec gbomeaac kpesimiu weme weme naric mi miude.
42011013	Ngic ngeni mangana angandaengo sifu nambaracfocngina ubangerecac wiac gombunga yemmegecdeac negentegecdae. Imocac yofi negenggec, kurumeng Mangnginango fakangina gombunga imoc homac feraheu ngicngac Tiri Asuya yemmeudeac kpesimidae, yeni Tiri Asuya naric yemmeude.”
42011014	Naso monnu Yesungo hadehade mong yoara kpac, imoc ngicfunac kporarec. Kporaru hadehadengo ngicfunac erema kenu ngic yoara kpac kefec, yeng yoac deu ngicngac yeneng kerectegec anggec.
42011015	Nga ngicngac goa yeni ine yofi degec, “Ye hadehade nga yafing yeneac ngictaungina Bedzeburu yeac kucfu ngicngac yenearunac kporacande.”
42011016	Anu goa yeneng ine Yesu kuha isinggegecdeac negemma kurumennunac faka kuhagoc mong meudeac edegec.
42011017	Edegec Yesungo negen negengngina bic negemma yofi edeyunuec, “Bangec monggac ngic yeneng ngaba angemema tohogecdeu bangec imoc kisi fingeru ama mongngo ama monggac witiau makpema kpac anude.
42011018	Nga Satangngo tohoma yengenaocngoc kporacemeudeu ye nga arengfora naric mi serima nanggecde, kpac. Nga ngeni neac ine deandae, ‘Ye Bedzeburungo ammiu yeac kucfu hadehade nga yafing kporacyunuande, imoc obohode.’
42011019	Neng Bedzeburuac kucfu hadehade nga yafing kporacyunubai dede ngeneac medacfocngina yeni ifingoc yeac kucfu hadehade nga yafing kporacyunubau. Ifi anu ngeneac medacfocnginango yoacngina isinggema desigecde.
42011020	Nga Anutungo gbonga faiu ni imocngo hadehade nga yafing kporacyunuduaeu Anutuac eucererengngo ngenearu bic hadac kecde, ngeni imoc negenggec.” (Mke 8:16-19)
42011021	“Ngic kuhagoc mongngo dzikacac iwaiya mema ameaac gareng kecmanu finaha gombunga feude.
42011022	Nga ngic mong kuha monggoc, yeng yearu hama yegoc ewema firang anudeu yeng ngic yeac dzikacac iwaia wangecmidarude. Wangeru ama minginango dzikac wiac, imocac kucfu seria kefec, imoc kpac anu ngic kuha monggocngo yeac finaha hamangec mema hendzicma ngicngac goa yemmeude.
42011023	Ifi anu mong ye neac ogona mi ande, ye ubeango wanude. Nga mong ye nigoc mekpedzuc ua mi meude, yeng neac wiac sinsararang kpeudeac ua meude.”
42011024	“Asu seuhagoc yeng ngicfunac erema bangec dokuya kpac, ihai kemma tacnegenudeac tatac hofocma yerecgema kecande. Kecma tatac mong mi meficgeudeu yengenaocngoc yofi deude, ‘Amana warac tacma wayai, imohai monggoc dzigenema kembadeac negenduae.’
42011025	Ifi dema kemma ama imoc wangge memengere angana henude.
42011026	Hemma monggoc kemma arengfora 7 wangecyunuu hagecde. Arengfora imoc yeneng ye ferahema mangana yombong andae, yeni meyunuma kemma ama imohai emma tacgecde. Tacgec ngic ye warac mangana kefec, imoc ferahema imocac mangana yombong kefude.”
42011027	Yesungo yoac ifi demanu ngac mongngo habu yeneac botucfunac kpacma deec, “Ngac meguma namuu garengguec, ye kenehagoc.”
42011028	Kparu Yesungo imoc wama yofi deec, “Ngicngac Anutuac yoac negemma hoanggeandae, yeni kenecnginagoc.”
42011029	Ngicngac habu yeni engngoc hamangoc fegec Yesungo yoac torokpema yofi deec, “Naso yomocac ngicngac ngeni areng mangana yombong. Ngeni kucna isinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc fingecngemmeudeac derecgeandae. Nga ngeni faka kuhagoc mong mi ngemmengemmea, Yonaaru kucfaka fingerec, ifiasac henggecde.
42011030	Niniwe taonggac ngicngac yeneng negensinggegecdeac Kebungo Yonaaru faka kuhagoc meec. Nga siriha imocngoc Ngicac Medac yengenaoc ngicngac yomocngo negensinggegecdeac fakaya kuhagoc meude.
42011031	Seba bangecac ngactau ye Salomoac negen negentegec meudeac bangec tegiau sautfunac haec. Imocac amma yeng ising ising nasou ngicngac yomoc yenigoc yacma nammagec fakangina isinggema yeneac mangana deyemmeude. Anu negenggec, yomocngo Salomoac negen negeng ferahade.
42011032	Niniwe taonggac ngic yeni Yonaac dedekperagiyoac negemma ubamereng anggecac amma yeneng ising ising nasou ngicngac yomoc yenigoc yacma nammagec yeneac fakangina isinggema yeneac mangana deyemmegecde. Negenggec, yomocngo Yonaac faka ferahade.
42011033	Mongngo kifa kpedzereckema sufu sufuu me pake bageau naric mi faiude, ye kifa imoc tatahau faiu tacma kperagiu ngicngac yeni erema kperagia henggecde.
42011034	Kicga imoc sebigaac kifa amma kicga gombunga fema sebiga sasawa mekperagidarude. Nga ge kickerec me kicmangang mekecma kicgango manganeudeu ine sebiga sasawa kundung kpeude.
42011035	Imocac amma ge kperagia fegende, imoc kundung kpebacac amma garengemema kecbesena.
42011036	Ge sebiga sasawango kundunga kpac kperagigoc feudeu sebiga kperagiango sokoma feude. Imoc kifa mong kperagitoayagoc mekperagiguande, ifi isoc.”
42011037	Anu Yesungo yoac demanungoc farisaio mongngo yegoc yaka neudeac heitaiu yeac amau emma taroc.
42011038	Matacma maria mi dzuacma yaka eng neudeac anu farisaiongo imoc hemma kpidohou
42011039	Kebungo ine yofi edeec, “Farisaio ngeni teratasengina ngadeasac dzuacandae nga ngeni ubaherengina manau ine kickerec amma wiac manganango wake wakea fede.
42011040	Ngeni negen negengtegecngina kpac. Kebungo ngadeau wiac meec, yeng manaac ifingoc meec.
42011041	Ngeni imocac amma ngicngac makpekpea wiac heregoc yemmebisia. Ifi anggec wiacngina sasawa dzuac dzuara anude.
42011042	Farisaio, ngeni romboc nga gime amma mondzangngina sasawa imocac kpete mema 10 imohacnac mocgu hendzicma Anutu miandae. Nga faka dindingac nga heregoc Anutuac songo negembesonga, imoc ine ihoc bahoc amma waandae, imocac ngeni sowecnginagoc. Ngeni faka gombunga imoc modacbisia amma tosea mi wabisia.
42011043	Farisaio, ngeni kpekpeturang amau tatac warac warac imohai tacgecdeac angemmeande nga ngicngac yeneng kpedzaroc sobennu eweheihei faka angemmegecdeac songo negengandae, imocac ngeni sowecnginagoc.
42011044	Kicsere esea mong wiaha kpac ngic yeneng mi negemma eng witiau kengha andae, ngeni kicsere ifia isoc kecdae, imocac ngeni sowecnginagoc.”
42011045	Ifi deu dedeseriyoacac negen negengngic yenearunac mongngo edeec, “Kpoukpou, ge ifi dema neni ifingoc denggbarinnununec.”
42011046	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi merenec, “Dedeseriyoacac negen negengngic, ngeni ifingoc sowecnginagoc. Ngeni ngic yeneac ngadenginau finac ngicngo memeacsoc kpac, imoc faiandae nga ngenang ine ngicngac ebicngina efea anude, imoc meficyunugecdeac gbongngina mong mi sinegecde.
42011047	Bangecfocnginango profete esea yunuhomegec homegecmoc yeneac kicsereu simengngina miacandae, imocac ngeni sowecnginagoc.
42011048	Yeneng profete yunuhomegec nga ngeneng kicserengina simenggoc miackeandae, ngeni ifi amma yofi dekperagidae, ‘Neni fakaninau uba mocgu kecdimbe.’
42011049	Ngeneac amma Anutuac negen negentegecngo bicngoc yofi deec, ‘Ni profete nga aposoro yenearu sueyunuba yeneng goa yunuhomegecde nga goa yunukporac ayemmegecde.’
42011050	Imocac amma bangec hanac hanaheaunacngoc erekecma profete yunuhomegec sacngina maec, imocac turunga yagucac ngicngac kecdae, ngenearunacngo kpoudacgecde.
42011051	Turung imoc Abeac sacfunac hanahema erekecma Dzekariaac sacfu erede. Yeni Dzekaria arata nga kpetiac ama botucngirau kpehomegec. Oc, ngicngacareng yomoc ngeneng turunga imoc kpoudacbisia, imoc edengunuduae.
42011052	Dedeseriyoacac negen negengngic, ngeni Anutu negemmigecdeac ki, imoc ngicngac yenearunac meickegec. Amma ngenang imohai mi emma ngicngac yeneng embesonga ammagec ine kpae bic faiandae, imocac ngeni sowecnginagoc.”
42011053	Anu Yesungo wama ngadeau kemeu mitiac negen negengngic nga farisaio, yeneng yeac negemmangang amma kpesi kpesi hania hania kpesimigec.
42011054	Yeni, “Yoac goa segeu meni.” dema yeac gareng mema kecgec.
42012001	Ngicngac homac yombong, teng tauseng nga noc ifiacsoc yeni kpedzucnema nanggecac yenaocngoc timbimbingemegec. Nga Yesungo medacfora, yeneac negemma yofi deec, “Ngeni farisaio yeneac ikoc fakangina imocac henghomema kecbisia, imoc yis isoc ic sogonnu sokoude.
42012002	Wiac mong sangoyagoc fede, imoc kecma nonongkac fingectegerude nga sufu sufuya fede, imoc negendacgecde.
42012003	Imocac ngeni kundunnu yoac sasawa deandae, imoc kperagiau negenggecde nga ama mana kapiau kedzacnginau sangic sangic deandae, yeni imoc ama witiau namma dekperagigecde.
42012004	Nga tosofocna, ngic goa yeni sebingina kpehomegecdeac kuc mekecma monggoc memanganengunugecdeac kuc hofocandae, ngeni yeneac mi kengecngunubeso, imoc edengunuduae.
42012005	Ngeni ine Kebu monggacsac damungunubeso. Yeng ngunuhomema gerechofeu ukungunuu kemegecdeac uayoac nga kuc mekecde. O, yofi deduae, ngeni yeac ine damungunubeso.
42012006	Ngicngac yeni nengbisic 5 faigec hocdzo yohockang sacsacngo bummeandae nga Anutungo neng imoc yenearunac mong naric mi nigeckpeude.
42012007	Amma ngeneac orucdzongina kpete, imoc ifingoc oso osodara. Nga ngeneng sawaac nengarengtoa yeni feracyunudae, imocac ngeni mi kengecngunubeso.
42012008	Ngic mong ye ngic yeneac kicfu Ngicac Medac yeac deande, ‘Ni yeac areng anduae.’ ifi deu Ngicac Medacngo yeac ifingoc Anutuac angerofora yeneac kicfu yofi deude, ‘Ye neac ngic.’
42012009	Nga ngic mong ye ngic yeneac kicfu ine ni busicnuude, neng ye ifingoc Anutuac angerofora yeneac kicfu busic kpebade.
42012010	Ngic mong ye Ngicac Medac emmiude, yeac kopocsic wamigecde nga mongngo Tiri Asu denggbaringgema emmiude, imocac kopocsic wawaya ine mi fede.
42012011	Ngic yeneng mengunuma kpekpeturang amau nga yoacgarenggac enara nga ngickuneng, yeneac kicfu faingunugecde, ngeni naso imohai negengyohoc amma yofi mi debisia, ‘Neni turunga dafi merennide nga noc yoac denide?’
42012012	Naso imohaingoc Tiri Asungo yoac enacnginau faiu ngeni imoc debisia.”
42012013	Anu ngicngac habu yeneac botucfunac ngic mongngo Yesuac deec, “Kpoukpou, dacna ye mannaac maridzoming tembuha mekecde, imocac geng dena noboha ni mederema nenu.”
42012014	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Ngic, ngereac iwai mederema gareng ambadeac mongngo mi fainuec.”
42012015	Ifi dema torokpema yeneac yofi deec, “Ngeni dzofinactoaac kichodung ambauac garengngina mebisia. Ngic monggac dzofinactoa, imocngo yengena kekehaac siriha mi heficgeude.”
42012016	Ifi dema yoac mong heima yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic dzofinactoagoc mongngo uayau semeng fora homac anu
42012017	semenga dahai faiudeac negengemema
42012018	yofi ambade negenec, ‘Ni semengama dafiguc mekecduae, yeni hembarackema monggoc meyadiyunuma mema semeng nga wiacna gombunga sasawa kpedzucnema ihai kpeturanggebade.
42012019	Kpeturanggeba wisickeu neanna ubaonganaac yofi debade, ni kifa homacacsoc wiac gombunga bic kpedzucnedua, imocngo kekecna meefaiu menec amma sogac sogaigoc kecbade.’
42012020	Ifi deu Anutungo yeac yofi deec, ‘Kapangic, tofocnac yomohaingoc kekecga wangecgugecde. Nga wiacga mekpedzuc amma wanade, imoc goa yeneng megecde.’ ”
42012021	Nga Yesungo monggoc torokpeec, “Ngic mong ye yengenaac amma bangecac dzofinactoa mekpedzuc amma Anutuac kicfu ine dzofinaha kpac kecde, yeac kekeha imocacsoc anude.”
42012022	Imocac amma Yesungo medacfora yofi edeyunuec, “Neni noc yaka nenide nga sebininau noc wamba heima kecni. Ngeni imocac kekecnginaac defagung mi ambisia.
42012023	Kekecngo yaka ferahaude nga sebingo ngakpikporuc ferahaude.
42012024	Ngeni wondong yenenggec. Yeni heikpenec nga netohong mong mi negenggec Anutungo sifu eng semeng yemmekecde. Nga Anutuac kicfu ngeneng neng yeneac engena andae.
42012025	Ngenearunac mongngo dewaidzoc amma kefu imocngo kekecnasoya kapianec monggoc naric mi mehereeude.
42012026	Ngeni wiac kapia ifiaac obohoma tosea goaac ifingoc negengyohoc mi ambisia.
42012027	Dzaring eng tohoandae, ngeni yenembisia. Yeni witic mi yumuandae amma uatoa mi mema sifu yadiandae. Ngictau Salomongo warac wamba kibia gombunga gombunga heikefu kibikperagitoayango ine dzaring yeneac kibi kereng kereng mi ferahaec.
42012028	Nga dzaring amasobennu eng tohoandae, yeni yagucac fingecdae nga ngic yeni wereckenu herecgema gerecfu ukuyunugecde. Nga Anutungo dzaringtehec ifia wamba heiyemmeudeu yeng ifingoc ngicngac negen negensingngina kapia mekecdae, ngeni ngakpikporucngina torokpeu torokpe imoc monggoc ngemmeude.
42012029	Imocac ngeni noc yaka nga doku dahacnac fima negecdeac negengyohoc nga demadzac imoc wabisia.
42012030	Nga bangeha bangeha ngicngac yeneng imoc megecdeac negen negengngina imohai faigec fekecde. Nga ngeni wiac imocac obohoandae, Mangnginango imoc bic negende.
42012031	Ngeni yeac eucerereng meficgegecdeac ua mebisia nga wiac imocnoc ifingoc torokpeu torokpe megecde.”
42012032	“Habubisic, ngeni mi ebiribisia. Mangngina ye eucererenga ngemmeudeac negenu ngereede.
42012033	Ngeni finacngina suegec ngicngac yeneng imoc bummedacgec ngeni dzo imoc mema ngicngac makpekpea kecdae, yeni ubangerecac wiac imoc yemmebisia. Ngeni dzobirang mi barackeudeac meficgebisia. Nga ngeni dzofinac kuha mi maude, imoc kurumennu kpedzucnebisia. Ihai hamangecngic yeni mi hagecde nga dzaukpadzadzangngo wiac mi memanganeude.
42012034	Imoc yofiac, ngeni dzofinacngina nofu faigec fede, imohaingoc ubasongongina ifingoc feude.”
42012035	“Ngeni kporucngina seria kpema kifangina kpedzereckema efaima kecbisia.
42012036	Ngic kuneng ye memeturang amaunac hama naguu heiu ua ngihango yeac tomai kecma nagu bic witimiude, ngeni ifi isoc tomai kecbisia.
42012037	Nga mingingnginango hama uamedacfora yeni gaugbori kecgec meficyunuude, yeni kenecnginagoc. Foracngoc, ye yengenaoc yeneac kingang kpeudeac kporuha mewegenema ‘Ngeni tacmagec.’ deu tacgec yaka meha yemmeu negecde, imoc edengunuduae.
42012038	Ye tofocnac dzongiau me ama werec wereckenggac gaugbori kecmagec hama yenenudeu uamedac imoc yeni kenecnginagoc.
42012039	Hamangecngic ye ama hetackema engande. Nga ama mingina mong ye hamangecngic noc nasou haude negendeu ye hamangecngic kpae heimiude.
42012040	Nga ngeni Ngicac Medacac aua mi negemmagec ye haude, imocac amma ngeni ifingoc efaima kecbisia.”
42012041	Anu Petorongo deec, “Kebu, ge yoac heima dedammoc, imoc neneac me ngicngac sasawa yeneac denec?”
42012042	Ifi deu Kebungo yofi merenec, “Amagareng gombunga mong negen negentegehagoc minginaac yoac dede modacande, minginango amagareng ifia uayoac miu ye uamedacfora yeneac enarangina amma yaka nasou hendzicma deecfu negecdeac yemmekefude.
42012043	Yemmekefu minginango dzigene hama henu uamedacngo ua imoc medarudeu uamedac ye kenehagoc.
42012044	Foracngoc, minginango wiara sasawa garenggeudeac demiude, imoc fora yombong.
42012045	Anu wanacngic mong ye yengenaocngoc ine yofi negensiudeu, ‘Minginnango bic mi haude.’ Ifi dema uangicngac goa yunuma minginaac wiac nedacma doku seria nema ubea sufuude.
42012046	Ifi anudeu wanacngic ye tomai mi kecma minginaac uamemenaso nga auaya mi negemmanu minginango haude. Hama uamedac imoc herecge meickeu kemema negen negensingngina kpac, yenigoc kefude.
42012047	Nga wanacngic mong ye minginaac yoac negemma mi efaima kecde, yeng dzikac ebiria kiude.
42012048	Nga wanacngic mong ye minginaac uayoac nga songo mi negemma dzikacac arennu faka goa angande, ye dzikac efeanecsac kiude. Ngicngac yeneng ngic mong wiac ebiria migec mekecde, yearu wiac ebiriangoc fingecmiudeac negenggecde. Nga yeni ngic mong wiac homac garenggeudeac uayoac migec mekecde, yeng wiac monggoc negen negengtegecgoc garenggeu imoc mi memanganeudeac negenggecde.
42012049	Ni bangecfu gerec habuya habuya fiba dzeudeac mayai. Amma gerec imoc bic dzebacfu ubana ngereebac.
42012050	Amma ni dokunadzic siriha mong nadzicbesare. Ni imoc negemma herenango ebiriu kecma uana imoc hafoangoc wisickeu herena ngereeude.
42012051	Ni bangecfu ruae meficgebadeac mayai, ngeni imoc mi negembisia, imoc kpac. Ni ine tohoemegecdeac mayai, imoc edengunuduae.
42012052	Nga yofinenggac nga namma enude, imohai ngicngac 5 ama mana monnu kecdae, yeni tohoma kecgecde. Harebec yeneng yohockang yerigoc nga yohockang yeri harebec yenigoc ngaba ngaba angemegecde.
42012053	Yeni tohoma manggacngo medac yegoc ngaba anude nga medac yeng mamagoc ngaba anecde. Nenggac ye naroangagoc ngaba anude nga naroangngo nonggeagoc ngaba angemeecde. Nga erangi yeri tohoemema ngaba angemeecde.”
42012054	Anu Yesungo ngicngac yeneac yofi deec, “Ngeni wenac keme kemeau hoeng mong hemma yofi bic deandae, ‘Kia kuneng kpeude.’ ifi degec kia kpeude.
42012055	Nga sautfunac firang kpeu negemma yofi deandae, ‘Bangec gerea anude.’ degec ifi angkecde.
42012056	Ikocngic, ngeni bangecfu nga sawau wiac fingecande, imoc hemma naric isinggegecde. Nga naso yofinenggac kecdimbe, imocac faka hemma isinggebau dede imocngo naric ambac.
42012057	Amma ngeni faka damocngo dindingac ande, imoc ngenaoc isinggebau dede imoc naric ambac.
42012058	Anu ngabaga mongngo yoacfu faiguudeac meguu ngerahafoc sinnu kengkecdape, ge imohai yoacngira dengereecdeac uatoa mebesena. Ifi mi annadeu ye desi desingic yearu faiguude. Nga desi desingicngo keracnatanggaru faiguu keracnatangngo witicamau faiguude.
42012059	Faiguu ge ihai takecma ngabagaac turung hafoangoc nga dzo wisic wisickea yombong kpoumaguc witicamaunac manade, imoc edeguduae.”
42013001	Naso imohaingoc ngic goa yeneng Yesu siduc yofi ammigec, “Gariraiangic goa yeni sesenginaac yang Anutuac hosuc heimagec Piratongo deu ngicfora yeneng kemma yunuhomema sacngina imoc sesenginaac yang sawagoc meturanggegec.”
42013002	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Ngic homegec, yeneac kopocsicngo gariraiangic sasawa yeneac kopocsic ferahaecac ifi fingecyemmeec, ngeni imoc negensidae me?
42013003	Nga imoc kpac yombong. Ngeni ubangina mi merenggecdeu ngeni sasawango yeni homegec, ifi isocngoc homedacgecde, imoc edengunuduae.
42013004	Nga Siroang amaherecngo barackema ngicngac 18 witinginau mama yunuhomeec. Imocac ngeni dafi negensidae, yeneac kopocsicngo Yerusalennu ngicngac sasawa kecdae, yeneac ferahade me?
42013005	Imoc kpac yombong. Nga ngeni ine ubangina mi merenggecdeu ngeni sasawango yeni homegec, ifi isocngoc homedacgecde, imoc edengunuduae.”
42013006	Anu Yesungo yoac mong heima yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic mong ye fig ic mong waing uayau homeru nanec. Nanu ye kemma fora hofocma
42013007	waing uaac gareng edeec, ‘Ic yomocac fora hofocma kecbare kifa harebec bic ande nga ye nocac eng namma bangec kereha nedarude? Imocac ic imoc herecgema ukuna.’
42013008	Ifi deu waing uagarengngo deec, ‘Kunenna, ge imoc wana kifa yomohai ifingoc nammanu haniau usuma guec heikecbesare.
42013009	Ifi amba ngadeguc fora gombunga anude gedang. Nga fora mi anudeu ge naric herecgema ukubesena.’ ”
42013010	Sabata naso monnu Yesungo kpekpeturang ama monnu emma kpoukpou ua meec.
42013011	Meu ngac mong imohai tarec, ye hafeiac hadehade mongngo ngadea mendanggeu ngadehokuc kefu kifaya 18 bic anu naric mi kpehengaibac.
42013012	Nga Yesungo ye hemma yearu haudeac kpacma edeec, “Ngac negenna, ni hafeiga meickeba kpac ande.”
42013013	ifi dema maria witiau faimanu ngac ye ngadea bic kpehengaima sorongaiu yacma namma Anutu dengereec.
42013014	Ifi anu kpekpeturang amaac gareng yeng ine Yesungo sabatau mengec mengere ua meecac herebu negemma ngicngac edeyunuec, “Uameme 6 fede, imohai ua mebesonga. Ifi anu ngeni naso imohai hagec mengerengunugecde nga sabata nasou ine kpac.”
42013015	Ifi deu Kebungo meremmiec, “Ikocngic, ngeni sasawa burumaka nga donggifocngina doku yemmegecdeac sabata nasou yungecyunugec, yeni amanginaunac magec meyunu kengandae, imocngo ngereede.
42013016	Nga ngac yomoc Abrahanggac naroannoc, ye ine Satangngo kifa 18 bic dzegeu kecmanu sabata nasou yungec yungera anude, imoc negenggec ifingoc ngereede.”
42013017	Yesungo ngabafora turunga ifi merengyemmeu yeni gameyunudarec. Nga ngicngac tosea yeni ine faka engena sasawa meu henggec, imocac sogac sogai andacgec.
42013018	Imocac Yesungo yofi deec, “Ni noc wiacfusing yoac heiba ngeni Anutuac eucererenggac siriha naric negentegecgecde?
42013019	Imoc mastet gbomea isoc, ngic mongngo mastet gbomea mema uayau homeru yadima ic wegenac anu sawau neng yeneng hama fawau faec heigec.”
42013020	Ifi dema Yesungo monggoc deec, “Anutuac eucerereng, imoc noc wiacfusing yoac heiba negenggecde,
42013021	Imoc yis isoc, ngac mongngo farawa 20 kiroacsoc meu uuha yisgoc yerecgema meu hafoangoc yisagoc anude.”
42013022	Yesungo taong nga amabisicfu yerecgema ngicngac yenearu kpoukpou ua mema Yerusalennu kenudeac kenec.
42013023	Kemmanu ngicngac goa yeneng kpesimigec, “Kebu, ngicngac efeanec, yenengsac komoc kpegecde me?” ifi degec Yesungo yofi merenec,
42013024	“Ngeni nagu kapiau enggecdeac ua seserigoc mekecbisia. Ni edengunuba, ngicngac homac yeni Anutuac eucererennu enggecdeac uatoa mema obohogecde.
42013025	Nga ama minginango yacma nagu heiu ngeni ngadeau namma naguu heima debesandae, ‘Kebu, nagu witinemmena ereni.’ Ngeni ifi degec yeng merengngemmema yofi deude, ‘Ngeni dahacnac? Ni mi negengngunuduae.’
42013026	Ifi deu ngeneng degecde, ‘Neni gegoc nenedoku neing nga geng neneac sinnu namma edekpou anemmenec.’
42013027	Ifi degec, yeng ine monggoc edengunuude, ‘Ngeni dahacnac? Ni mi negengngunuduae. Manganameme, ngeni neac kicfunac meickegec.’
42013028	Ngeni Abrahang nga Isaka amma Yakobo nga profete sasawa Anutuac eucererennu tacgec yenenggecde. Nga ngeni ine ngadeau ukungunugec kemegecde. Ihai ngeni kiacma enac kisaranggema kecgecde.
42013029	Nga ngicngac yeni wenac ere ereaunac nga keme kemeaunac amma nort amma sautnacngo hama Anutuac eucererennu tacma neneyaka nebesandae.
42013030	Amma goa ngadea kecandae, yeni warac warac anggecde nga warac warac kecandae, yeneng ngadea anggecde.”
42013031	Naso imohaingoc farisaio goa yeneng hama Yesuac degec, “Herodengo gubeso andeac bangec yomoc wama kenna.”
42013032	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Ngeni kemma katekasi imoc yofi edegec, ‘Negennec, ni yaguc nga wereckenu hadehade nga yafing kporacyunuma hafeigoc mengereyunuba uameme harebecfu uana wisickeude.
42013033	Ni yaguc nga wereckenu amma wereu kengkecbade. Profete yeni bangec goau naric mi yunuhomebesonga, kpac. Yeni Yerusalennusac yunuhomebesonga, faka ifi fede.’
42013034	Yerusaleng Yerusaleng, ge profete yunuhomeannec nga ngic gearu sueyunuyunuya, yeni hocngo yenereannec. Nga Kokorec nonggeango nambaracfora kpeganga bageau foforacyunuande, ni ifi isoc naso homac nambaracfocga kpedzucngunubadeac negembare ngeneng ine imocac songo mi negenggec.
42013035	Negendae, amangina kisi nanude nga ngeni monggoc mi nenggecde kecma yofi degecde, ‘Kebuac kpacfu ngic hade, ye kenehagoc.’ ifi degecde, imohai ngeneng monggoc nenggecde.”
42014001	Yesungo sabata naso monnu farisaio yeneac enarameme monggac amau yaka neudeac enu farisaio yeneng yeac haifaka hennegeng amma tacgec.
42014002	Imohai ngic mong sebia yadi yadia, yeng hama Yesuac kicfu nanu
42014003	Yesungo dedeseriyoacac negen negengngic nga farisaio yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Sabatau ngic mengec mengereyunuac sing mong fede me kpac?”
42014004	Ifi deu yeni turunga mong mi merenggec Yesungo ine ngic imoc maringo mema mengerema sueu kenu
42014005	yofi edeyunuec, “Ngenearunac monggac medac me burumaka mongngo dokuteng monnu kemeu sabata naso anu ye sifu bic kemma kpedziu ereude.”
42014006	Ifi deu yeneng yoac imocac turunga meremmigecdeac obohogec.
42014007	Anu imohai ngic heitaiyunuyunuya goa yeneng tatac warac warac isinggema ihai tacgec Yesungo yenensima yoac heima yofi dema edeyunuec,
42014008	“Ngic mongngo memeturanggac yakau heitaiguude, imohai ge yakaac tatac warac waracfu bic mi tacbesena. Ngic heitaiyunuyunuya, yenearunac mongngo gedang geac engena anu
42014009	ngic ye nga ge ngerahafoc heitainguruec, yeng hama yofi edeguude, ‘Ge meickemana ngic yomocngo taru.’ Ifi deu gameguu tatac wisic wisickeau yombong kemma tacnade.
42014010	Ngic mong heitaiguu ge ine kemma tatac wisic wisickeau tacbesena. Ifi anna ngic heitaiguec, yeng hama gemma yofi gedang deude, ‘Tosona, ge tatac warac waracfu ekemma tacna.’ Ifi deu ngicngac bic tacdae, yeneac kicfu eweheihei anggenude.
42014011	Ngic mong ye yengena sebi meengande, ye memagecde nga mong ye sebia memaemeande, ye meenggecde.”
42014012	Nga Yesungo ngic heitaiec, yeac ifingoc yoac mong yofi deec, “Ge wenacfu me marai yakaneneac areng goa heitaiyununade, imohai ogofocga me dacmunac me arengfocga me dzofinacnginagoc geac wegenacfu kecdae, yeni mi heitaiyunubesena. Yeneng turunga gedang monggoc kpougenggec sing imohai turungga bic menade, imoc mi ngereede.
42014013	Ge heitaiyununadeac yaka mengerenade, naso imohai ine ngic makpekpea nga sebimangang nga hanimangang amma kicpisic heitaiyunubesena.
42014014	Ge ifi amma kenecgagoc annade. Imoc yofiac, ngic imoc yeni turunga kpougenggecdeacsoc mi anggecde. Nga geng yaka imocac turunga imoc ngicngac dindingac gborima yacgecde, naso imohai mebesannec.”
42014015	Ifi deu yeni yaka netacma yoara negenggec yenearunac ngic mongngo Yesu edeec, “Mong ye Anutuac eucererennu emma yaka netarude, ye kenehagoc.”
42014016	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ngic mongngo nenesemeng kuneng mengereudeac negemma ngicngac homac yeneac yoac faima heitaiyunuec.
42014017	Heitaiyunuu yakaneneac naso hau ye wanacngiha sueu yeng ngic heitaiyunuec, yeni edeyunuudeac kemma deec, ‘Hagec, wiac sasawa bic mengereding tacde.’
42014018	Ifi deu ngic sasawango degbedic amma ngic warac warac yeng deec, ‘Ni bangec mong bummedua, imoc hembadeac kembeso negenduae, imocac negenna mi manganebeso.’
42014019	Nga mongngo deec ‘Ni burumakangiwa 10 uaac amma bummedua, imocac kemma uau tobangyunubeso negenduae, imocac negenna mi manganebeso.’
42014020	Ifi deu ogongira mongngo deec, ‘Ni ngac medua, imocac amma naric mi habade.’
42014021	Nga wanacngic ye kemma yoac imoc sasawa mingina edeu minginango herebu negemma wanacngic yofi edeec, ‘Ge taonggac sinnu nga singbisicfu bic kemma ngicngac makpekpea nga sebimangang amma kicpisic nga hanimangang, yeni hesicyununa hagec.’
42014022	Ifi deu wanacngicngo kemma deec, ifi isoc amma dzigenema yofi edeec, ‘Kunenna, ge dedang, imoc bic andacdua nga ama manau ine tatac fedengoc.’
42014023	Ifi deu minginango deec, ‘Ge singtoa nga singbisic fedacde, imohai kemma ngicngac yenemma hagecdeac serima dema hesicyunuma hana yeni amana mana yomoc mewakebisia.
42014024	Ngic heitaiyunuyunuya, yenearunac mongngo yakana ohoai, imoc naric mi nehembesande, imoc edengunuduae.’ ”
42014025	Yesungo kenu ngicngac habutoango ye modacma kenggec dzigenema yenemma deec,
42014026	“Ngic mong ye hama modacnubeso negenside, ye yengena nonggomama nga eneng nambaracfora amma dacmunac nga yengena kekeha ifingoc mi ngadeheudeu ua medacna naric mi anude.
42014027	Nga mong ye yengena mariponga mi tofohoma modacnuudeu ye medacna naric mi anude.
42014028	Ngenearunac ngic mongngo kicfifiac amaherec mebesonga negende, ye ama naric medarude me kpac, imocac waicke tacma hanahema iwaiac buma osoareng andarudeu ngereeude.
42014029	Nga ye hanahema ifi mi amma eng simenga yerecgema faima ama tosea mi medzickebac dede ngicngac yeneng imoc hemma deendema ammima
42014030	yofi degecde, ‘Ngic yomoc ye ama mebesonga amma kuha mong mi feecac ama ua mi mesiec.’
42014031	Anu ngictau mongngo ngicfora 10 tauseng eng meyunuma kemma ngictau mong ye ngicfora 20 tauseng, yenigoc ewegecde, imoc mi ngereeude. Ye matacma yofi isinggemaguc anude, neac ngicfocna 10 tauseng yeneng ngabafocna hagecde naric yunugecde me kpac.
42014032	Imoc naric mi anudeu yeni hereaungoc kecmagec yeng gubekisang ngic ruae dafi fingerudeac sueu kenude.
42014033	Imocac ngenearunac mongngo yengena wiac sasawa mi ngadehedarudeu ua medacna naric mi anude.
42014034	Kondung imoc wiac gombunga. Nga kondungngo kiacma songea kpac anudeu ine ye songea monggoc naric mi meficgeude.
42014035	Kondung ifiango yaka sereau ukuni memefic mi anude nga bangec kereha semeng uau faiandae, imocgoc kpeturanggenideac siric ifingoc mi ande. Imoc eng ukuandae. Kedzahagoc yeng yoac yomoc negembeso.”
42015001	Takesimeme ngic nga manganameme sasawa yeneng Yesuac yoac negembesonga yeac hoannu kendacgec.
42015002	Nga farisaio nga mitiac negen negengngic yeneng negenggec imoc naric mi anu nasosoc yofi dekecgec, “Ngic yomoc ye manganameme hoangyunuma yenigoc yaka neande.”
42015003	Ifi degec Yesungo yoac mong heima yofi edeyunuec,
42015004	“Ngenearunac ngic mong ye ramafora 100 femide. Ifi femiu yenearunac rama mong sufuudeu minginango dafi anude? Ye rama 99 wayunuu bangec kisiu nanggec kemma mocgu imoc hofockecma meficgeude.
42015005	Meficgema ubangerec negemma fuayau faima tofohoma mekenude.
42015006	Mekemma ameau kensikema ngic ogofora nga tosofora wegenac kecdae, yeni kpacyunuma yofi edeyunuude, ‘Ngeni hagec nenahafoc sogaini. Ni ramana sufuec, imoc meficgedua.’
42015007	Ifi isoc ngic kopocsihagoc mocgungosac ubamereng anu sogac sogai siriha imocngoc kurumennu fingerude, imoc edengunuduae. Nga ngicngac 99 yeni ubamerenggac sing mi obohoma kpetiac bic kecdae, yeneac amma sogac sogai ifia mi fingerude.
42015008	Me ngac mong ye silwadzoya 10 mekecma mong ukuu sufuudeu ye dafi anude? Ye kifaya kpedzereckema ama wanggema serima hofockengkecma meficgeude.
42015009	Meficgema ngac ogofora nga tosofora wegenac kecdae, yeni kpacyunuma yofi edeyunuude, ‘Ngeni hagec nenahafoc sogaini. Ni dzona ukuba sufuec, imoc meficgedua.’
42015010	Nga ngic kopocsihagoc mongngo ubea merenu Anutuac angero yeni yenahafoc ifingoc sogaigecde, imoc edengunuduae.”
42015011	Yesungo torokpema deec, “Ngic mong ye medachora yohockang kefoc.
42015012	Nga medaha kapiango mama edeec, ‘Manggac, ge dzofinac goa hendzicma neac nobohana nenna neannaoc mekecbade.’ Ifi deu mangngirango iwaiya hendzicma medachora yemerec.
42015013	Yemeru naso mi hereemanu medaha kapia ye dzofinaha kpedzucnedacma mema bangec hereau kenec. Kemma imohai bangecac sicsauckekecfu dzofinactoaya mekefec, imoc ukudarec.
42015014	Ukudaru kpac ammanu bangec imohai boditoa fingeru ye yaka nga wiac sasawaac obohoec.
42015015	Obohoma bangec imocac mingina mong yearu kemma ogo ammiu yeng bereha garenggeudeac berecodau sueu kenec.
42015016	Kenu berec yeneng yaka sebera negec, imoc neudeac ammiec nga mongngo ine yaka mong mi gumegec.
42015017	Ifi anu ye yengenaoc kekeha hentegecma deec, ‘Mannaac uamedacfora yaka negebec angandae. Nga neng ine yei yakaac homema homebeso anduae.
42015018	Imocac ni yacma mannaaru kembadeac negenduae. Kemma yofi edebade, “Manggac, ni kurumeng arenggac nga geac kicfu momoc kopocsic meficgeai,
42015019	imocac monggoc medacga kpacnugecde, imoc mi ngereeude. Ge sifu menuna yagurangicfocga yenearunac mong isoc amma kecbesare.” ’ ifi negemma kenec.
42015020	Amma medac ye hereaungoc kemmanu mamango bic hemma yeac ubea manganeu yearu nedzima kemma tofohoma titikokoc ammiu
42015021	medacngo deec, ‘Manggac, ni kurumeng arenggac nga geac kicfu momoc kopocsic meficgeai, imocac medacga monggoc kpacnugecde, imoc mi ngereeude.’
42015022	Nga manggacngo ine wanacngicfora yofi bic edeyunuec, ‘Ngeni bicbic kemma ngakpiherec gombunga yombong mehama heimigec kemeu gbonggac ring heimima hanitabe haniau heimigec kemeu.
42015023	Ngeni kemma burumakamedaha gbofoma, imoc mehagec kpema nenahafoc nesogai anni.
42015024	Medacna yomoc ye bic homeec, ifi negening ammanu ye kekec monggoc meficgedac. Ye sufuecfunac monggoc meficgeding.’ Ifi deu yeni nesogaitoa anggec.
42015025	Ifi ammagec medaha kunengngo semeng uau kecma ihacnac ama mewegenema hama ine musi nga yegec fedefedeac udumeng negemma
42015026	uamedac mong kparu hau kpesimiec, ‘Noc faka fingecde?’
42015027	Ifi deu uamedacngo turunga yofi merenec, ‘Munagango kpesipiriha kpac gombunga amau monggoc dzigenedacac amma manggango deu burumakamedaha gbofoma kpeding.’
42015028	Ifi deu dara ye herebu meficgema ngadeau namma amau enudeac mi ammiu mamango mama amau enudeac demekiri ammiu
42015029	darango mama edeec, ‘Negenna, ni kifa dafiguc geac wanac ua mema kecma yoacga mong mi kpeai. Ifi mekecba ogofocna yenigoc noningmedaha mong nenideac mong mi nennec, kpac.
42015030	Nga medacga imoc ye iwaiga singtoangacgoc kecma ukuma hau geng ine yeac amma burumakamedaha fusia kuneng kpenec.’
42015031	Ifi deu mamango deec, ‘Medacna, ge nasosoc nigoc kecannec nga neac wiac sasawa imoc geacnoc.
42015032	Nga nenang yaguc ubangerec negemma nesogai ambisina. Munaga yomoc ye bic homeec, ifi negening ammanu ye kekec monggoc meficgedac. Ye sufuecfunac monggoc meficgedinggac ifi anni.’ ”
42016001	Yesungo medacfora yoac yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic mong dzofinacgoc yeng dzogareng ngic mong meec. Meu yeng yegoc kecma yeac dzofinac garenggekefec. Garenggekefu goa yeneng yeac yofi dema edegec, ‘Dzogarengga imoc ye dzofinacga mi garenggema sicsauc faiande.’ Imocac amma yeng dzogarenga kparu hau
42016002	edeec, ‘Geac fakaga mangana degec negengkecduae. Dzogarenna monggoc naric mi kecnade. Ge imocac dzofinacac nga uagaac siduc hafoangoc ohoma nenna.’
42016003	Ifi deu dzogareng yengenaocngoc yofi negenec, ‘Ngickunennango dzogareng ua nearunac meickeude. Nga ni ama uamemeac osiduae amma kucna mi fede, derecgenecngic ambadeac gamenude, imocac dafi ambade?’
42016004	‘O, yaguc negenduae. Uaunac meicnugec kpac anu goa yeneng amanginau heitainugecdeac faka mong ambade.’
42016005	Ifi negemma ngic sasawa kunengaac turung mekecgec, yeni tembuc tembuc kpacyunuec. Kpacyunuu ngic warac enec, ye kpesimiec, ‘Ge kunenna yearunac turungga dafiguc annec?’
42016006	Ifi deu meremmiec, ‘Oliwakereha kes 600.’ Ifi deu edeec, ‘Ge turungkibiga mema bic tacma kes 300sac ohona.’
42016007	Dema ngic mong kpesimiec, ‘Nga ge turung dafiguc annec?’ Kpesiu meremmiec, ‘Wit toru 800, imocacsoc.’ Ifi deu edeec, ‘Ge turungkibiga mema 640sac ohona.’
42016008	Anu dzogareng mangana ye negengising amma anecac dzofinac minginango dengereec. Nocac bangectoa bangec yomocac medacfora yeni kperagiaac medacfora ferahema ebiriangoc meficemeandae.
42016009	Neng ine yofi edengunuduae, dzofinac yengenaocngoc fakaya dindingac kpac, ngeni wiac imoc mema ogo gboria meficgebisia. Ifi anggec dzofinacac naso kpac anude, imohai ogofocnginango bangec feengkefude, ama imohai heitaingunugec enggecde.
42016010	Ngic mong ye yoac modacma wiac kapianec gombunga garenggeande, ye ifingoc yoac modacma wiac kuneng garenggema kefude. Nga mong ye yoac mi modacma ikoc amma wiac kapianec gombunga mi garenggeande, ye ifingoc yoac mi modacma ikoc amma wiac kuneng gombunga mi garenggeude.
42016011	Nga ngeni yoac mi modacma bangecac dzofinac mangac manganea gombunga mi garenggegecde isoc ngic mongngo dzofinac fora garenggegecdeac maringinau naric mi faiude.
42016012	Nga ngeni yoac mi modacma ngic monggac dzofinac gombunga mi garenggegec isoc, imohai wiac ngeneac desi desia imoc ngemmegecdeac osiude.
42016013	Uamedac mocgungo ngic kuneng yohockang yereac kingang naric mi kpeude. Ye monggac songo negemma mong ngadeheude me monggaru kpeketahema mong waude. Ngeni, Anutu nga dzofinac yereac kingang sofucngoc kpegecdeacsoc mi ande.”
42016014	Yesungo yoac imoc deu farisaio yeni hiedzoac songo kuneng feyemmeecac amma imoc negemma detenic ammigec.
42016015	Ammigec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic yeneng dindingac dengemmegecdeac ngeni imoc yeneac kicfu faka dindingac angkecdae. Nga Anutungo ine wiac ubaherenginau fede, imoc negendacde. Imoc yofiac, ngic yeneng wiac monggac negenggec engena angkecde, imoc Anutungo henu faka mangana yombong ande.
42016016	Moseac dedeseriyoac nga profete yeneac yoac dekperagigec erema Yohane fingeru naso imoc wisickede. Nga imohacnac erema ngicngac yeneng Anutuac eucerereng dekperagigecde. Dekperagigec ngicngac yeni serima ihai endae.
42016017	Bangec nga kurumeng meickeu kpac anude, imoc efea nga Anutuac dedeseriyoac imohacnac dzikangabisic meic meicke imoc ine naric mi fingerude.
42016018	Ngic mong ye enema wama ngac mong meude, ye serofaka anude nga mong ye ngac wawaya meude, yeng ifingoc serofaka anude.”
42016019	Anu Yesungo monggoc deec, “Ngic mong kefec, ye dzeingakpia gombunga linengngo memea amma ngakpia witiau sacsac siriha gombunga heima wenacsoc nenesemengtoagoc nga ondzonggboc amma songo witiau takefec.
42016020	Nga yeac amasinnu, oda ngadeau ine ngic mong makpekpea kpara Radzaro kefec. Ye sebiau kubecngo wake wakea nga ngic yeni ihai faigec fekefec.
42016021	Fema ngic dzofinacgoc yeac tebounac yaka tosea maande, imoc neudeac ammikefec. Nga kasi yeneng ine hama kubeha aberekecgec.
42016022	Kecma ngic makpekpeango homeu angero yeneng ye mekemma Abrahanggac hoannu faigec kefu ngic dzofinacgocngo ifingoc homeu tonggogec.
42016023	Tonggogec ye homecamau kecma ihai kpendzeng kuneng kpekefec. Ifi kpekecma kic fima henu Abrahangngo hereau yombong tarec nga Radzaro henu yeac hoannu tarec.
42016024	Ifi hemma kpacma deec, ‘Abrahang manna, ni yei gerec manau kpendzeng kuneng kpeduae, imocac amma ge ubaga neac manganeu Radzaro suena kemma gbonga susiango dokuu nemurucke hama nedzaranna menomaneu.’
42016025	Ifi deu Abrahangngo yofi deec, ‘Medacna, ge wiac mong negensibesena. Ge bangecfu kecmana ngicngac yeneng iwai gombunga gombunga bic genggec mekecnec nga Radzaro ine manganasac migec. Yaguc Radzaro yei menomanedae nga geng ine kpendzeng kpekecnec.
42016026	Nga monggoc torokpema deduae, botucninau tufatoa faifaia fede. Ifi anu mongngo yeihacnac ferecgema gearu haude me ihacnacngo yei haha, imoc osiosia.’
42016027	Ifi deu dzofinacgocngo deec, ‘Ifi anu manggac derecgegemba, ge Radzaro suena mannaac amau kenu.
42016028	Dacmunafocna 5 ihai kecdae, yeneng kpendzengbangec yomohai habauac ye kemma gorongina kpema edeyunubeso.’
42016029	Ifi deu Abrahangngo ine yofi deec, ‘Yeni Mose nga profete yeneac yoac mekecma negengkecbisia.’
42016030	Ifi deu dzofinacgoc kefecngo deec, ‘Abrahang manna, imoc kpac. Ngic mongngo homecfunac gborima kemma edeyunuu ine ubamereng anggecde.’
42016031	Ifi deu Abrahangngo yofi deec, ‘Yeni Mose nga profete yeneac yoac mi negemma wagecdeu ngic mongngo homecfunac gborima deu ye ifingoc naric mi modacgecde.’ ”
42017001	Anu Yesungo medacfora yeneac yofi deec, “Ngicngac faka mangana anggecdeac faitobang, imocngo bangecfu fingerude. Nga ngic mongngo ngicngac ogofora faitobang ifia ayemmeude, ye ine sowehagoc.
42017002	Ye nambarac kapia yenearunac mong mangana mi kpoumiudeac ye yagucnoc dzamandzing ubeau ubahemima kondunnu ukugec kemeu, imoc yearu ngereebac.
42017003	Ngeni ngenaocngoc garengemema kecbisia. Tosoga mongngo kopocsic meficgeudeu ge goroyoac edena. Nga ye ubea merenudeu kopocsiha wabesena.
42017004	Nga ye uameme mocguac manau atac 7ngoc ge memanganeguu naso 7 ifingoc gearu dzigenema hama yofi deude, ‘Kopocsic yomoc anaiac ubahodung negenduae.’ Imoc deudeu kopocsiha wakecbesena.”
42017005	Anu aposoro yeneng Kebuac degec, “Ge negen negensinnina meyadinemmena.”
42017006	Ifi degec Kebungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Negen negensingngina kapia mastet gbomea isoc fengemmeudeu ngeni fig ic yomoc ye yengenaoc godeagoc fukema kondunnu kemema nanudeac edegec ye enacngina tofohoma naric kemema nanude.”
42017007	“Anu ngenearunac mongngo wanacngiha bangec mendzic mendzic kefude me ramaburumaka garenggekefude, yeng semeng uaunac hama amau ereu minginango matacma yaka neudeac mi deude.
42017008	Ye ine yofi edeude, ‘Ge ngakpikporucga mewegenema yakana mengerema henggareng anemma tomai nanna. Tomai nammana neba wisickeuguc ge yaka naric nenade.’
42017009	Minginango wanacngic uayoac ifi miu yeng yoara tofohoma ua medacdac, imocac ubangerecyoac mi edeude.
42017010	Ngeni ifingoc wiac anggecdeac dengecdengemmea, imoc mesidacma yofi debisia, ‘Neni wanacngic amma uaninasac meding.’ ”
42017011	Yesungo ifi dema Yerusalennu kenudeac sing modacma Samaria nga Gariraia botucngirau kenec.
42017012	Kemma guruama monnu emmanu ngic 10 kukuseringinagoc sinnu hamagec meficyunuec. Anu yeni hereaungoc namma
42017013	kpacma degec, “Yesu, kunennina, ge neneac ubaga manganeu.”
42017014	Ifi degec Yesungo yenemma edeyunuec, “Ngeni kemma womonggareng fingecyemmema sebingina edzacyunugec.” Ifi deu yeni sinnu kemmagecngoc sebingina ngereec.
42017015	Ngereegec yenearunac mongngo sebia ngereeu hemma dzigene hama seriangoc arohoma Anutu dengereec.
42017016	Dengerema Yesuac haniau kicmesuya hetutuckema makpe fema yeac ubangerec yoac deec. Amma ngic imoc ye Samariangic.
42017017	Ye ifi anu Yesungo kpesimiec, “Ni negemba ngic 10 yeneng ngerec ngeree meficgedau nga ngic 9 yeni damoc?
42017018	Ngic yomoc ye areng monnunacngo yeneac botucfunac yengsac Anutu afeheudeac dzigenema hade nga goa yeni ifingoc anggec naric ambac.”
42017019	Dema Yesungo yeac yofi deec, “Ge yacma kenna, negen negensinggango mengeregudac.”
42017020	Farisaio goa yeni Anutuac eucerereng noc nasoac haudeac Yesu kpesimigec yofi merengyemmeec, “Anutuac eucerereng hau ngeni imoc kicngo naric mi henggecde.
42017021	Amma yofi naric mi degecde, ‘Ngeni henggec, ye yoc me ngeni henggec, ye edimoc.’ Negenggec, Anutuac eucerereng imoc ubaherenginau fede.”
42017022	Ifi dema medacfora yeneac yofi deec, “Kecma naso mong hau ngeni Ngicac Medacac uameme mocgusac henggecdeac angemmeude amma naric mi henggecde.
42017023	Nga ngicngac yeni ngeneac yofi degecde, ‘Ngeni henggec, ye edi.’ me ‘Ngeni henggec, ye yei.’ Ifi degec ine mi modacyunubisia nga ihai bic mi kembisia.
42017024	Imoc yofiac, sawau piratac heiu kperagiango nobocnac ferecgema noboc kengande, Ngicac Medac ye ifi isocngoc hahanasoyau fingectegecbesande.
42017025	Hanahema ine naso yomocac kisic yeneng ye ngadehegec kpendzeng homac kpeude.
42017026	Noaac nasou faka fingerec, Ngicac Medacac haha nasou faka ifiangoc fingecbesande.
42017027	Ngicngac yeni nenedoku nema ngic ngacfu kenggec nga manggac yeneng degec, ‘Ni naroanna ngic mibade.’ Ifi angkecmagec Noango wageu enu doku yadima wiac sasawa semedaru manganema kpac andarec.
42017028	Nga Rotiac nasou faka ifiangoc fingerec. Ngicngac yeni nenedoku nema iwai bummema suema neneyaka mehomeckecma ama mekecgec.
42017029	Nga wenac mong ifi amma kecmagec Rotingo Sodong waec, wenac imohaingoc Anutungo negenu kurumennunac gerec nga sarafa hoc imoc ine kia isocngo mama wiac sasawa dzedaru kpac andarec.
42017030	Nga Ngicac Medac fingectegerudeac nasoyau faka ifia isoc fingecbesande.
42017031	Naso imohai ngic me ngac mong ye ama witiau tarude nga iwaiyango ama manau taru ye imoc meudeac ama manau mi embeso. Nga mong ye semeng uau nanude, ye ifingoc ameau dzigene mi kembeso.
42017032	Roti enemaaru faka fingerec, ngeni imoc negensibisia.
42017033	Ngic mong ye kekeha segereudeac ua mekecde, ye kekeha ukuu sufumiude nga mong ye kekeha ukuu sufuude, ye kekeha fingecmiude.
42017034	Tofocnac imohaingoc yohockang yeri fefe mocguac witiau femaec Kebuac areng yeneng yerearunac mong mema mong ine wagec feude.
42017035	Nga ngac yohockang yerahafoc imohaingoc namma flawa hedzamema kecmaec Kebuac areng yeneng yerearunac mong mema mong ine wagec nanude.
42017036	Nga ngic yohockang yeri semeng uau kecmaec Kebuac areng yeneng yerearunac mong mema mong ine wagec uau kefude, imoc edengunuduae.”
42017037	Ifi deu medacfora yeneng kpesimigec, “Kebu, faka imoc dahai fingerude?” Kpesimigec Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Hasaukpesac neng yeni fareng fede, imohai eacbesandae.”
42018001	Medac yeneng nasosoc modzotitia kpac nunumu ua megecdeac Yesungo yoac mong heima yofi edeyunuec.
42018002	“Yoac isic isingge ngic mong ye taong monnu kefec. Ye Anutuac kengec mi angkefec nga ngicngac yeneac eweheihei mong mi angkefec.
42018003	Nga taong imohaingoc ngachotsec mong ewea homemea kefec, ye nasosoc yearu hama yofi dekefec, ‘Ngabafocna yeneng memanganenubeso amma kecdaeac neac yoac dindingac dema meficnubesena.’
42018004	Ngac ye ifi dekefu yoac isic isinggengo meficgeudeac mi negenec. Amma ngade ngac imocac modzea tiu yengenaocngoc ine yofi negenec, ‘Ni Anutuac kengec mi anduae nga ngic yeneac eweheihei mong mi negenduae.
42018005	Nga ngachotsec yomoc ye nasosoc nearu hama hatahenengkecde, imocac amma yoara mengeremibesare. Ifi mi ambadeu ye nasosoc hakefu modzona tiyombonggeude.’ ”
42018006	Anu Kebungo yofi deec, “Ngeni yoac isic isinggengo faka dindingac mi modacande, yeng yoac deec, imoc negensibisia.
42018007	Anutungo ngicngacfora meisingngunuec, ngeneac amma modzea mi tiude. Ngeni hadzing toforec ye meficngunuudeac kiacnginango yearu kenu ye ngeneac amma faka dindingacfu meficngunuudenoc.
42018008	Nga nasongina mi mehereema faka dindingac fingecngemmeudeac ua bic meude, imoc edengunuduae. Nga Ngicac Medacngo haude, imohai ngicngac ye negensinggedae, ngicngac ifia negemba homac mi kecgecde.”
42018009	Ngic goa yeni yenanggac negenggec dindingac anu goa ngadeyunuma kecgec, yeneac negemma Yesungo yoac mong heima yofi deec,
42018010	“Ngic yohockang, farisaio mong nga takesimeme mong, yereng numuecdeac Anutuac womonnu enoc.
42018011	Emma farisaiongo yacma namma yengenaac negemma yofi dema numuec, ‘Anutu ni ngic goa, godzungic nga faka mangana me kaisero angandae, yeni isoc kpac. Nga takesimeme ngic edimoc, ni ifingoc ye isoc kpac, imocac ubangerec edeguduae.
42018012	Amma sondasoc uameme yohockang yakasege kecanduae nga wiac sasawa mekecduae, imoc 10nunac mocgu genganduae.’
42018013	Anu takesimeme ngic yeng farisaioac hereau namma kpehengaima kurumennu fiu enudeac negengebirima ine ngonducnema mokuhau kpema yofisac dema numuec, ‘Anutu, ni kopocsicmeme, ge neac ubaga manganeu.’
42018014	Nga takesimemengo ifi deecac Anutuac kicfu ngic dindingac amma amau kenec, imoc edengunuduae. Nga farisaio ye ine kpac. Ngic mong ye yengena sebi meende, yeni ye memagecde nga mong ye yengena sebi memaemeude, ye meenggecde.”
42018015	Ngicngac goa yeni Yesungo sabacfocngina mariango kpesereyunuudeac yearu meyunu hagec. Hagec medac yeneng yenemma ine kpetariyemmegec.
42018016	Kpetariyemmegec Yesungo ine kpacyunuma deec, “Nambaracbisic yeni nearu naric hagec, ngeni kpae mi heiyemmegec. Anutuac eucerereng imoc nambaracbisic yofia yeneac.
42018017	Foracngoc, mong ye nambarac kapia angkecdae, ifi isoc mi angkecde, ye Anutuac eucererennu naric mi enude, imoc edengunuduae.”
42018018	Ngicenara mongngo Yesu kpesimiec, “Kpoukpou gombunga, dafi amba kekecseri imoc neac ambesande?”
42018019	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Ge nocac gombunga denendang? Anutu mocgungo gombunga kecde.
42018020	Ge dedeseriyoac yomoc bic negennec, ‘Ge kaisero mi ambesena, ngicngac mi yunuhomebesena, hamangec mi mebesena, enacfu faifai mi ambesena nga nonggomanghocga seseheyurubesena.’ ” (Mke 20:12-16; Dser 5:16-20)
42018021	Ifi deu ngicngo merenec, “Ge denec, imoc sasawa sebigborinaungoc angereai.”
42018022	Ifi deu Yesungo imoc negemma edeec, “Ge wiac monggac engngoc kpedadanggenec, imoc yofi ambesena. Finacga sasawa fegende, imoc suena hiedzo kirecgeu imocngo ngicngac makpekpea medereyemmebesena. Ifi anna kurumenggac dzofinac fingecgenu hama modacnubesena.”
42018023	Ifi deu ngic ye yoac imoc negemma ubaebic kuneng meec, nocac ye dzofinactoa homac femiec.
42018024	Yesungo ngic henu ubaebic meu yofi deec, “Ngic dzofinactoagoc yeneng Anutuac eucerereng manau enggecdeac uatoa yombong ande.
42018025	Kamelengo bungic singau engeng imoc ua efea nga ngic dzofinactoagocngo Anutuac eucererennu engeng, imocngo ine uatoayagoc.”
42018026	Ifi deu ngicngac yeneng yoac imoc negemma kpesimigec, “Ifi anu merang naric komoc kpeude?”
42018027	Ifi degec Yesungo deec, “Ngic ngeni faka goa megecdeac obohodae, imoc Anutungo naric meude.”
42018028	Ifi deu Petorongo deec, “Negennec, neni ama nga iwainina wama ge modacguma kecdimbe.”
42018029	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ni foracngoc edengunuduae, ngic mong ye Anutuac eucererenggac amma amea me enema me nambaracfora nga dacmunafora amma nonggomama wayunuma kecde, yeac yofi fingerude, ye warac iwaiagoc kefec, imoc ferahema kekec nasoyau iwaia monggoc homac meficgeude. Amma wisickeu bangec siriha mong haude, imohai kekecseri ifingoc meficgebesande.”
42018031	Anu Yesungo medacfora 12 ngadeau meyunuma yofi edeyunuec, “Negendae, nenang Yerusalennu ennide. Enni imohai profete yeneng warac Ngicac Medacac yoac kibinginau ohogecmoc, imocac fora fingecdarude.
42018032	Nga ngic yeni ye mema faigec bangec monnunac ngic Anutu mi negemmidae, yeneac mariu enu yeneng detenic nga meenti memati ammima desofoc ammigecde.
42018033	Amma dzikacngo ye kpekecma kpehomegecde. Nga ye uameme harebec ammanu ine monggoc gborima yarude.”
42018034	Ifi deu medac yeneng yoac imoc negemma mong mi negengireckegec. Yoac imocac hania imoc yenearu sufu sufuya feu Yesungo yoac deec, imoc mong mi negengireckegec.
42018035	Yesungo Yeriko taong mewegenemanu ngic kicpisic mongngo sing tegiau tacma iwaiac derecgekefec.
42018036	Amma negenu ngicngac habutoango ferahema kengha anggec kpesiec, “Imoc dafi andae?”
42018037	Kpesiu edegec, “Yesu Nadzaretenac, yeng ferecgema kende.”
42018038	Ifi degec yeng kunengngoc kpacma deec, “Yesu Dawidiac bangec, neacnec ubaga manganeu.”
42018039	Kparu ngicngac kiwau kenggec, yeneng kpetarimima waickema tarudeac edegec yeng ine monggoc arohoec, “Dawidiac bangec, neacnec ubaga manganeu.”
42018040	Kparu Yesungo namma kicpisic yearu mekenggecdeac edeyunuu yeni wegenac mekenggec Yesungo yofi kpesimiec,
42018041	“Ni noc wiac anggembadeac negennec?” deu merenec, “Kebu, kicfifi ambadeac negenduae.”
42018042	Ifi deu Yesungo edeec, “Negen negensinggango mengeregudeac, ge monggoc kicfifi anna.”
42018043	ifi deu ngic ye imohaingoc kicfifi amma Yesu modacma Anutu dengereu ngicngac sasawa yeneng imoc hemma Anutu dengeregec.
42019001	Yesungo Yeriko ferecge kemmanu
42019002	takesimeme ngic yeneac enara mong dzofinactoayagoc, kpara Sakaio, ye ihai kefec.
42019003	Yeng Yesu ye ngic dafia dema hembesonga negenec. Amma ye ngic wegenac anu ngicngac homac yeneac botucfu nanecac Yesu naric mi henec.
42019004	Ifi anu Yesungo sing kenudeac kenec, ye ngicngac yeneac botucfunac ihai waraima nedzi kemma fig ic mong nanec, imocac witiau emma kic fima tarec.
42019005	Taru, Yesungo imohai kensikema kiwa fiu enu edeec, “Sakaio, ni yaguc amagau hama tacbade, ifi negenduaeac ge bic mana.”
42019006	Ifi deu Sakaiongo icfunac bicbic mama Yesu ubangerecgoc hoanggeu ameau kenoc.
42019007	Kenec ngicngac sasawa yeneng imoc hemma negenggec naric mi anu degec, “Yesungo manganamemengic yeac amau nocac kendac?”
42019008	Ifi degec Sakaiongo ine ihai namma Kebuac deec, “Kebu negenna, finacna mekecduae, imocac noboha ngicngac makpekpea yemmebade nga goa ikoc ayemmema wiac meai, yeneac turung atac fo meemma monggoc yemmebade.”
42019009	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Anutungo yaguc ama mana yomocac mingina ebicfunac mesiyunuu komoc kpegecde. Ngic yomoc ye ifingoc Abrahanggac kisicfunac.
42019010	Imoc yofiac, Ngicac Medac ye ngicngac sufu sufuya hofocyunuude nga kpedzucyunuude amma ebicfunac meyunuudeac maec.”
42019011	Ye ifi dema kemma Yerusaleng taong mewegeneec, imocac yeneng yofi negenggec, “Anutuac eucerereng imoc kicninau yombong bic fingectegerude.” Ifi negenggecac amma Yesungo yoac mong heima torokpema yofi edeyunuec,
42019012	“Ngic mongngo ngickunenggac arennunac fingec fingera, yeng yofi negenec, ‘Ni bangec hereau kemba yeneng ngictau kpac nenggec dzigenema bangec yomocac ngictau ambade.’
42019013	Nga ye kembesonga dema wanacngicfora 10 kpacyunuma dzo mong kpara mina mocgu tembuc tembuc yemmema deec, ‘Ni kembareng ngeni dzo yomocngo emekeng emeha amma kpetea meyadibisia.’
42019014	Nga ngic yeac ama mocgufora, yeneng ine ye ubango ukugec. Ifi anu ye kenu ngic goa yofi dema edeyunuma sueyunugec kenggec, ‘Yeng neneac ngictau kefudeac songo mi negendimbe.’
42019015	Nga ye ihai kefu yeneng ngictau kpac migec kecma monggoc dzigenema bangehau haec. Hama wanacngicfora dzo yemmeec, imoc dafi meyadigec, imoc negenudeac kpacyunuec.
42019016	Kpacyunuu wanacngic warac warac yeng hama deec, ‘Kebu, ni dzo nennec, imoc meyadima dzo 10 monggoc meficgeai.’
42019017	Ifi deu ngictaungo yofi deec, ‘Ge wanacngic gombunga amma ua gombunga medang. Ge yoac dedena modackecma wiac kapia gombunga garenggedanggac taong 10 garengyununadeac uayoac nga kuc genduae.’
42019018	Nga wanacngic ngade, yeng hama deec, ‘Kebu, dzo nennec, imocngo dzo 5acsoc monggoc meyadiec.’
42019019	Ifi deu ngictaungo edeec, ‘Ge taong 5 imocac gareng faiguduae.’
42019020	Anu uangic mongngo hama deec, ‘Kebu, dzoga yomoc kporuc manau sufuba tarec, imoc henna.
42019021	Ge ngic gerea amma kpekpeturang uaac hiedzo mi faima sifu meannec. Nga uau heihomec mi amma sifu foraya kpedziannec, imocac geac kengecnuu ifi anai.’
42019022	Ifi deu ngictaungo deec, ‘Ge wanacngic mangac manganea, yoacga meremba imocngo giude. Ni ngic gerea amma kpekpeturang uaac hiedzo mi faima sifu meanduae. Nga uau heihomec mi amma sifu foraya kpedzianduae, imoc bic negennec.
42019023	Nga ge nocac dzona yomoc dzo tohonu mi fainec? Ifi ambannu dzigenema dzona imoc nobohagoc mebai.’
42019024	Ifi dema ngicngac goa ihai nanggec, yeneac deec, ‘Ngeni dzo imoc wangecma wanacngic minadzoya 10 femide, ye migec.’
42019025	Ifi deu yeneng degec, ‘Kebu, ye dzoya 10 bic fede.’
42019026	Ifi degec yofi merengyemmeec, ‘Ngic mong wiac goa femide, ye wiac monggoc migecde nga mong ye wiac mong mi femide, yearu wiac fedemoc, imoc ifingoc wangecgecde, imoc edengunuduae.
42019027	Anu ngabafocna yomoc yeni neng ngictaungina kecma garengyunubadeac wagec, ngeni ngic imoc yei meyunu hama kicnau yunuhomegec.’ ”
42019028	Yesungo yoac ifi deu wisickeu ye waraima Yerusalennu enec.
42019029	Emma tiki kpara Oliwa, imocac wegenac hama Betefage nga Betania amabangec mewegenema medac yohockang, yofi dema sueyuruec.
42019030	“Ngeri dindingac kemma amabangec sing enarau tacde, imohai enec donggi medaha mong ngicngo witiau mi tatara, imoc witickegec nande. Nanu ngeri imoc meficgema witic yungecma mema haec.
42019031	‘Ngeri nocac donggi yungecdape?’ Ifi kpesigecdeu ngeri yofi debesera, ‘Kebungo imocgoc ua meudeac dede.’ ”
42019032	Yesungo ifi dema ngic sueyuruu kemma yeng deec, imoc sasawa meficgedaroc.
42019033	Meficgema donggi medaha yungerec minginango deec, “Ngeri nocac donggi medaha yungecdape?”
42019034	Ifi deu yereng deoc, “Kebungo imocgoc ua meudeac dede.”
42019035	Ifi dema yeri donggi medaha imoc Yesuaru mema kenoc. Amma Yesungo emma tarudeac yeri ngakpingira herea hesima donggi medahaac witiau kpesorohoma Yesu enudeac meficgeoc.
42019036	Meficgeec ye emma tacma kenec, imohai ngicngac yeneng ngakpiherecngina hesima sinnu tiamegec.
42019037	Nga Yerusaleng wegenac Oliwatikiac sing keme nande, imohai yeac arengfora habu kuneng yeneng kucfaka hengkecgecac amma ubangerec negemma udumengyadango Anutu dengerema yofi degec,
42019038	“Ngictau Kebuac kpacfu hade, ye kenehagoc. Kurumennu ruae feu sawau wi dedengerec febeso.” (Myeg 118:26)
42019039	Ifi kpacma dengeregec farisaio goa habu yeneac botucfu nanggec, yeneng Yesuac degec, “Kpoukpou, ge arengfocga dena waickebisia.”
42019040	Ifi degec Yesungo merengyemmeec, “Yeni waickegecdeu hoc yeneng arohogecde, imoc edengunuduae.”
42019041	Yesungo Yerusaleng mewegenema taong imoc hemma kiacma
42019042	yofi deec, “Geng yofinenggac ruaegoc kecnadeac sing hentegecna ngereebac. Nga sing imoc ine yaguc sufu sufu fema kicgau mi fingectegecde.
42019043	Geac nasoga haude, imohai ngabafocga yeneng noboc noboc orongguma bangec usuma heiemma igocgugecde.
42019044	Igocguma yeneng memanganeguma nambaracfocga geac botucfu kecdae, yeni yunuhomedacgec bangecfu fegecde. Amma geac manau hoc mong wagec mongngo monggac witiu mi tarude, nocac Kebugango hadac, ge imoc mi hentegecdang.”
42019045	Amma Yesungo Anutuac womonggac oda manau emma ngicngac yeneng wiac emekeng emeha amma nanggec, yeni kporacyunuma
42019046	yofi edeyunuec, “Yoac oho ohoya yofi fede, ‘Ni womonna yomocngo nunumuac ama ambeso.’ (Yes 56:7) Nga ngeneng ine imoc merenggec hamangecmeme yeneac sufu sufuama ande.” (Yer 7:11)
42019047	Anu Yesungo wenacsoc womonnu kpoukpou ua meu womonggareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic amma habu yeneac enarafocngina yeneng ye kpegecdeac nasoyombonga hofocma kecgec.
42019048	Nga ngicngac yeni yeac yoac negengyombonggema kecgec nga yoara mong wagecdeac mi negenggec. Imocac amma ngaba yeneng ye meickegecdeac sing mong mi meficgegec.
42020001	Yesungo naso monnu Anutuac womonnu ngicngac edekpou ayemmema siduc gombung edeyunuu womonggareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic amma yudangic enarafocngina yeni yenahafoc hama kicnginau namma
42020002	kpesimigec, “Ge noc kucfu ua yomoc menec nga merang uayoac imoc genec? Imoc edenununa.”
42020003	Ifi degec yeng yofi merengyemmeec, “Ni ifingoc kpesingemmeba wiac mong edenugec,
42020004	Yohanengo dokunadzic ua mekefec, imoc kurumennunac me ngicfunac?”
42020005	Ifi deu yeni yenaocngoc denegeng amma degec, “ ‘Imoc kurumennunac.’ Ifi denideu yeng yofi kpesinemmeude, ‘Anu ngeni nocac ye mi negensinggegec?’
42020006	Amma ‘ngicfunac’ ifi denideu ngicngac sasawa yeneng hocngo neneregecde nocac yeni Yohane ye profete, imoc ubaherenginango negensidae.”
42020007	Ifi dema meremmigec, “Dahacnac haec, imoc mi negendimbe.”
42020008	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merenec, “Ifi degec, ni merang uayoac nenu ua mekecduae, imoc ifingoc mi edengunubade.”
42020009	Ifi dema Yesungo yoac mong heima ngicngac yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic mongngo waing uayau waing homerec. Homeru wisickeu waing ua garenggegecdeac ngic meficyunuma yenigoc uayoac dedzege anggec nga yengena ine naso herea bangec monnu kefudeac kenec.
42020010	Kemma kecmanu fora kpememe naso hau wanacngiha mong sueu waing uaac gareng yenearu kenu yeneng waing fora imohacnac yeac noboha migecdeac kenec. Kenu waing uaac gareng yeneng wanacngic imoc dzoboya kpema entegeng suegec kenec.
42020011	Kenu minginango ifi hemma ngic mong sueec. Sueu kenu waing uaac gareng yeneng ye ifingoc kpema faka mangana yombong ammima entegeng suegec kenec.
42020012	Kenu wanacngiha atac harebec sueu kenu yeneng ye ifingoc kpegec sawa mau kporacgec kenec.
42020013	Ifi anu ua minginango yofi deec, ‘Dafi ambade? Ni medacyombonna songo negemmianduaemoc, ye sueba kenu ye sifu eweheimigecde.’
42020014	Dema medacyombonga sueu waing uaac gareng yeneng ye hemma yenaocngoc denegeng amma degec, ‘Yeng kecma ua yomoc tiu enude. Nenang ye kpehomeni yeac bangec nga maridzoming imoc nenang anude.’
42020015	Ifi dema medac imoc kporacgec oda ngadeau kemeu kpehomegec.” Ifi dema Yesungo kpesiyemmeec, “Ua mingina imocngo waing uaac gareng yeni dafi ayemmeude?
42020016	Yeng hama waing uaac gareng yunuhomema waing ua imoc uagareng goa yeneac mariu faiude.” Ifi deu yeneng imoc negemma yofi degec, “Ifi naric mi fingecbeso.”
42020017	Ifi degec Yesungo yenemma yofi deec, “Yoac yofi oho ohoya nande, imoc titiha negensibisia, ‘Amameme ngic yeneng hoc mong mangana dema ukugec. Nga hoc imocngo amaac hoc wotung amma seria nanude nga nambesande.’ (Myeg 118:22)
42020018	Ngicngac sasawa hoc imocac witiau mayunude, yeni sebingina tegerude. Nga hoc imocngo yeneac witiu makpema hedzameyunuu kapuc kpegecde.”
42020019	Mitiac negen negengngic nga womonggareng enara yeni imohaingoc ye mebeso anggec. Yesungo yeneac yoac heima deec, imoc bic negenggec amma ngicngac yeneac kengecyunuu ine wagec.
42020020	Anu yeni Yesu hembima ngicfocngina sueyunugec, yeneng yoara negendimbe siric yearu kenggec. Kemma noc yoac dafi deu negemma ine provinsiac desi desingic yeac mariu faigecdeac negenggec.
42020021	Nga ngic imoc yeneng Yesuac degec, “Kpoukpou, ge yoac denec nga wiac kpounemmenec, imoc fora sasawa. Amma ge Anutuac sing ngicngac edekpou ayemmema yoac monde monde mi angkecnec, geac ifi negendimbe.
42020022	Imocac edenununa, neni takesi ngictau Sisa naric minide me kpac?”
42020023	Ifi degec Yesungo ikocngina hentegecma yofi edeyunuec,
42020024	“Ngeni dzo mong edzacnugec hemba. Onga nga kibi yoc, imoc meracac?” deu degec, “Imoc Sisaac.”
42020025	Ifi degec Yesungo deec, “Imocac ngeni Sisaac wiac, imoc Sisa mibisia nga Anutuac wiac, imoc Anutu mibisia.”
42020026	Ifi deu yeni ngicngac yeneac kicfu enacfu faifai ammima meme, imoc obohogec. Amma yoacngina turunga merenec, imocac kerectegec amma yoac mong mi degec.
42020027	Anu Sadukaio yeneng homecfunac yacyac mong mi fede, ifi deandae. Amma yenearunac goa Yesuaru hama kpesimigec,
42020028	“Kpoukpou, Mosengo dedeseriyoac yofi ohonemmeec, ‘Ngic mong ye ngac mema gboriha kpac kecma homeu ngic imocac muneango daraac hotsec mema gboric kpeficgema daraac kpac miacma kecbeso.’ (Dser 25:5-10)
42020029	Naso monnu dacmunac seweng kecgec nga waracdacnginango ngac mema gboriha kpac kecma homeec.
42020030	Homeu muneango daraac hotsec mema
42020031	eng kecma homeec. Anu munangirango hotsec imoc mema ifingoc sabaha kpac kecma homeu dacmuna seweng yeni ngac imocngoc mema gboricfocngina kpac kecma homedacgec
42020032	amma ngac ye wisickeu ifingoc homeec.
42020033	Amma yeng ngic seweng yeneac enengngina amma kecma yacyac nasou ye dacmunac seweng yenearunac meracac enema ambesande?”
42020034	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Bangec yomocac kekec nasoac medacfora yeneng ngac meandae nga manggac yeneng yofi deandae, ‘Ni naroanna ngic mibade.’
42020035	Nga ngicngac homecfunac gborima yacyac nga kekeseri megecdeacsoc andae, yeni ihai eweeneng mi anggecde.
42020036	Yeni homecfunac yacyac, imocac kisic anggecde. Amma yeni Anutuac nambaracfora kecma angero isoc anggecdeac yeni monggoc naric mi homegecde.
42020037	Homecfunac yacyac fede, imoc Mosengo ifingoc ohoma dekperagiec. Imoc yofi, icfu gerec dzeu ye hemmanu Kebuac dede yoacfu yofi fingerec, ‘Ni Abrahang nga Isaka amma Yakobo yeneac Anutu.’ (Mke 3:6)
42020038	Yeac hehennu yeni sasawango kekecnginagoc. Ye gbori kecdimbe, neneac Anutu, homemea yeneac Anutu kpahac.”
42020039	Ifi deu mitiac negen negengngic goa yeneng yofi degec, “Kpoukpou, ge yoac gombunga yombong denec.”
42020040	Anu imocac ngadeau yeni kengecyunuu mongngo kpesi kpesi monggoc mi kpesimigec.
42020041	Ifi anu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngeni yoac yofi negembisia, yoac mong yofi fede, ‘Messia ye Dawidiac arennunac fingerude.’
42020042	Nga Dawidi ye yengenaoc Mitiyegecfu yofi deec fede, ‘ Kebungo neac Kebuna yofi edeec, “Ge foinaugeng tacmana
42020043	ngabafocga hanigaac bageau faiyunuba yeni hanigaac tatac ambesandae.” ’ (Myeg 110:1)
42020044	Imocac Dawidi ye ‘Neac Kebu’ kparecngo dafiu yeac arennunac ande?”
42020045	Yesungo ngicngac sasawa yeneac kicfu medacfora yofi edeyunuec,
42020046	“Ngeni mitiac negen negengngic yeneac henghomema kecbisia. Yeni ngakpi herec gombunga faima amayuguc anggecdeac songo negengandae nga suenecfu kemma ngicngac yeneng yeneac wenacngerec deyemmegecdeac songongina kuneng fede. Amma yeni kpekpeturang amau nga yakatoa nasou warac warac tatacfu tacbesonga songongina angkecde.
42020047	Amma yeni ngachotsec ewefocngina homemea yeneac amangina wangecyunuandae. Amma yeneac negengngeree fingerudeac nunumu hereangoc numuandae. Yeni ikocfaka ifia angandaeac turunga ebiriangoc megecde.”
42021001	Anu Yesungo kic fima henu ngicngac dzofinacgoc yeni sesengina Anutuac womonggac sesekatapau faigec kemeu
42021002	ngachotsec makpekpea mongngo ewea homemea hocdzo sacsac yohockang, ifisac faiu kemeu hemma
42021003	yofi deec, “Foracngoc, ngachotsec yomoc ye hiedzoya kpac kecma dzo faima ngic sasawa sese faidau, imoc feracyunuma faidarec, imoc edengunuduae.
42021004	Imoc yofiac, yeni finactoangina wakema fede, imohacnac tosea mema sesengina faidau. Ngac ye ine noc wiac femidac imocnoc hafoangoc faidacma entegeng kecde.”
42021005	Anu ngic goa yeneng Anutuac womong hoc kibia gombungango memea amma sese nga ubangerec hania haniango Anutu mikecgec, imocngo womong kibiagoc anudeac memengere anggec, imoc hemma siduc degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec,
42021006	“Ama yomoc hensongo homac andae, imoc naso herea mi tarude. Naso mong haude, imohai ngic yeneng imoc sasawa hembarackegecde. Hembarackegec hoc mongngo monggac witiau wagec mi tacbesande.”
42021007	Ifi deu yeneng kpesimigec, “Kpoukpou, ge faka denec, imoc noc nasoac fingerude nga naso imohai noc soi fingeru hemma naso wegenede negembesandimbe, imoc edenununa.”
42021008	Ifi degec Yesungo deec, “Ngic yeneng ikocfu wangecngunubauac ngeni henghomema kecbisia. Ngic homac yeneng hama neac kpac kpacma yofi degecde, ‘Ni Messia.’ nga ‘Naso bic hadac.’ ifi degec ngeni mi modacyunubisia, kpac.
42021009	Nga ewekpekpetoa amma ubakpekpe udumengtoagoc fingeru ngeni imoc negemma kengec mi ambisia. Wiac ifia hanahema fingecbeso nga naso ine imohaingoc yombong mi kpac ambesande.”
42021010	Amma monggoc torokpema yofi deec, “Bangec goa yeneng ogofocngina yenigoc ewekpekpe anggecde nga ngictau monggac arengngo ngictau monggac areng yenigoc ngaba angemegecde.
42021011	Usoctoa meude nga bodinaso nga hafei kuneng bangec monnu nga monnu ifiangoc fingeckenude. Fingeckenu bangecfu nga sawau soi hania hania fingeru hembesandae.”
42021012	“Faka ifia mi fingecmanungoc yeni kpacnaac amma ngeni ngunukporac angemmema mengunuma kpekpeturanggac amaareng yeneac mariu faingunugecde. Nga yeneng witicamau faingunugec ngeni ngictau nga gawana yenearu mengunuma kenggecde.
42021013	Nga naso imohainoc neac dedekperagi yoac edeyunugecdeac sing fingecngemmebesande.
42021014	Ni negen negentegec ngemmema yoac enacnginau faibade. Ifi amba ngabafocngina yeneac botucfunac mongngo yoac ngemmebade, imoc naric mi memaude me kpeude. Imocac amma ngeni yeneac kicfu noc yoac deni dema mi arenggekecbisia.
42021016	Kecma nonggomang nga dacmunafocngina amma sactoso nga ogofocngina yeneng kererengunuma ngaba yeneac mariu faingunugec ngenearunac goa yunuhomegecde.
42021017	Neac kpacnaac amma ngicngac sasawango ubango ukungunugecde.
42021018	Nga ngeneac orucnginaunac orucdzongina mongngo ine naric mi sufuude.
42021019	Ngeni seriangoc namma kekecngina onggonggebesandae.
42021020	Wasaingic habu yeneng hama Yerusaleng oronggegecde, naso imohai ngeni yofi bic negenggecde, taong manganeudeac naso bic hade.
42021021	Imohai ngicngac Yudaia bangecfu kecdae, yeni worama tikiu embisia nga Yerusaleng taong manau kecdae, yeni worama ngadeau kemebisia amma ngadeau kecdae, yeneng Yerusaleng manau mi embisia.
42021022	Naso imoc turung kpoukpou naso anude. Imohai yoac sasawa oho ohoya fede, imocac fora fingecbesande.
42021023	Naso imohai ngac heregoc kecdae nga nenggac sabac namuu meyunukecdae, yeni ebicnginagoc anggecde. Bangec yomohai ebic kuneng fingerude nga bangecac ngicngac witinginau ngaba fingerude.
42021024	Nga ngaba yeneng dzikacac beangngo ngic noboha yunuhomema noboha witicyunuma bangeha bangeha meyunuma kemma faiyunugecde. Amma bangeha bangeha ngicngacareng Anutu mi negemmidae, yeneng hama Yerusaleng haninginango tima kecmagec nasongina dedea, imoc wisickeu kenggecde.
42021025	Naso imohai wenac nga afo amma asomeng yenearu soi fingecbesande. Nga bangeha bangeha ngicngac yeni ubaebic mema kondunnu namma kondung tembonggac udumeng negemma negengyohoc amma dafi ambesonga obohogecde.
42021026	Ebic imocngo bangecfu fingerudeac ngicngac yeni imoc negemma negengyohoc nga kengec amma homecgboric anggecde. Sawau kuc sasawa yeni kockpac anggecde.
42021027	Anu naso imohai yeni Ngicac Medac henggec ye kuctoayagoc nga kibikperagitoayagocngo hoeng witiau haude.
42021028	Faka imoc fingecbeso ammanu ngeni kpehengaima yacma orucngina miacma nambisia. Naso imohai ebicfunac mesingunugec enggecdeac naso wegenebesande.”
42021029	Anu Yesungo yoac mong heima yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni fig ic nga ic sasawa hemma negembisia.
42021030	Ic yeni maringina besaiudeu wenac naso wegenede, imoc ngenaoc bic negenggecde.
42021031	Ngeni wiac sasawa deduae, imoc fingeru hemma ifingoc yofi negembisia, Anutuac eucerereng bic mewegenengunude.
42021032	Foracngoc, ngicngacareng yomoc, yeni mi homemagec wiac yomoc fingecdarude, imoc edengunuduae.
42021033	Bangec nga kurumeng, yeri kpac anecde nga neac yoac imoc naric mi kpac ambesande.
42021034	Ubasufu nga dokunene amma bangecac negengyohoc imocngo meebiringunubauac ngeni garengngina meemebisia. Wenac imoc utac fingecngemmebacac.
42021035	Wenac imohai subango yang kpeande, ifi isoc bangectoa bangec imohai hama ngicngac sasawa yenearu fingecdarude.
42021036	Imocac ngeni nasosoc garengemema kecma nunumu ua mekecbisia. Mekecma wiac sasawa yomoc fingecbeso ande, imohacnac woragecdeac kuc mema Ngicac Medac, yeac kicfu serima nambesandae.”
42021037	Yesungo naso imohai wenacsoc Anutuac womonnu kpoukpou ua meec. Mema kecmanu ama marai anu tiki mong kpara Oliwa, imohai kenu toforeu takefec.
42021038	Wereckenu ngicngac sasawa yeneng Anutuac womonnu yeac yoac monggoc negenggecdeac kengkecgec.
42022001	Hombang mong, ic sogong yisya kpac nene, kpara mong makekeng deandae, imoc wegeneec.
42022002	Wegeneu womonggareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic yeni Yesu homecfu faigecdeac sing mong meficgegecdeac negensigec. Amma yeni obohogec nocac yeni ngicngac yeneac kengecyunuec.
42022003	Yuda kpara mong Karioto ye medacfora 12 yenearunac mong. Nga Satangngo yeac ubahereau kemeu
42022004	yeng kemma womonggareng enara nga womonggac keracnatang garengfocngina, yenigoc tacma Yesu sing dafiu mema yeneac mariu faiudeac yoac denegeng anggec.
42022005	Nga yeni ubangerec negemma dzo kpetea mong dema migecdeac yoac dedzege anggec.
42022006	Yudango yenigoc uba mocgu amma sing dafiu meficgema habu yegoc mi kecmagec Yesu sufu sufuu yeneac mariu faiudeac kicfifi kefec.
42022007	Kecma ic sogong yisya kpac nene, imocac hombannu ramamedaha kpeandae, uameme imoc hau
42022008	Yesungo Petoro nga Yohane yofi dema sueyuruec, “Nenang makekenggac ramamedaha nenideac ngeri kemma wiac mengereec.”
42022009	Ifi deu kpesimioc, “Dahai mengerededeac negensinec?”
42022010	Deec merengyecmema yofi deec, “Ngeri kemma taonnu enecde, imohai ngic mong dokuenanga tofohoma hau ngeri yegoc ewacma modacma kemma ye ama monnu enu ngeri yegoc emma
42022011	ama mingina yofi edebesera, ‘Kpoukpoungo yofi kpesigende, amamana damohai medacfocnagoc makekenggac ramamedaha nenide?’
42022012	Ifi deec yeng ama witiau amamana mong kuneng edzacnguruude. Nga ihai wiac bic faifaia tacdacde, ngeri imohai iwai mengerebesera.”
42022013	Ifi deu yeri kemma Yesungo edeyuruec, imocac sirihau wiac meficgema makekenggac ramamedaha ohomengere anoc.
42022014	Anu yakanene naso hau Yesungo medacfora yenigoc yaka nebeso tacma
42022015	yofi edeyunuec, “Ni makekenggac ramamedaha yomoc ngenigoc nebesonga homac yombong anende. Amma imoc nemaguc kpendzennu embade.
42022016	Imoc yofiac, ni yaka yomoc monggoc mi nene kecbarengoc Anutuac eucererennu foraya fingecbesande.”
42022017	Ifi dema kpakenec mong mema Anutu dengerema yofi deec, “Ngeni yomoc mema ngenaoc emema negec.
42022018	Ni waing gbomeaac dokuya monggoc mi nene kecbarengoc Anutuac eucerereng haude.”
42022019	Ifi dema ic sogong mong mema Anutu dangge edema mendzicma yemmema yofi deec, “Yomoc fusina, imoc ngeneac amma faifaia. Ngeni neac negensima imoc negec.”
42022020	Yaka negec wisickeu ye kpakenec ifingoc mema deec, “Kpakenec yomoc sacnaac dzadzahac gboria, imoc ngeneac amma kpetic kpetinggea.
42022021	Ngicac Medac ye Anutungo sing demiecfu kenudenoc nga ngic docfu fainuude, ye maria neac marinagoc yakatebou tacdape, ngic imoc ye ine sowehagoc.”
42022023	Ifi deu medacfora yeni merang yeneac botucfunac faka imoc anude, ifi dema yenaocngoc kpesiemegec.
42022024	Anu medac yeni yenang botucfunac merang engena kecde, imocac yoacngina engemmama anu
42022025	Yesungo edeyunuec, “Bangec monnunac ngicngac Anutu mi negensinggeandae, yeni ngictaufocnginango ngicngac garengyunuma enac tofoc tofohofocngina meyunuandae. Ifi meyunuma ine yofi deandae, ‘Neni memeficngina kecdimbe.’ ”
42022026	Ngeneng ine ifi mi ambisia. Mong ye engena ande, ye ngadea ambeso nga enarangina kecde, yeng tosofora yeneac kingangkpekpengina siricfu kecbeso.
42022027	Imocac yofi kpesiduae, ngic merang engena ande? Ngic yaka eng tacma neude me yakau kingangkpekpe ua mema kecde? Yaka eng tacma neude, ngeni yeac negenggecde. Nga neng ine sifu ngeneac botucfu kingangkpekpe siricfu kecduae.
42022028	Amma ni faitobang manau kecbareng ngeni mi wanuma nigoc kecgec.
42022029	Mannango eucererenggac kuc neac mariu faiec, ifi isocngoc neng eucererenggac kuc ngeneac mariu faibade.
42022030	Kecma ngeni eucererennau yaka nga doku nema tacgecde. Amma ngeni ifingoc ngictautatac mema Israe kisic 12 yeneac fakangina isinggema desibesandae.
42022031	“Simong, Simong, negenna, Satang ye ngic yeneng wit seuha kpegec maudeac kpemindzaheandae, ifi isoc gombungaunac merengngunuu manganegecdeac bic arenggema derecgenendac.
42022032	Nga Simong ge ine negen negensingga ukuna mi maudeac, neng geac amma nunumu ua bic medua. Amma ubaga meremma nearu monggoc dzigenema dacmunafocga meseriyunubesena.”
42022033	Ifi deu Petorongo merenec, “Kebu, ni gegoc witicamau kembade amma homebadeac bic efaidua.”
42022034	Ifi deu Yesungo edeec, “Petoro, ni edeguba yaguc tofocnac yomohaingoc kokorec mi arohomanu geng neac sebiheina atac harebec anude.”
42022035	Anu Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ni warac suengunuba kenggec, imohai dzobirang me hie me hanitabe mi mekecgec ngeni wiac monggac kpedadanggegec me?” Ifi deu yeneng degec, “Kpac.”
42022036	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi deec, “Nga yaguc ine yofi deduae, Ngic mong ye dzobirangagoc me hieagoc kecde, yeng imoc mebeso. Amma wasaibeanga kpac kecde, ye ngakpitoaya sueu hiedzo kirecgeu imocngo wasaibeang bummebeso.
42022037	Mitikibiu yoac oho ohoya fede, imocngo nearu fora fingecbeso, imoc edengunuduae. Yofi, ‘Yeni yeac godzungic degec.’ (Yes 53:12) Neac negemma yoac degec fede, imoc yaguc fora fingecdarude.”
42022038	Ifi deu medac yeneng degec, “Kebu henna, neni wasaibeang yohockang mekecdimbe.” degec Yesungo deec, “Imoc soha.”
42022039	Dema Yesungo faka angkefec isoc amma taong wama Oliwatikiu kenu medacfora modacma kenggec.
42022040	Kensikema yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni faitobannu embauac numugec.”
42022041	Ifi dema medacfora wayunuma kapianec kpesima kemma fafoc heima
42022042	yofi dema numuec, “Manggac, ge negenna naric anu kpakenec yomoc nearunac meickena. Amma neac songo mi fingecbeso, kpac. Geac songo nga negen negeng imocngo seribeso.”
42022043	Ifi numumanu angero mongngo kurumennunac fingecmima mama meseriu
42022044	Yesungo ine negengebirima seriangoc numuu sengerangango sac isoc amma bangecfu maec.
42022045	Numuu wisickeu yacma medacfora yenearu dzigene kemma yenenu yeni ubahodung negemma gau fegec
42022046	yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni nocac gau fedae? Ngeni faitobannu embauac yacma numugec.”
42022047	Yesungo yoac denammanungoc habutoa mong yearu hagec. Hama medac 12 yenearunac mong kpara Yuda, yeng waraiyemmema Yesu muduckeudeac yearu mewegeneu
42022048	Yesungo deec, “Yuda, ge Ngicac Medac muduckema doc menec, ec.”
42022049	Ifi deu ngic Yesu oronggema nanggec, yeneng faka mangana imoc fingecbesonga anu hemma kpesima degec, “Kebu, neni wasaibeango yununide me?”
42022050	Nga yenearunac mongngo womonggarengtoa yeac wanacngic kpema kedzaha foiugeng herecgeec.
42022051	Herecgeu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngeni faka imoc wagec.” Ifi dema wanacngicac kedzaha kpeserema mengereec.
42022052	Anu ngic Yesu mebesonga hagec, imoc womonggareng enara nga womonggac keracnatang enaramemengina amma yudangic enarafocngina yeneac yofi deec, “Ngeni godzungic meandae, ifi isoc wasaibeang nga gbarucnginagoc hadae.
42022053	Ni Anutuac womonnu wenacsoc ngenigoc kecbareng ngeni sifu imohai mi menugec. Nga yaguc ine ngeneac naso anu kundunggac kucngo garenggac tatac mekecde.”
42022054	Ifi anu yeni Yesu mema womonggarengtoaac amau mekenggec Petoro ye ngadenginau hereaungoc modacyunuma kenec.
42022055	Kenu ngic goa yeni amaac oda manau sobeng dzongiau gerec figec dzeu dzeunegemma tacgec Petorongo yeneac botucfu mataru
42022056	wanac naroang mongngo Petoro gerecfu taru kic fima hemma deec, “Ngic yomocngo yegoc kecande.”
42022057	Ifi deu Petorongo ine sebi heima deec, “Ngac, ge denec, ni ye mi negemmiduae.”
42022058	Ifi deu naso mi hereemanu ngic mongngo Petoro hensima deec, “Ge ifingoc yenearunac mong.” Ifi deu Petorongo deec, “Ngic, ge negennec ni kpac.”
