42022059	Nga aua mocgu isoc nammanu ngic mongngo monggoc serima deec, “Fora yombong, ngic yomoc ye gariraiangic, ye ifingoc yeac arennunoc kecande.”
42022060	Ifi deu Petorongo ine merenec, “Ngic negenna, ge denecmoc, imoc mi negentegecduae.” Dema yoac imoc mi desimanungoc kokorecngo arohoec.
42022061	Arohou Kebungo dzigenema Petoro henu Petoro ye Kebungo yeac yoac deec, imoc negensiec, “Kokorecngo tofocnac yomohaingoc mi arohomanu geng neac sebiheina atac harebec anude.”
42022062	Imoc negemma Petorongo ngadeau kemema ubahodung kuneng mema kiac hodung kiarec.
42022063	Ngic Yesuac gareng kecgec, yeneng Yesu dedzomoc ammima kpema
42022064	kiwa kporucngo biranggema degec, “Merang gudac, geng imocac kpefingyoac dena.”
42022065	Ifi dema yeni faka hania hania ammima desusuic ammigec.
42022066	Ama wereckenu yudangic enarafocngina, imoc womonggareng enara amma mitiac negen negengngic yenahafoc kpeturanggemagec Yesu yudangic yeneac tutumangtoau mekemma
42022067	yofi degec, “Edenununa, ge Messia me?” Ifi degec yeng yofi merengyemmeec, “Edengunuba naric mi negensinggegecde.
42022068	Nga kpesi kpesi kpesingemmebadeu turunga naric mi merenggecde.
42022069	Nga yofinenggac nga namma enude Ngicac Medacngo Anutu Kuctoa minginaac foiaugeng tarude nga tacbesande.” (Myeg 110:1)
42022070	Ifi deu yeneng degec, “Ifi anu ge Anutuac Medac me?” Ifi degec, yeng merengyemmeec, “Ni imocnoc, ngeneng ine imoc dedae.”
42022071	Ifi deu yeneng degec, “Yoacninaac boingicac monggoc mi obohodimbe. Ye imoc yengena enarango deu bic negending.”
42023001	Dema kpeturanggema tacdacgec, yeni sasawa yacma Yesu mema Piratoaru mekemma
42023002	imohai yoacfu namma haniaya yofi degec, “Ngic yoc ye ngicngacfocnina yenearu singngina mesufuma takesi Sisa minideac kpetarinemmema yengenaac ifi dekecde, ‘Ni Messia, ngictau mong.’ ”
42023003	Ifi degec Piratongo kpesimiec, “Ge yudangic yeneac ngictau me?” Ifi deu meremmiec, “Imocnoc geanggaoc denec.”
42023004	Anu Piratongo womonggareng enara nga habu yeneac deec, “Ngic yomocngo singyoac mong mi kpeec, ni kopocsiha hofocduae.”
42023005	Ifi deu yeneng ine serima degec, “Ye ngicngac kpouyemmema here miac miac Gariraianac hanahema ayemme hakecma Yudaia bangecfu sokoma ihai wisickede.”
42023006	Ifi degec Piratongo imoc negemma kpesiyemmeec, “Ngic yomoc Gariraia ngic me?”
42023007	Amma ye Yesuac hania negemma Herodengo bangec garenggede, ye ihacnac, ifi negenec. Negemma Herodengo naso imohai Yerusalennu ifingoc kefecac Yesu sueu yearu kenec.
42023008	Kenu Herodengo Yesuac siduc bic negenec. Ye Yesungo faka kuhagoc goa meu henudeac negengkefec. Ifi negemma naso herea Yesu hofockefecac amma Yesu yearu mekenggec ubangerec yombong negenec.
42023009	Negemma Yesu kpesi kpesi homac kpesimiu yeng ine imocac turunga mong mi merenec.
42023010	Nga womonggareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic yeneng hama namma yeac hania seriangoc yombong degec.
42023011	Nga Herode nga wasai arengfora yeneng ye ngadehema dedzomoc ammima ngakpi mong kibiagoc heimigec kemeu Piratoaru monggoc suegec mekenggec.
42023012	Herode nga Pirato yeri warac ngaba ngaba kefoc nga wenac imohaingoc ogo ogo anoc.
42023013	Anu Piratongo womonggareng enara nga enarameme amma ngicngac kpacyunuu hadacgec
42023014	yofi dema edeyunuec, “Ngic imoc ye ngicngacfocnina herengina miacande, ifi dema mehadau. Nga neng ngeneac kicfu kpesimiba wiac negemma yoacfu faidae, imoc kpac anu kopocsiha hofocduae.
42023015	Nga Herodengo ifingoc negemma eng merenu mema hadau. Ifi anu ngic yomocngo mangana mong mi memanu neng homecfu faibadeacsoc mi ande, ngeni imoc negentegecbisia.
42023016	Ifi anu ye memeting goa mima waba kenudeac negenduae.”
42023017	Anu hombang nasou gawanango ngic mocgu witicamaunac yungecbeso, faka imoc feec.
42023018	Imocac habutoa sasawa yeneng arohogec, “Ye meickema Baraba yungecnemmena.”
42023019	Baraba ye warac taonnu ngicngac yeneac here miac miac faka amma ngic kpehomeec, imocac amma witicamau faigec.
42023020	Nga Piratongo ine ngicngac yenearu monggoc serima deec nocac ye Yesu yungeru kenudeac negenec.
42023021	Ifi deu yeni arohogec, “Ge mariponnu kpena homeu, mariponnu kpena homeu.”
42023022	Arohogec naso harebec anu Piratongo deec, “Ngic yomoc ye noc kopocsic yombong meficgeec? Ni kopocsiha mong mi meficgema homecfu faibadeacsoc mi anduae. Ifi anu memeting mima waba kenudeac negenduae.”
42023023	Ifi deu yeni mariponnu homeudeac serima seriangoc arohoma Piratoac yoac ferahema udumengtoa meficgema yeneng firang anggec.
42023024	Ifi anggec Piratongo yeneac yoac negemma negengyemmema Yesu desiyemmeec.
42023025	Amma ngic ye here miac miac faka angkecma ngic kpehomeu witicamau faigec tarec, ye yungecgecdeac degec, imoc yungecyemmema Yesu ine maringinau faiu songongina modacgecdeac wayemmeec.
42023026	Wayemmeu wasaingic yeneng Yesu mekemma henggec ngic mong Kirene taonnunac, kpara Simong, ye semeng uaunac hau sinnu meficgema yeng Yesuac maripong tofohoudeac ngombonggegec tofohoma Yesu modarec.
42023027	Nga ngicngac habu kunengngo modacgec, yeneac botucfu ngac homac yeneng yeac dekiac amma ubamangang kuneng anggec.
42023028	Ifi anggec Yesungo dzigenema edeyunuec, “Yerusalennac ngacnaroang, ngeni neac mi kiacgec. Ngeni ngenang nga nambaracfocngina, yeneac amma ine kiacbisia.
42023029	Naso mong haude, imohai ngicngac yeneng yofi degecde, ‘Ngac kufing nga sabac mi megec amma namu mi gumecyunugec, yeni kenecnginagoc.’
42023030	Naso imohai ngicngac yeneng tikiac degecde, ‘Tiki ge witininau mama ferandzinununa.’ Nga faganggac yofi degecde, ‘Fagang ge tohoma kperacnununa.’
42023031	Yeni ic sabayagoc nande, imohai faka ifia andaeu ic bic ururuedacfu, imoc memanganeyombonggegecde.”
42023032	Anu yarengic yohockang yeri Yesugoc yurugecdeac ifingoc meyuru kemma
42023033	bangec buma mong kpara Hatasic degec, imohai kensikema Yesu mariponnu kpegec amma yarengic mong foiugeng nga mong kanaugeng, ifi yurugec.
42023034	Yunugec Yesungo deec, “Manggac, yeni ua medae, imoc mi negentegecma andaeac kopocsicngina wana.” Nga yeneng wambaya kpeing kpema mederegec.
42023035	Ngicngac yeni wiac fingerec, imoc ifi hennammagec yudangic enarafocnginagoc yeneng ifingoc desusuic ammigec, “Ye Messia, Anutuac meisingmedaha andeu yeng ngicngac goa onggongyunuec, ifi isoc yengena ifingoc onggongemeu.”
42023036	Nga wasaingic yeneng ifingoc defagoc ammima yeac wegenacfu hama waing aengagoc yearu sinemima
42023037	degec, “Ge yudangic yeneac ngictau kecnecfu geangga onggongemena.”
42023038	Nga oruha witiau yoac yofi oho ohoya nanec, “Yomoc yudangic yeneac ngictau.”
42023039	Anu yarengic yohockang yerearunac mong nanec, yeng Yesu desusuic ammima deec, “Ge Messia annecfu geangga onggongemema neri ifingoc onggonnuruna.”
42023040	Ifi deu ogeango kpetarimima deec, “Ge ifingoc yoacfu firang mi andang amma Anutuac kengecguu ngereebac.
42023041	Nerang kopocsicniraac turunga faka dindingacfu ifi anecmedae nga ngic yomoc ye ine kopocsic mong mi meficgeec.”
42023042	Ifi dema Yesuac deec, “Yesu, ge eucererenggau kensikema ngictau tatac mema ni negensinubesena.”
42023043	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Foracngoc, yagucngoc nigoc eucererennu kecdede, imoc edeguduae.”
42023044	Anu wenac dzongiau 12 kiroc ammanu imohai ama kundung kpema kundungngo bangec sokoma fekemmanu 3 kiroc marai anec.
42023045	Nga wenackiwa kundung kpeec, naso imohaingoc Anutuac womonnu kpoructoa womongmana kpetiac yombong naguyau nanec, imoc tohou yohockang anec.
42023046	Nga Yesungo ubaudumeng kunengngoc kpacma deec, “Manggac, ongaasuna marigau faiduae.” (Myeg 31:5) Ifi deu asuya ereec.
42023047	Anu wasai garengngo imoc hemma Anutu eweheimima deec, “Ngic yomoc ye kopocsiha kpac, imoc fora.”
42023048	Nga ngicngac sasawa yeni faka fingerec, imoc hennegeng ambesonga hagec, yeneng faka imoc fingeru hemma mokucnginau kpema kiacma amanginau kenggec.
42023049	Nga Yesuac arengfora sasawa nga ngac goa Yesu modacma Gariraianac hagec, yeni ine hama hereau namma faka fingerec, imoc henggec.
42023050	Ngic mong kefec kpara Yosefe, ye Yudaia bangecfu Arimataia taonnunac. Amma ye yudangic yeneac tutumangtoaac memba kefec. Ye ngic yumea nga fakaya dindingac amma Anutuac eucererenggac tomai kefec. Nga yeac ogoforango yoac degec nga faka anggec, yeng imocac negenu mi ngereec.
42023052	Ifi anu yeng Piratoaru kemma Yesuac fareng meudeac kpesimiec.
42023053	Kpesiu negemmiu ye Yesuac fareng mesima linengkporuc imocngo tembonggema mekemma kicsere mong gboria, imohai faiec. Kicsere imoc gboria amma hoc sirango mengec mengerea nga ngic mong imohai mi tonggo tonggoya.
42023054	Anu wenac imoc sabataac efac kpefac naso anu sabata naso hanahebeso anec.
42023055	Nga Gariraia bangecfunac ngac goa Yesu modacgec, yeneng Yosefe modacma kicsereu kemma Yesuac fareng faigec, imoc hennegeng amma
42023056	monggoc dzigenema amanginau kemma fareng imocac kerecdoku homuna gombunga memengere amma sabatanasoac singyoac fede, imoc modacma tomai kecma tacnegenggec.
42024001	Sonda gboria hanahema asoac ama negemma ngac yeni kerecdoku homuna gombunga memengere anggec, imoc mema kicsereu kenggec.
42024002	Kemma henggec hoctoa kicsere sing hedzic hedzickeamoc, imoc bic kpedic kpedidinggea feu kicsere naguya eng nanec.
42024003	Nanu ngac yeni kicsere manau emma Kebu Yesuac farenga ine mi meficgegec.
42024004	Amma yeni noc wiac fingecdac dema obohoma nammagec imohaingoc ngic yohockang ngakpingira kongac koporarac yombong, yereng hama kicnginau fingecma nanoc.
42024005	Nanec ngac yeni kengec amma ngonducnema nammagec ngic yohockang yereng yofi edeyunuoc, “Ngeni ngic gboridac kecde, ye nocac kicsereu hofocdae?
42024006	Yenoc Anutungo homecfunac bic megboriu yacma yei mi kecde. Amma yeng Gariraia kecmangoc yoac edengunuec, imoc negensibisia.
42024007	‘Ngicac Medac ye kopocsicmeme yeneac mariu faigec, yeneng mema mariponnu kpegec homeude.’ imoc fingerudeac deec, ‘Nga uameme harebec ammanu monggoc gborima yarude.’ ”
42024008	Ifi deu ngac yeni yeng yoac bic deec, imoc negensigec.
42024009	Negensima kicsereunac monggoc dzigene kemma medac 11 nga tosofocngina faka sasawa fingerec, imoc edeyunudacgec.
42024010	Ngac kenggec, yeneac kpacngina Maria Madara nga Yohana amma Maria Yakobo nonggea nga ngac goa yenahafoc kenggec, yeneng siduc imocngoc aposoro edeyunugec.
42024011	Nga ngac yeneng yoac imoc edeyunugec, imocac medac yeneng negenggec sicsauc anu yoacngina mi negensinggegec.
42024012	Nga Petorongo ine yacma nedzima kicsereu kenec. Kemma kicsereu okarima henu kporucsusu tembonggegec imocngosac tarec. Ye imoc hemma negenu wiac engena anu monggoc dzigene kenec.
42024013	Anu wenacnaso imohaingoc ngic yohockang Yesu modacandape, yereng ama mong kpara Emausi, imohai kembesonga kenoc. Bangec imoc Yerusalenggac hereau 11 kiromita, imocacsoc tarec.
42024014	Nga yeri faka sasawa fingerec, imocac denegeng amma kenoc.
42024015	Yeri yoac imocac denegeng amma negen negeng ua mema kemmaec Yesu yengenaoc ngadengirau kemma meficyuruu yerigoc kenggec.
42024016	Amma yeri kic mesufuu ayecmeu mi hensioc.
42024017	Ifi anu Yesungo yofi kpesiyemerec, “Ngeri sinnu noc wiacac ngeraocngoc denegeng andape?” Ifi deu yeri ubahodung siric amma waickema nanoc.
42024018	Namma mong kpara Kereopa, yeng kpesimiec, “Ge kuricngic mocgungosac Yerusalennu kecmina sonda yomocac manau ihai faka fingecdac, imoc mi negendang me?”
42024019	Ifi deu yeng deec, “Noc faka fingecdac?” Ifi deu yereng edeoc, “Yesu Nadzaretenac yearu faka fingerec. Ye profete mong amma Anutu nga ngic yeneac kicfu yoac deec nga faka sasawa meec, imoc kuhagoc yombong anec.
42024020	Nga womonggareng enara nga israengic enarafocnina, yeneng ye homeudeac dema gamang yeneac mariu faigec yeneng mariponnu kpegec homeec.
42024021	Nga neni yofi negensinggeing, yennoc israengicngac mesinunuude. Faka fingerec, imocac uameme yaguc harebec ande.
42024022	Anu ngac goa neneac habuunac, yeni yaguc asoac yombong kicsereu kemma farenga hofocdau. Hofocma dzigenema hama yofi edenunudau, ‘Angero yereng ongau fingecnemmema yofi deec, “Yesu ye bic gboridac kecde.” ifi dedau.’ Ifi degec kpidohoding.
42024024	Amma nenearunac ngic goango kicsereu kemma ngac yeneng dedau, ifi isoc yombong meficgedau nga yengena ine mi hendau.”
42024025	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeyuruec, “Ngeni negen negengngina kpac nga wosongina nomana yombong. Profete yeneng bicngoc yoac sasawa degec, imoc bic mi negensinggedae.
42024026	Imoc yofi fingerudeac degec, ‘Messia ye kpendzeng kpekefu wisickeuguc kibikperagiatoaac ameau naric enude.’ ”
42024027	Yengena siduc imoc mitikibiu oho ohoya fedacde, imoc Moseac kibiunac hanahema kengkecma profete sasawa yeneng yeac siduc ohogec, ye imocac hania deireckeyemerec.
42024028	Anu yeri ama kembesonga kenoc, imoc mewegenema Yesungo ferecgema kembeso siric isoc anu
42024029	yereng kpetarimima deoc, “Ama marai anu kundung kpebeso andeac ge nerigoc kenni.” Ifi deec yerigoc amau emma tacgec.
42024030	Yesungo yerigoc tacma yaka nebesonga ic sogong mema kenecyoac dema mendzicma yemerec.
42024031	Yemeru kicngira tegeru Yesu hensimaec yeng imohaingoc aockeu
42024032	yeraocngoc denegeng amma deoc, “Yeng sinnu mitikibiac hania edekpou anecmema deireckenemeru herenirango yacyombonggedac, imoc fora yombong.”
42024033	Nga yeri imohaingoc yacma dzigenema monggoc Yerusalennu kemma medacfora 11 ogofocnginagoc kpeturanggema tacmagec meficyunuoc.
42024034	Meficyunuec yeneng edeyuruma yofi degec, “Kebungo fora homecfunac gborima yacdac, ye Simong bic fingecmidac.”
42024035	Ifi degec yereng sinnu yerearu faka fingerec nga Yesungo ic sogong mendziru hensioc, imocac siduc andaroc.
42024036	Siduc ifi andarec yeni yoac imoc negemma tacmagec Yesu yengenaoc botucnginau namma deec, “Ruae ngenearu febeso.”
42024037	Ifi deu yeni kpidohoma kengec amma negensigec, “Wosonga hendimbe.”
42024038	Ifi negensigec yeng yofi deec, “Ngeni nocac kpidohoma negengyohoc andae?
42024039	Imoc ni neanaoc, ngeni hanimarina henggec. Wosonga yeni sicfusingina kpac. Ngeni imocac hama kpeserenuma nenggec.”
42024040	Ifi dema hanimaria edzacyunuu
42024041	yeni kerectegec amma ubangerectoa negemma sifu mi negensinggegec yeng yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Ngeni yaka mong faigec tacde me?”
42024042	Ifi deu yeni kondungyang dzedzea noboha migec mema kicnginau neec.
42024044	Nema yofi edeyunuec, “Ni ngenigoc kefai, imohai yofi bic edengunuai, wiac sasawa neac negemma Moseac dedeseriyoacfu nga profete yeneac kibiu amma Mitiyegecfu oho ohoya fede, imoc sasawa fora fingecbeso.”
42024045	Ifi dema ye imohaingoc negen negengngina meireckeyemmeu yeni mitikibiac yoac negentegecgec
42024046	yofi torokpema deec, “Imocac amma yofinoc oho ohoya fede, Messiango kpendzeng kpema homema uameme harebecfu monggoc gborima yarude.
42024047	Yaru ngicngac yeni yeac kpacfu ubamereng nga kopocsic wawaac sing imoc Yerusaleng taonnusing hanahema bangeha bangeha ngicngac sasawa yenearu yoac dekperagigec kenude.
42024048	Faka yomocnoc kicnginau fingecdacmoc imoc dekperagibisia.
42024049	Nga Mannango wiac ngemmeudeac deec, neng imoc suengemmeba mebisia. Negenggec, ngeni taong yomohai tacma imoc mi wabisia kecma wihacnac kuc heingemmebade. Ngeni kuc imoc memaguc naric kengha ambisia.”
42024050	Anu Yesungo waraiyemmeu taong wama ngadeau Betania amabangec, imohai kemma maria miacma kenecyunumanu
42024051	Anutungo meu wayunuma kurumennu enec.
42024052	Enu yeni afehema songo kuneng meficgema Yerusalennu monggoc dzigenema kenggec.
42024053	Nga yeni nasosoc womonnu kecma Anutu ubangerec edekecgec.
43001001	Hanac hanaheaunacngoc enacyoacngo kefec nga enacyoac ye Anutugoc kefec amma enacyoac ye Anutu.
43001002	Amma yennoc hanac hanaheau Anutugoc kefec.
43001003	Nga Anutungo enacyoacfu deu wiac sasawa fingecdarec, wiac sasawa fingecma fekende imoc yea kpac mong mi fingerec.
43001004	Yearunoc kekec feec nga kekec imocngo ngicngac yeneac kperagi anec.
43001005	Nga kperagingo kundung mekperagiu kundungngo kperagi imoc semeudeac ambibiema waec.
43001006	Anutungo ngic mong sueu haec, yeac kpara Yohane.
43001007	Yeng kperagi imocac hepucngic amma dedekperagi imoc ngicngac mekperagiyemmeudeac haec. Yeng ifi hau ngicngac sasawango yeac amma kperagia imoc negensinggegecdeac negenec.
43001008	Ye yengenaoc kperagi imoc mi kefec, kpac. Ye ine kperagi imoc mekperagiudeac haec.
43001009	Anu kperagi fora yombong, yeng bangecfu ngicngac sasawa mekperagiyemmebeso haudeac anec.
43001010	Anutu ye kperagiango bangec nga wiac sasawa meficgedaru kperagia imocngo bangecfu kefu ngicngac yeneng ine ye mi hensigec.
43001011	Ye bangehau dzigenemanu arengfora yeneng ama mi heimigec.
43001012	Nga ngicngac ama heimima kpara negensinggegec, yeni Anutuac nambaracfora anggecdeac deyemmeec.
43001013	Deyemmeu ngicngac imoc yeni ngic sacfusiunac me sebiac songounac me ngic monggac songounac mong mi fingecgec, kpac. Yeni Anutu yengenaarunac fingecgec.
43001014	Anu enacyoacngo sebifusiagoc amma botucninau kefec. Kefu medac mocgungo fingecma Manggacarunac kuc nga kibikperagia mekefec, kuc nga kibikperagia imocnoc hening. Henni yearu danggunuc nga yoac fora wake wakea fede.
43001015	Yohanengo yeac hepuc amma dekperagima kpacma yofi deec, “Ni yeacnoc yofi deai, ngadenau hama kecde, ye kunenna, nocac ni mi fingecbarengoc ye kechakefec.”
43001016	Dedeseriyoacngo Mosegoc hau yearunac meing nga danggunuc amma yoac fora imoc Yesu Kristogoc haec. Amma ye danggunuc hafoangoc femide, imocngo nenannu wisic wisickea kpac hakecde.
43001018	Ngic mongngo Anutu mong mi henec, kpac. Medaha mocgusac Mamaac hoannu kecande, ye Anutungoc. Yeng Manggac dekperaginemmeec.
43001019	Yudangic Yerusaleng taonnu kecgec, yeneng womonggareng nga womonggareng yeneac memefic sueyunugec Yohanearu kemma kpesimigec, “Ge merac?” kpesimigec, yeng haniaya mi hesonggema yofi dekperagiyemmeec, “Ni Messia kpac.” imocngo Yohaneac dedekperagi.
43001021	Ifi deu yeneng monggoc kpesimigec, “Ge merac, ge Eria me?” kpesimigec yeng deec, “Ni ye kpac.” deu degec, “Ge profete yombong me?” degec merenec, “Kpac.”
43001022	Ifi deu degec, “Anu ge merac? Suenunudau, yenearu yoac turunga dafi mekemma edeyununide? Ge geanggaac dafi deannec?”
43001023	Ifi degec Yohanengo yofi merenec, “Bangec kisiu ubaudumeng fingerec imoc nennoc yofi kpacduae, ‘Ngeni Kebuac sing heitumeigec.’ (Yes 40:3) Profete Yesaiango neac ifi deec.”
43001024	Anu farisaio yeneng ngic goa sueyunugec kemma
43001025	Yohane kpesimigec, “Ge Messia kpac nga Eria kpac amma profete kpac. Ge nocac ngic doku nadzicyemmeannec?”
43001026	Ifi degec Yohanengo yofi merengyemmeec, “Ni doku nadzicngemmeanduae. Nga botucnginau ngic mong kecde, ngeni ye mi negemmidae.
43001027	Yeng ngadenau hama kecde nga ni ifiango yeac hanitabe witiha yungecba naric mi ngereeude.”
43001028	Yohanengo Betania amau Yordang doku nobocgengau doku nadzicyemmekefec, imohai faka imoc fingerec.
43001029	Wereckengau Yohanengo namma henu Yesungo yearu hau ngicngac yofi edeyunuec, “Henggec, imoc Anutuac ramamedaha, yeng bangectoa bangec imocac ngicngac sasawa yeneac kopocsic meickeude.”
43001030	Yeacnoc negemma yofi deai, “Ngic mong ngadenau hama kecde, yeng ni mi fingecbare bicngoc yombong kefecac ni feracnude.
43001031	Neng ye mi negemmiai. Nga israengicngac ngeneng ye hentegecgecdeac neng hama doku nadzicngemmebade.”
43001032	Yohanengo yofi dekperagiec, “Ni Tiri Asu hemba yeng kebesacac siric isoc kurumennunac mama yeac witiau taru henai.
43001033	Nga ni ye mi negemmibare suenuec, yeng yofi edenuec, ‘Asungo mama ngic yearu taru hennade, yeng Tiri Asungo nadzicngemmeude.’
43001034	Ni imocnoc hemma hepuc amma yofi dekperagiai, ngic yomocngo Anutuac medac.”
43001035	Anu wereckengau Yohane ye medacfora yenearunac yohockang yerigoc imohai monggoc nanggec.
43001036	Nammagec Yesungo kenu hemma medachora yofi edeyuruec, “Henec, imoc Anutuac ramamedaha.”
43001037	Ifi deu negemma medachora yereng Yesu modacma kenec Yesungo dzigene yeremma yofi kpesiyemerec, “Ngeri noc wiacac angecmede?” kpesiyemeru deoc, “Rabbi, (imocac titiha kpoukpou) ge dahai kecnec?”
43001039	Deec yofi edeyuruec, “Ngeri hama henec.” ifi deu yeni yenahafoc kemma ama kefec, imoc hemma wenac imoc yegoc taroc. Faka yomoc marai 4 kiroc fingerec.
43001040	Anu Yohaneac yoac negemma Yesu modaroc, yerearunac mong Anderea, Simong Petoroac munea.
43001041	Yeng Yesu hemma dzigenema warac warac yengena munea Simong meficgema yofi edeec, “Neri Messia meficgedic.” (Messia imocac titiha Kristo.)
43001042	Ifi dema Simong hesickeu Yesuaru kenec Yesungo ye hemma yofi deec, “Ge Simong Yohaneac medac, geac kpacga Kefa debesonga.” (Imocac titiha hoc amma grikyoacfu Petros.)
43001043	Wereckengau Yesungo Gariraia bangecfu kembesonga negemma Firipo meficgema yofi edeec, “Ge hama modacnuna.”
43001044	Nga Firipo nga Anderea amma Petoro yeni Besaida taonnunac.
43001045	Anu Firipongo Natanae meficgema yofi edeec, “Mosengo dedeseriyoac kibiu ohoec nga profete yeneng ifingoc ohogec, neni ngic imoc meficgeding. Imoc Yesunoc, Yosefeac medac, Nadzarete taonnunac.”
43001046	Ifi deu Natanaengo deec, “Nadzarete taonnunac wiac gombunga mong mi fingecande.” ifi deu Firipongo deec, “Ge hama henna.”
43001047	Nga Yesungo Natanae henu yearu kenu yofi deec, “Henggec, ngic yomoc israengic fora, yearu ikoc nga faitobang faka mong mi fede.”
43001048	Ifi deu Natanaengo kpesimiec, “Ge dafi negennunec?” Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Firipongo mi kpacgumanu fig ic haniau tacmana bic gendua.”
43001049	Ifi deu Natanaengo yofi edeec, “Rabbi, ge Anutuac medac, Israe neneac Ngictau.”
43001050	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Ge fig ic haniau tacna gendua deduaeac negensinnunec. Kecma faka yofia monggoc ferahema fingeru hennade.
43001051	Negenggec, kurumeng anggeu ngeni Anutuac angerofora yeneng Ngicac Medac yearu engemmama anggec yenenggecde, imoc fora yombong edengunuduae.”
43002001	Uameme yohockang wisickeu Gariraia bangecfu Kana taonnu memeturang fingerec. Nga Yesuac nonggea ihai kecmanu
43002002	Yesu nga medacfora momoc heitaiyunugec.
43002003	Nga yeni waingngina kpac anu nonggeango Yesu edeec, “Waingngina kpac ande.”
43002004	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ngac, neac wiac imoc geac mi ande, nasona mi hadacngoc.”
43002005	Ifi deu nonggeango uamedac edeyunuec, “Yeng wiac monggac edengunuu ngeni imoc sasawa tofohobisia.”
43002006	Anu yudangic yeni dzuac dzuac fakangina modacma enang dokuyagoc faigec tacande. Imocac amma imohaingoc enang hocngo memea 6 faigec tarec. Enang mocgu mocgu imoc 100 lita, ifingo tackenec.
43002007	Nga Yesungo uamedac yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni doku fima enannu kpakegec kemema wakeu.” ifi deu yeni doku figec kemema wakedarec.
43002008	Figec wakeu yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni yaguc fima imoc yakagarenggaru mekenggec.” Ifi deu fima mekenggec.
43002009	Mekemmagec dokungo waing anu yakagarengo imoc nehemma waing dahacnac dema obohou uamedac doku fima mekenggec, yenengsac negenggec. Ifi nehemma yakagarengo memeturangngic, ye deu haec.
43002010	Hau edeec, “Fakanina yofi fede, hanahema waing gombunga ngic gumecyununi nekecma ubasufu anggec waing songea kpac gumecyunuandimbe. Anu geng ine waing gombunga mesufuna tacdacac yaguc meficgenec.”
43002011	Yesungo Gariraia bangecfu Kana taonnu kecma negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc imoc hanahema meec. Mema kuc nga kibikperagia ifi mekperagiu medacfora yeneng imoc hemma ye negensinggegec.
43002012	Kecgec wisickeu Yesu nga nonggo munafora amma medacfora yenahafoc Kafanaung taonnu kemema ihai wenac goa kecgec.
43002013	Kecgec yudangic yeneac makekenggac naso wegene hau Yesungo Yerusaleng taonnu enec.
43002014	Emma henu ngic yeneng womonggac oda manau ramaburumaka nga kebesacneng faigec nga goa tatacnginau tacma hiedzo emekecmagec Yesungo yenenec.
43002015	Yenemma indzuru mong mudze mudzea mema imocngo ngic sasawa ramaburumakanginagoc womonnunac yunukisang ayemmeu kemegec. Kememagec ngic hiedzo emekecgec, yeneac dzongina megigi amma tebongina heimerenec.
43002016	Heimeremma ngic kebesacneng suegec, yeni yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni wiacngina imoc meickegec! Ngeni Mannaac ama anggec emekpesi ama mi ambeso.”
43002017	Faka imoc fingeru medacfora yeneng yoac mong oho ohoya feec, imoc negensigec, “Geac amaac amma herenango gerec dzema dzendandannuude.” (Myeg 69:9)
43002018	Amma yudangic yeneng meremma edegec, “Ge faka imoc andanggac noc faka kuhagoc mena hemma negensinggenide?”
43002019	Ifi degec Yesungo meremma yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni womong yomoc hembarackegec ni uameme harebecfu imoc miacbade.”
43002020	Ifi deu yudangic yeneng degec, “Ngic yeneng womong yomoc kifa 46 mekecma medzickegec. Anu geng uameme harebecfusac naric miacnade me?”
43002021	Yesungo ine yengena sebiaac womonnu yoac heima deec.
43002022	Kecma homecfunac megboriu yaru medacfora yeneng Yesungo yoac ifi deec, imoc negensigec. Negensima mitikibiu yoac oho ohoya fede nga Yesuac yoac momoc negensinggegec.
43002023	Anu Yesungo Yerusalennu makekenggac hombang naso femanu ihai kecma faka kuhagoc meu ngicngac homacngo hemma yeac kpara negensinggegec.
43002024	Nga Yesu yengenaoc ngicngac haifakangina hentegecdarecac amma ubakeraha mong mi edeyunuec.
43002025	Imoc yofiac, ye yengenaoc ngic yeneac ubaherenginau wiac sasawa fede, imoc negenecac ngic monggac haniaac ngic mong mi kpesimiec.
43003001	Farisaiongic mong kpara Nikodemo, ye yudangic yeneac ngickiwa mong kefec.
43003002	Nga yeng tofocnac dzongiau Yesuaru hama deec, “Rabbi, geng Anutuarunac mama kpoukpou ua mekecnec, imoc negendimbe. Geng faka kuhagoc meannec, ua ifia ngic mongngo Anutuya kpac kecma naric mi mebac.”
43003003	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Foracngoc, ngic mong ye fingec fingec gboria mi fingerude, yeng Anutuac eucerereng naric mi henude, imoc edeguduae.”
43003004	Ifi deu Nikodemongo deec, “Ngic bic yadi yadiyango dafi monggoc fingerude? Ye nonggeaac heremanau naric mi enude nga monggoc naric mi fingerude.”
43003005	Nga Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Foracngoc, ngic mong ye dokuu nga Asuu gboria mi fingerude, yeng Anutuac eucererennu naric mi enude, imoc edeguduae.
43003006	Nga ngicfunac fingec fingera, yeng ngic siricngoc nga Asuunac fingec fingera, ye Asu siricngoc.
43003007	Ngeni fingec fingec gboriau fingecgecdeac edeguba mi kpidohona.
43003008	Firangngo yengena songo modacma kpeu udumenga negengannec. Nga ye dahacnac hade amma dahai kenude, imoc ine mi negennec. Ngicngac Asuunac fingec fingera, yeni sasawango siricngina ifia.”
43003009	Ifi deu Nikodemongo meremmiec, “Yoac sasawa denec, imoc dafi fingecdarude?”
43003010	Ifi deu Yesungo meremma yofi edeec, “Ge israengic yeneac kpoukpoungo wiac imoc dafi mi negentegecnec?
43003011	Foracngoc, neni wiac hengandimbe nga negengandimbe, neni imocac hepuc nga dedekperagingic amma dekperagingemmeandimbe, imoc edeguduae. Anu ngeni yoac imoc mi mema honggeandae.
43003012	Ni bangecac wiacac yoac dema edengunuba ngeni mi negensinggegecde. Nga kurumenggac wiacac edengunubadeu ngeni imoc dafi negensinggegecde?
43003013	Ngic mongngo kurumennu mi enec. Ngicac medac kurumennunac maec, ye mocgungo kurumennu enec.
43003014	Mosengo bangec kisiu boudzoc miaru nanec, ngic yeneng ifi isoc Ngicac Medac miacgec nambeso.
43003015	Anu ngicngac ye negensinggegecde, yeni sasawango kekecseri megecde.
43003016	Imoc yofiac, Anutungo bangectoa bangecfu ngicngac ngeneac noc isoc ammiecac Medaha mocgu faiu bangecfu maec. Imocac ngic mongngo ye negensinggeude, ye manganau mi kemeude yeng ine kekecseri meude.
43003017	Anutungo Medaha bangecngic manganangina isinggema desiudeac sueu mi maec, kpac. Ye bangecngic ebicfunac mesiyunuu komoc kpegecdeac bangecfu sueu maec.
43003018	Amma ngic mong Medaha negensinggede, ye yoacfu mi faiude. Nga mong ye Anutuac Medaha mocguac kpara mi negensinggede, yeng ine mi negensinggeecac amma yoacfu bic makpeec.
43003019	Yoacninaac desi desiac hania imoc yofi, kperagingo bangecfu hau ngicngac angammemengina manganaac amma kundunggac songo monggoc negemma kperagia wagec.
43003020	Ngicngac faka mangana angandae, yeni fakangina mangana didiu mi fingectegerudeac sasawango kperagia ngadehema kperagiau naric mi hagecde.
43003021	Nga ngic mong ye faka fora meande, yeng kperagiau naric haude. Amma ye Anutuac kucfu uaya meande, imoc fingectegerude.”
43003022	Kecma Yesu nga medacfora Yudaia bangecfu kemma ihai yenigoc kecma ngicngac doku nadzicyemmegec.
43003023	Naso imohai Saring taong wegenacfu Ainong taonnu doku homac feec. Imocac Yohane ye ifingoc ihai kecmanu ngicngac yearu kenggec yeng ifingoc doku nadzicyemmekefec.
43003024	Faka imoc Yohane witicamau mi faimagec fingerec.
43003025	Anu Yohane medacfora nga yudangic mong, yeni yuda yeneac dzuac dzuac fakanginaac amma yoacngina engemmama anec.
43003026	Anu medac yeneng Yohanearu kemma edegec, “Rabbi, ngic gegoc Yordang nobocgeng kefec geng yeac hania edenununec, yennoc ngicngac doku nadzicyemmeu sasawango yearu kendacdae.”
43003027	Ifi degec Yohanengo yofi merengyemmeec, “Anutungo kurumennunac wiac mi miudeu ngicngo imoc naric mi meude.
43003028	Ni Messia kpac. Ni ine yeac singwarac ambadeac Anutungo suenuu hayai. Imocacnoc bic edengunuai, ngeni dedena imoc negendaeac hepucna naric anggecde.
43003029	Ngic enembingehagoc yeng ngacfu kenude. Anu ngicac ogeango yeac enacfunac memeturanggac siduha negemma ubangerectoa negenude. Nga ni ifi isoc yaguc ubangerec hafoangoc negenduae.
43003030	Yeac kpacsiducngo yadiu neacngo mamea ambeso.
43003031	Wihacnac maec, yeng wiac sasawaac engenatoa ande. Nga ngic bangecfunac fingec fingera, yeng bangecfunac, imocac amma bangecac yoac deude. Kurumennunac maecngo wiac sasawaac buma anec kecde.
43003032	Amma yeng wiac wi fede, imoc hennegeng angkefec, imocac hepuc amma dekperagiu ngic mongngo yeac yoac mi hoanggeude.
43003033	Anu ngic mong ye yoac imoc mema hoanggeude, yeng Anutu ye fora, imoc deseriude.
43003034	Anutungo ngic sueec ye Anutuac yoac deude. Imoc yofiac, Anutungo Tiri Asu hendzicma nobohasac kpeteagoc mema mi yemmeude, kpac.
43003035	Manggacngo heregoc Medahaac songo negemma wiac sasawa mariau faiec.
43003036	Imocac Medaha negensinggede, ye kekecserigoc kefude nga kecbesande. Nga Medahaac yoac kpeude, ye kekec mi henu Anutuac turungngo ine yearu fekefude nga fekecbesande.”
43004001	Farisaio yeni Yesuac yofi negenggec, “Yeng habu meyunuma doku nadzicyemmeu Yohaneac habu kpetea ferahede.”
43004002	Nga Yesu yengenaoc ngicngac doku mi nadzicyemmeu medacfora yeneng doku nadzicyemmegec.
43004003	Nga Yesungo yoac ifi negemma Yudaia bangec wama Gariraia bangecfu monggoc dzigeneec.
43004004	Ihai kemma Samaria bangec ferecgebeso amma Samariaac taong mong kpara Sika, ihai kensikeec. Sika taong imoc Yakobongo medaha Yosefeac bangec desimiec, imocac wegenac tarec.
43004006	Anu Yesungo Yakoboac dokuteng tarecfu, imohai sing kengkecma kuha kpac anu dokuteng imocac tegiau mama tarec. Tacmanu 12 kiroc isoc anec.
43004007	Anu medacfora yeni yaka bummegecdeac taonnu kemmagec samariangac mongngo doku fiudeac hau Yesungo yofi edeec, “Doku mehana neba.”
43004009	Ifi deu ngacngo deec, “Ge yudangicngo dafi samariangac nearu dokuac denec?” Yudangicngac yeni samariangicngac yenigoc emenecngina mi feecac ngacngo ifi deec.
43004010	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ge Anutu haringaac hania nga merang dokuac kpesigende, imoc negentegecma kpesimibang debac yeng doku kekehagoc gembac.”
43004011	Ifi deu ngacngo deec, “Kebu, ge doku finadeac wiacga kpac nga dokuteng imoc herea anu doku kekehagoc dahacnac finade?
43004012	Bangecnina Yakobongo dokuteng yomoc menemmeec. Geng ye ferahenec me? Ye yengena nga medacfora amma ramaburumakafora, yeni doku yomohanac nekecgec.”
43004013	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Ngicngac doku yomoc neandae, yeni sasawango dokuac monggoc ayemmeande.
43004014	Nga mong ye neng doku miba neude, yeng dokuac monggoc mi ammiude nga ammibesande. Nga doku mibade, imocngo yearu dokukiwa sike sikea fingecma kekecseri meficgemiude.”
43004015	Ifi deu ngacngo deec, “Kebu, ge doku imoc nenna nema dokuac monggoc mi anembeso nga doku fibadeac yomohai monggoc mi habesare.”
43004016	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Ge kemma ewega dena haec.”
43004017	Ifi deu ngacngo deec, “Ni ewena kpac.” deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ni ewena kpac, ge fora denec.
43004018	Ge ngic 5 bic meyununec nga ngic yofinenggac mena ngerahafoc kecdape, ye geac ewega kpac.”
43004019	Ifi deu ngacngo deec, “Kebu, ge profete, imoc gentegecduae.
43004020	Kisicfocnina yeneng tikibuma yomohai Anutu afehekecgec. Anu ngeneng yofi deandae, ‘Yerusaleng, imohaisac Anutu afehebesonga.’ ”
43004021	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ngac negensinnuna, naso mong wegeneude, imohai ngicngac ngeneng tikibuma yomohai nga Yerusalennu Anutu monggoc mi afehegecde.
43004022	Ngeni wiac hania mi negentegecdae, imoc numumidae. Ebicfunac mesi mesi nga komoc kpegecdeac kuc, imoc yudangic nenearunac fingerec nga Anutu negengireckema numumima kecdimbe.
43004023	Naso mong hama kecde nga bic hadac, imohai ine dedengerec ngicngac fora, yeni ongaasungina forango Manggac dengeregecde. Manggacngo nunumu areng ifia yeneac negenu ngereeude.
43004024	Anutu ye Asu. Imocac amma ngicngac dengerebesonga dema ongaasungo nga faka forau dengerebisia.”
43004025	Ifi deu ngacngo deec, “Messia, kpara mong Kristo deandae, ye fingerudeac dedea, imoc negenduae. Yeng hama wiac sasawa dekperaginemmeude.”
43004026	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Yoac edeguduae, imoc ni.”
43004027	Ifi demanu medacfora yeneng amaunac dzigene hagec. Hama Yesungo ngacgoc yoac denegeng anocac hemma kerectegec anggec. Amma mongngo yofi mi kpesimiec, “Ge noc wiacac kpesiminec me yegoc noc wiacac dedape?”
43004028	Anu ngacngo Yesuac yoac negemma enanga wama amau dzigene kemma amafora edeyunuec,
43004029	“Ngeni hama henggec. Ngic mong ni faka anai meai, imoc seng deficnudacde. Ye Messia gedang?”
43004030	Ifi deu yeneng taong wama Yesuaru hagec.
43004031	Anu medacfora yeneng yaka neudeac yofi degec, “Rabbi, ge yaka nena.”
43004032	Ifi degec yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Yaka fenende, imoc ngeni mi negendae.”
43004033	Ifi deu medacfora yenaocngoc denegeng amma degec, “Ngic mongngo yaka meha migec nedac gedang.”
43004034	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Suenuec, yeac enac tofohoma uaya mekecma mesibade, imocngo yakana ande.
43004035	Ngeni yofi deandae, ‘Afo 4 wisickeuguc semeng fora anude.’ Neng yoac mong deba negenggec, ngeni kicngina fima uau henggec, yaka bic fora amma kpekpauc fede.
43004036	Ifi anu heihomec nga kpememengic yeri yerahafoc ubangerec negenecdeac kpememengicngo uayaac bung mema kekecseriac fora ifingoc mekpedzuc anude.
43004037	Nga, ‘Ngic mongngo wiac homeru mong ye fora mekpedzuc anude.’ yoac ifi deandae, imocac foranoc fingecde.
43004038	Ngic goa yeneng ua megec ua imocac fora fingerec. Nga ngeni heihomec mi ammagec ni suengunuba fora mekpedzuc ambisia. Ngeneng yeneac ua torokpema tigec enec.”
43004039	Samariangacngo Yesuac yofi dekperagiyemmeec, “Yeng ni faka anai meai, imoc seng deficnudacde.” ifi deecac taong imohacnac samaria ngicngac yenearunac homacngo Yesu negensinggegec.
43004040	Imocac amma samariangicngac Yesuaru kemma yeng yenigoc kefudeac heitaigec. Heitaigec yeng negengyemmema wenac yohockang yenigoc kefec.
43004041	Yesungo ihai kecmanu homacngo yombong yeac yoacac amma negensinggema
43004042	ngac edegec, “Neni warac geac siducac amma negensinggeding. Nga yaguc nenaoc yeac enacfunac yoara negemma negensinggedimbe. Amma gennoc bangecngic sasawa neneac memengerec ngic, imoc negendimbe.”
43004043	Anu uameme yohockang wisickeu Yesungo Samaria bangec wama Gariraia bangecfu kenec.
43004044	Ye ihai kemma yengenaac yofi dekperagiemeec, “Profete mongngo yengena bangecfu kefu ngicngac yeneng eweheihei mong mi ammigecde.”
43004045	Anu gariraiangic yeni makekenggac nasou Yerusaleng taonnu kenggec Yesungo faka sasawa meu henggecac amma Gariraia bangecfu kenu amafora yeneng ubangerecgoc heitaigec.
43004046	Heitaigec Yesungo Kana taong Gariraia bangecfu doku merennu waing anec, ihai monggoc dzigene kenec. Kenu ihai ngictauac kia mong haec, yeac medacngo Kafanaung taonnu hafei feec.
43004047	Nga kiango Yesu Yudaia bangecfunac dzigenema Gariraia bangecfu hade, ifi negemma yearu kemma medaha mengereudeac edeec, nocac medaha homebeso anec.
43004048	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ngeni faka kuhagoc nga faka morora mi hemma eng mi negensinggegecde.”
43004049	Ifi deu kiango deec, “Kebu, ge bic hana, medacna homebeso ande.”
43004050	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ge kenna, Medacga bic ngereedac kecde.” ifi deu ngic ye Yesuac yoac negensinggema dzigene kenec.
43004051	Dzigene kememanungoc wanacngicfora yeneng hama sinnu meficgema edegec, “Medacga bic ngereedac kecde.”
43004052	Ifi edegec, ye ngereec, imocac nasoyombonggac kpesiyemmeu yeneng degec, “Worang hadzing 1 kiroc, imohai sebia nomanedac.”
43004053	Ifi degec mamango negensiec, “Yesungo naso imohainoc suenuma dedac, ‘Medacga ye bic ngereedac kecde.’ ” Ifi negemma siduc edeyunuu ye nga wiacfora yeni Yesu negensinggegec.
43004054	Yesungo Yudaia bangecfunac Gariraia bangecfu dzigene hama negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc meu imocngo naso yohockang anec.
43005001	Imocac ngadeau yudangic yenang hombang mong hau Yesungo Yerusalennu enec.
43005002	Emma Yerusaleng taonnu nagutoa mong kpara Ramaac nagu, imocac nobohau dzohong mong feec. Imoc hebiraio yoacfu Betesida deandae, imocac tegiau firangama 5 tackenec.
43005003	Anu firangama imocac manau ngicngac hafeinginagoc nga kicpisic amma goa hanimangang nga puringa ifia homacngo fekenggec, yeni doku kockpac anudeac tomai fegec. Imoc yofiac, naso goau Kebuac angero mongngo doku imohai haande. Hau doku kockpac anu mong ye waraima dokuu kemede, yeng hafeia sasawa kpac angande.
43005005	Anu ngicngac fekenggec, yeneac botucfunac ngic mong puringa kefu kifa 38 bic anec, yeng ihai fekefec.
43005006	Nga naso herea ihai fekefecac Yesungo hemma imoc negemma yofi kpesimiec, “Ge ngereebeso anggende me?”
43005007	Ifi deu puringngo meremmiec, “Kunenna, doku kockpac ammanu merac ngicngo meficnuma dzohonnu fainubac. Ni kemebeso ambare mongngo hefacnuma kemeande.”
43005008	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ge yacma fefega mema kenna.”
43005009	Ifi deu ngic ye naso imohaingoc sebia ngereeu yacma fefea mema kenec. Nga naso imoc ine sabata naso anec.
43005010	Anu yudangic yeneng ngic ngereec hemma edegec, “Yaguc sabatanasou fefega mema kenna, imoc singngo mi dede.”
43005011	Ifi degec merengyemmeec, “Ngic mengerenudac, yeng suenuma dedac, ‘Ge fefega mema kenna.’ ”
43005012	Ifi deu kpesimigec, “Merac ngicngo fefega mema kenna.” dedac?
43005013	Nga ngic ngereec ye merang mengereec, imoc mi negenec nocac Yesungo ngichabutoa nanggecac, ihai kemma kperucgeec.
43005014	Anu imocac ngadeau Yesungo ngic imoc womong manau meficgema yofi edeec, “Ge sebiga bic ngereedac. Nga ebic mong kunengngoc fingecgembacac kopocsic monggoc mi meficgebesena.”
43005015	Ifi deu ngicngo kemma yudangic edeyunuec, “Ngic mengerenudac, imoc Yesu.”
43005016	Yesungo sabata nasou ua ifia mekefecac yudangic yeneng ngaba seria ammigec.
43005017	Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Mannango uaya mehakefec nga yofinenggac medengoc imocac amma neng ifingoc ua mekecduaengoc.”
43005018	Ifi amma Yesungo sabatanasoac singyoac memanganeec nga torokpema Anutuac Manna dema ye isocngoc anec, imocac amma yudangic herengina monggoc yaru Yesu kpehomebeso anggec.
43005019	Ifi anggec Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Foracngoc, Mamango ua mong meu Medacngo imoc hemma yengenaoc ua imocsac naric meude, imoc edengunuduae. Mamango ua mede, Medahango ua imocngoc meude.
43005020	Imoc yofiac, Manggac ye Medaha songogoc hoanggema ua mede, imoc sasawa edzahekecde. Nga ua sasawa meu hengandae, imocac engenatoa edzaheu meu ngeni imoc hemma kerectegec anggecde.
43005021	Manggacngo ngic homemea midiyunuma megboriyunukecde, ifi isocngoc Medacngo ngic megboribeso negemmiu ngereeu megboriude.
43005022	Manggacngo ngic angammemengina mi desiude, kpac. Ngic sasawango Manggac eweheimiandae, ifi isoc Medac eweheimigecdeac yeng desi desiua Medahaac mariu faidarec. Nga ngic mong ye Medahaac eweheihei mi ammiande, yeng Manggac sueec, ye ifingoc eweheihei mi ammiude.
43005024	Foracngoc, ngic mong ye neac yoac negemma Manggac suenuec, ye negensinggeude, yeng kekecserigoc kecma yoacfu mi embesande, imoc edengunuduae. Yeng homec wama kekecfu bic endac.
43005025	Foracngoc, ngicngac bic homegec, yeneng Anutuac Medacac ubaudumeng negemma kekec megecde. Naso imoc haude nga yaguc bic hadac, imoc edengunuduae.
43005026	Manggac yengenaaru kekec fede, siriha imocngoc yeng kekec Medac miu Medacaru ifingoc kekec fede.
43005027	Nga Medaha ye Ngicac Medac, imocac amma Manggacngo ngic isingyunuma desiyunuudeac kuc miec.
43005028	Ngeni yoac imocac kerectegec mi ambisia. Imoc yofiac, ngicngac kicsereu fedae, yeni sasawango naso mong hau ubaudumenga negemma kicsereunac eregecde. Faka gombunga angkecma homegec, yeni kekec megecdeac yacgecde. Nga faka mangana angkecma homegec, yeneng yoacfu nanggecdeac yacgecde.
43005030	Ni wiac mong neanna ubaac naric mi mebade, kpac. Ni wiac kedzacnango negemma negenganduae, imocac sirihau fakangina isinggema desibade. Neanna songo mi modacanduae, kpac. Suenuec yeac songo modacbade. Imocac amma neac desi desiuango dindingac ande.
43005031	Ni neannaoc haniana dekperagibadeu dedekperagina imocngo fora mi anude, kpac.
43005032	Mongngo neac hepuc amma haniana dekperagiande. Nga yeng neac hanianaac wiac dekperagiande, imocngo fora ande, imoc negenduae.
43005033	Anu ngeni ngic goa sueyunugec Yohanearu kenggec, yeng yoac foraac hepuc amma imoc dekperagiyemmeec.
43005034	Ngic mongngo neac dedekperagi naric mi deude, kpac. Ngeni ebicfunac mesingunuba komoc kpegecdeac yoac yomoc edengunuduae.
43005035	Yohane ye siriha yofi, kifa mong dzema mekperagingunuande, ye ifi isoc anec. Mekperagingunuu ngeni naso wegenanec kperagi imocac songo negemma kperagia imohai kecgec.
43005036	Ni neannaoc dedekperagi metacduae, imocngo Yohaneac dedekperagi ferahede. Nga Manggacngo uaya mema mesibadeac nenec. Amma ua mekecduaengo hepucna amma Manggacngo suenuec imoc dekperagiude.
43005037	Amma Manggac suenuec, yennoc hepucna amma haniana bic dekperagiec. Ye ngic sueu ngeneng ye mi negensinggedae amma Manggacac ubaudumeng mi negemma yengena dafia mi henggec nga enacyoarango ubaherenginau mi fede.
43005039	Mitikibingo kekecseri meficgengemmebesande, ngeni ifi negensinggema kibi imoc osonegeng angkecdae. Kibi imocngonoc neac hepuc amma neac hania dekperagiude.
43005040	Nga ngeni ine nearu hama kekec megecdeac mi angemmede.
43005041	Ni ngic yeneac dedengerec mi hoanggebade, kpac.
43005042	Nga Anutuac songo imoc ngeneac ubahereu mi fede, imoc negenduaengoc.
43005043	Nga ni Mannaac kpacfu haba ngeni mi hoannugecde. Nga ngic mong yengena kpacfu haudeu ngeni ye bic hoanggegecde.
43005044	Ngeni ngenaocngoc dengereemema Anutu mocgu yearunac dedengerec haande, imocac mi angemmeudeu ngeni ye negensinggegecdeac obohogecde.
43005045	Neng kecma Manggacaru yoacfu faingunubade, ngeni ifi mi negembisia. Ngeni Mosearu heirima kecgec yeng yoacfu faingunuude.
43005046	Mosengo neac negemma ohoec. Imocac amma ngeni imoc negensinggebau dede ni ifingoc negensinnubau.
43005047	Ngeni Moseac mitikibi mi negensinggedaeu neng yoac deduae, imoc ifingoc naric mi negensinggegecde.”
43006001	Yesungo yoac imoc dedacma Gariraia dzohongtoa, imocac kpara mong Tiberia dzohongtoa, imoc ferecgema edibigeng enec.
43006002	Nga yeng hafeigoc yenearu faka kuhagoc meu ngicngac yeneng imoc henggecac amma ngicngac habutoango ye modacgec.
43006003	Modacgec Yesungo medacfora yenigoc tikibumau emma tacgec.
43006004	Anu yudangic yeneac makekeng hombang naso wegeneec.
43006005	Nga Yesungo kic fiu kenu ngicngac habutoango kuting kuting yearu kenggec, yenemma Firipo yofi kpesimiec, “Nenang yaka dahacnac bummema ngicngac habutoa yomoc yemmeni negecde?”
43006006	Yeng noc faka meude, imoc bic negemma Firipo eng tobanggema kpesimiec.
43006007	Kpesimiu Firipongo meremmiec, “Nenang afo 8ac uabung, imocac socfu yaka bummema hesisicke yemmeni yeneacsoc mi anude.”
43006008	Ifi deu medacfora yeneac botucfunac Anderea, Simong Petoroac muneango deec,
43006009	“Medacbisic mong yei nande, ye ic sogong 5 bali gbomeango memea nga kondungyang yohockang mekecde, imocngo ine habutoa dafi yemmeni sokoyunuude?”
43006010	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngeni ngicngac matacgecdeac edeyunugec.” Ifi deu edeyunugec kpindzingtoa feec, imohai matacgec. Ngic tacgec, yeneac kpetengina 5 tauseng isoc anec.
43006011	Tackenggec Yesungo ic sogong imoc mema Anutu ubangerec edema mederema ngicngac ihai tacgec, yeni yemmeec. Yemmeu wisickeu kondungyang ifingoc mema medereu songonginaac areng menec anggec.
43006012	Negec gebecyunuu Yesungo medacfora yofi edeyunuec, “Yaka tosea neti anggec fema manganebacac ngeni imoc kpedzucnedacgec sakacfu kemedaru.”
43006013	Ifi deu yeni ic sogong 5 bic negec, imocac tosea kpedzucnedacgec kemema sakac 12 wakeec.
43006014	Wakeu ngicngac yeng faka kuhagoc meec, imoc hemma degec, “Foracngoc, ngic yocnoc profete bangecfu haudeac dedea.”
43006015	Nga ngic yeneng hama Yesu mendanggema ngictaungina faibesonga degec Yesungo negengyemmema meickema monggoc tembuha tikiu enec.
43006016	Enu ama kundung kpemanu medacfora yeni dzohongtoa tegiau kemegec.
43006017	Kememagec ama kundung kpeu Yesungo yenearu mi hamanu yenaocngoc gombau emma dzohongtoa ferecgema Kafanaung kembesonga kenggec.
43006018	Kemmagec firangtoa kpeu dzohonggac tembong kuneng yarec.
43006019	Nga yeni 5 me 6 kiromita, imocacsoc puri kpema kemmagec Yesungo doku witiau titi kemma gomba mewegeneu yeni hemma kengec anggec.
43006020	Ifi anggec ine Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Imoc ni, neannaoc haduae, ngeni kengec mi anggec.”
43006021	Ifi deu negemma Yesu gombau taiembeso ammagec gombango bangec kembeso degec, imohai bic kensikeec.
43006022	Wereckengau ngicngac habutoa yeneng dzohong noboc namma degec, “Gomba mocgungosac yoc taru hending. Nga Yesungo ine medacfora yenigoc imohai mi enu yeni tembucngina emma kendau.”
43006023	Ifi dema nammagec gomba goa Tiberia taonnunac kemma, Kebungo Anutu dangge dema ic sogong gumecyunuecfu, ama imoc mewegenema hagec.
43006024	Hama yeni Yesu nga medacfora ihai mi yenenggecac habutoango Yesu hofocbesonga Kafanaung taonnu kenggec.
43006025	Hofocma dzohong edibigeng kemma meficgema kpesimigec, “Rabbi, ge noc nasoac yei hadang?”
43006026	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Foracngoc, neng faka kuhagoc meba hendau, imocac amma mi hofocnudae, imoc edengunuduae. Ngeni yaka negebec andauac hofocnudae.
43006027	Yaka mong hoaema kpac angande, ngeni imocac uatoa mi mebisia. Nga Ngicac Medacngo kekecseriac yaka ngemmeude, imocac uatoa mebisia. Imoc yofiac, yeac witiu Anutu Manggacngo yengena dedeseriac dzic faiec.”
43006028	Ifi deu yeni kpesimigec, “Anutuac ua mebeso dema noc ua meni ngereeude?”
43006029	Ifi degec turunga yofi merengyemmeec, “Anutuac ua yomocnoc. Anutungo ngic sueu haec, ngeni ye negensinggegec.”
43006030	Ifi deu yeneng degec, “Hemma negensinggunideac noc faka kuhagoc menade nga ge noc ua naric menade?
43006031	Kisicfocnina bangec kisiu mannayaka nekecgec, imocacnoc yofi oho ohoya fede, ‘Ye kurumennunac yaka yemmeu nekecgec.’ ” (Mke 16:4; Myeg 78:24)
43006032	Ifi degec yofi edeyunuec, “Foracngoc, Mose ye yengenaoc kurumenggac yaka mi mema ngemmeec, imoc edengunuduae. Mannango kurumenggac yaka fora ngemmeude.
43006033	Anutuac yaka, ngic yennoc kurumennunac mama bangecngic yeneac kekec meficgeyemmeude.”
43006034	Yeng ifi deu degec, “Kebu, ge yaka imoc nasosoc nemmekecbesena.”
43006035	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ni neannaoc yaka kekehagoc, imocac ngic mong ye nearu haude, yeng yakaac mi homeude nga mong ye ni negensinnuude, yeng dokuac monggoc mi ammiude.
43006036	Neng ine yofi bic edengunuai, ngeni bic nenggec nga sifu mi negensinnuandae.
43006037	Mannango ngicngac sasawa nenec, yeneng nearu hagec ngadeau naric mi kisangyunubade.
43006038	Ni neanna ubanaac kurumennunac mi mayai. Suenuec, yeac negen negeng modacbadeac mayai.
43006039	Nga suenuec, yeac songo nga negen negeng yofi, ye yengenaoc ngicngac nenec, yeni marina titingaunac mi mabisia nga yeni kecma naso wisic wisickeau midiyunuba yacdacgecde.
43006040	Mannaac negen negeng imoc yofi, ngicngac Medaha hemma negensinggegecde, yeni sasawango kekecseri megecde. Nga naso wisic wisickeau neng midiyunubesandua.”
43006041	Nga yeng yofi deec, “Ni neannaoc yaka fora amma kurumennunac mayai.” Imocac amma yudangic yeneng negenggec naric mi anu degec, “Ngic yomoc Yesu, i. Ye Yosefeac medac nga neni nonggomama negengyurudimbe. Ammanu yeng dafi yofi dede, ‘Ni kurumennunac mayai.’ ”
43006043	ifi degec Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngeni negemmangang wagec.
43006044	Mannango ngic mong mi heitaiudeu yeng nearu naric mi haude. Manggac suenuec, yeng ngicngac heitaiyunuec nga neng naso wisic wisickeau midiyunubesandua.
43006045	Profete yeneac kibiu yoac yofi oho ohoya fede, ‘Anutungo kpouyemmedarec.’ (Yes 54:13) Imocac amma ngicngac sasawa Manggacac yoacfu kedzac faima yearunac negen negeng medae, yeneng nearu hadacgecde.
43006046	Ngic mongngo Manggac mi henec, kpac. Ngic mocgungo Manggacgoc kefec, yeng Manggac henec.
43006047	Foracngoc, ngic mongngo ye negensinggede, yeng kekecserigoc anude.
43006048	Ni neannaoc kekecac yaka.
43006049	Kisicfocnina yeneng bangec kisiu mannayaka nema homedacgec.
43006050	Ngeni yaka kurumennunac maec, yocnoc nema mi homegecde.
43006051	Ni neannaoc yaka kekehagoc amma kurumennunac mayai. Ngic mong ye yaka imoc neudeu ye kekecseri meficgema kechereema kecbesande. Yaka imoc fusina. Ngicngo kekec meficgegecdeac yemmebade.”
43006052	Ifi deu yudangic yoacngina manganeu degec, “Ngic yomoc ye dafi sebifusia nemmeu nenideac dede?”
43006053	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Foracngoc, ngeni Ngicac Medac sacfusia mi negecdeu kekecngo ngenearu mi feude, imoc edengunuduae.
43006054	Imoc yofiac, neac fusi, imocngo yaka fora nga neac sac, imocngo doku fora, imocac amma ngic mong ye sacfusina neude, yeng kekecserigoc anu neng naso wisic wisickeau ye megboribesandua.
43006056	Anu mong ye neac sac nga fusi neude, yeng neac heremanau kefu neng yeac heremanau kecbade.
43006057	Manggac suenuec, ye kekec mingina nga ni yeac amma kecduae. Nga mong ye fusina neude, ye ifi isocngoc neac amma kefude.
43006058	Yaka yomocngo kurumennunac maec kecde, imoc bangecfocninango yaka nema homegec, ifi isoc kpac. Mongngo yaka yomoc neude, yeng kecma kekecseri meude nga mekecbesande.”
43006059	Yesungo yoac imoc Kafanaung kpekpeturang amau ngicngac edekpou ayemmeec.
43006060	Ifi deu negemma medacfora yenearunac homacngo degec, “Kpoukpou imoc ebihagoc, mongngo imoc negemma naric mi modarude.”
43006061	Ifi degec Yesungo edekpou ayemmeu medac yeni yoac homac osogecac yengenaoc negengyemmema yofi edeyunuec, “Yoac imocngo memanganengunude me?
43006062	Nga Ngicac Medac ye warac kefecfu dzigene enu ngeni imoc hemma dafi anggecde?
43006063	Asungo kekec meefaiude nga sebiac kekec, imocngo memefiha kpac. Ni yoac edengunudua, imoc Asu nga kekec.
43006064	Anu ngeneac botucfunac goango ine yoacna mi negensinggedae.” Imoc yofiac, ngicngac damoc yeneng ye mi negensinggegec nga ngic merang Yesu doc mema ngaba yeneac mariu faiude, Yesungo imoc bic negenec.
43006065	Ifi anu yofi torokpeec, “Ngic goa ngeneng mi negensinggedae, imocac amma waraima bic edengunudua, Manggacngo ngic mong mi meefaiudeu, yeng nearu naric mi haude.”
43006066	Ifi deu medac homacngo Yesu wama amanginau kemma yegoc monggoc mi yerecgegec.
43006067	Kenggec Yesungo medacfora 12 yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Ngeni ifingoc wanuma kembeso angemmede me?”
43006068	Ifi deu Simong Petorongo yofi meremmiec, “Kebu, gearu kekecseriac yoac fora fedeac neni ngic monggaru naric mi kennide.
43006069	Neni bic negentegecma negensinggudimbe, genoc Anutuac Kpetiacngic.”
43006070	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Neng medac 12 meisingngunuai nga ngenearunac ine mongngo hadehade ande.”
43006071	Ye yoac imoc Simong, Karioto taonnunac yeac medaha Yudaac negemma deec. Ngic imocngo medac 12 yenearunac amma yeng Yesu doc meudeac anec.
43007001	Imocac ngadeau yudangic Yudaia bangecfu kecgec, yeni Yesu kpehomebesonga sing hofocgec. Imocac amma yeng ihai mi kengha amma Gariraia bangecfu yerecgema kefec.
43007002	Anu yudangic yeneac bedzo 40ac hombang wegene haec.
43007003	Nga Yesu munafora yeneng edegec, “Ge bangec yomoc wama Yudaia bangecfu kemma fakaga imoc ihai mena medacfocga henggecde.
43007004	Mong ye habu yeneac kicfu fingecbeso negende, ye sufu sufuu ua mi mebeso. Ge fakaga imoc annadeu ngicngac yeneng fakaga hentegecgecdeac didiu kecma mebesena.”
43007005	Nga munafora yeneng ifingoc ye mi negensinggegec.
43007006	Ifi anggec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Neac naso mi hadac nga ngeneac naso, imoc ine nasosoc feude.
43007007	Ngicngac yeni ubango naric mi ukungunugecde. Nga neng ine angammemengina mangana dekperagianduaeac ubango ukunukecdae.
43007008	Ngeni hombannu kenggec nga ni ine bic mi kembade nocac neac nasoyombong mi ande.”
43007009	Ye ifi dema wama Gariraia bangecfu tarec.
43007010	Taru munafora hombanggac kemmagec ye ifingoc kemma fingectegecma mi keng keng sufu sufuu kenec.
43007011	Ifi anu yudangic yeneng hombannu Yesu hofocma kpesiemegec, “Ngic imoc dahai?”
43007012	Kpesiemegec ngicngac habutoango yeac sangic kpema homac denegeng amma degec, “Ye ngic gombunga.” ifi demagec goa yeneng degec, “Kpac, ngic imocngo ngicngac habutoa ikoc ayemmeande.”
43007013	Amma yudangic yeneac kengecyunuu mongngo Yesuac yoac didiu mi deec.
43007014	Anu hombang imoc bic dzonginemanu Yesungo womonnu emma ngicngac edekpou ayemmeec.
43007015	Kpouyemmeu negemma yudangic yeneng kerectegec amma degec, “Ngic imoc ye dafi, ye negen negeng mong mi mema sifu mitikibiu yoac oho ohoya fede, imoc negende.”
43007016	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Ni yoac kpoungemmeduae, imoc neanna yoac kpac. Imoc suenuec, yeac yoac.
43007017	Ni yoac kpoungemmeduae, imoc Anutuarunac me neanna ubanaac deduae, imoc ngic mongngo Anutuac enac tofohobeso negende, yeng negentegerude.
43007018	Ngic mong ye ubeaac yoac deande, ye yengena dedengerec fingerudeac negensima imoc deude. Nga mong ye ngic sueec, yeac dedengerec fingerudeac ua meande, yeng ngic fora, yearu faka dindingac fede. Faka segesegea yearu mong mi fede.
43007019	Mosengo dedeseriyoac ngemmeec, fora. Nga ngenearunac ngic mongngo imoc ine mi modackecde, kpac. Amma ngeni nocac nuhomebeso negendae?”
43007020	Ifi deu habutoa yeneng merenggec, “Ge yafinggagoc. Merang gubeso dede?”
43007021	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ni faka kuhagoc meba ngeni henggecac sasawango kerectegec andae.
43007022	Negenggec, Mosengo ngeni sebi tosangina, imoc herecgegecdeac uayoac ngemmeec. Mose ye yengenaoc imoc mi hanahemanu yeac bangecfora yeneng ine hanahegec. Imocac amma ngeni faka imoc modacma sabata nasoungoc ua imoc megecde.
43007023	Amma ngeni Moseac dedeseriyoac mi ferahegecdeac sabata nasoungoc ngic yeneac sebi tosangina herecgeandae. Ngeni faka ifia mekecdaeu neng sabata nasou ngic mong sebia hafoangoc mengerebare nocac ngaba anendae?
43007024	Ngeni kicnginango sebiu heheng imohai mi isinggema debisia. Ngeni ine yoac dindingac negengising amma debisia.”
43007025	Ifi deu Yerusaleng taonggac ngic goango kpesiemegec, “Ngic imoc kpehomebeso dedae me?
43007026	Nga ngic ye yoac didiu demanu nocac turunga mong mi merendae? Yeni ye Messia, imoc bic ireckedae gedang.
43007027	Nga Messia haudeu ye dahacnac haude imoc ngic mongngo mi negenude nga ngic yoc ye dahacnac, imoc ine negendacdimbe.”
43007028	Ifi degec Yesungo imoc negemma womong manau namma yoac kucgoc dema yofi edekpou ayemmeec, “Ngeni ni negennuma dahacnac hayai, imoc negendaengoc. Ni neanna negen negennu wiac mong mebesonga mi hayai. Suenuec, yeng fora anu ngeneng ye mi negendae.
43007029	Nga suenuec, ye negemmiduae, nocac yearunacnoc hayai.”
43007030	Ifi deu yeni mendanggema witicamau faibesonga negenggec. Nga nasoya mi haecac mongngo mi kpeserema megec.
43007031	Nga habutoa yenearunac ngicngac homacngo ye negensinggema degec, “Messiango haude, imohai yeng faka kuhagoc meude, imoc ngic yocngo faka kuhagoc homacngoc meande, imoc mi ferahema meude.”
43007032	Habutoa yeneng ifi dema sangicfu yoac denengeng anggec. Anggec farisaio yeneng imoc negemma womonggareng enarafocngina yenigoc kpedzucnema keracnatang sueyunugec Yesu mendanggema witicamau faigecdeac kenggec.
43007033	Ifi anggec Yesungo yofi deec, “Ni naso wegenanecsac ngenigoc kecbade. Kecma suenuec, yearu monggoc dzigenema embade.
43007034	Ngeni ni hofocnubibiema naric mi meficnugecde nga ni kembade, imohai ngeni naric mi hagecde.”
43007035	Ifi deu yudangic yenaocngoc denegeng amma degec, “Ngic yomoc ye dahai kenu hofocma mi hennideac dede. Ye arengfocnina grik bangecfu sinsararang kpema kecdae, ihai gedang kemma grikngicngac yoac edekpou ayemmeude.
43007036	Ngeni ni hofocnubibiema naric mi meficnugecde nga ni kembade, imohai ngeni naric mi hagecde. Yoac imocac hania mi negentegecdimbe.”
43007037	Hombang wisic wisickea, imocac nasoyadau Yesungo mama yoac kucgoc yofi deec, “Ngic mong ye dokuac homeandeu ye nearu naric hama nebeso.
43007038	Nga mongngo ni negensinnude, yeacnoc mitikibiu yofi oho ohoya fede, ‘Yeac hereunac kekecac dokukiwa tohoma kenude.’ ”
43007039	Ngicngac ye negensinggema kecdae, yeneng Tiri Asu ngade megecde, imocac ifi deec. Yesungo naso imohai kurumennu emma kuc nga kibikperagiagoc mi anecac amma Asu imoc mi yemmeyemmea.
43007040	Anu ngicngac habutoa yeneng yoara imoc negemma goango degec, “Ngic yomocngo profetenina fora yombong.”
43007041	Amma goa yeneng degec, “Ngic imoc ye Messia.” nga goa yeneng degec, “Kpahac, Messiango Gariraia bangecfunac mi haude.”
43007042	Mitikibiu yoac yofi oho ohoya fede, “Ye Dawidiac dzominga Beterehennunac, imoc Dawidiac ama yombong.”
43007043	ngic yeni ifi dema Yesuac amma tohoemmegec.
43007044	Tohoma goango ye mendanggema witicamau faibesonga, ifi degec amma mongngo ine sebiau mi kpesereec.
43007045	Keracnatang yeni womonggareng enara nga farisaio yenearu eng dzigenema kenggecac kpesiyemmegec, “Ngeni nocac Yesu mi mehadae?”
43007046	Kpesiyemmegec degec, “Ngic mongngo yoac ifia deu mi negenning.”
43007047	Ifi degec farisaio yeneng merengyemmegec, “Ngeni ifingoc yeac ikocfu makpedau me?
43007048	Enarameme nga farisaio neneac botucfunac mongngo ye naric mi negensinggedimbe, kpac yombong.
43007049	Nga sicsauc areng yomocngo dedeseriyoac mi negentegecdae, ngeni sowec medae.”
43007050	Ifi degec, yenearunac mong kpara Nikodemo, ye warac Yesuaru kenec, yeng yofi deec, “Dedeseriyoacninango yofi dede, ‘Ngic monggac yoara nga angammemea mi hennegeng amma isinggema tactacngoc yoacfu mi faibesonga.’ ”
43007052	Ifi deu turunga yofi meremmigec, “Ge ifingoc Gariraia bangecfunac me? Mitikibiu hennegeng amma yofi bic hennade, profete mongngo Gariraia bangecfunac mi fingerude.”
43007053	Ifi dema yacma amanginasoc kendacgec.
43008001	Yesungo oliwatikiu emma taru ama wereckembeso ammanu mama monggoc Anutuac womonnu enec. Enu ngicngac yearu hadacgec tacma miti kpouyemmeec.
43008003	Ifi amma tacmanu mitiac negen negengngic nga farisaio yeneng ngac mong serofaka anu hemma Yesuaru mehama kicnginau faigec nanec.
43008004	Nanu Yesu kpesimigec, “Kpoukpou, ngac yomocngo serofaka kicninau anu hending.
43008005	Nga dedeseriyoacfu Mosengo ngac ifianoc hocngo yenerehomenideac deserinemmeec. Geng yaguc dafi denec?”
43008006	Yeni Yesungo yoac mong dafi deu negemma yoacfu faini dema faitobang ammigec. Ifi ammigec Yesungo ngonducnema gbongango bangecfu kibi ohoec.
43008007	Ohoma nammanu kpesima kpesi anggec kpehengaima yofi edeyunuec, “Ngenearunac ngic mong kopocsiha kpac kecde, yeng waraima hoc ukuu ukubisia.”
43008008	Ifi dema monggoc ngonducnema bangecfu kibi ohoec.
43008009	Anu yeni Yesuac yoac imoc negemma kifanginaac sirihau yadango waraima Yesu wama kendacgec ngac ye botucnginau tembuha nanec.
43008010	Ifi nanu Yesungo kpehengai hemma yofi kpesimiec, “Ngac, ngic yeni dahai kendau? Ge manganaac areng, imoc mong dedau me?”
43008011	Kpesimiu deec, “Kebuna, kpac.” Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Neng ifingoc ge mangana areng mi debade. Ge kemma kopocsic monggoc mi meficgebesena.”
43008012	Yesungo monggoc torokpema yoac yofi edeyunuec, “Ni bangectoa bangec imocac ngicngac ngeneac kperagi. Mong ye ni modacnude, yeng kundunggac sing mong mi modarude. Amma ye kekecac kperagi mekefude.”
43008013	Ifi deu farisaio yeneng merenggec, “Ge geanggaocngoc dekperagiemenec, imoc singngo mi dedeac yoacga fora mi ande.”
43008014	Yesungo meremma yofi edeyunuec, “Ni neannaocngoc haniana dekperagiemeduae, imoc fora. Ni dahacnac hayai nga dahai kembade, imoc neannaoc negenduae. Ngeni ine dahacnac hayai nga dahai kembade, imoc mi negendae.
43008015	Ngeni bangecngic siricnginau ngicngac fakangina isinggema haniangina deandae. Neng ngic mong isinggema hania dede ua mi mebade.
43008016	Ni tembucna ua imoc mi mekecduae. Manggac suenuec, yegoc ua mekecdipe. Imocac neng desi desiua meduaeu imocngo foragoc ande.
43008017	Dedeseriyoacnginau yoac yofi oho ohoya fede, ‘Ngic yohockang dedengira mocgu anu yoacngira fora anude.’
43008018	Imocac amma neannaocngoc dekperagiemeba Manna suenuec, yeng ifingoc hepucna amma dekperaginuude.”
43008019	Ifi deu farisaio yeneng kpesimigec, “Geac Mangga dahai kecde?” degec Yesungo meremma yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni ni mi negennudae nga Manna ifingoc mi negemmidae. Ngeni ni negennubau debac Manna ifingoc negemmibau.”
43008020	Yoac imoc, womonggac mana monnu soikia katapa tarecfu, imohai ngic edekpou ayemmeec. Nga ngic mongngo mendanggema witicamau mi faigec nocac ye ifi ammigecdeac naso mi anec.
43008021	Amma Yesungo monggoc yofi edeyunuec, “Ni kemba ngeni hofocnuma kopocsicnginagoc kecma homegecde. Nga ni kembade, imohai ngeneng naric mi hagecde.”
43008022	Ifi deu yudangic yeneng degec, “Ni kembade, imohai ngeni naric mi hagecde. Ye nocac ifi dede? Yengena sebia eweude me?”
43008023	Ifi degec yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeneng emu bangecfunac nga ni bangecfunac kpac, ni wihacnac.
43008024	Imocacnoc edengunuduae, ngeni kopocsicnginagoc kecma homegecde. Ngeni ‘ni kecduaengoc’, imoc mi negensinggedaeu kopocsicngina fekefu homegecde.”
43008025	Ifi deu kpesimigec, “Anu ge merac?” degec yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Ni haniana bic edengunudua.
43008026	Ni ngeneac haifakangina homac hennegeng amma isinggema desibadeac fede. Anu suenuec, ye yoac foraac mingina nga wiac yearunac negenduae, imoc bangecfu dekperagibade.”
43008027	Yesungo Mamaac negemma edeyunuu yeni obohogec.
43008028	Obohogec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni Ngicac Medac nanggegec nanude, ngeni naso imohai ‘ni kecduaengoc’, imoc negentegecgecde. Ni wiac mong neannaoc mi angkecduae, Mannango kpounenec, imoc debade.
43008029	Suenuec, yeng nigoc kecde. Ni yeac songo modacma ua mekecduae. Imocac amma ye wanuu tembucna mi kecbade.”
43008030	Yesungo yoac ifi deu ngicngac homacngo ye negensinggegec.
43008031	Yesungo yudangic ye negensinggegec, yeni yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni neac yoac hoanggema kecgecdeu neac medacfocna fora anggecde.
43008032	Ifi amma yoac fora negentegecgecde nga yoac forango witicfunac yungecngunuude.”
43008033	Ifi deu meremmigec, “Neni Abrahanggac kisicfunac, mongngo wanac mi menunuec. Nga merang wanac menunuecac geng yungecnununadeac denec?”
43008034	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi deec, “Ni fora yombong edengunuba, mongngo kopocsic meande, ye kopocsicngo wanac meu wanacngiha kecde.
43008035	Wanac meu kecande, ye ama imocac manau hombonanga naric mi kefude. Nga Medacngo ama imocac manau hombonanga kefude.
43008036	Imocac Medacngo yungecngunuudeu ngeni witicngina kpac kecgecde.
43008037	Ngeni Abrahanggac kisicfora, imoc negenduae. Neac yoacac titinga mong ine ngeneac ubahereu mi nandeac nuhomebeso efaidae.
43008038	Ni Mannaac hoannu kecma wiac hennegeng anai, imocnoc edengunuduae. Nga ngeni ine mangnginaarunac wiac nga faka negengandae, imocnoc amma kecdae.”
43008039	Ifi deu degec, “Neneac mannina Abrahang.” degec Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Ngeni Abrahanggac nambaracfora ambau debac yeac kekec nga faka modacbau.
43008040	Ni ngic mongngo Anutuarunac yoac fora negemma edengunubare ngeni nocac nuhomebeso andae? Abrahang ye faka ifia mong mi angkefec.
43008041	Ngeni ine mangnginaac kekec nga faka modacandae.” Ifi deu yeneng degec, “Neni sicsaucfunac mong mi fingering, kpac yombong. Mannina mocgu Anutu.”
43008042	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi deec, “Ni Anutuarunac fingecma neanna ubanaac mi mayai. Yennoc suenuec, imocac ngeni Anutu mangngina ambac dede heregoc neac songo negemma hoannubau.
43008043	Nga ngeni ine yoacnaac kedzac kpegecdeacsoc mi ande, imocac amma ngeni yoac deanduae, imoc mi negentegecdae.
43008044	Nga mangana mingina, yennoc ngeneac mangngina nga faka yeac songou fede, ngeni imoc megecdeac angemmeude. Ye hanahemangoc ngic yunuhomeande nocac yeac ubahereau faka fora mi feu faka fora mi mema nangkecde. Ye ikocngic nga ye ikocac mama kecdenoc. Imocac amma ye yoac ikoc dema yengenaoc nanggeeme kefude.
43008045	Nga ni yoac fora deduaeac ngeni neac yoacna mi negensinggegecde.
43008046	Ngenearunac mongngo neac kopocsic mong negendaeu naric mi heficgebac. Nga ni yoac fora deduae isoc ngeni nocac mi negensinnudae?
43008047	Anutuac arengfora yenennoc yoara negenggecde. Ngeni ine Anutuac arengfora kpac, imocac yeac yoac mi negenggecde.”
43008048	Anu yudangic yeneng meremmigec, “Ge samariangicnoc amma ge hadehadegagoc, ifi deandimbe nga imoc yoac fora.”
43008049	Ifi degec Yesungo meremma yofi edeyunuec, “Ni hadehadena kpac. Ni Manna eweheihei ammiba ngeneng ine eweheihei mong mi anengandae.
43008050	Ni neanna kpac kuneng mebadeac ua mi meanduae nga mongngo neac kpac miacma desiude.
43008051	Foracngoc, ngic mong ye neac yoac mekefudeu, ye naric mi homeude nga homebesande, ni edengunuduae.”
43008052	Ifi deu yudangic yeneng degec, “Ge hadehadegagoc, neni yaguc negenggudimbe. Abrahang ye homeec nga profete yeni ifingoc homegec. Geng ine denec, ‘Mong ye neac yoac mekefude, yeng mi homeude nga homebesande.’
43008053	Anu ge kisicnina Abrahanggac engena mi annec. Ye homeec nga profete yeni ifingoc homegec. Amma ge geanggaac negenna engena ande, imocngo naric mi ande.”
43008054	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ni neannaoc dengereemebadeu imocngo fora mi ambac. Nga Manna ngeneac Anutungina kecde, yeac ifi deandae, yeng eweheihei anende.
43008055	Ngeneng mi negemmidae, neannaoc ine ye negemmiduae. Neng ye mi negemmiduae debadeu, ngic ikoha amma ngeni isoc ambade. Ni negemmiduaengo yoara mekecduae.
43008056	Bangecngina Abrahang ye neac naso fingeru imoc hembeso negemma songotoa femiec. Femiu hemma songo negenec.”
43008057	Ifi deu yudangic yeneng degec, “Ge kifaga 50 mi andacngoc nga ge Abrahang hennec, imoc naric mi heide.”
43008058	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi deec, “Foracngoc, Abrahang mi fingecmanu ‘ni kecduaengoc’, imoc edengunuduae.”
43008059	Ifi deu yeni hoc mema heibeso anggec yeng sufu sufuu womong ngadeau kemeec.
43009001	Yesungo sinnu kemma ngic mong kicpisic fingec fingera henec.
43009002	Henu medacfora yeneng kpesimigec, “Rabbi, ngic yoc meracac kopocsicac amma kicpisic fingerec? Yengenaac me nonggomama yereac kopocsicac?”
43009003	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic yengena me nonggomama yeneng kopocsic meficgegec, imocac kpac. Anutuac ua mong yearu fingectegeru henggecdeac ifia fingerec.
43009004	Suenuec, nenang yeac ua wenacfungoc mekecbisina. Nga ama toforemanu mongngo ua naric mi meude.
43009005	Ni bangecfu kecma bangecac kperagi anduae.”
43009006	Ifi dema bangecfu sofohoma imoc bangecgoc yerecgeu goteng fingeru ngic kicpisic yeac kiwau hosoec.
43009007	Hosoma yofi edeec, “Ge Siroang dzohonnu kemma doku nadzicna.” (Siroanggac titiha imoc “Sueec.”) Ifi deu kemma nadzicma kicfifi amma dzigeneec.
43009008	Ifi amma dzigene hau amafora nga ngicngac goa warac iwaiac derecgekefu henggec, yeneng degec, “Ngic yomocngo tacma derecgekefec me?”
43009009	Goango degec, “Imoc yennoc.” Nga tosea yeneng ine degec, “Imoc ye kpac, imoc ye isoc mong.” nga yengenaoc deec, “Ni ngic yomocnoc.”
43009010	Ifi deu kpesimigec, “Ge dafi amma kicga fidang?”
43009011	Ifi degec deec, “Ngic kpara Yesu, yeng goteng yerecgema kicnau hosoma suenuma deec, ‘Ge kemma Siroannu doku nadzicna.’ ifi deu kemma nadzicma kicfifi andua.”
43009012	Ifi deu kpesimigec, “Nga ngic imoc damoc?” degec deec, “Ni mi negenduae.”
43009013	Ifi deu yeni ngic warac kicpisic kefec, imoc farisaio yenearu hesicke kenggec.
43009014	Nga Yesungo goteng yerecgema ngic kiwa merecgeu kicfifi anec, imoc sabata nasou ifi anec.
43009015	Nga farisaio yeneng ifingoc ngic hemma kpesimigec, “Ge dafi amma kicfifi andang?” degec deec, “Ye gotengngo kicnau hosou imoc nadzicma kicfifi andua.”
43009016	Ifi deu farisaio goango degec, “Ngic imoc ye sabata tatacninaac sing mi modacde, imocac ye Anutuarunac kpac.” Ifi degec goango degec, “Ngic kopocsihagocngo dafi faka kuhagoc ifia mebac?” Ifi dema yenaocngoc tohogec.
43009017	Tohoma kicpisicngo kicfifi anec, ye monggoc kpesimigec, “Ge ngic kicga merecgeec, yeac dafi denec?” degec deec, “Ye profete mong.”
43009018	Ifi deu yudangic yeneng ngic imoc kicpisic kefecfunac ngereema kicfifi anec, imoc mi negensinggegecac nonggomama kpacyuruma
43009019	kpesiyecmegec, “Ngic yomoc ye ngereac medac me? Ye kicpisic fingerec, ifi dedape me? Nga ye dafiu yaguc kicfifi ande?”
43009020	Ifi degec nonggomama yereng yofi merennoc, “Ngic yomoc nereac medac. Ye kicpisic fingerec, imoc negendipe.
43009021	Nga dafiu yaguc kicfifi ande nga merang kiwa merecgedac, imoc neri mi negendipe. Ye bic yadi yadiaac amma yengena kpesimigec, yengenaoc haniaya edengunubeso.”
43009022	Yeri yudangic yeneac kengecyuruu ifi deoc. Yudangic yeneng yoac mong bic yofi dedzege anggec, “Mongngo Yesu ye Messianoc ifi dema deficgeudeu neni ye kpebung yeneac ngadeau faini kefude.”
43009023	Imocac amma nonggomama yereng deoc, “Ye bic yadi yadiaac yengena kpesimigec.”
43009024	Ifi deec yeni monggoc ngic kicpisic kefecmoc, ye naso yohockang kpacma edegec, “Ge Anutu afehena. Ngic dedang, ye kopocsihagoc, imoc negemmidimbe.”
43009025	Ifi degec, yeng merengyemmeec, “Ngic imoc kopocsicmeme me kpac, imoc mi negenduae. Nga wiac mocgu negenduae, ni warac kicpisic kefaingo yaguc kicfifi anduae.”
43009026	Ifi deu kpesimigec, “Ye noc wiac anggendac? Ye siriha dafiu kicga merecgedac?”
43009027	Ifi degec yeng merengyemmeec, “Ni imoc bic edengunudacdua nga ngeni ine nearu kedzac mi faidau. Ngeni nocac monggoc negembeso andae? Ngeni ifingoc yeac medacfora ambeso negensidae me?”
43009028	Ifi deu yeni desusuic ammigec, “Genoc ngic imocac medac nga neni Moseac medacforango kecdimbe.
43009029	Anutungo Mose edeu yoara deec, imoc negendimbe. Nga ngic yomoc ye dahacnac, imoc ine mi negemmidimbe.”
43009030	Ifi degec yofi merengyemmeec, “Ngic imoc kicna merecgedac. Nga ye dahacnac haec, imoc ngeni mi negendae. Ni imocac warecngunuduae.
43009031	Nenang yofi negendimbe, Anutungo kopocsicmeme yeneac yoac naric mi negengyemmeude. Anu ngic mongngo eweheimima dedea tofohoande, Anutungo ye negemmiude.
43009032	Bicngoc yombong hanahema feerekefecfu siduc mong yofia mi negenning, ‘Ngic mong kicpisic fingecma kecmanu ngic mongngo kiwa merecgeec.’
43009033	Ngic imoc Anutuarunac mi mabac dede, ye ua mong ifia naric mi mebac.”
43009034	Ifi deu yofi meremmigec, “Ge hafoangoc manganaunac fingecnecngo yoac kpounemmenec, i.” Ifi dema kucgoc kisanggec maec.
43009035	Anu Yesungo ngic kisanggec maec, imoc negemma hofockemma meficgema edeec, “Ge ngicac medac negensinggenec me?”
43009036	Ifi deu ngic imocngo deec, “Kunenna, ye merac? Edzacnuna hemma negensinggeba.”
43009037	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ge bic hendang. Ngic imocngonoc gegoc yoacyoac ande.”
43009038	Ifi deu deec, “Kebu, ni negensingguduae.” Ifi dema ye afeheec.
43009039	Nga Yesungo yofi deec, “Ni fakanginaac ising ising fingerudeac bangecfu mayaiac ngic kicpisicngo kicfifi anggecde nga kicfifi yeni kicpisic anggecde.”
43009040	Yoac ifi deu farisaio goa yegoc nanggec, yeneng imoc negemma degec, “Neni ifingoc kicpisic me?”
43009041	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngeni kicpisic kecbau debac kopocsic mi fengemmebac amma ngeneng ine yaguc dedae, ‘Neni kicfifi kecdimbe.’ imocac amma kopocsicngina fengemmekefude.”
43010001	Ni fora yombong edengunuduae, “Ngic mongngo rama yeneac oda manau embeso dema oda naguya wama monnusing enudemoc, ye hamangec nga godzungic.
43010002	Ngic naguusing engande, yeng rama yeneac gareng.
43010003	Nga nagugarengngo yeac amma odanaguya naric witiude. Witiu rama yeneng ubea negenggec, yengenaoc rama kpacnginau kparu hagec waraiyemmeu yenahafoc ngadeau kemegecde.
43010004	Ye ramafora hesicyunuu kemedacgec waraiyemmeu ramafora yeni yeac ubea negendaeac ye modacgecde.
43010005	Amma yeni ngic furia naric mi modacgecde. Yeneng yeac ubea mi negendaeac kengec amma woragecde.”
43010006	Yesungo yoac yomoc heima deu yeneng ine imocac obohogec.
43010007	Obohogec Yesungo monggoc yofi edeyunuec, “Foracngoc, neng rama yeneac nagu, imoc edengunuduae.
43010008	Ngic goa ni mi fingecbare hagec, yeneng hamangec nga godzungic. Nga rama yeneng ine yenearu kedzac mi faigec.
43010009	Ni neannaoc nagu. Mongngo nearu ferecgema oda manau enudeu Anutungo ye ebicfunac mesiu komoc kpeude. Amma ye naguusing engemmama amma nenesemeng meficgeude.
43010010	Hamangecngic yeng wiac hamangec meudeac nga yunuhomema kpetotieyunuudeac haude. Nga neng kekec monggoc nga monggoc mekecgecdeac hayai.
43010011	Neannaoc ramagareng gombunga. Gareng gombungango rama yeneac amma kekeha waude.
43010012	Nga ngic mong ye yagura kemma ngic monggac ramagareng kecde, yeng rama yeneac mingingngina mi amma kecmanu katekasi hau ine hengkpatema woraude. Worau katekasingo rama yininegiric ayemmeude.
43010013	Ngic imoc ye yaguraua mekecdeac rama yeneac negengyohoc mi anude.
43010014	Neannaoc ramagareng gombunga. Mannango ni negennude nga neng Manna negenduae, ifi isoc neannaoc ramafocna negengyunuduae nga ramafocna yeneng negennudae. Neng rama yeneac amma kekecna wabade.
43010016	Amma ramafocna goa kecdae, yeni oda yomohanac kpac. Nga neng hesicyunuba ubana negenggecde. Ifi anggec ramakpebung mocgu nga ramagareng mocgu anude.
43010017	Ni kekecna wama monggoc mebadeac amma Manggacngo neac songo negende.
43010018	Ngic mongngo nearunac kekecna naric mi meickeu ni neannaoc kekecna wabade. Amma kekecna wama monggoc mebade, imocac uayoac nga kuc nearu fede. Imoc Mannango deserinenec.”
43010019	Yoac imocac amma yudangic yeni monggoc tohogec.
43010020	Tohoma ngic homac yeneng degec, “Ye yafingagoc kecdeac ubasufu ande. Ngeni nocac yearu kedzac faidae?”
43010021	Nga ngic tosea yeneng degec, “Yoac ifia ngic yafingnginagoc, yeneac yoac kpac. Yafing yeni kicpisic kiwa naric mi merecgegecde.”
43010022	Yerusalennu nomang naso anu womong naguya bicngoc desigec, imocac hombannaso anec.
43010023	Imohai Yesungo womong manau firangmemeac mana mong feec, kpara Salomoac firangmeme mana, ihai kengha anec.
43010024	Ifi anu yudangic yeneng oronggema edegec, “Ge noc nasou haniaga dekperaginemmena negemma monggoc mi obohonide? Ge Messia kecnecfu imoc deireckenemmena.”
43010025	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merenec, “Imoc bic edengunuai anu ngeni mi negensinggedae. Ni Mannaac kpacfu ua mekecduae, imocngo haniana mekperagiude.
43010026	Ngeni ine mi negensinnudae, nocac ngeni neac ramafocna, yenearunac kpac.
43010027	Ramafocna yeni ubanaac kedzac faigec ni negengyunuba yeneng modacnugecde.
43010028	Modacnugec kekecseri yemmeba yeni wiac mongngo naric mi memanganeyunuude. Nga ngic mongngo marinaunac naric mi mesiyunuude nga mesiyunubesande.
43010029	Mannango yeni nenec, yeng wiac sasawa yeneac engena. Imocac Mannaac mariunac mongngo naric mi mesiyunuude.
43010030	Ni nga Manggac neri mocgu.”
43010031	Ifi deu yudangic yeneng hocngo heigecdeac hoc monggoc megec.
43010032	Ifi anggec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Manggacac ua gombung homac edzacngunuai. Anu hania damocac ngeni ngaba amma hocngo nerebesonga andae?”
43010033	Ifi deu yudangic yeneng merenggec, “Ua gombungaac amma hocngo gerebeso mi andimbe. Ge bangecngicngo geangaac Anutu dema Anutu emminec, imocac amma ine hocngo gerebeso andimbe.”
43010034	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merenec, “Dedeseriyoacnginau yoac yofi oho ohoya fede, imoc mi negendae me? Anutu yengenaoc deec, ‘Ni deba, ngeni sasawango anutuareng.’ (Myeg 82:6)
43010035	Nga ngic Anutuac enacyoac bicngoc mekecgec, yeneac Anutungo deecfu, ‘Ngeni anutuareng.’ ifi anu Anutuac yoac mitikibiu fede, imoc netohonideac singa mong mi fede.
43010036	Anu Anutungo ngic meisinggema desima sueu bangecfu maec, imoc ni. Ni yofi bic dedua, ‘Ni Anutuac medac.’ Ifi deaiac ngeni nocac yofi dedae, ‘Ge Anutu emminec.’
43010037	Ua mekecduae, imoc Mannaarunac mi andeu ngeni mi negensinnubisia.
43010038	Nga Mannaac ua mebadeu ngeneng ine mi negensinnuma sifu faka kuhagoc mekecduae, imoc negensinggebisia. Ifi amma Mannango nearu kecde nga neng yearu kecduae, imoc negemma negentegecgecde.”
43010039	Ifi deu yeneng monggoc mendanggebeso anggec, yeng maringinaunac hesima woraec.
43010040	Anu Yesungo Yodang doku ferecgema doku noboc Yohanengo doku nadzic ua hanahema meec, ihai kemma kefec.
43010041	Ihai kecmanu ngicngac homacngo yearu hama degec, “Yohanengo negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc mong mi mekefec. Amma ye ngic yomocac hania deec, imoc sasawa sifu fora ande.”
43010042	Ifi dema bangec imohai ngicngac homacngo Yesu negensinggegec.
43011001	Ngic mong kpara Radzaro, ye Betania amau hafei ammiu feec. Nga Maria nga dara Mata yereng ama imohai kefoc.
43011002	Nga Maria yennoc Kebuac haniu kerec homuna gombungango nadzicmima yengena orucsusiango mekerenggeec. Nga Mariaac naina Radzaro yenoc hafei ammiec.
43011003	Hafei ammiu nainghora yereng Yesuaru yoac faiec kenu deoc, “Kebu negenna, ngic hensongo ammiannec, ye hafei ammiu fede.”
43011004	Ifi deec kenu Yesungo imoc negemma yofi deec, “Ye homeudeac hafei mi ammide. Hafei imoc Anutuac kuc nga kibikperagi heficgeucdeac fingecde. Fingeru Medahaac kuc nga kibikperagi ifingoc fingectegerude.”
43011005	Nga Yesungo Mata muneagoc amma Radzaro yeni heresongogoc hoangyunukefec.
43011006	Anu yeng ine siduc imoc negemma uameme yohockang bangec ihaingoc torokpema kefec.
43011007	Ifi kecmaguc medacfora yofi edeyunuec, “Nenang Yudaia bangecfu dzigenema kenni.”
43011008	Ifi deu medacfora yeneng degec, “Rabbi, yudangic yeneng hocngo gerebeso anggec nga geng naso mi hereemanu monggoc ihai kennade.”
43011009	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merenec, “Uameme mocguac manau aua 12 fede nga ngic mongngo wenacfu sing kengande, ye naric mi fopockeu makpeude nocac ye bangectoa bangec imocac kperagi henude.
43011010	Nga mong ye kundunnu kengande, ye fopockeu makpeude nocac yearu kperagia mong mi fede.”
43011011	Ifi dema yoac monggoc torokpema edeyunuec, “Nenang ogonina Radzaro gau feu ni midiba yarudeac ihai kembade.”
43011012	Ifi deu medacfora yeneng degec, “Kebu, ye gau fedeu fekecma ngereeude.”
43011013	Yesungo Radzaroac homecac deu, yeneng ine negenggec gautehec feu dede isoc anec.
43011014	Imocac ye tongganang yofi edeyunuec, “Radzaro ye bic homedac.”
43011015	Nga ngeni negensinggegecdeac amma ni imohai mi kefaiac ubangerec negenduae. Ngeni yaguc hagec yearu kenni.
43011016	Ifi deu Toma kpara mong Tombosonga yeng medac ogofora edeyunuec, “Nenang ifingoc yegoc homenideac kenni.”
43011017	Yesungo Betania taonnu kensikeu Radzaro ye kicsereu wenac yohoc nga yohoc bic ferahemanu edegec negenec.
43011018	Yerusaleng nga Betania botucngirau kiromita harebec, imocacsoc wegeng wegeng taroc. Imocac
43011019	Yudangic homacngo naingngiraac amma demeefai ayecmebesonga dema Mata nga Maria yerearu hatacgec.
43011020	Tacmagec Yesu hade degec Matango imoc negemma meficgeudeac kenu Mariango ine amau tarec.
43011021	Taru Matango kemma Yesu edeec, “Kebu, geng yei nenigoc kecbang debac nainna mi homebac.
43011022	Nga geng yaguc iwai monggac Anutu kpesimina ye naric genude, imoc negenduae.”
43011023	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Nainggango gborima yarude.”
43011024	Ifi deu Matango deec, “Ye naso wisic wisickeau homecfunac yacyac fingeru yarude, imoc negenduae.”
43011025	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Homecfunac yacyac nga kekec, imoc ninoc. Mong ye ni negensinnude, ye homeude nga sifu kefude.
43011026	Nga ngicngac yei kecma negensinnudae, yeni sasawango mi homegecde nga homebesandae, imoc negensinggenec me kpac?”
43011027	Ifi deu deec, “Oc Kebu, ge Messia Anutuac Medac bangecfu mabeso dedeanoc, imoc bic negensingguduae.”
43011028	Ifi dema dzigene kemma munea Maria kparu kenu sangicfu edeec, “Kpoukpoungo hatacma geac dede.”
43011029	Anu Yesungo taonnu mi hasikemangoc Matagoc ewaroc ihaingoc nanecac Mariango yoac imoc negemma bic yacma kenec.
43011031	Kenu yudangic yeneng demeefaiac hama tacgec, yeni Mariango gereagoc yacma kenu hemma ye kicsereu kiarudeac kende dema modacgec.
