43011032	Anu Mariango Yesu nanec, imohai kensikema Yesuac haniau makpema edeec, “Kebu, ge yei tacbang debac nainna naric mi homebac.”
43011033	Ifi dema kiaru yudangic yegoc hagec, yeni yenahafoc kiacgec Yesungo yenenu ubahodungngo ongaasuya meebiriu negenghodungaima kickumea mamanu deec, “Dahaigeng faigec?” deu degec, “Kebu, hama henna.”
43011036	Ifi anu yudangic yeneng hemma degec, “Henggec, ye Radzaroac heresongo kuneng femiec.”
43011037	Nga goa yenearunacngo degec, “Ye warac kicpisic kiwa merecgeec. Nga ye ngic yomoc gombunga garenggeu mi homebac.”
43011038	Yesungo monggoc ubaebic mema kicsereu kenec. Kicsere imoc hockedzebe anu hoc mongngo singa hedzickema feec.
43011039	Feu kensikema edeyunuec, “Ngeni hoc imoc meickegec.” ifi deu ngic homeec, yeac naina Matango deec, “Kebu, ye homunagoc bic andac nocac ye uameme yohoc nga yohoc bic kendac.”
43011040	Ifi deu Yesungo edeec, “Ge negensinggenadeu Anutuac kuc kibikperagiagoc hennade, ifi bic edegudua.”
43011041	Ifi deu hoc meickegec Yesungo kic fiu enu yofi deec, “Manggac, ge yoacna bic negendang, imocac geac dangge deduae.
43011042	Ge nasosoc nunumuna negengannec, imoc bic negendua. Anu geng ni suenunec, imoc ngichabu yoc nandae, yeneng negensinggegecdeac ifi edegudua.”
43011043	Ifi dema Yesungo kucgoc kpacma deec, “Radzaro, ge yacma ngadeau mana.”
43011044	Ifi deu ngic homemea hanimaria nga kicmesuya kporucsusucngo kpefusema birac biranggea, imocngo yacma maec. Mau Yesungo edeyunuec, “Ngeni yungecmigec kenu.”
43011045	Yudangic homacngo Maria hembeso hagec, yeni Yesungo ua meec, imoc hemma ye negensinggegec.
43011046	Ifi anggec, yenearunac goango ine farisaio yenearu kemma Yesungo faka meec, imocac siduc ayemmegec.
43011047	Ayemmegec womonggareng enarafocngina amma farisaio, yeni tutumangtoaac memba kpedzucyunuma yofi degec, “Ngic yomoc ye negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc homac medeac nenang dafi anni?
43011048	Ye wani kecma faka ifia torokpema meudeu ngic sasawango ye negensinggegec Roma yeneng hama amawomonnina nga ngicngacfocnina wangecnunubauac.”
43011049	Ifi degec, yenearunac mong kpara Kaifa, ye kifa imohai womonggareng enara kefec, yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni wiac mong mi negentegecdae.
43011050	Ngicngacareng sasawa mi kpac anggecdeac ngic mocgungo bangec areng yeneac amma homeu ngereeude, ngeni imoc mi negentegecdae me?”
43011051	Yoac imoc yengena ubeaac negemma mi deec. Yeng kifa imohai yudangic yeneac womonggarengtoa kefec, imocac kpefing deec. Yesungo bangec areng yeneac amma homeudeac ifi anec.
43011052	Ye yeneacsac homeudeac mi maec. Ye Anutuac nambaracfora sinsararang kpegec kecdae, yeni kpedzucyunuu areng mocgu anggecdeac ifi deec.
43011053	Ifi deu naso imohaingoc Yesu kpegecdeac hanahema dekiric anggec.
43011054	Ifi anggec Yesungo negemma yudangic yeneac botucfu monggoc nonongkac mi yerecgekefec. Ye ine worama Eferaing ama bangec kisi wegenacfu feec, ihai medacfora yenigoc kemma kefec.
43011055	Yudangic yeneac makekeng hombang naso wegene hamanu ngicngac homacngo Anutuac kicfu kpetiac anggecdeac dzuacemegecde, imocac amma amangina wama Yerusalennu kenggec.
43011056	Kemma womong manau namma Yesu hofocma yenaocngoc kpesiemegec, “Ye hombanninau haude me dafi negendae?”
43011057	Nga womonggareng enarafocngina nga farisaio yeneng deserima ngicngac yofi edeyunugec, “Yesu dahai kecde, imoc mongngo meficgema edenunugec mendanggema mebisina.”
43012001	Makekenggac hombang imocac wenac 6 femanu Yesungo Radzaroac taonnu Betania, ihai kenec. Yesungo ngic yenoc homecfunac megboriec.
43012002	Yeni imohai Yesuac amma yaka gombunga ohogec Matango yaka faima arenggeu negec. Nga ngic Yesugoc tacma yaka negec, yenearunac mong Radzaro.
43012003	Tacmagec, imohai Mariango sebiac kerec lita noboha, kpete imocacsoc mema Yesuac haniau kpakema nadzicmiec. Kerec, imoc narda foraunac memea amma imocac buma kuneng. Nadzicmima orucdzoeango hania meusuranggeec. Ifi anu kerec imocac homunango fima ama mana sokodacma feec.
43012004	Anu medacfora yeneac botucfunac medac mong Yuda Kariotonac, yennoc ngade Yesu doc meudeac anec amma yeng deec,
43012005	“Nenang kerec imoc faini kifa mocguac uabunggac dzo kirecgeu ngic makpekpea yemmebing, imocngo ngereebac.”
43012006	Yuda ye imoc ngic makpekpea yeneac negensima mi deec, kpac. Ye ine hamangecngicac amma dzohiengina garenggekecma dzo hamangec menec angkefec.
43012007	Ifi deu Yesungo deec, “Ge ngac imocac yoac wana. Ye kerec imoc faiu femanu homeba naso imohai eng tonggonubauac amma nadzicnende.
43012008	Ngic makpekpea yeni nasosoc ngenigoc kecgecde nga neng ine ngenigoc nasosoc mi kecbade.”
43012009	Anu yudangic homacngo Yesungo Betania taonnu kecde, ifi negemma Yesuacsac mi kenggec. Yeni Yesungo Radzaro homecfunac megboriec, ye momoc hembeso kenggec.
43012010	Ifi fingeru yudangic homacngo Radzaroac amma enarafocngina yeneac dede wama Yesu negensinggegec. Imocac womonggareng enara yeneng Radzaro ifingoc kpegecdeac yoacua megec.
43012012	Wereckengau ngicngac habutoango hombanggac Yerusalennu kenggec. Kemma Yesungo Yerusalennu haudeac wegenanec hade, ngicngac yeni ifi negemma
43012013	ic maria dzuamagoc mema Yesugoc ewacgecdeac sinnu kenggec. Kemma yofi kpacgec, “Ohec, ngic Kebuac kpacfu hade, ye kenehagoc. (Myeg 118:26) Yeng Israe neneac Ngictau.”
43012014	Ifi kpacgec Yesungo donggi medaha mong meficgema imohai emma tarec. Imocacnoc yofi oho ohoya fede,
43012015	“Sionggac naroang ge mi kengecguu. Henna, ngictaugango donggi medahaac witiau tacmanu habesande.” (Dzek 9:9)
43012016	Faka fingerecfunac medacfora yeneng imocac hania mi negenghomegec. Kecma Yesungo kuc nga kibikperagiagoc anec, naso imohai ine faka ammigec nga yoac yeac negemma oho ohoya fede, imoc negengireckegec.
43012017	Anu ngichabu yeni Yesugoc kemma Radzaro kicsereunac kpacma homecfunac megboriu henggec, yeneng siduc imoc desahegec.
43012018	Ye faka kuhagoc imoc meecac amma habutoango yegoc ewacgecdeac kenggec.
43012019	Ifi anggec ine farisaio yeni yenaocngoc denengeng amma degec, “Negenggec, nenang wiac mong anganggac siriha kpac. Ngicngac kpedzongacngo ye modacma kendacdae.”
43012020	Anu ngicngac hombanggac Anutu afehegecdeac Yerusalennu kenggec, yeneac botucfu grikngic goa momoc kecgec.
43012021	Kecma Firipoaru hama degec, “Ngickuneng, neni Yesu hembeso negendimbe.” nga Firipo ye Gariraia bangec Besaida taonnunac.
43012022	Ifi degec Firipongo hama Anderea edeu yerahafoc kemma Yesu edeoc.
43012023	Edeec Yesungo yofi meremma edeyuruec, “Ngicac medac ye kuc nga kibikperagiagoc anudeac nasoya hade.
43012024	Foracngoc, wit gbomea mong bangecfu mi kemema tohoudeu imoc yengenaocsac tarude, imoc edengunuduae. Nga bangecfu kemema tohoudeu imocngo fora homac meficgeude.
43012025	Ngic mong ye sebiaac kekecac songo negengande, ye kekeha sufumiude. Nga sebiaac kekec bangec yomohai ubeango waande, yeng kekeha mekecma kekecseri meficgeude.
43012026	Nga ngic mong ye kingang kpekpena ambeso negendeu ye ni modacnubeso. Nga ni kecbade, ye imohai ifingoc nigoc kefude. Nga ngic mong ye neac kingang kpeudeu, Mannango ye seseheude.”
43012027	Amma Yesungo monggoc deec, “Yaguc ubaongana ebiriu dafi debade? Manggac, ge naso yomohacnac onggonnuna. Nga neng ine imocac ammanoc naso yomohai hasikeduae.
43012028	Manggac, ge kpacga mekperagina.” Ifi demanu kurumennunac udumeng mong yofi fingerec, “Ni kpacna bic mekperagiai amma monggoc mekperagibade.”
43012029	Yoac ifi fingecmanu ngicngac habutoa nanggec, yeneng udumeng imoc negemma degec, “Parandangngo heide.” Nga toseango ine degec, “Angero mongngo yegoc yoac dede.”
43012030	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi deec, “Udumeng imoc neac amma mi hadac, kpac. Imoc ngeneac memeficac fingecdac.
43012031	Yaguc bangectoa bangec imocac ngicngac fakangina ising isinggenaso nga yoacngina desigecde. Amma bangec yomocac ngictau meickegecde.
43012032	Anu ngic yeneng bangecfunac miacnugec ni emma ngicngac sasawa kpedziyunuba nearu hadacgecde.”
43012033	Yengena siric dafiu homeude, imocac dekperagima edeyunuudeac ifi deec.
43012034	Ifi deu ngic habutoango meremmigec, “Dedeseriyoacfu yofi degec negengandimbe, ‘Messiango fingecma nasoya kpac, kechereema kecbesande.’ Anu ge dafi denec, ‘Ngic yeneng Ngicac Medac miacgec embeso.’ Nga Ngicac Medac imoc merac?”
43012035	Ifi degec Yesungo deec, “Kperagingo naso wegenanecsac ngenigoc kefude. Kundunggac kucngo semengunubacac ngeni kperagi fengemmemanu kperagigoc kecbisia. Ngic mong ye kundunnu kengkecde, ye sing dafiu kende, imoc naric mi negentegerude.
43012036	Imocac amma ngeni kperagingo ngenigoc femanungoc kperagi imoc negensinggebisia. Ifi angkecma kperagiac nambaracfora anggecde.” Yesungo ifi dema wayunuma yenearunac meickeec.
43012037	Yesungo faka kuhagoc homac kicnginau meu yeni ine ye mi negensinggegec.
43012038	Profete Yesaiaac yoac yomoc fora fingecbeso, “Kebu, yeni yoac dekperaginemmegec, imoc ngic merac negensinggeec amma meracaru Kebuac mariseri fingecmiec?” (Yes 53:1)
43012039	Imocac amma yeni naric mi negensinggegec. Amma Yesaiango yoac mong yofi torokpema deec,
43012040	“Yeni kicnginango mi henggecdeac kicngina mekundung kpeec amma faka meu ubangina dzingfong anu mekundung kpeyunuec nga ubadzigec dzigene mi fingecyemmemanu mengereyunubaiac.” (Yes 6:10)
43012041	Yesaiango Yesuac kuc kibikperagiagoc henecac yeac negemma yoac yomoc deec.
43012042	Ammanu ngickiwa botucnginaunac homacngo Yesu negensinggegec nga farisaio yeneng ine kpebunggac ngadeau faiyunubauac yeni imoc mi dekperagiyemmegec.
43012043	Ngic yeneng dedengerec ayemmegecdeac songotoa feyemmeec nga Anutungo dedengerec ayemmeudeac wagec.
43012044	Anu Yesungo kucgoc kpacma yofi deec, “Ngic mong ni negensinnude, ye nisac kpac, ye suenuec, ye ifingoc negensinggeude.
43012045	Nga mong ye nende, yeng suenuec ifingoc henude.
43012046	Nga ngicngac negensinnudae, yeni sasawango kundunnu monggoc mi kecgecde nocac bangecfu kperagia mama fingectegerec, imoc ni.
43012047	Ngic mong ye yoacna negemma mi tofohoudeu neng fakaya mi isinggema desibade, kpac. Ni ngicngac fakangina isinggema desibadeac mi mayai. Neng ine ngicngac ebicfunac mesiyunubade nga yeni komoc kpegecdeac mayai.
43012048	Anu mong ye ngadenuma yoacna mi hoanggeude, wiac mongngo fakaya isinggema desimiude. Yoac deai, imocngonoc naso wisic wisickeau fakaya isinggema desiude.
43012049	Ni neanna ubanaac yoac mi deanduae, kpac. Manggac suenuec, yeac yoac debadeac dederecge anenec.
43012050	Yeac dedeseriyoac imoc kekecseri, imoc negenduae nga imocac amma Manggac yoara edenuec, imocngoc debade.”
43013001	Makekenggac hombang nasoac tofocnac mocgu femanu Yesungo bangec yomoc wama Manggacaru dzigeneudeac nasoya wegeneec, imoc bic negengemeec. Ifi negemma bangecfu wiacfora yeneac heresongoya fekefec, imoc hafoangoc edzacyunumaguc kekeha wisickebeso, ifi negenec.
43013002	Yeni maraiac yaka nema tacgec. Nga mangana minginango negen negeng Yuda, Simong Kariotoac medac ubeau bic yofi faiec, yeng Yesu docfu faiu ngaba yeneng mebisia.
43013003	Nga Mamango wiac sasawa Yesuac mariau bic faiec nga ye Anutuarunac mama monggoc dzigene enude, ye imoc bic negenec.
43013004	Negemma tataha wama yacma ngakpi hereha hesima keremmeme mong mema kebangau dzegeec.
43013005	Dzegema tera yadaosong, imohai doku kpeu kemeu medacfora yeneac hani dzuacyemmema keremmeme kebangau dzegeec, imocngo haningina mekerenggeyemmeec.
43013006	Ifi amma Simong Petoroaru kenu Petorongo kpesimiec, “Kebuna, ge dafiac hanina dzuacnade?”
43013007	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ni faka anduae, ge yaguc imocac hania mi negentegecnec amma ngadeguc hania negentegecnade.”
43013008	Ifi deu Petrongo deec, “Kpac yombong, ge neac hani mi dzuacnade.” deu Yesungo meremmiec, “Ni haniga mi dzuacbadeu, ge nearu mi tahockenade.”
43013009	Ifi deu Simong Petorongo deec, “Kebuna, ge haninasac kpac, orucna nga marina momoc dzuacnenna.”
43013010	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngic mong ye doku bic nadzirec, ye hafoangoc kongac kpeecac monggoc mi nadzicma haniasac dzuacbesonga. Ngeni kongac bic kpegec amma imoc ngeni sasawa ngeneac ine mi deduae.”
43013011	Nocac ngic merang ye doc meu megecde, imoc bic negenec. Imocac yofi deec, “Ni sasawa ngeneac imoc mi deduae.”
43013012	Yesungo haningina dzuacdaru wisickeu ngakpi hereha heiu kemeu monggoc matacma yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Ni faka ngenearu medua, imocac hania negentegecdae me?
43013013	Ngeni neac kpoukpou nga Kebu kpacnuandae, imoc naric deandae, nocac ni imocnoc.
43013014	Ni Kebu nga kpoukpounginango haningina dzuacduaeu ngeni ngenaoc ifingoc haningina dzuacemebisia.
43013015	Ni faka gombungaac ongea edzacngunuma angemmeduae, siriha imocngoc ngenaocngoc modacma mebisia.
43013016	Foracngoc, wanacngicngo mingina mi feraheude nga sue sueango ngic sueec, ye mi feraheude, imoc edengunuduae.
43013017	Ngeni yomoc negemma modacgecdeu Anutuac ubangerecngo ngenearu feude.
43013018	Ni sasawa ngeneac mi deduae. Meisingngunuai, ngeni ine negengngunuduae. Amma yoac mitikibiu oho ohoya fede, imoc fora fingerudeac yoac yomoc heficgeec, ‘Ngic nigoc yaka neande, ye gofoc gofohango tifacnuudeac hania miarec.’ (Myeg 41:9)
43013019	Faka imoc fingerude nga, ‘Ni kecduaengoc.’ ngeni imoc negensinggegecdeac amma yaguc faka imoc mi fingecmanu imocac siriha edengunuduae.
43013020	Foracngoc, ni ngic me ngac mong sueba hau mongngo ama heimiude, yeng ni ama heinende ande. Anu ngic mong ye ni ama heinenude, yeng suenuec, ye ama heimiudengoc.”
43013021	Yesungo yoac imoc demanu ongaasuya ebiriu yoac yofi dekperagiec, “Ni fora yombong edengunuba, ngeneac botucfunac mongngo docfu fainuu menugecde.”
43013022	Ifi deu medacfora yeni yenaocngoc kicngo engemma degec, “Imoc meracac dede?” ifi dema obohogec.
43013023	Nga medacfora yeneac botucfunac songomedaha yeng Yesuac hoannu tarec.
43013024	Ifi taru Simong Petoro ye hatango sosoc yofi anec, “Ge kpesimina, imoc meracac dede?”
43013025	Ifi deu medac imoc Yesuac mokucfu heifema kpesimiec, “Kebu, ge imoc meracac denec?”
43013026	Ifi deu Yesungo deec, “Ni ic sogong tosea yomoc nemuruckema ngic mong mibade, ngic imocnoc.” Ifi dema ic sogong mema nemuruckema Yuda, Simong Kariotoac medac miec.
43013027	Miu ic sogong meu Satangngo hereau kemeec. Kemeu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ge ua mebeso negennec, imoc kemma bic mebesena.”
43013028	Ifi deu medacfora tacgec, yeneng noc wiacac edede, imocac obohogec.
43013029	Imoc yofiac, Yuda ye dzohie mekefecac hombanggac wiac mong bummeudeac edede me ngic makpekpea wiac mong yemmeudeac dede, ifi negenggec.
43013030	Nga Yudango ic sogong tosea memanu imohaingoc yacma kemeec. Nga tofocnac naso yombong bic anec.
43013031	Anu Yesungo yofi deec, “Yaguc Ngicac Medacngo kuc nga kibikperagiagoc fingectegecde. Fingectegeru ngicngac yeni Ngicac Medac uayaac amma Anutuac kuc nga kibikperagia negenggecde.
43013032	Ngicngac yeni Medac hemma Anutuac kuc nga kibikperagia negenggecdeu Manggacngo Medahaac kuc nga kibikperagia ngicngac mekperagiyemmeude, imocac naso wegenede.
43013033	Nambaracfocna, ni naso wegenanec ngenigoc kecmangoc kemba ngeni ni hofocnugecde. Anu yudangic edeyunuai, imocngoc yaguc edengunuduae. Ni kembade, imohai ngeneac hahaac sing mong mi fede, kpac.
43013034	Singyoac gboria mong ngemmeduae, ngeni ngenaocngoc heresongogoc hoangemebisia. Neng ngeni heresongogoc hoangngunukecduae, ngeni ifi isoc ngenaocngoc heregoc tembuc tembuc songogoc hoangemebisia.
43013035	Ngeni ngenaocngoc heresongogoc hoangemegecdeu ngicngac sasawango ngeni neac medacfocna kecdae, imoc negenggecde.”
43013036	Ifi deu Simong Petorongo kpesimiec, “Kebu, ge dahai kennade?” ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ge yaguc ni kembade, imohai naric mi modacnunade, kecma ngadeguc modacnunade.”
43013037	Ifi deu Petorongo monggoc kpesimiec, “Kebu, ni nocac yaguc naric mi modacgubade? Ni geac amma kekecna naric waba doude.”
43013038	Ifi deu Yesungo meremma yofi edeec, “Ge naric neac amma kekecga wana doude, ifi denec me? Foracngoc, ni edegubade, kokorecngo mi arohomanu geng atac harebec neac busic kpenade.”
43014001	Ngeni ubaebic mi mebisia. Ngeni Anutu negensinggema ni ifingoc negensinnubisia.
43014002	Neac Mannaac amau amamana homac fekende. Imoc mi febac dede yofi bic edengunubai, “Ni ngeneac ama mana mengerebadeac kembade.
43014003	Amma ngeneac amatatac heitumeibadeac kemma dzigene hama hesicngunubade. Ni kecbade, ihai nenahafoc kecnideac negenduae.
43014004	Amma dahai kembade, ngeni imocac sing bic negendae.”
43014005	Anu Tomango kpesimiec, “Kebu, ge dahai kennade, imoc mi negendimbe. Imocac sing dafi negentegecnide?”
43014006	Kpesimiu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ninoc sing nga yoac fora amma kekec. Ngic mongngo nia kpacfu Manggacaru keng keng imocac sing mong mi fede.
43014007	Ngeni ni negennudaeu Manna ifingoc negemmigecde. Amma ngeni yaguc namma enude imohai ye negemmima bic hendae.”
43014008	Ifi deu Firipongo deec, “Kebu, ge Manggac edzacnununa henni socnunuude.”
43014009	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Firipo, ni naso herea ngeneac botucfu kecbare ge mi negennunec. Ngic mong ye nenec, yeng Manna henec. Nga dafiac Manggac edzacngunuba henggecdeac denec?
43014010	Ni Manggacac hereu kecduae nga Manggacngo neac hereu kecde. Ge imoc mi negensinggenec me? Yoac edengunuanduae, imoc neanna ubaac mi debade, kpac. Manggacngo neac hereu kecma ua imoc mekecde.
43014011	Ngeni yoacna yomoc negensinggegec, ni Manggacac hereu kecduae nga Manggacngo neac hereu kecde. Ifi deba obohogecdeu uana meanduae, imoc negensinggebisia.
43014012	Foracngoc, mong ye ni negensinnude, ye ni ua meanduae, imocngoc meude, imoc edengunuduae. Amma ua mekefai, yeng imoc ferahema monggoc meude, nocac ni Manggacaru kembade.
43014013	Medacngo Manggacac kuc nga kibikperagi heficgeudeac amma ngeni wiac sasawa neac kpacfu kpesigec, imoc ambade.
43014014	Amma wiac monggac neac kpacfu kpesinenggecdeu ni imoc ambade.
43014015	Ngeni heregoc neac songo negenkecdaeu singyoacna modacgecde.
43014016	Anu neng Manggac kpesimiba yeng memeseringina mong ni isoc ngemmeu yeng ngenigoc nasosoc kefude.
43014017	Amma ye yoac foraac Asu. Nga bangecfunac ngicngac yeni ye naric mi megecde. Yeni ye mi hengandae nga ye mi negemmigecde. Nga ngeneng ye negemmidae, ye ngeneac botucfu amma herenginaunoc kefude.
43014018	Nga wangunuba beging isoc mi kecgecde, kpac. Ni ngenearu habade.
43014019	Naso wegenanec wisickeuguc bangectoa bangec imocac ngicngac yeneng ni monggoc mi nenggecde nga ngeneng ine nenggecde, nocac ni kecduaeac amma ngeni kecgecde.
43014020	Ni Mannaac hereu kecduae nga ngeni neac hereu kecdae amma ni ngeneac hereu kecduae, ngeni naso imohai imoc negentegecgecde.
43014021	Ngic mong ye neac singyoac hoanggema modacande, ye heregoc neac songo negenude. Nga mong ye heregoc neac songo negenudeu Mannango yeac songo ifingoc negenude. Amma neng yeac songo negemma fingecmibade.”
43014022	Ifi deu Yuda Kariotoac waseango Yesu kpesimiec, “Kebu, ge nenisac fingecnemmebesonga negensinec nga bangectoa bangec, imocac ngicngac yenearu kpac, imoc dafiac?”
43014023	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Ngic mong ye heregoc neac songo negendeu ye enacyoacna modarude. Modaru Mannango yeac songo negenu nereng yeac hereu amatatacnira mema kecdede.
43014024	Nga mong ye heregoc neac songo mi negenude, ye enacyoacna mi modarude. Nga ni yoac deba negengandae, imoc neac yoac kpac, imoc Manggac suenuec yeac yoacnoc.
43014025	Ni ngenigoc kecma yoac yomoc edengunuduae.
43014026	Nga Manggacngo memeficngina Tiri Asu neac kpacfu sueu mama yeng wiac sasawa kpoungemmema yoac edengunuai, imoc heigboringemmeude.
43014027	Ni faingunu kembade nga ruaena faiduae, imocngo ngenearu fekefude. Bangectoa bangecac ngicngac yeneng ruae yemmeandae, ruaena imoc ifi isoc kpac. Imocac ngeni kengec mi ambisia amma ubaebic mi mebisia.
43014028	Ni Manggacaru kemma monggoc ngenearu dzigene habade, ifi deba negendau. Amma ngeni heregoc neac songo negendae isoc sogaibau nocac Manggac yennoc neac engena.
43014029	Nga kembadeac fora ngadeguc fingectegeru ngeni negensinggegecdeac amma kembadeac fora mi fingecmanungoc siduha yaguc edengunuduae.
43014030	Ni naso herea monggoc ngenigoc yoacyoac mi ambade. Bangectoa bangec yomocac ngictau haude. Nga yeac wiac mong neac hereu mi fede.
43014031	Ni Manggacac songo negengkecduae. Amma yeng uayoac deserinenec, imocac sirihau ua mekecduae, bangectoa bangec yomocac ngicngac yeneng imoc negentegecgecdeac amma deduae, ngeni yacgec wama kenni.”
43015001	Ni waing ic fora nga Mannango wainguaac mingina.
43015002	Ic fawa goa nearu fema fora mi angkecgec ye imoc sasawa kperecgema ukuyunuude. Nga fawa fora angandae, imoc sasawa foraya homac anudeac ye imoc kperecgema memengere anude.
43015003	Ni enacyoac edengunuaiac ngeni bic kongac kpegec kecdae.
43015004	Amma ngeni nigoc kpeketahema kecbisia. Ifi anggec neng ngenigoc kpeketahema kecbade. Ic fawango waing icfu mi kpeketaheudeu, ye fora naric mi anude. Ifi isocngoc ngeni nearu mi kpeketahema kecgecdeu fora mong mi anggecde.
43015005	Ni neannaoc waing ic nga ngeni fawafocna. Ngic mong ye nearu kpeketahema kecde, neng yearu ifingoc kpeketahema kecba yeng fora homac anude. Ngeni nia kpacfu ua mong naric mi megecde.
43015006	Mong ye nearu mi kpeketahema kefudeu ye ngicngo fawa heregema ukuu dzanggeande, ifi isoc ye ukugecde. Nga fawa ifia kpedzucnema gerecfu ukugec dzeude.
43015007	Ngeni nearu kpeketahema kecgecde nga neac yoac ngenearu kpeketahema feudeu wiac monggac angemmeu kpesigec, imoc fingecngemmeude.
43015008	Nga ngeni fora homac meficgemagec Manggacngo faka imocac kpac kuneng meu ngeni medacfocna fingectegecgecde.
43015009	Manggacngo ni songogoc hoannukefec, neng ifi isocngoc ngeni songogoc hoangngunukefai. Ngeni neac songo manau kpeketahema kecbisia.
43015010	Ni Mannaac dederecge yoac modacma yeac songo manau kpeketahema kecduae. Ifi isoc ngeneng neac singyoac modacgecdeu neac songoac manau kpeketahema kecgecde.
43015011	Neac ubafeacngo ngenearu fede nga ubangerecngina hafoangoc fengemmeudeac yoac yomoc edengunuduae.
43015012	Yomoc neac singyoac, neng ngeneac songo negengkecduae, siriha imocngoc ngeni ngenaocngoc heresongogoc hoangemema kecbisia.
43015013	Mong ye ogofora yeneac amma kekeha waude, yeac heresongo imoc engena yombong.
43015014	Nga ni singyoac ngemmeai, imoc sasawa modacgecdeu ngeni neac ogofocna anggecde.
43015015	Kingangmedac ye minginango wiac angkecde, imoc mi negenude. Imocac ni ngeneac kingangmedac monggoc mi debade, kpac. Ni ngeneac ogofocna deduae, nocac ni Manggacarunac yoac negennai, imoc sasawa edengunudarai.
43015016	Anu ngeni neac kpacfu wiac monggac kpesigec Manggacngo imoc ngemmeudeac amma neng meisingngunuai. Ngeneng ine ni mi meisinnugec, kpac. Meisingngunuma fora meficgegecdeac uau faingunuai. Nga ngeni kemma fora meficgebisia. Meficgegec fora imocngo fefeseri feengkefude.
43015017	Anu ni singyoac yofi ngemmeduae, ngeni ngenaocngoc heregoc songo negengemekecbisia.
43015018	Bangectoa bangec yomocac ngicngac yeneng ubango ukungunudaeu ngeni yofi negembisia. Yeni ubango ngeni mi ukungunugec imohai ni ubango bic ukunugec.
43015019	Ngeni bangectoa bangec yomocac ngicngac kecbau yeni yenang ayemmeande, ifi isocngoc ngeneac songo negembau. Nga ngeni ine bangec yomohanac kpac, neng ine ngeni bic meisingngunuma bangec yomocac ngicngac yenearunac meicngunuai. Imocacnoc yeneng ngeni ubango ukungunugecde.
43015020	Ni yoac warac edengunuai, imoc negenggec febeso, wanacngicngo mingina naric mi feraheude. Imocac amma ngicngac nukporac anenggec, yeni ifi isocngoc ngeni ngunukporac angemmegecde. Nga neac yoac hoanggeandaeu ngeneac yoac ifingoc hoanggegecde.
43015021	Yeni suenuec, ye mi negemmidae. Imocac yeni neac kpacnaac amma ngeni ifi angemmedacgecde.
43015022	“Ni mama yenearu yoacna mi debai dede yeni kopocsicngina kpac kecbau. Amma yaguc ine kopocsicnginaac amma degbedic anggecdeac sing mong mi fede.
43015023	Ngic mong ye ubango wanude, ye ifingoc Manna ubango waude.
43015024	Ni ua mekecduae ngic mongngo faka kuhagoc ifia bicngoc mi meec, imoc yeneac botucfu mi mebai dede, yeni kopocsicngina kpac kecbau. Nga yeni ine imoc yaguc hemmaguc Mannagoc neri ubango ukunurugec.
43015025	Anu yoac yomoc, ‘Yeni hania kpacfu ubango ukunugec.’ (Myeg 35:19; 69:4) imoc dedeseriyoacnginau oho ohoya fede nga imocngo hafoangoc fingerudeac ifi anggec.
43015026	Memeficngina haude, ye Manggacarunac suengemmeba haude amma yennoc yoac foraac Asu nga yeng hama ni dekperaginuude.
43015027	Nga ngeneng hanac hanaheaunacngoc nigoc kecgec, imocac ngeni ifingoc naric dekperaginugecde.”
43016001	Ngeni negemmangang amma mi wanugecdeac yoac yomoc bic edengunudua.
43016002	Ngic yeni kpekpeturang amaac kpae heingemmema ngadeau faingunugecde. Nga naso mong haude, imohai ngic yeni Anutuac ua medimbe dema ngunuhomegecde.
43016003	Yeni Manggac nga ni mi negennurudaeac ifi anggecde.
43016004	Ni hanac hanaheaunacngoc yoac imoc mi edengunuai nocac ni naso imohai ngenigoc kefai. Nga naso mong haude, imohai ni yoac edengunudua, imoc mi nigecngunuudeac amma yaguc monggoc edengunuduae.
43016005	“Ni suenuec, yearu dzigenebadeac naso wegene hade. Nga ngenearunac mongngo yofi mi kpesinende, ‘Ge dahai kennade?’
43016006	Neng yoac yomoc edengunuduaac ine ngeni ubahodungngo mewakengunuude.
43016007	Ni yoac fora edengunuduae, ni kembade, imocngo ngenearu ngereeude. Ni mi kembadeu memeficngina naric mi haude. Neng kemma ye sueba ngenearu haude.
43016008	Yeng hama bangectoa bangec yomocac ngicngac kopocsicngina nga faka dindingac amma desi desiua imoc edzacyunuma heficgeyemmeu negenggec fora anude.
43016009	Kopocsicac hania yofi, yeni ni mi negensinnudae.
43016010	Nga faka dindingacac hania yofi, ni Manggacaru emba ngeni mi nenggecde.
43016011	Amma desi desiac hania yofi, bangectoa bangec yomocac ngictau ye yoacfu bic makpeec.
43016012	Nga nearu ngeneac yoac homacngoc fede. Nga ngeni ine yaguc imoc tofohoma mekecgecdeacsoc mi ande.
43016013	Yoac foraac Asu maude, yeng yoac forau mekpedzuc angemmedarude. Amma ye yengena ubeaac yoac mi deude. Ye Anutuarunac yoac negengande, imoc deude nga faka ngadeu fingecbesande, imocac momoc edengunuude.
43016014	Ye ni dekperagingemmema kpac kuneng nenude, nocac ye neanna ubatohonnunac yoac imoc meude.
43016015	Manggacaru wiac sasawa fede, imocac mingina ni. Imocac amma yofi deduae, wiac sasawa Asungo mema dekperagingemmeude, imoc nearunac.
43016016	Ngeni naso wegenanec mi nenggecde nga naso wegenanec monggoc fede, imohai nenggecde.”
43016017	Ifi deu medacfora goa yenaocngoc kpesiemegec, “ ‘Naso wegenanec fede, imohai mi nenggecde nga naso wegenanec monggoc fede, imohai nenggecde.’ yoac imocac hania dafi? Amma monggoc dedac, ‘Ni Manggacaru kembade.’ ”
43016018	Anu negenggec obohou degec, “Naso wegenanec fede, imocac hania dafi? Neni yoac imocac hania obohodimbe.”
43016019	Medacfora yeneng kpesimibeso anggec Yesungo imoc bic negemma yofi edeyunuec, “Naso wegenanec fede, imohai mi nenggecde nga naso wegenanec monggoc fede, imohai nenggecde. Imocac ngenaocngoc kpesiemedae me?
43016020	Foracngoc, ngeni kiac songgong ammagec bangectoa bangec yomocac ngicngac yeneng sogaigecde, imoc edengunuduae. Nga ngeni ubahodung anggec ubahodungngina imocngo merennu ngeni ubangerec monggoc meficgegecde.
43016021	Ngac mong ye medacmeme nasoya wegene hau kpendzeng kpema sabac meude. Sabac mema ye kpendzeng imoc nigeckpeude. Ye sabac bangecfu bic fingecdac, imocac amma sogaiude.
43016022	Ngeni imocacsoc yaguc ubaebicgoc kecdae. Amma monggoc ngenemba imohai ngeni ubangerec negemma sogaigec ngic mongngo sogac sogaingina imoc naric mi meickeude.
43016023	Anu naso imohai ngeni wiac monggac mi kpesinenggecde, kpac. Foracngoc, ngeni wiac monggac neac kpacfu Manggac numumigec yeng imoc ngemmeude, imoc edengunubade.
43016024	Ngeni warac neac kpacfu wiac monggac mi numukecgec. Nga sogac sogainginango hafoangoc fengemmeudeac ngeni wiacac numuma mebisia.
43016025	Ni yoac heima yoac edengunukefai. Kecma nasoya hau ni yoac heima ngenearu monggoc mi debade, kpac. Ni didiu yombong Manggacac wiac dekperagibade.
43016026	Naso imohai ngeni neac kpacfu numugecde. Nga neng ngeneac amma Manggacaru numubade, imoc mi deduae.
43016027	Ngeni heregoc neac songo negendae nga ni Manggacarunac hayai, imoc negensinggegecde. Imocac Manggac yengenaoc ngeneac songo negende.
43016028	Ni Manggacarunac hama bangecfu mayai nga monggoc bangec wama Manggacaru dzigene kembade.”
43016029	Ifi deu medacfora yeneng degec, “Negenna, ge yaguc yoac mi heima didiu denec.”
43016030	Amma wiac sasawa negendacnec, imoc yaguc negendimbe. Ge mongngo kpesigenggecdeac mi obohonecac amma ge Anutuarunac hanec, imoc negensinggedimbe.
43016031	Ifi degec Yesungo medacfora yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni yaguc negensinggedae.
43016032	Negenggec, naso mong hade nga bic hadac imohai ngeni ni tembucna wanuma ticpac tohoma sinsararang kpema tembuc tembuc amanginasoc kenggecde. Nga tembucna mi kecbade, nocac Manggacngo nigoc kefude.
43016033	Ngeni nearu ruaegoc kecgecdeac yoac yoc edengunuduae. Nga ngeni bangectoa bangec yomohai kpendzeng kpema kecgecde. Nga ni bangec yomoc bic feraheaiac ngeni ubangina kuha mi mabeso.”
43017001	Yesungo yoac imoc dema kiwa kurumennu fiu enu yofi numuec, “Manggac, naso bic hadac. Ge medacgaac kuc nga kibikperagi ngicngac mekperagiyemmena. Ge ifi anna Medacngo ifingoc geac kuc nga kibikperagi ngicngac mekperagiyemmeude.
43017002	Geng bangecngicngac sasawa yeac kuc bageau faiyununec. Nga yeac areng denec yeng kekecseri yemmeudeac yeni yeac bageau kecgecdeac uayoac nga kuc ye minec.
43017003	Anu yeni Anutu mocgungo fora kecde amma yeng Yesu Kristo sueu maec negennurugecde, imocngo kekecseriac hania.
43017004	Ni ua mebadeac denennec, imoc mesiai amma geac kuc nga kibikperagi bangecfu mekperagiyemmeai.
43017005	Manggac, bangec nga kurumeng mi fingecmaecngoc ni geac kicfu kuc nga kibikperaginagoc kefai, ge kuc nga kibikperagina imoc nenna.
43017006	Manggac, ge geanggaoc ngicngacfocga bangec yomohacnac meisingyununa geac kpacga mekperagiyemmeai. Yeni geac ngicngac kecgec geng yeni nennec nga yeneng yoacga tofohoma kecgec.
43017007	Amma enacyoac nennec, imoc bic yemmeba megec. Imocac yeni wiac sasawa gearunac hau nennec, imoc negendae. Nga geng suenuna gearunac hayai, imoc ifingoc yaguc fora yombong negendae.
43017009	Imocac yeneac numugenduae. Bangectoa bangec yomocac ngicngac yeneac mi numuduae, kpac. Ni geng ngicngac nennec, yeneac amma numugenduae nocac yeni geac ngicngacareng
43017010	nga neac wiac sasawa imoc geac nga geac imoc neac. Nga ni yeneac kekecfu kuc kibikperagigoc mema kecduae.
43017011	Kekecnasona bangecfu wisickebeso ammanu yeni bangecfu kecmagec neng gearu habade. Kpetiac Manggac, nerang mocgu nga ifi isoc yeneng mocgu anggecdeac geng kpacga nennec, imoc arennu yenenggareng ambesena.
43017012	Neng yenigoc kefai, naso imohai kpacga nennec, imocngo garengyunuma onggongyunuba ngic mongngo mi sufuec. Yenearunac mocgusac, hofeac medac, yeng manganeec. Mitikibiu yoac fede, imoc hafoangoc fora fingerudeac ifi fingerec.
43017013	Anu neac feac feacngo yenearu sokodarudeac amma yoac sasawa yomoc bangec yomohaingoc dekperagima yaguc gearu habade.
43017014	Ni enacyoacga yemmeai. Amma yei kuriha kecduaeac bangectoa bangec yomocac ngicngac yeneng ubango ukunugec nga siriha imocngoc yeni kuric kecdaeac bangectoa bangec yomocac ngicngac yeneng yeni ubango ukuyunugec.
43017015	Ge bangecfunac meicyununadeac mi numugenduae, kpac. Manganaac minginango memayunubacac geng kaso ayemmebesena, imoc numugenduae.
43017016	Ni bangectoa bangec yomohanac kpac nga yeni ifi isocngoc yomohanac kpac.
43017017	Geac yoac imoc fora amma imocngo kpetiac kekecfu meyadiyunubeso.
43017018	Nga geng ni bangectoa bangec yomohai suenunec, ifi isocngoc neng yeni bangecfu sueyunuduae.
43017019	Yeni yoac forau kecma kpetiac kecgecdeac neng yeneac amma kpetiac kekecfu kecduae.
43017020	Anu ni yeneacsac mi numugenduae. Nga enacyoacga degec ngicngac yeneng imoc negemma negensinnugecde, yeneac momoc numugenduae.
43017021	Yeni sasawa mocgungoc anggecde nga geng suenunec, imoc ngicngac bangectoa bangec yomohai negensinggegecdeac yeneac yofi numugenduae, Manggac, ge neac hereu kecnec nga neng geac hereu kecduae, siriha ifingoc yeneng nerang here manau kecbisia.
43017022	Nerang mocgu kecdipe, ifi isoc yeni mocgu kecgecdeac amma geng kuc kibikperagiagoc nennec, imoc bic yemmeai.
43017023	Yeni mocgu yombong kecgecdeac neng herenginau kecba geng neac hereu kecnade. Ifi fingeru bangectoa bangec yomocac ngicngac yeni geng suenuna mayai, imoc negentegecgecde. Nga ge neac songo negennec, ifi isoc yeneac songo negengkecnec, imoc ifingoc negentegecgecde.
43017024	Manggac, bangec nga kurumeng mi fingecmaec ge bic heresongogoc hoannuma kuc nga kibikperagi nennec. Nga ngicngacfocna nennec, yeni neac kuc kibikperagiagoc imoc henggecdeac neng kecbade, imohaingoc nenahafoc kecbesandimbeac anende.
43017025	Faka dindingacac Manggac, bangecngic yeneng ge mi negenggugec neng ine negengguai. Nga geng ni suenuna mayai, neac ngicngacfocna imoc bic negendae.
43017026	Geng ni songogoc hoannunec, songo imocngo yeneac hereu feude nga ni herenginau kecbadeac neng geac kpac bic dekperagiyemmeai amma dekperagiyemmebade.”
43018001	Nunumu wisickeu Yesungo medacfora yenigoc mekemma Kidrong doku ferecgema noboc yufu ua mong feec, ihai kemma enggec.
43018002	Nga Yesungo medacfora yenigoc naso homac imohai kpeturanggekecgecac Yuda ye Yesu docfu faiu megecde, yeng ifingoc yufuua imoc negenec.
43018003	Ye ifi negemma womonggareng enara nga farisaio yeneac wasaingicfocngina amma kingangngicfocngina goa meyunuu hagec. Hama yenahafoc kifa hania hania nga yareac wiac goa momoc mekenggec.
43018004	Anu Yesungo faka fingecmiude, imoc bic negendarecac amma yenearu wegenac kemma yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Ngeni merac hofocdae?”
43018005	Kpesiyemmeu degec, “Yesu Nadzaretengic, ye hofocdimbe.” ifi degec Yesungo yofi deec, “Imoc ni.” Ifi demanu Yuda Yesu doc meec, yeng yeneac botucfu nanec.
43018006	Nga Yesungo yofi deec, “Imoc ni.” imohai yeni ngade ngade kemma bangecfu makpegec.
43018007	Kpefemagec monggoc kpesiyemmeec, “Ngeni merac hofocdae?” deu degec, “Yesu Nadzaretengic.”
43018008	Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merenec, “Ni bic edengunudua, imoc ninoc. Ngeni ni hofocnudaeu naric medac yomoc wayunugec kembisia.”
43018009	Nga Yesungo yoac bic deec, imocngo hafoangoc fora anudeac torokpema yofi deec, “Ge ngic nennec, yenearunac mong mi waba sufuec.” (Yoh 6:39)
43018010	Anu Simong Petoro yeng wasaibeang mong ameagoc mekefec, imoc kpedzima imocngo womonggareng enaraac wanacngiha kpara Mariku, ye kpema kedzaha foiaugeng herecgeec.
43018011	Herecgeu Yesungo Petoro yofi edeec, “Ge beangga ameau faina kemeu. Manggacngo kpendzenggac sokoc nenec, imoc nedacbesare.”
43018012	Anu wasaingic goa nga enara amma yudangic yeneac keracnatang goa yeneng Yesu mendanggema maria dzegema
43018013	hanahema Hanasiaru mekenggec. Nga Hanasi kpegea Kaifa ye kifanaso imohai womonggarengtoa kefec.
43018014	Nga “Ngic mocgungo ngicngacareng yeneac amma homeude, imocngo ngereeude.” Imoc Kaifango yudangic bic dederecge ayemmeu feec.
43018015	Yeni Yesu mekemmagec Simong Petoro nga medac ogea mong, yeri Yesu modaroc. Modarec medac imocngo womonggarengtoa negemmiecac yeri Yesu modacma womonggarenggtoaac ama imocac oda manaungoc enec.
43018016	Enu Petoro ye ine oda naguac ngadeau nanec. Nammanu medac ogeango womonggarengtoa negemmiec, yeng mama nagugareng ngac naguu nanec, ye edema Petoro hesickeu oda manau enoc.
43018017	Emmaec wanac naroang nagugareng nanec, yeng Petoro kpesimiec, “Ge ifingoc ngic mehadau, yeac medac me?” deu Petorongo deec, “Ni imoc kpac.”
43018018	Nga ama nomang anecac wanacngic nga keracnatang yeneng hama gerecmosora kpedzucnema figec wewengaima feu sebingina megec gereeu nanggec. Nammagec Petoro ye ifingoc sebia meu gereeudeac hama botucnginau nanec.
43018019	Anu womonggarengtoango Yesu medacforaac nga yengena kpoukpou uayaac dekpesi ammiec.
43018020	Ifi ammiu Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Ni didiu bangecfu ngicngac yoac edeyunukecma yoacna nasosoc kpekpeturang amanginau amma womongtoanginau dekefai. Nga yudangic sasawa kpeturanggeandae, imohai dema sufu sufuu mong mi deai.
43018021	Nga geng nocac imoc kpesinennec? Ngicngac yoac deba negenggec, yeni kpesiyemmena. Negenghenna, yoac deai, yeneng negendae.”
43018022	Ifi deu keracnatang yenearunac mong wegenac nanec, yeng Yesu kpepatanggema yofi edeec, “Ge noc sinnu namma womonggarengtoaac yoac turunga ifi meremminec?”
43018023	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Ni yoac mong mangana deduae, imoc dekperagina me fora deduaeu nocac nudang?”
43018024	Ifi deu Hanasingo Yesu witihagoc sueu womonggarengtoa Kaifa, yearu mekenggec.
43018025	Anu Simong Petorongo sebia meu gereeu nammanu yeni kpesimigec, “Ge medacfora yeneac arennunac mong me?” ifi degec, yeng sebi heima deec, “Ni kpac.”
43018026	Ifi deu womonggarengtoaac wanacngic mong, ye Petorongo kedzaha herecgeec, yeac arennunac, yeng deec, “Ge yufu uau yegoc tacna neng genai.”
43018027	Ifi deu Petorongo monggoc busic kpeu imohaingoc kokorecngo arohoec.
43018028	Wereckengau yeni Yesu Kaifaarunac wasaingic oda manau kecandae ihai mekenggec. Nga womonggareng yeni Anutuac kicfu wonongnginagoc amma makekenggac ramamedaha mi nebinggac dema ine oda manau mi enggec.
43018029	Ifi anggec Piratongo sobennu mama kpesiyemmeec, “Ngeni ngic yomoc noc haniaac yoacfu faidae?”
43018030	Ifi deu yeneng turunga meremmigec, “Ye faka mangana mi ambac dede gearu mi faibing.”
43018031	Ifi degec Piratongo yofi edeyunuec, “Ifi anu ngeni mekemma ngenang singngina modacma fakaya isinggema desigec.” Ifi deu yudangic yeneng degec, “Neni ngic mong kpeni homeudeac kuc mi metacdimbe.”
43018032	Yesungo warac yengena home homecac sing deec, imoc hafoangoc fora anudeac faka imocnoc fingerec.
43018033	Nga Piratongo oda manau monggoc emma Yesu kpacma kpesimiec, “Ge yudangic yeneac ngictau me?”
43018034	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Ge yoac imoc geanggaoc denec me goango neac edegudauac denec?”
43018035	Ifi deu Piratongo yofi meremmiec, “Ni yudangic kpac. Geangga ngicngacfocga amma womonggareng enara yeneng nearu faigudau. Nga geng noc faka annec?”
43018036	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi merennec, “Neac eucerereng imoc bangectoa bangec yomohacnac kpac. Imoc yomohacnac ambac dede ni yudangic yeneac mariu mi fainugecdeac enac tofoc tofohofocna yeneng neac amma yenigoc ewekpekpe ambau. Nga neac eucerereng imocngo bangec yomohacnac kpac.”
43018037	Ifi deu Piratongo deec, “Fora, ge ngictau mong me?” ifi deu Yesungo yofi merenec, “Geng neac ngictau mong denec. O, ni ua imoc mebadeac fingecma yoac fora imocac hepuc amma imoc dekperagibadeac bangectoa bangec yomohai mayai. Nga ngic mong ye yoac foraac arennu kecde, yeng neac ubaudumennaac kedzac kpeude.”
43018038	Ifi deu Piratongo deec, “Nga nocngo yoac fora ande?” Ifi dema monggoc Yuda yenearu dzigene mama yofi edeyunuec, “Ni yeac kopocsic mong mi meficgeduae.
43018039	Ni ngic mocgu makekenggac hombannu witicamaunac faingemmeba maande, faka ifi fedeac yudangic ngictaungina faingemmeba maudeac angemmede me?”
43018040	Ifi deu yeni monggoc kucgoc yombong arohogec, “Ngic ye kpac, Baraba ine faina mabeso.” Nga Baraba ye ine yarengic.
43019001	Anu Piratongo deu wasaingic yeneng dzikacngo Yesu kpema sebia kperec merecge kpegec.
43019002	Kpema somang batihema ngickunenggac ira isoc mengerema oruhau gborockegec. Nga yeni ngakpi mong herea giweng giweng heimigec kemeec.
43019003	Ifi amma hoangau hama degec, “Ohec, yudangic yeneac ngictau.” Ifi dema kpekpepetang ammigec.
43019004	Anu Piratongo monggoc ngadeau mama deec, “Negenggec, ni ngic yeac kopocsic mong mi meficgeduae, imoc negenggecdeac amma wangecma maduae.”
43019005	Ifi deu Yesungo ngakpia giweng giweng nga iraya waeagoc, imoc tacmanungoc mama nanu Piratongo deec, “Ngeni ngic yomoc henggec.”
43019006	Ifi deu womonggareng enara nga keracnatang yeneng ye hemma kpacgec, “Mariponnu kpegec, mariponnu kpegec!” ifi degec Piratongo deec, “Ni yeac kopocsic mong mi meficgeduaeac amma ngenaoc wangecma kemma mariponnu kpegec.”
43019007	Ifi deu yudangic yeneng meremma degec, “Ye yengena sebia meemma ni Anutuac medac deec, imocac neni dedeseriyoacnina fede, imohai namma ye homebeso, ifi dedimbe.”
43019008	Ifi degec Piratongo negemma monggoc damukpeec.
43019009	Damukpeu ye oda manau monggoc emma Yesu kpesimiec, “Ge dahacnac yombong?” ifi deu Yesungo turunga mong mi merenec.
43019010	Ifi anu Piratongo monggoc kpesimiec, “Ge neac yoac turunga nocac mi merennec? Ni naric mesigubade nga mariponnu naric gubade, imocac uayoac nga kuc nearu fede, ge imoc mi negennec me?”
43019011	Ifi deu Yesungo meremma yofi edeec, “Ge kuc imoc wihacnac mi genggena dede geanggaoc naric mi memanubang. Imocac yofi ande, ngic geac mariu fainudac, yeac kopocsicngo geac ferahede.”
43019012	Ifi deu imohaingoc Piratongo Yesu dafi kenudeac negensimanu yudangic yeneng kpacgec, “Ge ngic imoc wana kenudeu Sisaac ogea mi kecnade. Mong ye yengena meemma yofi dede, ‘Ni ngictau.’ ye Sisa emmiude.”
43019013	Ifi degec Piratongo imoc negemma Yesu wau kenudeac sing hoforec. Hofocma Yesu wangeru ama ngadeau mama bangecbisic botuha mong kpara Hocdzake, ihai desi desitatacfu emma tarec. Bangecbisic imoc hebiraio yoacfu kpara Gabata.
43019014	Anu makekeng nasoac efac kpefac amma yaka kpedzucnegec femanu 12 kiroc wegeneu Piratongo yudangicngac yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni ngictaungina henggec.”
43019015	Ifi deu yeni kpacgec, “Meickena, meickema mariponnu kpena homeu!” Ifi kpacgec edeyunuec, “Ni ngictaungina mariponnu kpeba homeudeac negendae me?” Ifi deu womonggareng enara yeneng meremma degec, “Ngictaunina imoc Sisa, mong mi kecde, kpac.”
43019016	Ifi degec Piratongo mariponnu kpegecdeac maringinau faiec.
43019017	Faiu Yesu yengenaoc mariponga tofohou bangec buma mong kpara Hatasic degec nga hebiraio yoacfu Gorigata, imohai mekenggec.
43019018	Imohai kemma Yesu mariponnu kpegec. Nga yegoc ngic yohockang noboc nga noboc Yesu botucngirau, ifi yunugec.
43019019	Anu Piratongo yoacbuma mong yofi ohoma mariponnu faiu nanec, “Yesu Nadzaretenac, yudangic yeneac ngictau.”
43019020	Anu Yesu mariponnu kpegec, bangecbisic imoc amatoa wegenacfu feecac amma yudangicngac homacngo kibi imoc osogec. Kibi imoc hebiraio yoacfu nga latingyoacfu amma grikyoacfu oho ohoya nanec.
43019021	Ifi oho ohoya femanu yudangic yeneac womonggareng enarafocngina yeneng Pirato yofi edegec, “Yudangic yeneac ngictau, ifi mi ohona. Ngic yomoc yengenaoc deec, ni yudangic yeneac ngictau, ge ifi ohobesena.”
43019022	Ifi degec Piratongo deec, “Yoac ohoduae, imoc ohoduanoc.”
43019023	Anu wasaingic yeni Yesu mariponnu kpegec nanu wambaya mema mederegec, yohoc nga yohoc anu sokoma megec. Nga ngakpia imoc susuic dzuhura kpac,
43019024	yeni imoc hemma denengeng amma degec, “Nenang yomoc mi mesuckema meracac anudeac kpeing kpeni.” Anutuac yoac hafoangoc fora fingerudeac wasaingic yeni ifi anggec. Yoac yofi oho ohoya fede, “Yeneng wambana botunginau mederema ngakpina merang meudeac kpeing kpegec.” (Myeg 22:18)
43019025	Anu Yesuac nonggonasia yeri nga Keropaac enema Maria amma Maria kpara mong Madara, yeneng Yesuac mariponnu wegenac kemma nanggec.
43019026	Nammagec Yesungo songomedaha henu nonggeagoc wegenac nanec yeremma nonggea yofi edeec, “Nenggac, imoc geac medacyombongga.”
43019027	Ifi dema medac, ifingoc edeec, “Medac, imoc geac nonggoga.” Ifi deu medac ye imohaingoc Yesu nonggea yegoc kefudeac wangeru ameau kenoc.
43019028	Uana mesidacdua, Yesungo imoc negemma yoac mitikibiu oho ohoya fede, imoc hafoangoc fora fingerudeac yofi deec, “Ni dokuac anende.”
43019029	Ifi deu bokong mong waing aengagoc wake wakea nanec, yeni kondung sobing mong imohai mema wainnu nemuruckema babacmeacfu dzegema faigec Yesuac enarau enec.
43019030	Enu Yesungo waing imoc nema yofi dema arohoec, “Ni uana bic mesidacdua.” Ifi demanu ubea sorohoma mau asuya yaru homeec.
43019031	Uameme imoc makekenggac efac kpefacac naso anec. Nga yudangic yeneng ngic mariponnu yunugec, yeneac farengngina sabata nasou mariponnu mi nambeso negenggec. (Sabata naso imocngo hombang kuneng yombong.) Imocac amma wasaingic yeneng mariponnu ngic haningina kpetackema mesiyunugecdeac Pirato kpesimigec.
43019032	Kpesimigec wasaingic yeneng hama ngic Yesugoc mariponnu yurugec, yereac haningira monggac hanahema kpetackema monggac ifingoc kpetackegec.
43019033	Kpetackema Yesuaru hama henggec, ye bic homeec, ifi anu hania mi kpetackegec.
43019034	Nga wasaingic mongngo ine sangarango Yesuac pandzenga nembarackeu sac nga doku imohacsing maec.
43019035	Ngeni ifingoc faka fingerec, imoc negensinggegecdeac amma ni kicnango hendarai nga imoc dekperagiduae. Amma ni wiac dekperagiduae, imocngo fora ande, imoc negenduae.
43019036	“Yeni sira mong mi kpetackegecde nga kpetackebesandae.” (Mke 12:46; Bki 9:12; Myeg 34:20) Yoac yomocngo mitikibiu oho ohoya fede, imoc hafoangoc fora fingerudeac ifi fingerec.
43019037	Mitikibiu yoac mong yofia fede, “Nembaracnugec, ngic imoc yeni kicnginango nembesandae.” (Dzek 12:10)
43019038	Imoc wisickeu ngic mong kpara Yosefe Arimatianac, yeng Piratoaru kemma Yesuac fareng mesiudeac kpesimiec. Kpesimiu Piratongo desiu Yosefengo kemma Yesuac farenga mesiec. Imoc yofiac, ye Yesuac medac anu ye yudangic yeneac kengec kpeu fingectegecma mi kefec.
43019039	Nga Nikodemo, ye warac tofocnac Yesugoc yoacyoac anoc, yeng ic sopea homuna gombunga ebiha 30 kiroacsoc, imoc mehaec. Sopo yereac kpacngira mira nga aloe, imocngo yerec yerecgea.
43019040	Yeri imoc mehama yudangic yeneac fareng tonggo tonggoac faka modacma farenga mema sopongo kpedanggema lineng kporucngo tembonggeoc.
43019041	Anu yeri Yesu mariponnu kpegec, bangec botuc imohaingoc ua mong feec, ua imocac manau kedzebe mong gboria ngicngo memea nanec. Nanu kicsere ngic mong warac mi faigec, imohai faioc.
43019042	Yudangic yeni imohai hombanggac efac kpefac anggec nga kicsere imoc wegenac feecac Yesuac farenga imohai faioc.
43020001	Sonda gboria uameme hanac hanaheau ama werec wereckenggac Maria Madarango kicsereu kemma kedzebe naguac hoctoa, imoc meic meickea henec.
43020002	Ifi hemma monggoc nedzikemma Simong Petoro nga medac mong, Yesuac songomedaha, yeri edeyuruec, “Yeni Kebu kicsereunac meickema dahaigeng faidau, imoc mi negendimbe.”
43020003	Ifi deu Petoro nga medac ogea yeri kicsereu kemma
43020004	yerahafoc sinnu nedzikemma medacogeango kucgoc nedzima Petoro ferahema yeng bic kicsereu kensikeec.
43020005	Kensikema okarima henu kporucsusu tembonggegec, imocngosac tarec. Nga ye manau ine mi enec.
43020006	Simong Petoro ye ngade hama kicsereu emma henu kporucsusu imoc tarec.
43020007	Kporucsusu oruhau kperahagec, imocngo tembuha kporuc tosea kpou faifaiango imocgoc mi tarec, ifi henec.
43020008	Ifi hemma nammanu medacogea waraima kicsereu kenec, yeng ifingoc kicsereu emma imoc hemma negensinggeec.
43020009	Imoc yofiac, Yesu homecfunac yacbeso, imocac mitikibiu oho ohoya fede, yeri imoc warac mi ireckemangoc
43020010	dzigenema amangirau kenoc.
43020011	Anu Mariango kicsere ngadeau namma kiarec. Kiacmangoc okarima kicsereu kic fima henec.
43020012	Henu angero yohockang yeri ngakpiherecngira kongac kongac yerenec. Yerenu Yesuac farenga feecfu, mongngo oruhaugeng nga mongngo haniaugeng, ifi taroc.
43020013	Tacma kpesimioc, “Ngac, ge nocac kiacnec?” kpesimiec Mariango merenec, “Yeni Kebunaac farenga meickema dahai faidauac obohoma kiacduae.”
43020014	Ifi dema dzigene henu Yesungo ngadeau nanec. Nanu Yesungo nande, imoc mi hentegeru
43020015	Yesungo yofi kpesimiec, “Ngac, ge merac hofocma kiacnec?” deu negenec, “Ua minginango kpesinende.” ifi negemma deec, “Kunenna, geng Yesuac farenga meickema monnu faidang isoc edenuna kemma meba.”
43020016	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Maria.” ifi deu dzigenema “Rabbouni.” deec. (Arama yoacfu Rabbouni, imocac titiha kpoukpouna.)
43020017	Nga Yesungo yofi edeec, “Mannaaru mi enduangoc, imocac mi kpeserenuna. Ge kemma tosofocna yofi edeyununa, ‘Ni Manna nga ngeneac Manggac amma neac Anutuna nga ngeneac Anutu, yearunoc embade.’ ”
43020018	Ifi deu Maria Madarango medac yenearu kemma Yesu henec nga yoac edeec, imoc edeyunuec.
43020019	Uameme imohaingoc ama bic toforemanu Yesu medacfora yeni yudangic yeneac kengecyunuu amangina nagu heima kpetinggema tacgec. Tacmagec Yesungo hama botucnginau namma yofi edeyunuec, “Ruae ngenearu febeso.”
43020020	Ye ifi dema maria nga pandzenga edzacyunuec. Edzacyunuu medacfora yeni Kebu hemma sogaigec.
43020021	Nga Yesungo monggoc yofi edeyunuec, “Ruae ngenearu febeso. Mannango suenuu hayai, neng ifi isocngoc ngeni suengunuduae.”
43020022	Ye ifi dema enacasuya fifiyemmema yofi deec, “Ngeni Tiri Asu megec.”
43020023	Ngeni ngic yeneac kopocsic wayemmegecdeu kopocsicngina wawaya anude. Nga ngeni kopocsicngina witickegecdeu kopocsicnginaac witicfu kecgecdengoc.
43020024	Medac 12 yeneac botucfunac mong kpara Toma, Tombosonga degec, yeng Yesungo medacfora fingecyemmeec, naso imohai mi tarec.
43020025	Imocac medac ogofora yeneng edegec, “Neni Kebu hending.” degec Tomango deec, “Ni kicnango biringngo kpegec mi hembade nga gbonnango maria titingau mi faibade amma pandzengau marinango mi faiba enudeu imoc naric mi negensinggebade.”
43020026	Ifi deu uameme 8 imocac ngadeau Yesu medacfora nga Toma yenahafoc monggoc emma tacgec. Yeni nagungina heima kpetinggema tacmagec Yesungo botucnginau fingecma namma yofi deec, “Ruae ngenigoc febeso.”
43020027	Ifi dema Tomaac yofi deec, “Toma, gbongga sinena marinaac titingau enu nga kicgango henna. Amma mariga sinena pandzennau enu negengyohoc wama negensinggena.”
43020028	Ifi deu Tomango deec, “Ge Kebuna amma Anutuna.”
43020029	ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ge kicngo nendanggac negensinggenec. Nga ngic mong ye kicngo mi hemma negensinggeude, ye kenehagoc.”
43020030	Yesungo medacfora yeneac kicfu ngicngac yeneng negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc homac mekenec, imoc kibi yomohai mi ohodarai.
43020031	Nga Yesu ye Messia Anutuac medac, ngeni imoc negensinggema kekec yeac kpacfu mekecgecdeac kibi yomoc oho ohoya fede.
43021001	Imocac ngadeau Yesungo Tiberia dzohonnu medacfora monggoc fingecyemmeec. Imoc yofi fingerec,
43021002	Simong Petoro nga Toma Tombosonga dekecgec amma Natanae Gariraia bangecfu Kanang taonnunac nga Dzebedaioac medachora amma Yesuac medacfora yenearunac ngic yohockang, yeni yenahafoc tacgec.
43021003	Tacma Simong Petorongo ogofora edeyunuec, “Ni kondungyanggac kembadeac negenduae.” Ifi edeyunuu degec, “Neni gegoc momoc kennide.” Ifi dema yenahafoc gombau emma kemma tofocnac imohai kondungyang mong mi megec.
43021004	Wiac mong mi mekecmagec ama wereckenu Yesungo dzohong tegiau nanec. Nanu yeni Yesungo nande, imoc mi hensigec
43021005	Yesungo yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Medacfocna, ngeni kondungyang mong medau me kpac?” deu yeni degec, “Kpac.”
43021006	Ifi degec yeng yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni uficngina gomba foiaugeng ukugec kemeu goa meficgegecde.” Ifi deu yeni deec imoc modacma uficngina ukugec kemeu kondungyang ebiriango yombong uficfu kemegecac kpedzibibiema wagec.
43021007	Nga Yesuac songomedacngo Petoro edeec, “Imoc Kebunoc.” ifi deu Simong Petorongo negemma sebiasac nanecac ngakpia heima gombaunac yuma dzohonnu kemema waraiyemmeec.
43021008	Nga medacfora goa dzohong tegiaugeng 100 mitaacsoc hereau mi tacgecac yeni gombau namma uficngina kondungyangagoc kpedzi kpedzi kenggec.
43021009	Kensikema tegiau emma henggec ic sogong goa nga kondungyang gerecyohocfu tarec.
43021010	Ifi taru Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngeni kondungyang goa yaguc medau, imoc mehagec.”
43021011	Ifi anggec Simong Petorongo tembuha gombau emma ufic kpedziu tegiau enec. Nga imoc kondungyang kuneng kunengngo wakema kpetengina 153 imocacsoc anec nga uficngo sifu mi tegerec.
43021012	Nga Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni hama menegec.” ifi deu medacfora kengecyunuu yenearunac mongngo, ge merac dema, mi kpesimigec. Imoc Kebunoc, yeni ifi bic negenggec.
43021013	Nga Yesungo gerec kiwau hama ic sogong mema yemmema kodungyang ifingoc mema yemmeec.
43021014	Yesungo homecfunac yarec, naso imohai medacfora fingecyemmeec, imoc atac harebec anec.
43021015	Anu yaka negec wisickeu Yesungo Simong Petoro yofi kpesimiec, “Simong Yohaneac medac, ge neac songo heregoc negennec, imocngo tosofocga yeneac ferahede me?” ifi deu Petorongo deec, “O, Kebu ni geac heresongo negenduae, ge imoc bic negennec.” Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ge ramafocna medaha yaka gumecyunubesena.”
43021016	Dema Yesungo monggoc deu atac yohockang anec, “Simong Yohaneac medac, ge foracngoc neac songo heregoc negennec me?” deu Simongngo deec, “O, Kebu ni geac heresongo negenduae, imoc bic negennec.” ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ge ramafocna yeneac gareng kecbesena.”
43021017	Dema Yesungo monggoc kpesimiu atac harebec anec, “Simong Yohaneac medac, ge neac songo heregoc negennec me?” Yesungo kpesimiu atac harebec anu Petoro ye negengebirima Yesu yofi edeec, “Kebu, ge wiac sasawa negendacnec. Ni geac heresongo negenduae, imoc bic negennec.” ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ge ramafocna meyunuma yaka gumecyunubesena.”
43021018	“Ni fora yombong edeguduae, ge sebigbori kecma geanggaoc wambaga faima songoga modacma kengha angannec. Nga ge kpengeng annade, naso imohai mariga miacna ngic mongngo wamba heigemma songoga mi fede, imohai megu kemma faigugecde.”
43021019	Petorongo homehau siric dafi homema Anutu dengereude, Yesungo imocac heabima deec. Amma monggoc edeec, “Ge hama modacnuna.”
43021020	Yesungo ifi deu, Petorongo dzigenema Yesuac songomedaha henu yeng yeri modacyuruec. Ngic modacyuruec, yeng warac yaka negec, naso imohai Yesuac mondacfu heima merang doc meudeac kpesimiec.
43021021	Nga Petorongo medac imoc hemma Yesu kpesimiec, “Kebu, ge yeac dafi negennec?”
43021022	Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ni songona andeu yeng kecmanungoc dzigene habade, imocngo ine geac wiac mi ande. Ge eng hama modacnuna.”
43021023	Ifi deu tosofora botucnginaunac yofi netohogec wakeec, “Medac imoc mi homeude.” Nga Yesungo mi homeudeac mi deec, kpac. Ye yofisac deec, “Ni songona andeu yeng kecmanungoc dzigene habade, imocngo geac wiac mi ande.” Yoac wisic wisickea.
43021024	Medaha imoc ninoc. Ni wiac yomocac hepuc amma dekperagima ohoai. Nga yoacna imoc fora, imoc negendimbe.
43021025	Yesungo wiac goa homac meec, ngic mongngo wiac imocac yoac sasawa kibiu ohodacbac, imoc bangectoa bangec yomohai faifaiac titinga negemba mi fingecbac.
44001001	O Teofiro, ni warac yoac ohogenai, imoc Yesungo hanahema ua meec amma enacyoara kpounemmeec, imocac yoacsiduc seng anggendarai.
44001002	Ye uaya mekengkefu nasoya wegene haec imohai Tiri Asuac kucfu aposoro warac meisingyunuec, yeni uaareng dederecge ayemmema kurumennu enec, imocac siducnoc ohodarai.
44001003	Yeng kpendzeng kpekecma homema monggoc gborima yacma uameme 40ac manau yengenaoc fingecsufu ayemmema faka hania hania mema Anutuac eucererenggac hania edekpou ayemmeec. Ayemmeu yeni faka imoc hemma ye fora kecde, imoc negentegecgec.
44001004	Amma yenigoc tacyac amma yoac yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni Yerusaleng bic mi wabisia. Manggacac dedeseriyoac edengunuba negenggec, imoc fora kpeudeac tomai kecbisia.
44001005	Imoc yofiac, Yohane ye doku bic nadzicngemmeec nga yoc ine naso mi hereemanu Tiri Asu nadzicngemmeude.”
44001006	Ifi deu kpedzucnema tacgec yeneng kpesimigec, “Kebu, ge naso yomohai Israe ngicngac monggoc kpedzucnununa neni nenang bangec ngictauninagoc amma kecnide me?”
44001007	Ifi degec yofi edeyunuec, “Manggac ye kuc minginango yeng wenac me yabungnaso hania hania faiec fede, imoc negentegecgecdeac kuc mi ngemme ngemmea.
44001008	Negenggec, Tiri Asungo ngenearu mama kuc ngemmeu ngeni siducdedefocna anggecde. Nga ngeni Yerusaleng amma Yudaia nga Samaria bangec sasawa yerecgema yoacna dekenggec bangeha bangeha sokodacbeso.”
44001009	Yesungo ifi edeyunuma kicngina witiau efaima enec. Emmanu hoengngo kicnginaungoc merucgema meenec.
44001010	Meemmanu yeni fimodacma hofocgec ngic yohockang ngakpingira kongac kongacngo mi yenearu fingecma nambesera i.
44001011	Namma yofi edeyunuoc, “Gariraia bangecfunac ngic, ngeni kicngina sawau fimangoc mi nambisia. Anutungo Yesu kurumennu meenu ye wangunuma endac. Amma ngic enu hendau, yennoc kecma siriha ifiangoc habesande.”
44001012	Anu aposoro yeni Oliwatikibumaunac dzigenema mama Yerusalennu enggec, imoc sing wegenac anu sabata nasou sing imoc naric kengha angkecgec.
44001013	Yerusalennu kemma ama tacyac angkecgec, imohai emma tacgec. Tacgec, yeneac kpac yofi: Petoro nga Yohane amma Yakobo, Anderea nga Firipo amma Toma, Batoromaio nga Mataio amma Yakobo Arifaioac medac, Simong Dzerote nga Yuda Yakoboac medac.
44001014	Ngic imoc yenennoc uba mocgu amma nunumu ua tatahoc mekecgec. Ifi anggec Yesuac nonggea Maria nga ngac goa amma Yesuac munafora, yeneng yenigoc yenahafoc kecma nunumu ua momoc mekecgec.
44001015	Anu Yesuac arengfora 120 nganoc ifingo kpedzucnema tacmagec Petorongo botucnginau namma yofi edeyunuec.
44001016	“Negen negensinggoc tosofocna, negenggec, Yudango ngic hesicyunuu kemma Yesu mendanggegec, yeacnoc Tiri Asungo bicngoc Dawidiac enacfu yoac faiu ohoec, imoc fora fingecbeso, imocac ifi anec.
44001017	Yuda warac nenang arennoc amma kefec, ye nenahafoc Kebuac uamemeac denecdenemmea.”
44001018	“Amma ngic yeng faka manganaac dzo mema ua bangec mong bummeec, ihai kemma oruhango kpemeremma kekpeu wosea kpendziru keracbawa madarec.
44001019	Amma imocac siduc Yerusaleng ngicngac sasawa negendacma bangec, imocac kpara Akedama degec, titiha yofi, ‘Bangec sac maecfu.’ ”
44001020	“Mitiyegecfu yoac yofi oho ohoya fede, ‘Ye amabangeha kisi fingeru ngic mongngo yeac kporucbedzou mi tacbeso.’ (Myeg 69:25) Amma monggoc yofi, ‘Ngic mongngo yeac ngicenaraac tatac mebeso.’ (Myeg 109:8)
44001021	Imocac amma ngic mong yeac turunga meisinggebesonga. Yohanengo Yesu mitidoku nadzicmiu uaya hanahema mema nenanggoc kengha kecma kurumennu enec, naso imohai ngic nenanggoc kecgec, ngic imoc yeneac botucfunac ngic mong isinggeni yeng nenanggoc Yesu homecfunac yarec, imocac siduc nenahafoc debisina.”
44001023	Petorongo ifi deu ngic yohockang meficyurugec: Mong kpara Yosefe Basaba dekecgec, yeac kpara mong Yusto, amma ogea Matia.
44001024	Meficyuruma yofi dema numugec, “O, Kebu ubaheheng mingina, ge ngic yohockang yoc yerearunac daoc meisinggema edzacnununa henni.
44001025	Henni yeng aposoro kpac mema Yudaac tatac mebeso. Yuda ye tataha imoc wama yengena sing monnu kenec.”
44001026	Ifi dema numuma meisinggeudeac kpeing kpegec Matia heficgeu aposoro 11 yenearu torokpegec.
44002001	Pentekos tacyacac naso wegenemanu yenahafoc ama mocguu kpedzucnema engensicfu tacgec.
44002002	Tacmagec kurumennunac udumengtoa mong firang kucgoc kpeande, imocac udumeng isoc ioha yombong fingecma maec. Mama ama tacgec, ihai emma wakeu
44002003	yeni siriha yofi henggec: Nedzarang gerecborang isoc fingecma ngicngac orucnginasoc tohoma tackenec.
44002004	Anu Tiri Asungo ubanginau kemema wakeec. Wakeu yoac siriha mong mong degec. Asungo minginasoc meficgeyemmeu yoac dekenggec.
44002005	Anu yudangic homac bangec noboc nobocnac hahayango Yerusaleng taonnu tacgec, yeni Anutuac yoac modacma kecgec.
44002006	Nga udumengtoa fingeru habu homacngo imoc negemma hama kpedzucnema kerectegec anggec. Imoc yofiac, Tiri Asugoc yeneng ngicngac yeneac yoacnginausing tembuc tembuc degec negenggec.
44002007	Negemma kerectegec amma warecyunuma degec, “Ngic yomoc yoac andae, yeni sasawango gariraiangic.
44002008	Nga yeni dafiu nenang yoacninausing yombong tembuc tembuc degec negendimbe?
44002009	Neni yoc patangic nga medengic amma erangngic, me Mesopotamia bangecfunac nga Yudaia bangecfunac amma Kapadokia bangecfunac, neni Ponto bangecfunac nga Asia bangecfunac,
44002010	amma monggoc Firigia bangecfunac, neni Pamfiria bangecfunac nga Aigita bangecfunac amma Ribia bangecfu Kirene ama tegia tegia, imohacnac amma Roma taongtoaunac hading.
44002011	Amma yudangic nga bangec monnunac ngic yudangic yenigoc torokpegec, kretangic amma arabiangic. Nenang ifingoc kecma yoacninasoc Anutu fakatoayaac yoacsiduc degec negendimbe.”
44002012	Ifi dema kerectegec amma obohoma denegeng amma degec, “Faka fingecde, imoc wiac siriha mong yombong, imoc mi negentegecdimbe.”
44002013	Goango ine yeneac deendema amma yofi degec, “Yeni waingdoku homac nedauac ubangina sufude.”
44002014	Ifi degec Petoro ye tosofora 11 yenigoc namma ubea meyadima yofi edeyunuec, “Yudangicngac amma ngicngac sasawa Yerusalennu kecdae, ni faka yomocac hania dekperagingemmeba negenggec.
44002015	Ngeni ngic yomoc yenemma yofi negensidae, ‘Waingdoku nema ubangina sufude.’ ifi kpac. Yaguc asoac 9 kirocsac andeac waingdoku mi nedau, kpac.
44002016	Nga faka yomocacnoc, profete Yoelengo yoac yofi deec,
44002017	‘Anutungo yofi dede, “Naso wisickebeso ammanu ni Asuna kpakeba mau ngicngac sasawango medacbesandae. Amma naroang medacfocngina yeni profeteyoac degecde nga sebigborifocngina onga henggecde amma yadafocngina gaukpefing henggecde.
44002018	Amma naso imohainoc ni enac tofoc tofoho ngicngacfocna, yenearu Asuna kpakeba mau yeni profeteyoac degecde.
44002019	Amma deba wi sawau soi fingerude. Nga emu bangecfu faka bibiagoc siria hania hania fingerude. Naso imohai sac nga gerec amma hosuctoa fingerude.
44002020	Kebuac nasotoaac kuc kibikperagiagoc mi fingecmanu wenackiwa meremma kundung kpeude nga afokiwa sac isoc anude.
44002021	Anu Ngicngac yeneng Kebuac kpac kpacgec Anutungo yeni sasawa kopocsicnginaac ebicfunac mesiyunuu komoc kpebesandae.” ’ (Yle 2:28-32)
44002022	Israengic, ni edengunuba negenggec, Yesu Nadzaretenac, ye Anutungo meefaima nonggo tacmimanu botucnginau faka kuhagoc nga negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc nga faka mi hengena meec. Imoc bic irec ireckeaac hania hentegecgec.
44002023	Yeacnoc Anutungo bicngoc negenu feec, imocac sing desima ngeneac mariu faiec. Ngeneng ye bangec monnunac ngic, dedeseria kpac kecdae, yeneac mariu faima edeyunugec yeni ye mariponnu kpegec homeec.
44002024	Anu homecngo ye naric mi segereec. Imocac Anutungo homecac kpendzennunac megboriu yarec.
44002025	Dawidingo yeac enac mema yofi deec, ‘Ni nasosoc kicna kebuaru fikecduae. Yeng foinaugeng kecdeac wiac mongngo menuu goroc goroc naric mi ambade.
44002026	Imocac ubaherenango ubangerec negemma nedzarannango sogaiu sebina ifingoc ruaegoc anude.
44002027	Geng ubaongana homecamau naric mi wanade. Amma ge kpetiac ngicga kisereu wana mi hoaeude.
44002028	Geng kekecac sing kpounennec. Geac kicfu sogac sogai hafoangoc fede nga foigaugeng ubangerec feengkecbesande.’ (Myeg 16:8-11) Yoac imoc Dawidingo dekperagiec.
44002029	Tosofocna, bangecnina Dawidiac hania dema enacefac yofi edengunuba, ye homeu tonggogec. Anu kicserea feecngo yaguc fede.
44002030	Ye profete kefecac yofi negenec, ‘Anutungo yeac bangecyombonga yeneac arennunac medaha mong meisinggema ye ngictautatahau faiu tarudeac deseriec.’
44002031	Imoc kpefing hemma negemma Kristo yacyahaac yofi deec, ‘Anutungo homecamau mi waec nga farenga kisereu mi hoaeude.’ (Myeg 16:10)
44002032	Anu Yesu yenoc Anutungo homecfunac midiu yaru neni kicninango fora hendaring.
44002033	Ye yacma dzigene enu Anutu marifoiango seseheec. Nga Mamango warac Tiri Asu miudeac deec, ye imoc mema kpakeu maec, imoc yagucnoc hennegeng andae.
44002034	Dawidi ye kurumennu mi enec, kpac. Yeng ine yoac yofi deec, ‘ Kebungo neac Kebuna yofi edeec, “Ge foinaugeng tacmana
44002035	ngabafocga hanigaac bageau faiyunuba yeni hanigaac tatac ambesandae.” ’ (Myeg 110:1)
44002036	Imocac amma israengicngac sasawa, ngeni yofi negengyombonggebisia: Ngeni Yesu mariponnu kpegec, ngic imocnoc Anutungo Kebu nga Messianina fainemmeec kecde.”
44002037	Petorongo yoac ifi edeyunuu herengina yaru, yengena nga aposoro arengfora yofi kpesiyemmegec, “Tosofoc, neni dafi anni ngereeude?”
44002038	Ifi degec Petorongo yofi edeyunuec, “Anutungo kopocsicngina waudeac ngeni ubangina dzigeneu tembuc tembuc Yesu Kristoac kpacfu doku nadzicgec. Ifi anggec Anutungo wosoefahaac Tiri Asuya ngemmeude.
44002039	Nga dedeseriyoac imoc ngenang nga nambaracfocngina amma hereau kecdae, Kebu Anutuninango kpacngunuma heitaingunuudesoc, ngeni naric megecde.”
44002040	Petoro ye ifi dema gorongina kpema yoac homac torokpema edeyunuec, “Kebungo ngic mangac manganea yeneac faka imohacnac mesingunuu ngeni komoc kpebisia! Yenigoc manganema kpac ambauac.”
44002041	Anu wenac ihai ngicngac 3 tauseng yeni Petoroac yoac negensinggema doku nadzicma Yesuac habuu torokpegec.
44002042	Anu aposoro yeneng siduc gombung kpouyemmegec imoc negenggecdeac yenang singngina meserima kecma ubango dedzege amma uba urecfu yaka nema nunumu ua mekecgec.
44002043	Nga aposoro yenearu faka kuhagoc nga faka morora hania hania fingectegerecac ngicngac sasawango kerectegec anggec.
44002044	Anu Yesu negensinggegec, yeni uba urecfu wiac sasawangina imoc mekecgec.
44002045	Amma yeni bangec nga hiefinacngina suegec dzo kirecgeu tosofocngina wiac hofocgecsoc medereyemmegec.
44002046	Nga ngicngac wenacsoc Anutuac womonnu uba mocgu amma kpedzucnekecgec, yeni uba urecfu amaya amaya yaka nekecma yakangina imoc ubangerecgoc mederema emenec angkecgec.
44002047	Ifi amma Anutu dengerema kecgec ngicngac habutoango yeneng dzidziema eweheihei ayemmegec. Anu Kebungo wenaha wenaha ngicngac kopocsicfunac mesiyunuu komoc kpegec yengena arennu torokpeyunuec.
44003001	Wenac monnu 3 kiroc marai nunumunaso anu Petoro nga Yohane yeri Anutuac womonnu enoc.
44003002	Anu ngic mong hanimangang nonggo heremanaunac ifia fingerec, ye Kebuac womonnu nagu mong kpara Nagukereng, ihai wenaha wenaha tofoho emma faigec takefec. Ye ngicngac womonnu engemmama anggec, yenearu ubangerecac wiacac derecgeudeac ifi anggec.
44003003	Ngic imocngo Petoro nga Yohane yeri womonnu embeso ammaec yeremma ifingoc ubangerecac wiacac derecgeyemerec.
44003004	Derecgeyemeru yereng ye henserioc. Henserima Petorongo yofi edeec, “Ge nerenna!”
44003005	Ifi deu “Yereng wiac mong nembesonga dedape.” ifi negemma kic fima yerenec.
44003006	Yeremmanu Petorongo yofi edeec, “Ni hiedzona kpac nga wiac mocgu fenende, imoc ine gemba mena! Yesu Kristo Nadzaretenac, yeac kpacfu yacma kenna.”
44003007	Ifi dema marifoiau mema miaru imohaingoc hania ubea seriec.
44003008	Seriu kucbiric yacma namma yerigoc womonnu enggec. Emma yeng yu engemmama nga sing kengha amma Kebu dengereec.
44003009	Kebu dengerema kengha anu ngicngac hafoangoc yeneng hemma degec.
44003010	“Yennoc womonggac nagu kpara Nagukereng, ihai hiedzoac derecgeyemmeudeac takefec.” Ifi dema hensima kpidohoma dzonong fedefede anggec.
44003011	Ngic ye Petoro nga Yohane yerearu kpeketaheu ngicngac homacngo Anutuac womong mana kakasang mong feec, kpara Salomo, imohai yerearu kemma kpedzucnedacma kerectegec anggec.
44003012	Ifi anggec Petorongo yenemma ngicngac yofi edeyunuec, “Israe ngicngac, ngeni ngic yomoc hemma kerectegec mi ambisia. Amma ngeni neri mi nerenseribisia. Faka imoc nereac kucac mi fingecdac nga imoc nereng Kebuac kicfu gombunga kecdipeac mi fingecdac.
44003013	Imoc kpahac, kisicfocngina Abrahang nga Isaka amma Yakobo, yeneac Anutu yennoc enac tofoc tofohoa Yesu ngickunenggac kuc kibikperagiagoc miec. Ngeni ine ye ngadehema bangec monnunac ngic Anutu mi negemmidae, yenearu faigec. Foracngoc, Piratongo yoara isinggema yungecbesonga desiec. Nga ngeneng ine wagec.
44003014	Yenoc ngic kpetiac nga faka dindingac mekecde nga ngeneng ine ye wagec. Amma godzungicngo ngic mong kpeu homeec, ngeni yenoc yungecngemmeudeac serima dema
44003015	kekecac enarameme kpegec. Nga Anutungo ye homecfunac megboriu yarec, neni imocac hepuc aning.
44003016	Nga neri Yesuac kpac kpacma negensinggedicac ngic yomoc hendae, ye kuc medac. Nga Yesuac kpacfu negen negensinggoc kecdipe, imocac amma ye ngereehomedac. Ngeni sasawango faka imoc hendae.
44003017	Tosofocna, ngeni nga garengfocngina Yesuac hania mi negemma ifi anggec, imoc yaguc negentegecduae.
44003018	Foracngoc, Anutungo Messia meisinggeec, yeng kpendzeng kpekecma homeudeac profete sasawa yeneac enacfu yoac faiu degec, imoc sasawa Anutu deecfu fingecdarec.
44003019	Imocac ngeni kopocsicngina meicmeickea anudeac ubangina dzigeneu Anutu hoanggebisia.
44003020	Ifi anggecdeu Anutuac hoannunac kenec kuhagoc haude. Amma bicngoc Messia meisinggengemmeec, ye suengemmeude, imoc Yesunoc.
44003021	Ye kurumennu emma kecmanungoc, wiac sasawaac mengec mengere naso hau dzigeneude. Imocac yoac Anutungo bicngoc yombong kpetiac profetefora enacnginau faiu dekperagigec.
44003022	Mosengo yofi deec, ‘Kebu Anutunginango ngeneac arennunac profete mong ni isoc, ifia meficgengemmeu yeng yoac sasawa deude, imoc negendacbisia.
44003023	Anu mongngo profete imocac yoac mi tofohoudeu ye arengnginaunac meickema kpehomebesonga.’ (Dser 18:15, 18-19)
44003024	Naso yomohai faka fingecdac, imoc Samuearunac profete sasawa nangeregec, yeneng bic dekperagigec.
44003025	Anutungo kisicfocngina yenigoc dzadzahac mema Abrahang yofi edeec, ‘Bangecga yeac arennu ngicngac bangeha bangeha keneheyunudacbesandua.’ (Fing 22:18; 26:4) Ngeni dzadzahac imoc nga profete yeneac ubamarac imoc mekecdae.
44003026	Ngeneacnoc bic negensima Anutungo medaha sueu mama fingerec, imoc ngeni sasawa kpenggodzuac sinnunac merengngunudacma kenecngunuudeac ifinoc anec.”
44004001	Petoro nga Yohane yeri ngicngac yoac ifi edeyunuma nammaec womonggareng amma womonggac tebengic enara nga sadukaio yeni yenahafoc yerearu kemma ihai nanggec.
44004002	Nga ngic nanggec yereng yoac edekpou ayemmema Yesu ye enaranina mema homecfunac yarec, imocac yoacsiduc desaheyemmedarec yeni herebu negemma ngaba ayecmegec.
44004003	Ifi ayecmema mendangyuruma ama bic marai anecac witicamau faiyurugec tacmaec ama wereckenec.
44004004	Anu habutoango Petoro yoac deu negenggec, yenearunac homacngo imoc negensinggema Yesuac habuu torokpegec. Anu ngicngac imoc kpetengina 5 tauseng anec.
44004005	Wereckengau yudangic yeneac tutumangtoaac memba nga enarafocngina amma mitiac negen negengngic, yeni Yerusalennu kpeturanggegec.
44004006	Kpeturanggema womonggarengtoa Hanasi nga Kaifa amma Yohane nga Aresande amma womonggareng enara kecdae, yeneac arengfocngina sasawa yenahafoc kpedzucnema tacgec.
44004007	Tacma Petoro nga Yohane meyuru hama kicnginau faiyurugec. Faiyuruma yofi dekpesi ayecmegec, “Ngeri noc kucfu nga meracac kpacfu faka yomoc medaoc?”
44004008	Kpesiyecmegec Petoro ye Tiri Asungo ubeau wakeu yofi edeyunuec, “Enarameme nga Israe garengfocnina deba negenggec.
44004009	Ngeni ngic hanimangang ye dafi ngereedac amma yearu faka gombunga dafi fingecmidac, imohaingoc kpesinecmebau.
44004010	Ngeni nga israengic sasawa negenggecdeac yoac yofi deireckeba, ngeneng Yesu Kristo Nadzaretenac mariponnu kpegec homeu Anutungo ye homecfunac megboriu yarec kecde. Nga yeac kpacfu ngic imoc ngereema kicnginau nande.
44004011	‘Amameme ngic ngeneng hoc mong mangana dema ukugec. Nga hoc imocngo amaac hoc wotung amma seria nanude nga nambesande.’ (Myeg 118:22)
44004012	Ngic monggaru kpeketahegec yeng kopocsicac ebicfunac naric mi mesiyunuude, komoc kpegecdeac sing mong mi fede, kpac. Bangeha bangeha nenang Yesuac kpacfu kecni yeng kopocsicac ebicfunac mesinunuu komoc kpenide.”
44004013	Anu Petoro nga Yohane yeri kibiama yadau mong mi tarocngo kengeha kpac enacefacngoc yoac deocac yeni imoc negemma kerectegec anggec. Amma yeri Yesugoc kefoc, imoc yerensigec.
44004014	Anu ngic sebia ngereec, yeng yerigoc nanu henggecac yoac merengyecmegecdeac obohogec.
44004015	Obohoma tutumangtoaunac ayecmegec sobennu mama nammaec yenaocngoc yoac yofi dema denegeng anggec.
44004016	“Nenang ngic yohockang dafi ayecmenideac obohode. Yeri negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc yombong meec fingectegeru Yerusalennac ngicngac yeneng siduha bic negendacdau, imocac busic naric mi kpenide.
44004017	Nga yoac imoc amasoc kenu negendacbauac yeri Yesuac kpacfu yoac monggoc mi edekpou ayemmeecdeac dekengec ayecmeni.”
44004018	Ifi dema kpacyuruma yofi edeyurugec, “Ngeri Yesuac kpac ngic monggoc edekpou mi ayemmebesera.”
44004019	Ifi degec Petoro nga Yohane yereng yoac yofi merengyemmeoc, “Wiac kicninango hening amma kedzacninango negening, imoc busic naric mi kpenide. Ngeni ngenaoc negenghenggec, ngeneac yoac me Anutuac yoac tofohobesonga. Damocngo Anutuac kicfu ngereede?”
44004021	Ifi deec yeni dekengec yoac monggoc ayecmema eng faiyurugec kenoc. Imoc yofiac, faka fingerecac ngicngac sasawa Anutu dengeregec. Imocac aposoro dafi ayemmebeso, imocac obohogec.
44004022	Nga ngic faka kuhagoc sebiau fingeru ngereec, ye ngicyada kifaya 40 feraheecac yeni aposoro eng wayurugec.
44004023	Wayurugec Petoro nga Yohane yeri arengfocngira yenearu dzigenema kenoc. Kemma womonggareng enara amma garengfocngina yoac edeyurugec, imocac yoacsiduc edeyunudarec negenggec.
44004024	Negemma yeni uba mocgu amma Anutu kpacma dengerema yofi degec, “Kuctoa mingina, ge kurumeng nga bangec amma kondung nga imocac iwai hania hania meficyununec.
44004025	Geng bicngoc Tiri Asu edena yeng kisicnina amma enac tofoc tofohoga Dawidi, yeac enara meefaina yeng yoac yofi deec, ‘Foracngoc bangec monnunac ngicngac Anutu mi negemmidae, yeni faka mangana anggecdeac yoac dedzege anggec nga ngiha ngiha yeni negen negeng ua mema kpedzongemegec, imoc mi ngereeec.
44004026	Bangecac ngictau yeni efaigec nga ngicenara uayoacnginagoc, yeni kpeturanggema Kebu memagec. Nga yeng ngic meisinggema kerecdokungo nadzicmiec, ye ifingoc memagecdeac yoac degec.’ (Myeg 2:1-2)
44004027	Geac enac tofoc tofohoga kpetiac, imoc Yesu Kristo nga geng ye kerecdokungo nadzicminec. Nga taong yomohainoc Herode nga Pontio Pirato, yereng bangec monnunac ngic Anutu mi negemmidae, yeneng Israe ngicngac yenigoc kpeturanggema ye keracmangang ammigec.
44004028	Amma waracngoc geangga kucfu nga enacgango denecac sirihau ifi ammidacgec.
44004029	O Kebu, yomoc ine dekengec yoacngina hennegeng amma enac tofoc tofohofocga kuc meficnunuma nanggenununa yoacga kengeha kpac dekperagiyemmebisina.
44004030	Demina mariga sinena sebiu ngerec ngeree nga negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc nga faka mi hehena kpetiac enac tofoc tofohoga Yesu, yeac kpacfu fingeckembeso.”
44004031	Ifi numugec wisickemanu amabangec kpedzucnema tacgec, imoc kpididieu Tiri Asungo ubanginau wakeu Anutuac yoac kengeha kpac ngic enacefac deireckeyemmegec.
44004032	Yesu negensinggegec, habu imoc yeni uba mocgu amma wiac feyemmeec, imocac neac geac mi dema urecngina mekecgec.
44004033	Aposoro yeneng Kebu Yesu homecfunac yarec, siduc imocac hepuc amma kuhagoc dekperagigec. Nga danggunuctoayango sokoyunudacma feec.
44004034	Yeneac botucnginau mongngo wiac monggac mi obohoec, kpac. Ngicngac sasawa amabangecnginagoc kecgec, yeni amabangecngina imoc desigec hiedzo kirecgeu
44004035	Aposoro yenearu faigec. Faigec, yeneng ngic yeni iwaiac obohogecsoc medereyemmekecgec.
44004036	Anu ngic mong kefec kpara Yosefe, aposoro yeneng kpara mong Banaba degec, imocac titiha yofi: Demeseri medac. Ye Lewiac arennunac Kipiro nucfu fingerec.
44004037	Ngic yeng bangeha mong desiu hiedzo kirecgeu aposoro yenearu mekemma faidarec.
44005001	Anu ngic mong kefec kpara Anania, ye enema Safiragoc bangecngira noboha mong desiec dzo kirecgeec.
44005002	Kirecgeu dzo tosea meickema faiu tarudeac enema edeu negentegeru uba mocgu anoc. Amma toseasac aposoro yenearu mekemma faiec.
44005003	Faiu Petorongo yofi edeec, “Anania negenna, Satangngo ubagau kemeu geng Tiri Asu ikoc ammima bangecga nobohaac bung tosea herandzina fede.
44005004	Amabangecga noboha fegembeso dema fegembac me desina dzo kirecgeu imocngo ‘ifi me ifi amba’ dema ambang. Ge ubagango tobangguu ifi andang, imoc naric mi ande. Negennec, ge ikoc annec, imoc ngic neni mi anemmenec, kpac. Ge Anutunoc ikoc ammidang.”
44005005	Ifi deu Anania ye yoac imoc negemma imohaingoc todingge makpeu asu heifeec, imoc kpac anu homeec. Anu yeni sasawango faka fingerec, imocac siduha negemma damuyunuu kengectoa anggec.
44005006	Nga ngicmedac yeneng yacma farenga biranggema tofoho kemma tonggogec.
44005007	Tonggomagec aua harebec wisickeu enema ye ewearu faka fingerec, imoc mi negemma haec.
44005008	Hau Petorongo yofi kpesimiec, “Bangec nobohango dzo kirecgedac, imocsac me?” kpesimiu yeng deec, “Oc, imocsacnoc.”
44005009	Ifi deu Petorongo yofi edeec, “foracngoc, ngeri Kebuac Asu tobanggeecdeac denegeng amma uba mocgu andaoc. Negennec, ewega tonggoma hadau, yeni nagu ngadeau nandae, mi hereemanu ge ifingoc tofogu kemma tonggogugecde.”
44005010	Ifi edemanu ye imohaingoc haniau todingge makpeu asuya ereu homeec. Homeu ngicmedac yeni ama manau emma ye bic homeec, ifi hemma farenga tofoho kemma ewea feec, imocac tegiau tonggogec.
44005011	Anu kpebung sasawa amma ngicngac sasawa yeneng siducngira negemma damuyunuu kengectoa anggec.
44005012	Aposoro yeneng negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc nga faka mi hehena, imoc homac ngicngac yenearu megec. Nga Yesuac habu sasawa yeni Anutuac womong mana mong katapa mi kpekpea feec, kpara Salomo, ihai uba mocgu amma kpeturanggema kecgec.
44005013	Kpeturanggegec ngicngac yeneng kengec amma yenearu mi torokpegec. Amma yeni sifu eweheihei ayemmema kecgec.
44005014	Ifi anggecac ngicngac homac yeni Kebu negensinggema yenearu kentorokpe anggec Yesuac habu yadiec.
44005015	Aposoro yeni faka kuhagoc megec henggecac amma yeni hafeigoc fefe nga dzakegoc sinnu yofi dema faiyunugec, “Petorongo kengha anu sifunec ongeango kpahacyunuu hafeingina kpac ambeso.”
44005016	Amma Yerusaleng taong yerec yerec amabangec hereau tackende, imohacnac ngicngac homac hafeinginagoc amma asu seuhagocngo memanganeyunugec, yeni hesicyunu kenggec ngereedacgec.
44005017	Faka ifia fingeru womonggarengtoa nga arengfora sadukaio ngichabu, yeneng keracmangang angkecma
44005018	aposoro mendangyunuma witicamau faiyunugec.
44005019	Faiyunugec tofocnac imohai Kebuac angero mongngo nagu meyemmema hesicyunuu magec yofi edeyunuec.
44005020	“Ngeni Anutuac womonnu emma namma kekec gboriaac hania ngicngac sasawa edeyunudadacbisia.”
44005021	Ifi edeyunuu negemma ama werec wereckenggac womonnu emma ngicngac edekpou ayemmegec. Naso imohai womonggarengtoango arengforagoc yudangic yeneac tutumangtoa, imocac memba nga Israe ngicngac yeneac enaratoa kpacyunuu hadacma kpeturanggegec. Kpeturanggema aposoro meyunu hagecdeac witicamau yoac faigec kenec.
44005022	Kenu keracnatang yeni kensikema witicamau hofocyunuma dzigene hama degec,
44005023	“Neni kensikema nagu kia seria yombong memea henni gareng yeni naguu nandau. Anu nagu witima emma ngic hofocyunuma ine ngic mong mi hending.”
44005024	Yoac imoc degec womonggac tebengic enara nga womonggareng enara, yeneng faka fingecdac, imocac obohogec.
44005025	Ifi ammagec ngic mongngo hama deec, “Negendae, ngic witicamau faiyunudau, yeni womonnu ngicngac kpouyemmema nandae.”
44005026	Ifi deu tebengic kunengngina yeng keracnatang meyunuu kenggec. Nga ngic yeneng hocngo yenerebauac kengecyunuu aposoro yumeau hesicyunu hagec.
44005027	Nga yudangic yeneac gamang, imocac memba, tutumannu faiyunugec nammagec womonggarengtoango yoac yofi kpesiyemmeec.
44005028	“Ngeni ngic yeac kpacsiduha ngicngac edekpou mi ayemmegecdeac dederac angemmeing. Nga ngeni ine yoac imoc edekpou ayemmema Yerusalennu monggoc desahedae. Amma ngic imoc yeac sawaac kopocsic, imoc neneac witiu faibeso dedae.”
44005029	Ifi degec Petoro nga aposoro goa yeneng yoac yofi merengyemmegec, “Anutuac yoac wama ngicyoac tofoc tofoho, imoc naric mi ambesonga.
44005030	Ngeni Yesu maringinango mariponnu kpema kpehomegec kisicfocninaac Anutungo ye homecfunac megboriu yarec.
44005031	Yaru Anutungo meemma enaramemetoanina nga memengerecnina amma kasonina gununggeu foiau nande. Nga israengic ngeni ubangina dzigeneu kopocsicngina waudeac ifi anec.
44005032	Anutungo Tiri Asu enac tofoc tofohofora yemmeande. Nga Tiri Asu nga neni Yesuac siduc imoc nenahafoc dekperagidimbe.”
44005033	Yoac ifi edeyunuu wosongina meu aposoro yunuhomegecdeac degec.
44005034	Ifi degec tutumangnginau farisaiongic mong tarec, kpara Gamarie, ye mitiac negen negengngic nga ngicngac yeneng yeac ewea heikecgec. Yeng deec, “Ngeni ngic yomoc ama sobennu meyunu kemema nammagec.”
44005035	Ifi deu meyunu kemegec enarameme arengfora yofi edeyunuec, “Israengic, ngeni ngic yomoc haniangina negentegecma faka ayemmebisia.
44005036	Warac naso mong ngic mong kpara Teuda yengenaoc fingecma deec, ‘Ni ngickunengngina.’ ifi deu ngic 400 isoc yearu kpeketahegec. Nga ye yengena dzikac kima homeu arengfora ticpac tehegec uangina kpac anec.
44005037	Ye kpac anu takesiac amma kpac oso oso nga oho oho naso megec, naso imohai Gariraia bangecfunac ngic mong kpara Yuda, ye ngic goa herengina miaru yeni ye modacgec. Yuda yengena ifingoc kpegec kpac anu arengfora ticpac tehedacgec.
44005038	Imocac amma yofi edengunuba negenggec, ngeni ngic yomoc wayunugec kenggec. Yeni uaareng yomoc ngic negen negennu medaeu imoc bic kpac andarude.
44005039	Nga Anutungo nonggo tacmanu medaeu ngeni mi kpetariyemmegecdeacsoc anggecde. Kecma Anutu ngaba ammibauac.”
