44005040	Ifi edeyunuu ireckema aposoro kpacyunugec hagec dzikacngo yunugecdeac edeyunugec. Yunugec wisickeu yeni yoac monggoc Yesuac kpacfu mi dekperagigecdeac deracyunuma sueyunugec.
44005041	Sueyunugec, yeni naric Yesu kparaac amma gamekpekpe ayemmegec, imocac ubangerecfu tutumannunac mama kenggec.
44005042	Amma yeni wenaha wenaha Anutuac womonnu nga amaya amaya, imohai Yesu ye Messia imocac siduc gombung edekpou ayemmema ua imoc mi wagec.
44006001	Naso imohai Yesuac habu sokoma kenec. Sokoma kenu nenesemeng wenacsoc mendzicyemmekecma yudangic grikyoac dekecgec, yeneac hotsec ewefocngina homemea medadangyunugec. Ifi anggec, yeni yudangic ama mingina kecgec, yeneac ubakpekpe anggec
44006002	aposoro 12 yeneng Yesuac habu kpacyunudacma yofi edeyunugec, “Neni yaka hendzic hendzic ua imoc nanggema Anutuac yoac dede, imocac ua wadacni mau naric mi ngereeude.
44006003	Negen negensinggoc tosofocna, ngeni imocac amma ngic 7 ngenang botucfunac meisingyunubisia. Ngic Asungo ubangina wakeu negen negeng nga fakangina gombunga yenengkecdae, ngic fakangina ifia meisingyunubisia. Nga neneng ua imoc yemmeni mebisia.
44006004	Nenaoc ine ua imoc wama nunumu nga Anutuac enacdede ua mekecbisina.”
44006005	Yoac ifi degec habutoa yeneng negenggec ngereec. Anu ngic yofiguc meisingyunugec: Stefano, ye negen negensingtoayagoc amma Tiri Asu wake wakea femiec, amma Firipo nga Porokoro amma Nikano, Timong nga Pamena amma Nikorao. Nikorao ye Antiokianac nga ye bangec monnunac ngicngo warac Anutu mi negemmima kecma yudangic yenearu torokpeec.
44006006	Yeni ngic imoc aposoro yeneac hoannu faiyunugec nanggec aposoro yeneng maringina sebinginau faima yeneac amma numugec.
44006007	Anu Anutuac yoacngo Yerusalennu yadima sokoma kenu Yesuac habu yenearu nasoya nasoya torokpeu torokpe fingeckenec. Fingeckenu Anutuac womonggareng yenearunac homacngo siduc gombung negensinggema modacgec.
44006008	Stefano ye Anutuac danggunuc nga kuc homac femiec. Imocac amma yeng ngicngac botucnginau kecma Kebu negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc nga faka mi hehena homac meec.
44006009	Anu yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang amangina mong kpara Feackekec degec, yenearunac ngic goango yacma Stefanogoc yoacngina engemmama anec. Ngic imoc yeni Kirene nga Aresandria amaunac amma Kirikia nga Asia bangectoaunac.
44006010	Nga Stefano ye Tiri Asuac kucfu yoac negentegecma deu yeni yoac turunga merembesonga osigec.
44006011	Osima ngic goa fenggeyunugec, yeneng Stefanoac yofi degec, “Ngic ye Mose nga Anutu demanganeyuruu negening.”
44006012	Ifi degec ngicngac habutoa amma yudangic enarafocngina nga mitiac negen negengngic, yeneac wosongina miacgec. Miacgec yeni Stefano mema mendanggema yudangic yeneac tutumangtoau mekemma
44006013	ihai ngic ikoha faiyunugec yeneng hepuc amma yofi degec, “Ngic imoc ye nenanggac ama kpetiac nga dedeseriyoacnina wisic wisickea kpac tatahoc demanganeande.”
44006014	Yeng yoac yofi deu negening, “Yesu Nadzaretenac, yennoc ama yomoc iriringgema singyoac Mosengo deficgenemmeec, imoc wama yoac gboria heficgenemmeande.”
44006015	Nga yudangic sasawa tutumangtoanginau tacgec, yeneng Stefano henserima henggec kicmesuyango angero yeneac siric isoc anec.
44007001	Womonggarengtoango Stefano kpesimiec, “Yoac dedae, imoc fora me?”
44007002	Ifi deu Stefanongo yofi deec, “Mangfocna nga sactosofocna, yoac deba negenggec: Kisicnina Abrahang ye Harang taonnu mi kemma Mesopotamia bangecfu kecmanu Anutu kuc nga kibikperagi mingina, yennoc fingecmima yofi edeec,
44007003	‘Ge amabangecga nga arengfocga wayunuma neng bangectoa mong edzacgubade, ihai kemma kecbesena.’ (Fing 12:1)
44007004	Anu ye yoac ifi negemma Kardea bangec wama Harang taonnu kemma kefec. Ihai kecmanu mama homeec. Homeu Anutungo bangec ngeni yofinenggac kecdae, Abrahang imohai sueu haec.
44007005	Hesicke hama bangec mong mi wamiu tiuenec, imoc kpac yombong. Ye nga bangecfora dengec tigec enudeac areng kpeyemmeec, imoc nambaraha kpac kecmanu edeec.
44007006	Amma Anutungo yoac mong yofi deec, ‘Esangaboga nga bangecfocga yeni kifa 400 ngic mong yeneac bangecfu kuric kecma wanacua memagec bangec mingina ngaba ayemmema ebic hania hania meficgeyemmebesandae.’
44007007	Amma yoac mong yofi torokpeec, ‘Bangec imohai yeni wanacua megecde, ngicngac imoc yeni turunga yemmebade. Imoc wisickeu yeni bangec imoc wama bangec yomohai neac enac tofohobesandae.’ (Fing 15:13-14)
44007008	Anutungo Abrahang dzadzahac mima sebi tosangina herecgegecdeac Anutungo Abrahang edeec. Ifi edeecac medaha Isaka kpeficgeu fingecma uameme 8 femanu medahaac sebi tosea herecgeec. Anu Isakango Yakobo kpeficgeec nga Yakobongo kisicfocnina 12 kpeficyunuec.
44007009	Kisicfocnina yeni munangina Yosefe keracmangang ammima Aigita bangecfu faigec ngic goa yeneng bummema mekenggec. Ihai kecmanu Anutungo yegoc kefecac amma
44007010	kpendzennunac meickema ubangerecgoc kekec heficgemiec. Yeng Yosefe wosoefac ammima negen negentegec miu Aigita ngictau Faraongo negen negenga imoc hengngereema yengena amagerec nga aigitangicfora momoc garengyunuma kefudeac ngickuneng faiec.
44007011	Faiu kecmanu Aigita nga Kanaang bangecfu bodi fingeru ebic kuneng meficgegec. Ifi fingeru kisicfocnina yeni nenesemenggac homema kecgec.
44007012	Kecmagec ‘Aigita bangecfu semeng fede’ ifi degec negemma Yakobongo medacfora sueyunuu ihai kenggec.
44007013	Kecma naso monnu monggoc kenggec Yosefengo dacfora haniaya dekperagiyemmeec. Dekperagiyemmeu Faraongo Yosefe yengena nga arengfora haniangina negentegerec.
44007014	Ifi anu Yosefengo dacfora edeyunuu kemma mangngina Yakobo nga arengfocngina sasawa bic kpacyunugec hagec. Nga ngicngac hagec, yeneac kpetengina 75 anec.
44007015	Nga Yakobo ye Aigita bangecfu kemma kecma homeec nga medacfora kisicfocnina yeni ifingoc ihaingoc homedacgec.
44007016	Homegec farengngina Sikeng amau meyunu hagec. Hama Abrahangngo Sikeng amau Hamoro medacfora yenearunac bangec mong kicsereac amma silwadzo dafigucngo bummeec, imohai tonggoyunugec.”
44007017	“Anutungo wiac Abrahang miudeac bicngoc deseriec, imoc fora fingerudeac naso wegenemanu Yakobo esangabofora nga bangecfora yeni Aigita bangecfu homac fingecsahe anggec.
44007018	Ifi amma kecmagec Aigita ngictau gboria mong fingerec, yeng Yosefeac hania mi negenec.
44007019	Anu ngictau yennoc kisicfocnina meenti memati ayemmema memanganeyunudarec. Amma yeng yofi edeyunuec, ‘Ngeni sabacfocngina wayunugec homedacbisia.’ ”
44007020	“Mose ye naso imohai fingeru Anutungo sabac gombunga imoc henu ngereec. Nga ye mamaac amau afo harebec kefu garenggegec.
44007021	Ifi amma mekemma ama ngadeau tihereema faigec feec. Femanu Farao naroangango meficgema yengena medac isoc mema mekefu yadiec.
44007022	Yadiu Farao ngicfora yeneng aigitangic yeneac faka nga negen negeng kpoumigec negentegecma kecma wiac deme anu kuhagoc anec.”
44007023	“Kecma kifaya 40 anu ye israengic ogofora yenennegeng anudeac ubea efaiu kenec.
44007024	Kemma aigitangic mongngo israengic mong eng kpeu hemma ogea meficgema turunga meremma aigitangic homemea kpeec.
44007025	Kpema yofi negenec, ‘Ni arengfocna Faraoac mariunac mesiyunubadeac dema Anutungo ua nende, imoc negentegecdae gedang.’ Ye ifi negenec anu Israe ngicngac yeneng imoc ine mi negentegecgec.
44007026	Anu wereckengau monggoc kemma israengic yohockang eng eweec meficyuruma demefac ayecmema yofi edeyuruec, ‘Ngihoc waec, ngeri areng mocgungo ewedape, imoc naric kpac.’ ”
44007027	“Ifi deu ngic ogea kpeecngo Mose kpefahama yofi deec, ‘Mongngo mi nereac desidesingic me gareng faiguec.
44007028	Ge worang aigitangic kpehomedang, ifi isoc ni gedang ifingoc nubeso annec.’
44007029	Ifi deu Mosengo yoac imoc negemma imohaingoc worama Midiang bangecfu kemma kuric kefec. Ihai kecma ngac mema medac yohockang kpeficyuruec.”
44007030	“Anu kifa 40 monggoc kecma Sinai tikiugeng bangec hocsiragocfu kemma kecmanu angero mongngo icbarama susiau gerecborang manau fingeru henec.
44007031	Hemma kpidohoma hentegerudeac kenu Kebuac yoac yofi fingerec,
44007032	‘Ni kisicfocga yeneac Anutu, Abrahang nga Isaka amma Yakobo, yeneac Anutunoc.’ Fingeru Mose ye dzonong fedefede amma kengec kpeu kiwa sufuma ngonducnema nanec.
44007033	Nammanu Kebungo yofi edeec, ‘Bangec nannec, imoc bangec kpetiac, imocac hanitabega hesina.
44007034	Ni ngicfocna Aigita bangecfu sisicyunugec kiacudumeng anggec ereu yenenduae. Amma mesiyunubadeac yaguc maduae. Imocac Aigita bangecfu sueguba bic kembesena.’ ”
44007035	“Ngic yeneng Moseac yoac wama yofi degec, ‘Mongngo ge desidesingic me ngickuneng mi faiguec, kpac.’ (Mke 2:14) Anutungo ngic yenoc israengic yeneac enarameme nga mesi mesingicngina anudeac dema angero sueu gerecborang manau fingecmima ua imoc demiec.
44007036	Ifi amma Anutungo Mose sueu kemma hesicyunu haec. Ye Aigita bangecfu nga Kondung sacsacfu nga bangec kisiu faka mi hehena nga negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc homac mema kecmanu kifa 40 anec.”
44007037	“Amma Mose yennoc israengic yofi edeyunuec, ‘Anutungo arengfocngina yeneac botucfunac profete mong ni isoc meficgengemmebesande.’ (Dser 18:15)
44007038	Amma yengngoc bangec hocsiragocfu kisicfocnina yeneac kpebunggoc kpeturanggema kecma Sinai tikiu emma angeroac enacfunac yoac kekehagoc negemma mama edenunuec.”
44007039	“Kisicfocnina yeni yengena wama yoara membaickema Aigita bangecfu dzigenegecdeac ubangina suema
44007040	Arong yofi edegec, ‘Ge nemuonga mong menemmena nemu imocngo warainemmebeso. Mosengo Aigita bangecfunac hesicnunu haec, ye gedang bic sufuma kpac anec.’
44007041	Ifi dema naso imohai nemuonga burumaka medaha siric isoc mema hosuc heimigec. Yeni maringinango onga mema imoc deafehe ammima hoanggegec.
44007042	Ifi anggec Anutungo ngadeyunuma sawau onga hadehade afeheyunugecdeac wayemmeec. Profete yeneac kibiu yoac imocac yofi bic oho ohoya fede, ‘Israe mingina, ngeni kifa 40 bangec hocsiragocfu kecma yang hosuc heima me sesegerec goa mong mi ohonenggec, kpac.
44007043	Ngeni nemu Morokoac kporucbedzo tofohokecgec nga nemu Refang, yeac asomeng onga mekecgec. Wiac imocnoc numumigecdeac memengere anggecac amma ni Babilon bangec hereau faingunubesandua.’ ” (Amo 5:25-27)
44007044	“Kisicfocnina yeni bangec hocsiragoc, ihai Anutuac kporucwomong megec, imoc Anutungo Mose siriha edzahema derecgemiec, imocac sirihau memea.
44007045	Kporocwomong imocnoc kisicfocnina Yosuango enara meyemmeu yei bangecareng goa yeneac bangecfu mehama tacdacgec. Tacmagec Anutungo bangecareng kecgecmoc, yeni yunukporac ayemmeu kisicfocnina yeni bangec tigec enu Anutuac kporucwomong imohaingoc torokpeu torokpe mekengkecmagec Dawidi fingerec.”
44007046	“Anutungo Dawidi wosoefac ammiu yeng Yakoboac Anutu, yeac amawomong mong meficgeudeac numumiec.
44007047	Foracngoc, imoc yengenaoc kpac, Salomongo Anutuac womong memiec.
44007048	Engenatoa yeng ine ngic yeneng womong mong maringo memea, ihai tacyac mi angande. Profete mongngo enacyoac yofinoc deec,
44007049	‘Ngictau tatacna imoc kurumeng nga bangec imocngo titiserina, Kebungo ifi dede. Ngeneng amatatacna mong menenggec imoc ine mi ngereeude amma fefe monggac manau tacnegembade, imoc obohoude.
44007050	Foracngoc, ni marinango wiac sasawa meficgedarai.’ ” (Yes 66:1-2)
44007051	“Ngicngac gori goria, ngeni ubakedzacngina fonggo fonggoya, kisicfocngina yeni Tiri Asu deendema ammikecgec, ngeni ifingoc ifi andae.
44007052	Kisicfocngina yeni profete sasawa yunukporac ayemmegec. Profete yeneng dindingac mingina fingecbesandeac kpefingyoac degec nga ngeneac kisicfocngina yenennoc yenahafoc profete imoc yunugec. Kecma Ngic Dindingac yengena fingeru ngenennoc doc mema ye kpehomegec.
44007053	Ngeni angeroac enacfunac dedeseriyoac megec nga imoc ine sifu wagec.”
44007054	Stefanongo yoac ifi edeyunuu negemma wosonginau meu yeni herebu kuneng negemma yearubigeng fima enacngina kisaranggema nangengngina manganeec.
44007055	Stefano ye ine Tiri Asungo ubeau wakeu kurumennu fiu enu Anutuac kuc kibikperagiau Yesu Anutu foiau nanu henec. Hemma yofi deec,
44007056	“Negendae, ni kurumeng anggeu Ngicac Medacngo Anutu foiau nanu henduae.”
44007057	Ifi deu yeni sasawango kpeborongtoa kpema kedzacngina kpefonggema yearu ururunggema kpefahe kpefahe kemma
44007058	taong ngadeau kensikema hocngo ukuma heigec. Ifi amma hepucngic yeni ngakpingina herea hesima ngicmedac mong kpara Sauro, yeac haniu guruhegec.
44007059	Guruhema Stefano hocngo heigec yeng yofi dema numuec, “O Kebu Yesu, ge ubaongana mena.”
44007060	ifi dema fafoc heima arohoma kpacma deec, “Kebu ge kopocsicngina yomoc wayemmena.” ifi dema homeec. Homeu Saurongo faka imocac negenu ngereec.
44008001	So, naso imohaingoc Yerusalennu kpebung kecgec, yeni hanahema yunukporac ayemmegec. Ayemmegec ticpac tehema Yudaia nga Samaria bangectoau kendacgec aposoro yeneng ine tacgec.
44008002	Amma ngic goa Kebu eweheimima kecgec, yeneng Stefano mema kiacsonggongtoa yombong ammima tonggogec.
44008003	Anu Sauro ye kpebung yunukporac ayemmeudeac amaya amaya emma ngicngac metai ayemmema witicamau faiyunuec.
44008004	Yesuac habu yeni ticpac tehema kenggecngo ine guruamasoc kecma ngicngac siduc gombung dekperagiyemmekecgec.
44008005	Ifi ammagec Firipongo samariangic yeneac taonnu sikema Kristoac yoacsiduc dekperagiyemmeec.
44008006	Dekperagiyemmema negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc meu hemma kedzac kpema yoara yenahafoc negenggec.
44008007	Imoc yofiac, ye asu seuhagoc homac kisangyunuu ngic hereunac erema arohoma woragec. Amma ye puring hania hania homac mengereyunuec.
44008008	Ifi anu taong imohai ngicngac yeni ubangerec kuneng negenggec.
44008009	Anu taong imohai ngic mong kefec kpara Simong, ye bangecac asugoc ua mekefu samariangichabu yeneng henggec bibiagoc anec. Ye yengenaac negenu engena anec.
44008010	Anu engena mamea yeni yenahafoc yeac negenggec engena anu eweheimima yofi dema kecgec, “Anutuac kuc kunengngo yearu fede.”
44008011	Ye boru mema kerec ayemmeu kpidohoma yearu kpeketahema nasoherec kecgec.
44008012	Anu Firipongo Anutuac eucererenggac siduc gombung nga Yesu Kristoac kparaac hania deireckeyemmeu ngicngac yenahafoc negensinggema mitidoku nadzicgec.
44008013	Ifi anggec Simongngo ifingoc Yesu negensinggema doku nadzicma Firipoac hoannu kefec. Firipongo faka kuhagoc nga faka mi hehena meu Simong ye imoc hemma kpidohoma negen negeng ua homac meec.
44008014	Samariangicngac yeni Anutuac yoac negenguba anggec, imocac siduc Yerusalennu aposoro yenearu kenu negenggec. Negemma Petoro nga Yohane sueyurugec kenoc.
44008015	Ihai kemema yeni Tiri Asugoc anggecdeac Kebu numumioc.
44008016	Tiri Asungo warac yenearu mong mi mamanu yeni Kebu Yesuac kpacfusac mitidoku nadzicgec.
44008017	So, aposoro yeri maringirango sebinginau faiec yeni Tiri Asugoc anggec.
44008018	Aposoro yeri ngic yeneac sebiu maringira faiec Tiri Asugoc anggec, Simongngo imoc hemma dzo yerearu mehama
44008019	yofi edeyuruec, “Ngeri uayoac nga kuc imoc ni ifingoc nenec neng ifingoc ngicsebinginau marina faiba Tiri Asugoc ambisia.”
44008020	Ifi deu Petorongo yofi edeec, “Anutuac wosoefac imoc hiedzongo bummebeso negennecac hiedzogagoc ngerahafoc hofeu kemebesera.
44008021	Anutungo uba ikocga hendeac kuc yomocngo mong mi yafinggumanu entegeng kecnade.
44008022	Ge manganaga imoc wama ubaga dzigeneu Kebu numumina ubagau songo ikoha dzuacgembac.
44008023	Manganaac hodungango ge memanganeguu ngicngac memanganeyununadeac fakango fuseguecnoc.” imoc henduae.
44008024	Ifi deu Simongngo deec, “Wiac dedapemoc, imoc mi fingecnembeso. Imocac ngeraoc neac amma Kebu numumiec.”
44008025	Anu aposoro yeri ngicngac Kebuac yoac dekperagima edekpou ayemmema Yerusalennu dzigenebeso dema Samaria guruama tackendesoc siduc gombung dekperagiyemmema kenoc.
44008026	Kebuac angero mongngo Firipo yofi dema edeec, “Ge efaima sing Yerusalennunac emu Gadza taonnu kemede, imohai kembesena. Sing imoc kisi fede.”
44008027	Ifi dema edeu Firipongo efaima kenec. Anu Etiopia bangectoau ngactau mong kefec kpara Kandake, yeac ngickuneng mong dzofinahaac garengtoa, yeng Yerusalennu Kebu afeheudeac kengenecfunac
44008028	dzigenema keretacfu tacma ferecge kemma profete Yesaia, yeac yoackibi osoec.
44008029	Ifi ammanu Asungo Firipo yofi edeec, “Ge bic keretac edimocac hoangau kenna.”
44008030	Ifi deu Firipongo yearu nedzima kemma ngic ye profete Yesaia, yeac yoackibi osou negemma kpesimiec, “Yoac osonec, imocac hania negentegecnec me?”
44008031	Kpesimiu deec, “Mongngo mi dekperaginemmanu neannaoc naric mi negentegecbade.” Ifi dema Firipo ye keretau enu yerahafoc tarecdeac derecgemiec.
44008032	Yoackibi osoec, imoc yofi, “Rama mong kpehou anggecdeac mekengandae me ramamedahango dzoea merec merecgengic yearu waickema feande, siriha imocacsoc amma enara mong mi anggeec.
44008033	Yeni yoacfu kuha memama yeac yoacac fora mi dema bangecfu kekeha meickegec. Anu yeac esangabofora yeneac kpetengina mongngo oso osoac siriha kpac. Imoc yofiac, Kebuac arengfora yeneng kekeha bangecfunac wangecgec.” (Yes 53:7-8)
44008034	Ifi osoma ngickunengngo Firipo yofi dema kpesimiec, “Profete ye meracac ifi dede, ye yengenaac me ngic monggac?”
44008035	Kpesimiu Firipongo enara anggema mitikibiac yoac imohacnac torokpema Yesuac siduc gombunggac hania edekpou ammiec.
44008036	Ifi amma kengkecma doku monnu kensikema ngickunengngo yofi deec, “Henna, doku yoc fede, ge naric mitidoku nadzicnembang me?”
44008037	Ifi deu Firipongo deec, “Ubaga hafoangoc negensinggenadeu naric ambade.” deu yoac yofi meremmiec, “Yesu Kristo ye Kebuac medac, imoc negensinggeduae.”
44008038	Ifi dema keretac dzegeu taru Firipo nga ngickuneng yerahafoc dokuu kemema Firipongo doku nadzicmiec.
44008039	Nga dokuunac eremaec Kebuac Asungo Firipo ioha wangecma kenu ngickunengngo monggoc mi hemma ubangerec negemma kenec.
44008040	Firipongo ine Asodoc taonnu kenu henggec. Amma ihacnac hanahema amea amea siduc gombung dekperagiyemmema kengkecma Kaisarea taonnu mesiec.
44009001	Sauroac hereu ubagerec kuneng fekefecac Yesuac habu ngaba ayemmema yunumeme amma womonggarengtoa yearu kemma yofi edeec,
44009002	“Ngic me ngac Damasko taonnu sing gboria modacdae, yeni meficyunuma meyunuma maringina dedeckema Yerusaleng taonnu meyunu habadeac Damasko kpekpeturang amaac enara, yeneac kibi mong ohoma nenna.”
44009003	Miu ye kemma Damasko mewegenebeso ammanu imohaingoc kurumennunac kperagingo ioha mama neraranggeec.
44009004	Neraranggeu ye bangecfu todingge kpeu fema yoac mong yofi fingeru negenec, “Sauro, Sauro, ge nocac nukporac anemma kecannec?”
44009005	ifi deu Saurongo kpesimiec, “Kebu ge merac?” ifi deu deec, “Nukporac anengkecnec, Yesu ninoc.
44009006	Imocac ge yacma amau kenna! Ihai kecmana dafi ambesonga, imocac yoac edegugecde.”
44009007	Anu ngic yegoc kenggec, yeni yoacngina kpac anu engsac iridzagec amma nanggec. Nocac yeni yoac negenggec amma ngic mong ine mi henggec.
44009008	Nga Saurongo yacma kic fiudeac kpanggung manggung anu ngicfora yeneng mariau mema Damasko mekenggec.
44009009	Mekenggec ihai uameme harebec kiwa nomaneu tacma nenedoku mong mi neec.
44009010	Damasko taonnu ubamereng ngic mong kefec kpara Anania, ye Kebungo ongau fingecmima kparec, “Anania.” kparu deec, “Kebu ni yomoc.”
44009011	deu Kebungo yofi edeec, “Ge yacma sing kpara Dindingac deandae, ihai kemma Yudaac amau emma ngic mong kpara Sauro, Tarso taonnunac, ye hofocma meficgebesena. Negenna, ye numuma tacde.
44009012	Ye ongau kpefing yofi hendac: Ngic mong kpara Anania, yeng yearu kemma kiwa fiudeac dema maria sebiau faidac.”
44009013	Ifi deu deec, “Kebu, ngic yeac homac degec negenganduae. Ye geac kpetiac arengfocga Yerusalennu megigi noc efea ayemmeande.
44009014	Nga yei ifingoc kpacga kpacma dengereandimbe, neni sasawa witicnunuma menunu kenudeac womonggareng enara yeneng uakibi migec yofinenggac mekecde.”
44009015	Ifi deu Kebungo yofi edeec, “Ge kenna. Ni ngic yenoc meisinggeba ye siducdedena bangec monnunac ngicngac nga ngictaufocngina amma israe medacfora yenearu kpacsiducna deyadibeso.
44009016	Ammanu kpacnaac amma sueba kpendzeng nga ebic hania haniaac witiau kecbeso, imoc edzahema kpoumibade.”
44009017	Ifi deu Anania ye kemma ama dedea, ihai emma Sauroac sebiu maria faima deec, “Tosona Sauro, yacna. Kebu Yesu sinnu fingecgenec, yennoc suenude. Ge kicga fina Tiri Asungo ubagau wakeudeac haduae.”
44009018	Ifi demanu ye imohaingoc kiwaunac wiac mong fonoc isoc mau kiwa fima yacma mitidoku nadzirec.
44009019	Nadzicma yaka nema seriec. Sauro ye Yesuac habu Damasko kecgec, yenigoc uameme goa kefec.
44009020	Kecma imohaingoc yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang amau emma Yesuac hania dekperagiyemmema yofi edeyunuec, “Yesu ye Anutuac medac.”
44009021	Ifi edeyunuu yeni negemma kpidohoma yofi degec, “Ngic imocngonoc Yerusaleng taonnu kpac imocnoc eweheihei ammigec megigi ayemmema yei ifingoc witicyunuma womonggareng enara yenearu meyunu kenudeac haec.”
44009022	Ifi degec Saurongo seriyombonggema namma yofi deec, “Foracngoc, Yesu ye Messia.” Ye imocac hania edzacyunuu yudangic Damasko kecgec, yeni negemma kpidohoma yoara turunga mi merenggec.
44009023	Ye uameme homac ifi angkefu yudangic yeneng Sauro kpegecdeac yoac dedzege anggec.
44009024	Ifi amma yeni kpegecdeac dema oda naguyau hadzing tofocnac gareng faiyunugec nangkecgec. Yeac dekiric anggec, imoc yengenaaru hau negenec.
44009025	Anu Sauro yoaraac uba merenggec, yeneng tofocnac ye uficfu barima oda titingau sing faigec ngadeau kemema kenec.
44009026	Kemma Yerusalennu kensikema Yesuac habu yenearu torokpeudeac yoara deu yeni sasawango kengec anggec. Nga ye ubamereng fora anec, imoc mi negensinggegec.
44009027	Anu Banabango Sauro mema aposoro yenearu hesicke kemma yofi edeyunuec, “Kebungo Sauro sinnu fingecmima yoac edeec. Ifi anu ye Damasko taonnu kengeha kpac Yesuac hania dekperagiec.”
44009028	Anu Saurongo yenigoc Yerusalennu tacyac amma yoac kengeha kpac deede ayemmema kengha anec.
44009029	Amma Kebuac kpacfu serima namma ngic siduc gombung kengeha kpac, enacefac edeyunuec. Edeyunuu yudangicngo grikyoac dekecgec, yenigoc Anutuac enacyoac denegenggac amma yoacngina engemmama anec. Anu ngic imoc yeneng ye kpebeso anggec.
44009030	Ifi anggec Yesuac habu yeneng imoc negemma Kaisarea taonnu hesicke kemema faigec kengkecma Tarso taonnu kengsikeec.
44009031	Anu kpebung Yudaia nga Gariraia amma Samaria bangecfu kecgec, yenearu ruae fingerec. Fingeru ruaegoc kecgec kpetengina kuneng anu serima kecma Kebu eweheimima ubango hoanggema afehegec. Anu Tiri Asungo ubaebicngina meickema meseriyunuec.
44009032	Petoro ye amabangec tackende, imoc yerecgema kengkecma Yesuac kpetiac areng Rida taonnu kecgec, yenearu kemesikeec.
44009033	Sikema ihai ngic mong henec, kpara Ainea, ye puring amma fefeu fekefu kifa 8 bic anec.
44009034	Nga Petorongo yofi edeec, “Ainea, Yesu Kristongo mengeregudeac yacma fefega geanggaoc mengerena.” deu ye imohaingoc yacma nanec.
44009035	Ifi anu ngicngac Rida taong nga Sarong bangecfunacngo ye hemma ubangina meremma Kebuaru kenggec.
44009036	Yope taonnu ubamereng ngac mong kefec, kpara Tabita, kpara grikyoacfusing Dorkas. Yearu memeficac faka gombunga feecac makpekpea meficyunuma kefec.
44009037	Anu naso imohai Tabita ye hafei fingecmiu homeec. Homeu yeni farenga kerec nadzicmima amamana monnu meemma faigec feec.
44009038	Nga Yope imoc Rida taong wegenac tarecac Yesuac habu yeni Petorongo Rida tacde, imoc negemma ngic yohockang sueyurugec yearu kemma yofi desambic ammima edeoc, “Ge naric nenearu bic habang me?”
44009039	Deec Petoro ye negemma efaiu yerigoc kenggec. Kensikeu fareng feecfu hesicke enggec. Enu ngachotsec sasawa ewefocngina homemea yeni oronggema kiacubamangang anggec. Nga Tabita gbori kecma ngakpikporuc kpebiyemmekefec, imoc edzahedacgec.
44009040	Edzahegec Petorongo sueyunuu kemedacgec fafoc heima numuec. Numuu wisickeu farenga feecfu dzigenema yofi edeec, “Tabita ge yacna.” deu ye kiwa fima Petoro hemma yacma tarec.
44009041	Tacmanu Petorongo mariau mema miaru yacma nanec. Nanu Yesuac kpetiac areng amma ngachotsec Tabita gborima yarec, imoc henggecdeac kpacyunuec. Kpacyunuu hagec Tabita yarec, imoc edzacyunuec.
44009042	Nga yeni siduc imoc degec, imocngo Yope taonnu sokoma kenu homacngo Kebu negensinggegec.
44009043	Nga Petorongo ngic mong kpara Simong, yamberec seberameme, yeac amau naso herea isoc tacyac anec.
44010001	Kaisarea taonnu ngic mong kefec, kpara Konerio. Ye Itaria wasaiareng tosea, yenearunac ngic 100, yeneac kunengngina kefec.
44010002	Ye yengena nga arengfora sasawa, yeneng heregoc Anutuac songo negemma eweheimima kecgec. Konerio ye ubangereac wiac homac ngicngac makpekpea yemmekefec amma Anutu wenacsoc numumikefec.
44010003	Konerio ye 3 kirocac ua memanu Anutuac angero mongngo ongau yearu fingecma edeec, “Konerio.”
44010004	Ifi deu kpidohoma kengec kpeu kiwango gbong henserimanu deec, “Kebu noc wiac?” deu yeng deec, “Nunumuga nga ubangerecgaac wiac makpekpea yemmeannec, imoc sese isoc Anutuaru enu ye imocac negengngereekecde.
44010005	Imocac ge yaguc Yope taonnu ngic sueyununa kemma ngic mong kpara Simong, kpara mong Petoro, ye hesicke habisia.
44010006	Ye yamberec seberameme ngic mong kpara Simong, yeac amau kecde. Amea imoc kondung tegiau tacde.”
44010007	Angerongo yoac imoc edema kenu Konerio ye enac tofoc tofohongic yohockang nga wasaingickereng mong, ngic imoc heitaiyunuma yoac deu negenec.
44010008	Imoc ayemmedacma Yope taonnu sueyunuu kenggec.
44010009	Ngic yeni kengkecma sinnu fegec ama wereckenu monggoc kengkecma ama mewegenebeso ammagec, Petorongo wenac dzongiau numuudeac ama witiau waranda isoc feec, ihai enec.
44010010	Emma yakaac homema deu yaka ohomagec Kebungo kiwa merecgeu faka yofi henec:
44010011	Kurumeng anggeu wiac mong henec. Imoc kporuc isoc tegia noboc noboc mema bangecfu faigec mama, ifi isoc anec.
44010012	Imocac manau yamberec amma nengboudzoc hania hania feec.
44010013	Mamanu yoac mong yofi fingerec, “Petoro ge yacma kpenec anna.”
44010014	Ifi fingeru Petorongo yofi deec, “Kebu imoc naric kpac, ni wiac wonongagoc nga Kebungo kpae faiec, imoc mong mi neai nga naric mi nebade.”
44010015	Ifi deu atac yohockang anu deec, “Anutungo kpae imoc meickede, imocac ge wonongagoc mi dena.”
44010016	Nga faka imoc fingeru atac harebec anu imohaingoc kporuhagoc kpedziu kurumennu monggoc enec.
44010017	Enu Petoro ye onga henec, imocac negengfagung amma tacmanu Konerio ngicfora yeni Yope taonnu sikema Simonggac amaac kpesi kpesi kengkecma odanaguyau namma
44010018	kpachofoc amma kpesigec, “Simong kpara mong Petoro, ye ama yei kecde me?”
44010019	Nga Petorongo onga henecac negengfagung amma kecmanu Asungo yofi edeec, “Negennec, ngic harebec yeni hama ge hofocgudae.
44010020	Imocac ge yacma kemema yenigoc kembesonga dema negengyohoc mi ambesena. Ngic imoc yeni neng sueyunuba hadae.”
44010021	Ifi deu Petorongo yenearu kemema deec, “Ngic hofocdau ni yomocnoc, ngeni dafiac hadae?”
44010022	Ifi deu ngic yeneng yofi degec, “Wasaingic gareng Konerio ye Anutu eweheimima faka gombunga modackecde. Nga yudangic sasawa yeni yeac negenggec ngereeande, yenoc angero kpetiac mongngo fingecmima ameau heitaiguma enacgaunac yoac negenudeac edeec.”
44010023	Ifi degec Petorongo amau heitaiyunuma edoc bedoc ayemmeu fegec. Fema wereckengau yacma ye nga ngic imoc yeni kembeso anggec Yesuac habuunac goa Yope kecgec, yeni yenahafoc kenggec.
44010024	Yeni sinnu tofocnac mong fema ama wereckenu yacma kengkecma Kaisarea kensikegec. Konerio ye arengfora amma tosofora heitaiyunuu tomai kecmagec kensikegec.
44010025	Kemma Petorongo amau embesonga ammanu Koneriongo hama hoangau fafoc heima numumiec.
44010026	Numumiu Petorongo mema miacma yofi edeec, “Yacna ni ngicogogangoc.”
44010027	Ifi denegeng amma ye ama manau emma ngic kpedzucnema tacgec, yenemma yofi edeyunuec.
44010028	“Ngeni yudangic neneac faka negendae. Neni bangec monnunac ngic ngenigoc ogo nga engemma kekec ifi mi annideac kpaeyoac seria fede. Ni ine ngeni ngic wonongnginagoc dema desusuic mi dengemmebadeac Anutungo imoc edeedzacnu anec.
44010029	Imocacnoc heitainugec haba dema mi obohoai. Anu yoc heitainudae, imocac hania degec negemba.”
44010030	Ifi deu Koneriongo yofi edeec, “Uameme 4 bic wisickemanu marai 3 kirocac ua memanu numubare ngic mong ngakpia kperagiagocngo nearu fingecma
44010031	yofi edenuec, ‘Konerio negenna, Anutungo nunumuga nga ubangerecgaac wiac makpekpea yemmeannec, imocac negengngereede.
44010032	Imocac ge Yope taonnu ngic sueyununa Simong kpara mong Petoro, ye hesicke habisia. Yeng yamberec seberameme Simong, yeac amau kecde. Amea imoc kondung tegiau tacde.’
44010033	Yoac ifi deu ni imocacnoc gereagoc sueyunuba gearu hadau. Hagec geng yoacna negemma hanecac naric ande. Nga Kebungo yoac edeguec, imoc seng dena negennideac Anutuac kicfu nenahafoc kpedzucnema tacdimbe.”
44010034	Ifi deu Petorongo enacefac amma yofi edeyunuec, “Anutungo ngicngac isinnunuma monggac songo negemma mong mi waude, imoc foracngoc negentegecyombonggeduae.
44010035	Ngic bangeha bangeha eweheimima angammeme dindingac angkecdae, yeneac negenu ngereeande.
44010036	Foracngoc, Anutungo Yesu Kristo mocgu, ngic sasawa nenang Kebunoc sueu maec. Yeng ruaeyoac gombung Israe ngicngac nenearu deficgenemmeec, imoc ngeni negendae.
44010037	Amma Gariraia bangecfu hanahema wiac fingecma Yudaia bangec sokoma kenec, imoc ngeni negendae. Imoc yofi: Yohane ye ngic dokunadzicac yoac edeyunuec.
44010038	Anu Anutungo Yesu Nadzaretenac kuc nga Tiri Asu faimiu yeng bangec yerecgema kengha amma ngic meficyunuma mengereyunukefec nga mangana minginaac kucngo ngicngac kekecngina memanganedarec, yeni mengereyunudarec. Anutungo nonggo tacmimanu yeng ua imoc meec.
44010039	Anu Yesungo yudangic neneac bangecfu nga Yerusalennu ua meec, imoc hennegeng andaring. Ifi amma kecmanu yeni ye mariponnu kpegec homeec.
44010040	Homema femanu wenac harebec anu Anutungo ye megboriu yacma ngicngac fingecyemmeu henggec.
44010041	Ngicngac sasawa yenearu mi fingerec, kpac. Anutungo waracngoc siducdedefora meisinnunuec, nenearusac fingerec. Ye homecfunac yaru neninoc nenedoku yegoc neing.
44010042	Nga Anutungo ngic yenoc ngic gbori nga homemea angammemenina desiudeac gununggeec, yoac imocac hepuc amma ngichabu gorongina kpema desaheyemmenideac denemmeec.
44010043	Anu profete sasawa yeneng yeacnoc hepuc amma yoac yofi degec, ‘Ye negensinggegecde, yeni yeac kpacfu kopocsicngina wawaya anude.’ ”
44010044	Petoro ye yoac ifi dema nammanungoc negemma tacgec Tiri Asungo yenearu maec.
44010045	Mau ngic sebi tosangina herec herecgeango Yesu negensinggegec nga Petorogoc kenggec, yeni Tiri Asungo wosoefahaac kuc bangec monnunac ngicngac, yenearu ifingoc kpakeyemmeu
44010046	nedzarangyoac dema Anutu dengerema deafehe ammigec, yeni imoc negemma kerectegec anggec. Ifi anggec Petorongo yofi deec,
44010047	“Nenang Tiri Asugoc aning, faka imoc ngic yomoc ifingoc fingecyemmeu mitidoku naric mi segereyemmebesonga.”
44010048	Ifi dema yeni Yesu Kristoac kpacfu doku nadzicgecdeac deyemmeec. Nga yenigoc uameme goa tarudeac edegec.
44011001	Aposoro goa nga Yesuac habu Yudaia bangecfu kecgec, yeni bangec monnunac ngicngo Anutuac yoac negenguba anggec, imocac siduc negenggec.
44011002	Nga Petorongo Yerusalennu dzigene kenu sebi tosangina herec herecgea, yeneng dehou ammima
44011003	yofi edegec, “Ge nocac sebi tosangina mi herec herecgea, yeneac amau emma yenigoc yaka nedang?”
44011004	Ifi degec Petorongo faka haniaunacngoc fingecereec, imoc edeyunuec.
44011005	“Ni Yope taonnu numuma kecbare kicna merecgeu onga mong yofi henai: Wiac mong kporuc kuneng isocngo tegia noboc noboc menamma kurumennunac nearu faigec maec, ifi isoc anec.
44011006	Mau hereema kperirickema yofi henai, yamberec kuneng kapia nga goa enacnginagoc amma nengboudzoc hania hania feec.
44011007	Ifi yenembare nearu kpakpac yofi fingerec, ‘Ge yacma kpenec anna.’
44011008	Ifi deu yofi deai, ‘Kebu imoc naric kpac. Ni wiac wonongagoc nga Kebungo wiac mong kpae faiec, imoc enacna mi kpesereecfu mi kpesereude.’
44011009	Ifi deba kurumennunac yoac mong fingeru atac yohockang anec, ‘Anutungo kpae imoc meickede, imoc wonongagoc mi debesena.’
44011010	Faka imoc fingeru atac harebec anu iwai imoc kporuhagoc monggoc kpedziu kurumennu enec.
44011011	Anu negenggec, naso imohaingoc Kaisarea taonnunac ngic harebec sueyunugec nearu hama ama kefai, ihai nammaggec
44011012	Asungo yofi edenuec, ‘Ge yenigoc kembeso dema negengyohoc mi ambesena.’ Ifi deu kemba negen negensinggoc tosofocna 6 yomoc, yeneng modacnugec kemma wasaingicgareng yeac amau ening.
44011013	Enni yeng yoacsiduc yofi anemmeec, ‘Neac amau angero mongngo fingecnemma yofi edenuec, “Ge Yope amau ngic sueyununa kemma Simong kpara mong Petoro, ye hesicke hagec.
44011014	Yeng yoac edeguu ge nga arengfocga ngeni yoac imoc negemma hoanggema komoc kpegecde.” ’
44011015	Anu ni siduc gombung edeyunubare warac nenannu Tiri Asu maec, ifi isocngoc yenearu madac.
44011016	Ni imoc hemma Kebungo yoac yofi deec, imoc negensiai, ‘Yohane ye doku nadzicngemmeec, yoc ine Tiri Asu nadzicngemmeude.’
44011017	Nga nenang Kebu Yesu Kristo negensinggemina Anutungo wosoefahaac kuc nemmeec, yeng ine wosoefahaac kuc siriha imocngoc yemmeu ni ifiango Anutu naric mi kpetarimibade.”
44011018	Petorongo ifi dema edeyunuu yeni negemma ubangina kuha mau Anutu afehema yofi degec, “Foracngoc, Anutungo bangec monnunac ngicngac ubangina meremma kekecseriac fora megecdeac ifinoc ande.”
44011019	Ngicngac yeni Stefano kpema Yesuac habu goa yunukporac ayemmegec ticpac tehema goango Foiniki bangecfu nga Kipiro nucfu amma Antiokia taonnungoc kensikegec. Kemma kecma yudangicsac siduc gombung dekperagiyemmegec.
44011020	Anu Yesuac habu botucnginau ngicngac Kipiro nucfunac nga Kirene bangecfunac kecgec, yeni Antiokia taonnu hama grikngic yenigoc ifingoc denegeng amma Kebu Yesuac siduc gombung dekperagiyemmegec.
44011021	Dekperagiyemmegec Kebungo kuc yemmeu ngicngac habutoa yeni negensinggema ubangina Kebuaru faigec.
44011022	Imocac yoacsiduc kpebung Yerusalennu kecgec, yeneac kedzacfu kemeu yeni imoc negemma Banaba suegec Antiokia amau kenec.
44011023	Kensikema Anutungo danggunuc uaya bic meficgeec, ye imoc hemma ubangerec negemma ubanginango Kebuaru heiserigecdeac demeefai ayemmeec.
44011024	Ye ngic gombunga amma ye ubeau Tiri Asu nga negen negensing wake wakea femiu ngicngac homacngo imoc hemma Kebuaru torokpegec.
44011025	Nga Banabango Sauro hofocma meficgeudeac Tarso kenec.
44011026	Kemma meficgema hesickeu Antiokia taonnu hama kpebung yenigoc kifa mocgu kecma ngic homac Anutuac enacyoac edekpou ayemmeoc. Nga Antiokia amau hanahema ngicngo Yesuac habu, yeneac kpac Kristoac ngic deficgeyemmegec.
44011027	Naso imohai profetengic goa Yerusalennac Antiokia taonnu magec.
44011028	Yenearunac tosongina mong kpara Agabo. Asungo kpefing edeu yeng yacma bangecsoc boditoa fingerudeac deficgeec. Nga bodi imoc Roma ngictau Sisa Kraudio kecmanu naso imohai fingerec.
44011029	Fingeru Yesuac habu yeni yoac imoc negemma Yudaia bangecfu negen negensinggoc tosofocngina kecgec meficyunugecdeac hiedzo feyemmeecsoc kpeturanggema yenearu faigec kenudeac deserigec.
44011030	Deserima hiedzo meficgegec, imoc Banaba nga Sauro yemecgec yeri imoc mekemma Yesuac habu Yerusalennu enarafocngina kecgec, yeni yemmegec.
44012001	Naso imohai ngictau Herodengo kpebung kecgec, yenearunac ngicngac goa yunuma memanganeyunuudeac negemma mendangyunuma witicamau faiyunuec. Ifi ayemmema ngade yoacfu faiyunuma ngaba ayemmema yunubeso negenec.
44012002	Amma yeng deu Yohane dara Yakobo wasaibeangngo kpehomegec.
44012003	Ifi anu yudangic yeni songo negenggec nga yeng yenemma ic sogong yisya kpac nene, imocac tacyacnasou deu Petoro ifingoc mendanggema witicamau faigec.
44012004	Ye makekenggac tacyacnaso wisickeu Petoro yudangic yeneac kicfu yoacfu faiudeac negensima deu witicamau faiec. Faima wasaingic 16 yeneng areng 4 nga 4 hendzicma namma garenggegec.
44012005	Ifi anggec Petoro ye witicamau tacmanu kpebung yeni tatahoc Anutuaru numukecgec.
44012006	Anu Herodengo ama wereckenu Petoro yoacfu faiudeac deec, naso imoc wegenemanu tofocnac imohaingoc wasaingic yohockang yereng Petoro seng yohockangngo yeranggoc witickema faiec botucngirau feec. Femagec wasai goa yeni nagu ngadeau gareng nanggec.
44012007	Yeni ama manau ifi fegec Kebuac angero mongngo hama ihai nanu amamana imoc kperagidarec. Kperagiu angerongo Petoro pandzengau kpeserema midima deec, “Ge bic yacna.” demanu seng imohaingoc Petoroac mariaunac fotockema mau
44012008	angerongo deec, “Ge fadengga dzegema hanitabega heina kemeu.” Dema angerongo monggoc edeec, “Ngakpiga herea heina kemeu modacnuna.”
44012009	Ifi deu Petorongo yacma angero modacma kenec. Kemma angerongo faka yearu meec, imocac negenu onga isoc anec.
44012010	Nga yeri nagu yohockanggac gareng nanggec, imoc feracyunuma kemma aieng nagutoa taonggac kiwaugeng mewegenemaec, imoc yengenaoc anggeu kemeoc. Kemema sinnu kemma angero ye ioha aockeec.
44012011	Ifi anu Petoro ye negen negenga sariu yofi deec, “Yaguc negentegecduae, Kebungo angeroya sueu Herodeac mariunac nga yudangic yeneac herebuunac mesinude.”
44012012	Ifi negentegecma kemma Yohane Marekoac nonggea kpara Maria, yeac amau sikeec. Ihai homacngoc kpeturanggema numuma tacgec.
44012013	Tacmagec Petorongo ama naguyau namma nagu heiu uanaroang mong kpara Rode, yeng imoc negemma mama
44012014	Petorongo yoac deu ubea negemma nagu mi witiwiti, eng sogaima ama manau emma, “Petoro ye hadac naguu nande.” dema edeyunuec.
44012015	Edeyunuu yeni negemma degec, “Ubaga sufude me?” degec, yeng serima deec, “Fora yombong, yeng nande.” deu yeneng degec, “Imoc angeroyango gedang.”
44012016	Nga Petoro ye heimangoc nammanu yeni nagu witima yengena hemma kpidohogec.
44012017	Kpidohogec yeng maribarac tuema deracyunudacma Kebungo witicamaunac yungeru maec, imocac yoacsiduc ayemmema deec, “Ngeni siducna yomoc Yakobo nga negen negensinggoc tosofocnina edeyunugec.” Ifi dema meickema monnu kenec.
44012018	Ama wereckenu wasaingic yeni Petoro hofocma degec, “Ye dafiu aockedac?” dema kpidohoma oboc kpoboc yombong anggec
44012019	Herodengo meficgegecdeac deu hofocbibiegec. Hofocbibiegec dekpesi ayemmeu kpac anu wasai yeneng nagugareng imoc yunuhomegecdeac desiec. Desiyunuma Yudaia bangec wama Kaisarea kemema kefec.
44012020	Herodengo Tiro nga Sidonggac ngicngac herebu meficgeyemmekefec. Imoc yofiac, yeni nenesemengngina Herodeac bangecfunac megecac amma yeni kpedzucnema yearu hama ngaba kpac anu ruae fingerudeac kpesimigec. Yeni warac Herodeac ngickereng mong kpara Birasto, ye Herodeac gaufefe amea garenggema kefec, yearu kemma yeng yenigoc kefudeac dengombong ammigec.
44012021	Herodengo yoac imoc negemma imocac turunga merengyemmeudeac naso edeyunuec. Naso imohai ye ngictau ngakpia heima ngictautatahau matacma urecyoacngina edeyunuec.
44012022	Edeyunuu ngic yeni sasawango horianggemima yofi degec, “Yoac imoc ngicyoac kpac, imoc Anutuac yoac.”
44012023	Anu ye Anutu mi afeheecac amma naso imohaingoc Kebuac angero mongngo Herode kpeu kamango kigec homeec.
44012024	Anu Anutuac yoacngo yadima kenec.
44012025	Anu Banaba nga Sauro Yerusalennu sueyurugec, yeri ua imoc medarec wisickeu dzigene Antiokia kenecdeac Yohane kpara mong Mareko hesickeec yenahafoc kenggec.
44013001	Kpebung Antiokia kecgec, yeneac botucfu profete nga kpoukpou yofingo kecgec: Banaba nga Simong, kpara mong Nige, Rukeo Kirene amaunac nga Sauro amma Manaeng.
44013002	Anu yeni naso monnu yakasege kecma Kebu afehegecdeac kpedzucnema kecgec Tiri Asungo yoac yofi edeyunuec, “Banaba nga Sauro yeri neac ua meecdeac kpacyuruma ua yemerai, ngeni imoc meecdeac desiyecmegec.”
44013003	Ifi deu yeni yakasege kecma maringina sebingirau faima numukenehe ayecmema faiyurugec kenoc.
44013004	Tiri Asungo ifi dema sueyuruu yeri Sereukia taonnu kemeoc. Ihai sikema kporucwageu emma kengkecma Kipiro nucfu enoc.
44013005	Emma Sarami taong ihai kemma yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang amangina tackenecsoc, ihai emma Anutuac yoac deireckeyemmekenoc. Kenec Yohanengo yerigoc yenahafoc kecma meficyuruec.
44013006	Anu nuc imohai hanising ferecge kengkecma Pafo amau kenggec. Ihai kensikema yudangic mong bangecac hadehadegoc nga profete ikoha kefec kpara Bara Yesu, ye meficgegec.
44013007	Ngic yeac tosoya kia mong kpara Sergio Pauro. Kia imoc ye negen negengtoayagoc nga Anutuac yoac negembesonga ammiu Banaba nga Sauro kpacyuruec.
44013008	Kpacyuruu Erima, ngic bangecac hadehadegoc, (Yoacninau merenni kpac imocac titiha ngic bangecac hadehadegoc.) yeng yereac yoac mefahema kiango Yesu negensinggebacac deraheec.
44013009	Ifi anu Tiri Asungo Sauro, kpara mong Pauro ubeau wakeu Erima kiwango henseriserima yofi edeec,
44013010	“Mangana minginaac medac, ge Kebuac sing dindingac fekende, imocac ngaba seria amma kecna ubagau ikoc nga manganango wake wakea. Ge Kebuac sing dindingac femanu mengbaringgekecnec nasoherec ifi kecma faka imoc mi wanec.
44013011	Imocac yaguc Kebuac kuc gearu fingeru hembesena. Kicga kundung kpeu naso botuc yomoc wenac kperagia mi heheng kecbesena.” Ifi deu imohaingoc wiac hoeng hoeng isocngo kiwa sangoheu kiwa kundung kpeu mariango meang kpeang amma mariau megecdeac deec.
44013012	Faka imoc fingeru kiango hemma Kebuac siduc gombung kpoumigec, imocac negenu engena anec.
44013013	Pauro nga ngicfora yeni Pafo taong wama wageu monggoc emma kengkecma Pamfiria bangecfu Perege taonnu kensikegec. Kensikegec Yohanengo ihai wayunuma Yerusalennu dzigeneec.
44013014	Dzigeneu yeni Perege wama kengkecma Pisidia bangecfu Antiokia taong waseau, ihai kensikegec. Ihai kecmagec sabata naso anu yeni yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang amau emma tacgec.
44013015	Tacgec gareng yeneng Anutuac dedeseriyoac nga profete yeneac yoackibi goa oso wisickema yofi edeyunugec, “Tosohocnina ngereng Anutuac enacyoac mong negendape isoc demeseri anemmeec negenni.”
44013016	Ifi degec Paurongo yacma waickema tacdacgecdeac maribarac kpouyemmema yofi edeyunuec, “Israengicngac, ngeni nga habu goa Anutu eweheimiandae, ngeni edengunuba negenggec:
44013017	Israengicngac nenang Anutungo kisicfocnina meisingyunuu yeni Aigita bangecfu kuric kecma sahegec. Amma ye kuctoayango imohacnac hesicyunu hama
44013018	bangec kisiu hocsiragocfu faiyunuma yenenggareng ayemmeec. Yenenggareng amma mebibieyunuma kecmanu kifa 40 wisickeec.
44013019	Wisickeu yeng Kanaang bangecfu amabangec seweng kpedzongyunuma kisicfocnina bangec imoc yemmeu minginasoc amma kecmagec kifa 450 wisickeec.
44013020	Wisickeu Kanaang bangecfu kecmagec yeng dedesingic meficyunuu keceremagec profete Samue fingerec.
44013021	‘Ngictaunina mong fingeru.’ degec Anutungo Benyaminggac arennunac Kisi medaha kpara Sauro, ye meficgeyemmeu kifa 40 enaramemengina amma kefec.
44013022	Kecmanu ye meickema ngictaungina Dawidi faiec. Amma yeac hania yofi dekperagiec, ‘Ni Dawidi, Isaiac medac yeac ubana ngereeu ye hengising ammiai. Yennoc enac tofoc tofohona kefude.’ ”
44013023	“Anu yoac yofi dedea fede, ‘Dawidi arengfora yenearunac israengicngac nenang kopocsicac ebicfunac mesinunuudeac ngic mong fingerude.’ Anutungo imoc deserinemmeec, imocac fora fingerec nga imoc Yesunoc.
44013024	Anu Yohanengo ngic botucfu mi fingectegecma kecmanu israengicngac sasawa ubangina dzigeneu mitidoku nadzicgecdeac edeyunuec.
44013025	Edeyunuma uaya mesiu wisickebeso ammanu yofi edeyunuec, ‘Ngeni ngic negennuandae, ni ye kpac. Negenggec, neac ngadeu hade, ye engenatoa nga ni ifiango yeac hanitabe witiha yungecba mi ngereeude.’
44013026	Tosofocna, Abrahanggac bangecfora nga habu goa Anutu eweheimiandae, ngeni yoacna deba negenggec, kopocsicac ebicfunac mesi mesiac sing fede nga komoc kpeni, yoac imoc Anutungo nenannu faiec fede.
44013027	Nga Yerusaleng ngic engena mamea, yeneng Yesu mi hentegecma ye kpegecdeac desigec. Yoacfu ifi faima desigec nga sabata tatac nasosoc profete yeneac kpefingyoac osonegeng angandimbe, imoc seriec.
44013028	Foracngoc, yeni Yesuac kopocsic hofocbibiema eng hodzinggema Piratoac mariu faigec, yeng desiu kpehomegecdeac degec.
44013029	Anu mitikibiu yoacsiduha oho ohoya fede, yeni imoc ammidacma mariponnunac mesima kicsereu mekenggec. Yeni mekemma kedzebe ngicngo miac miackeau sinegec emma feec.
44013030	Feu Anutungo ine homecfunac megboriu yarec.
44013031	Yacma ye ngicngac yegoc Gariraia bangecfunac Yerusaleng taonnu yenahafoc kenggec, yeni uameme homac fingecyemmeec. Fingecyemmeu henggec, yenennoc siducdedefora anggec kecdae.
44013032	Anu Anutungo bangecfocnina hanahema wiac yemmeudeac deseriyemmeec,
44013033	imoc Yesu megboriu nambaracfocngina nenannu fora fingeru imocac siduc gombung edengunuandimbe. Imocacnoc Mitiyegec nadung yohockang, imohai yoac yofi oho ohoya fede, ‘Ni yagucnoc megudua. Ge medacna nga ni geac Mangga.’ (Myeg 2:7)
44013034	Yeng Yesu megboriu yarec nga ye ngade homehome nga hoachoae imoc yearu monggoc mi fingerude nga fingecbesande. Yoac imocac Anutungo yofi deec, ‘Ni Dawidigoc dzahacemeic, imocac fora kenec kenehe kpetiac ngemmebade.’ (Yes 55:3)
44013035	Amma Mitiyegec monnu yoac yofi fede, ‘Ge kpetiac ngicga hoaeudeac naric mi desibesannec.’ (Myeg 16:10)
44013036	Dawidiac yofi negendimbe, Anutungo ye ua demiec, imoc ngicfora yenearu mesima homeec. Homeu esangabofora faiyunugec, ihaingoc tonggogec hoaema kpac anec.
44013037	Anu Anutungo ngic megboriec, yeng ine hoac hoaea kpac.
44013038	Tosofocna yofi edengunuba negenggec: Kopocsic wawaya, imoc ngic yennoc meficgeec, dedekperagi yoac imocngo ngenearu haec.
44013039	Nga kopocsicngina sasawa Moseac dedeseriyoacngo naric mi dzuaru dindingac anggec. Yeni ine Yesu negensinggedae, yeni sasawango dindingac Anutungo ifi deyemmeude.
44013040	Profete yeneng yoac yofi degec, imoc ngenearu seribacac nono edengunuduae.
44013041	‘Ngicngac ngeni defagoc angkecdae henggec. Ni naso imohai faka morora meba ngeni imoc hengkpidoc amma hofeu kemegecde. Ngic mongngo edengunuu imoc naric mi negensinggebau.’ ” (Hab 1:5)
44013042	Ifi deu Pauro nga Banaba yeri kpekpeturang amaunac mamaec ngic yeneng sabata tatac naso monggac yoac imocacngoc edeyunuecdeac derecgeyemecgec.
44013043	Tutumang wisickeu mama yudangic nga bangec monnunac ngic homacngo yudangic yenearu torokpema kecgec, yeni yenahafocngoc Pauro nga Banaba modacyurugec Anutuac wosoefahaac arennu seria kecgecdeac demeseri ayemmeoc.
44013044	Nga sabata tatac nasongina monggoc anu taong imocac ngicngac yeni Kebuac yoac negenggecdeac ebiriango sikegec.
44013045	Sikegec yudangic yeneng yenemma Pauro nga Banaba keracmangang ayecmegec Paurongo yoac deu yeneng yegoc yoacngina engemmama anu yoara kpema desusuic ammigec.
44013046	Ifi anggec Pauro nga Banaba yeri yoac kucgoc kengeha kpac yofi edeyunuoc, “Hanahema yudangic ngeni Anutuac yoac dekperagingemmebesonga. Yaguc ngeni ngenaoc wama kekecseriac areng mi ambeso dedaeac neni wangunuma bangec monnunac ngicngac, yenearu kennide.
44013047	Kebungo yofi denemmeec, ‘Neng ge bangec monnunac ngicngac, yeneac kifa faiguba geng ngicngac kopocsicac ebicfunac mesiyununa dema ge ua imoc gemba mekengkecma bangec tegiau mekemma ebicfunac mesiyununa komoc kpebesandae.’ ” (Yes 49:6)
44013048	Ifi degec bangec monnunac ngicngac, yeneng imoc negemma ubangina ngereeu Kebuac yoacac dedengerec anggec. Nga kekec wisic wisickea kpac, imocac areng anggecdeac Anutungo negengyemmeecsoc, yeni Kebu negensinggegec.
44013049	Nga amabangec ihai Kebuac yoacngo wakema kenec.
44013050	Taong imocac ngac kuneng goa yeni yudangic yenearu torokpema kecgec. Yudangic yeni amagareng nga ngac imoc wosoumeme ayemmema meyunu kemma Pauro nga Banaba yurukporac ayecmema amabangecngina segerema kisangyurugec kenoc.
44013051	Kemma fakanginaac amma haningiraunac yube kpefanggeec mau wayunuma Ikoniong taonnu kenoc.
44013052	Nga Yesuac habu yeneac ubau songo kuneng nga Tiri Asu wake wakea fingecyemme kenec.
44014001	Yeri Ikoniong taonnu sikema ihai ifingoc yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang amau emma siduc gombung kuhagoc deireckeyemmeoc. Imocac yudangic nga grikngic homacngo Yesu negensinggegec.
44014002	Yudangic goa yeneng ine yoac imoc wama bangec monnunac ngic Anutu mi negensigec, yeni fenggeyunugec negen negensinggoc tosofocnina herebu negengyemmegec.
44014003	Negengyemmegec yeri serima naso herea taong ihai kecma kengeha kpac Kebuac yoac kuhagoc dekefoc. Ammanu Kebu danggunuhaac yoac meseriudeac yengenaoc nonggo tacyecmemanu yeri negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc nga faka mi hehena homac mema kefoc.
44014004	Ifi anec taong imocac ngic tohoma goa yudangic yenearu kenggec nga goa aposoro yerearu kenggec.
44014005	Nga bangec monnunac ngic nga yudangic goa yeni garengfocnginagoc aposoro mangana ayecmema hocngo yereregecdeac yoac dzegegec.
44014006	Dzegegec yeri imoc negemma worama Rikaonia bangecfu kenoc. Kemma ihai Ristera nga Derebe nga amabangec goa wegenac tarecfu
44014007	siduc gombung dekperagiyemme kenoc.
44014008	Ristera taonnu ngic mong tarec, ye hanihora mangac manganea. Ye nonggo heremanaunac ifia fingecma kenghaya kpac eng takefec.
44014009	Tackefu Paurongo siduc gombung edeyunuu ngic ye negemma tacmanu yearu kic dindingac fima haniaya yofi negenec, “Ngic imoc ye ngerec ngereeac negen negensing femidenoc.”
44014010	Ifi negemma yoac kuhagoc yofi edeec, “Ge yacma hongngoc nanna.” ifi deu ngic ye poratacke yacma kengha anec.
44014011	Anu ngic habutoa yeneng Paurongo faka meec, imoc hemma kucgoc kpacma Rikaonia yoacnginau sing yofi degec, “Nemu yeneng ngicsebi mema botucninau magec kecdae.”
44014012	Amma yeni Banaba ye nemu mong kpara Dia, ifi degec nga Pauro ye yoac dederecgeac ngic, imocac amma nemu mong kpara Hermes, ifi degec.
44014013	Nga nemu Dia yeac sesememengicngo deu yeni burumakangiwa goa nga dzundzaring taong tegiau odanaguyau mekemema ngihoc yereac eweheima hosuc heibeso anggec.
44014014	Ammagec aposoro yeri imoc negemma ubaebic mema ngakpingira merecgema amangira wama bic habu yeneac botucfu kemma yofi arohooc,
44014015	“Yei, ngicngac ngeni noc andae? Neri ngic ngeni isoc, ngeneac siric. Ngeni nemungina kucmama kecdae, yeni ngadeyunuma Anutu kekehagoc mewegenegecdeac siduc gombung dekperagingemmekecdipe. Yeng wiac sasawa bangecfu nga kurumennu nga kondunnu fedacde, imoc meficgedarec.
44014016	Ngicngac warac kecgec, naso imohai bangec monnunac ngicngac negengyemmemanu yeni ubanginaac nga kekecnginaac songo hania hania, imocac kpaea mi faiyemmemanu yeni keceregec.
44014017	Keceregec ihoc bahoc mong mi angemmeec, kpac. Ye haniaya negenggecdeac ubangerec angemmema deu kiawenac sawaunac nasoyau fingeckecde. Nga ye nenesemeng nasoyau deu fingeru yakangina homac meficgengemmeu songo witiau kecdae.”
44014018	Ngihoc yereng yoac ifi gadzea mema yoac ua ebiriangoc mekecma dekpetari ayemmeec yereac hosucheihei imoc wagec.
44014019	Yeri ihai kecmaec yudangic Antiokia nga Ikoniong taonnunac sikema yereac ua desakoigec. Desakoima ngicngac wangecyunugec, yenahafoc Pauro hocngo heigec. Heima negenggec, “Ye bic homedac.” ifi dema ama ngadeau taikemma faigec feec.
44014020	Femanu Yesuac habu yeneng hama oronggema memidi ammigec gborima yacma amau enec. Nga wereckengau ye Banabagoc Derebe taonnu kenoc.
44014021	Yeri kemma ihai siduc gombung dekperagiyemmeec ngic homacngo Yesu negensinggegec. Ifi amma sing kenocfu, ihai monggoc dzigenema Ristera nga Ikoniong amma Antiokia taonnu tacyac hakefoc.
44014022	Hakecma amasoc sikema Yesuac habu negen negensingina kpedzucnema kecgecdeac demeseri ayemmema yofi edeyunuoc, “Nenang Anutuac eucererennu ennideac kpendzeng hania hania fingecnemmeu imocac witiau kecbisina.”
44014023	Amma kpebung taong mocgu mocgu kecgec, yeneac enarafocngina meisingyunugec. Nga ngicngac Yesu negensinggegec, yeneac amma yakasege amma numuma kenecyunuma Kebuac hoannu faiyunuoc.
44014024	Nga yeri Pisidia bangec ferecgema kengkecma Pamfiria bangecfu kenoc.
44014025	Ihai kemma Perege taonnu yoac edeyunuma Ataria taonnu kemeoc.
44014026	Kemema kporucwageu emma kengkecma Antiokia dzigeneoc. Taong imohainoc Yesuac habu yeni warac Kebuac kenecfu faiyuruma ua deyecmegec, imohai sikema mesioc.
44014027	Ihai hasikema kpebung kpedzucyunuma Anutungo nonggo tayecmemanu ua sasawa meoc amma bangec monnunac ngicngac, yenearu ua nagu mong meyecmeu Yesu negensinggegec, imoc edeyunudaroc.
44014028	Amma yeri naso hereangoc Yesuac habu yeneac botucfu kefoc.
44015001	Yudaia bangecfunac ngic goa yeni Antiokia taonnu kemema Yesuac habu yofi kpouyemmegec, “Ngeni Moseac yoacfu sebi tosangina mi herecgema komoc naric mi kpegecde.”
44015002	Ifi degec Pauro nga Banaba yerigoc yoacngina engemmama anu uba mocgu mi anggec. Ifi angkecma yeni aposoro nga Yerusalennu habu enarafocngina yenigoc yoac imoc dengeregecdeac Pauro nga Banaba amma ngic goa meisingyunuma Yerusalennu sueyunugec kenggec.
44015003	Nga kpebung yeneng singgac wiac yemmema sueyunugec kenggec. Kemma Foinike nga Samaria bangec kensikema Yesuac habu ihai kecgec, yeni yofi edeyunugec, “Bangec monnunac ngicngac homacngo ubamereng anggec.” Ifi degec, yeni imoc negemma ubangerec kuneng negenggec.
44015004	Nga yeni kengkecma Yerusalennu kensikegec. Kensikema kpebung nga aposoro amma Yerusaleng kpebung enarafocngina, yeneng ama heiyemmegec. Heiyemmegec, yeni Anutungo nonggo tacyemmemanu misingua megec fora fingerec, imocac siduc meyemmegec.
44015005	Meyemmegec farisaioac mitiarennunac goango Yesu negensinggegec, yenearunac goa yacma yofi degec, “Bangec monnunac ngic yeni sebi tosangina herecgebesonga amma Moseac dedeseriyoac tofohogecdeac demeseri ayemmebesonga.”
44015006	Ifi degec aposoro nga enara yeni kpedzucnema yoac imoc tembuc denegeng anggec.
44015007	Yoacua mekecma Petorongo yacma yofi deec, “Tosofocna, bangec monnunac ngicngac, yeni neac enacfunac siduc gombung negemma negensinggegecdeac Anutungo warac nenang botucfunac meisinnuec, imoc negendae.
44015008	Anutu ye uba hehengngo warac Tiri Asu nemmeec, imoc ifingoc bangec monnunac ngicngac, yeneac negenecac Tiri Asu yemmeec.
44015009	Nenang negensinggeing, ifi isoc yeni negensinggegec Anutungo ubangina dzuarec.
44015010	Ifi anu ngeni Anutu tobanggema Moseac dedeseri, imocac tofo kuneng Yesuac habu yeneac witiu faibeso dedae, imoc naric mi ande. Bangecfocnina nga esangabofocnina amma nenang imoc tofobibiema obohoing.
44015011	Nga yofi negensinggedimbe, Kebu Yesungo yudangic nga bangec monnunac ngicngac, neni nenahafoc danggunuha nemmema ebicfunac mesinunuu komoc kpenide.”
44015012	Ifi deu habutoa yeni engsac negemma tacgec. Nga Anutungo Pauro nga Banaba nonggo tacyemecmanu ua meoc, imocac siduc meyemmeoc. Yeri bangec monnunac ngicngac, yenearu negensinggegecdeac faka kuhagoc nga faka mi hehena homac meoc, imoc edeyunuoc.
44015013	Siduc meyemmeec wisickeu Yakobongo yoac yofi edeyunuec, “Tosofocna, deba negenggec,
44015014	Anutungo hanahema bangec monnunac ngicngac, yenearunac ngicngac meyunuu yeac arengfora anggecdeac sing meficgeec, imocac yoac Simongngo dekperagiu negending.
44015015	Negenni yeac yoacngo profete yeneac yoacgoc socfungoc ande. Negenggec, mitikibiu yoac yofi ohogec fede.
44015016	‘ “Neng ngade kecma dzigenema Dawidiac amabara sesuhau monggoc heigborima meseribade.
44015017	Nga ngic toseango Kebu ni kpachofoc anemma meficnubesandae amma bangec monnunac ngicngac, yeneng ifingoc arengfocna ambisia.” (Amo 9:11-12)
44015018	Kebu ye bicngoc yoac ifia deereecngo dedenoc.’
44015019	Imocac negengising amma yofi deduae, bangec monnunac ngicngac, yenearunacngo Anutu ubanginango hoanggema kecdae, yeni ebictoa mi yemmebisina.
44015020	Yofisac deserima kibi ohoyemmebisina, ngicngac yeneng nemunginaac sese dema wiac heiyemmekecdae, wiac wonongagoc ifia wabisia. Yeni serima kecma kaisero mi ambisia nga yamberec fusia sawagoc amma sacac segekecbisia.
44015021	Yeni Moseac yoac bic negendae. Nga imoc esea bicngoc yuda yeneng hanahema taonsoc osohakecgec. Amma imoc yofinenggac ifingoc sabata tatac nasoyau kpekpeturang amanginasoc osonegeng angandae.”
44015022	Anu aposoro nga kpebunggac enarafocngina amma kpebungtoa, yeni negenggec imoc naric anec. Nga yenearunac ngicenara yohockang meisingyurugec mong kpara Yuda, yeac kpara mong Basaba, amma Sira. Meisingyuruma yeri Pauro nga Banaba yerigoc yenahafoc Antiokia taonnu kenggecdeac sueyurugec.
44015023	Amma yoackibi mong yofi dema ohoma yemmegec kenggec, “Neni tosofocngina aposoro nga enarango bangec monggac habuunac tosofocnina Antiokia nga Siria amma Kirikia bangecfu kecdae, ngenearu yoackibi yoc faingemmedimbe.
44015024	Wenacngerec. Neni mi sueyunumina nenearunac ngic goa yeni yenaoc ngenearu hama yoac edengunuma negen negengngina mesufugec negengyohoc anggec, imoc negending.
44015025	Neni imoc negemma uba mocgu amma ngic yohockang meisingyuruma tosohocnina Banaba nga Pauro yerigoc sueyuruni hadae.
44015026	Ngic yerinoc Kebunina Yesu Kristo, yeac amma kekecngira waoc.
44015027	Anu ngic imoc meisingyuruding, yeri hama yoac imoc enacfu dekperagingemmeec negembisia.
44015028	Tiri Asu nga neni nenahafoc ebic goa witinginau mi faingemmenideac negenni ngereede. Ngeni singyoac yomocsac modacgecdeac faingemmeni ngereede:
44015029	Ngicngac nemunginagoc yeneng nemungina yeneac sese dema yang heiyemmegec, ngeni imoc wama mi nebisia. Ngeni yamberec fusia sawagoc mi nebisia amma sac mi nebisia. Nga kaisero mi ambisia. Ngeni imoc sasawa wadacgec ngereeude. Imocac ngeni ubangerecgoc kecbisia.”
44015030	Anu kpebung yeni ngic imocnoc sueyunugec kenggec. Kengkecma yeni Antiokia kemesikema Yesuac habu Antiokia kecgec, yeni kpedzucyunuma yoackibi imoc yemmegec.
44015031	Yemmegec memeseri yoackibi imoc hemma osoma ubangerec negenggec.
44015032	Amma Yuda nga Sira yeri profete kefocac yoac homac dema Yesuac habu ubangina meefaima demeseri ayemmeoc.
44015033	Ifi angkefec naso wisickeu Yesuac habu yenearu dzigenebesonga turunga ruae nga kenecyoac ayecmegec kenoc.
44015034	Nga Sirango ine ihai kecbeso negenec.
44015035	Pauro nga Banaba yeri Antiokia taonnu uangira monggoc torokpema mekefoc. Mekefec ngic homac yenigoc memefic amma Kebuac yoac ngicngac edekpou ayemmema siduc gombunggac hania dekperagiyemmeec.
44015036	Kecma Paurongo Banaba yofi edeec, “Nerang monggoc dzigene kemma taonnu Kebuac yoac dekperagiyemmeic, ihai negen negensinggoc tosofocnina dafi kecdae, imoc kemma hennegeng ambisira.”
44015037	Ifi deu Banabango Yohane Mareko yenahafoc kenggecdeac deec.
44015038	Nga Mareko ye warac yerigoc kengkecma Pamfiria bangecfu ua wama woraecac amma Paurongo yegoc kenggecdeac negenu mi ngereec.
44015039	Ifi amma Banabagoc yoacngira engemmama anu wama faiemeoc. Faiemema Banabango Mareko hesickeu kemma kporucwageu emma Kipiro nucfu kenoc.
44015040	Nga Pauro ye Sira meu kembeso deec Yesuac habu yeneng Kebuac danggunucngo ngerearu febeso degec kenoc.
44015041	Kemma yeri Siria nga Kirikia bangecfu kengkecma kpebung demeseri ayemmekenoc.
44016001	Pauro ye kengkecma Derebe nga Ristera taonnu kenec. Anu Ristera ihai ubamereng ngic mong kefec, kpara Timoteo. Yeac nonggea yudangac nga ye Yesuac arennu toroc torokpea anu mama ye grikngic.
44016002	Amma Yesuac habu Ristera nga Ikoniong taonnu kecgec, yeneng Pauro yofi edegec, “Timoteo ye fakaya gombunga.”
44016003	Edegec Paurongo yerahafoc kenecdeac edeu naric deec. Anu yudangic bangec imohai kecgec, yeneng Timoteo mama ye grikngic, imoc negendacgec. Imocac Paurongo yeneac amma Timoteoac sebi tosea herecgeec.
44016004	Nga yeri amea amea kemma aposoro nga Yerusaleng habuac enarafocngina singyoac dedzege anggec, imoc tofohogecdeac Yesuac habu edeyunukenoc.
44016005	Ifi amma ua meec kpebung yeneac negen negensing yadiec. Nga wenacsoc bangec monnunac ngicngac, yeneng aposoro yenearu kemma torokpekecgec homac anggec.
44016006	Asia bangectoau yoac dekperagiyemmebeso degec Tiri Asungo kpetariyemmeu Firigia nga Garatia bangec eng ferecgema kenggec.
44016007	Kengkecma Misia bangec nga Asia bangec botucngirau namma Bitinia bangecfu kembeso degec Yesuac Asungo kpae heiyemmeec.
44016008	Imocac yeni Misia bangec ferahema kengkecma Troa taonnu kemegec.
44016009	Ihai sikema tofocnac imohai Paurongo onga mong yofi henec, Makedoniangic mongngo yearu fingecma namma desambic ammima yofi edeec, “Ge dokutoa ferecgema Makedonia bangecfu hama meficnunubesena.”
44016010	Pauro ye wiac imoc henu Anutungo neni Makedonia bangecfu kemma siduc gombung dekperagiyemmenideac kpacnude, ifi negentegecma Troa wanideac bic efaiing.
44016011	Efaima kporucwageu emma Troa wama ferecgema kengkecma Samotrake nucfu kensikeing. Kensikema wereckengau imohacnac kengkecma Neapori taonnu sikeing.
44016012	Sikema ihai wageunac mama hanising kengkecma Firipi taonnu sikeing. Imoc Makedonia bangectoa imocac taongyada. Romangic yeneng warac bangec imoc megec. Anu taong imohai uameme goa kecmina
44016013	sabata naso anu taong odanagu wegenacfu doku mong feec, imohai yofi dema kemeing, “Ngicngac numuandae, yeneac tacyac mong doku tegiau fede me kpac, imoc kemema henni.” Ifi dema kemema ngac kpedzucnema kecmagec meficyunuma matacma yenigoc yoacyoac aning.
44016014	Yeneac botucfunac ngac mong Tiatira taonnunac kpara Ridia, ye finacama mingina nga kporuc sacsac faikefec. Ye Anutu eweheimima kefu Kebungo ubea mekperagiu Pauroac yoac kedzac kpema negenec.
44016015	Amma ye yengena nga arengfora mitidoku nadzicma yofi derecgenemmeec, “Ngeni negennugec ni Kebu fora negensinggeanduaeu neac amau erema nigoc tacyac ambisia.” Ifi dema ngombonnunuu ening.
44016016	Naso monnu numukecgec, imohai monggoc kememina ihai wanac naroang mongngo meficnunuec. Naroang ye yafingagoc kecma ngicngac yeneac kpefingdede kefec. Ifi amma ngic mingingfora hiedzotoa kirecgeyemmekefec.
44016017	Anu yennoc meficnunuma Pauro nga neni modacnunuma kpacma arohoec, “Ngic yomocngo Anutu Engenatoa, yeac enac tofoc tofoho nga kopocsicac ebicfunac mesi mesi amma komoc kpegecdeac sing mong derecgenemmedacgec ngeni sing imohai komoc kpegecde.”
44016018	Faka imoc wenacsoc anemmekefu Paurongo imocac modzea tiu sisirema dzigene yafing yofi edeec, “Ni Yesu Kristo yeac kpacfu demekiri amma edeguba, ge ngac hereunac erema kenna.” Ifi deu ye imohaingoc erema kenec.
44016019	Kenu ngac mingingfora yeni hiedzongina fingecyemmeande, imoc kpac anu negemma Pauro nga Sira mendangyuruma kpedziyuruma yoacfu faiyurugecdeac kia yeneac amasobennu kenggec.
44016020	Kemma kia yenearu faiyuruma yofi degec, “Yeri yudangicngo amaninau dzomu meficgema tacyacnina memanganedape.
44016021	Amma faka goa furia romangic nenaoc menideac kpaeyoac dedea fede, imocnoc mema modacdacnideac edenunudape.”
44016022	Ifi degec ngichabutoango uba mocgu amma herebu negengyecmegec. Negengyecmegec kiango deu ngakpingira kucbiric hesigec. Hesima dzikacngo yurugec.
44016023	Dzikacngo homac kperec merecgeyuruma witicamau faiyuruma garengngo nagu seria heima gombunga yombong garengyuruudeac edegec.
44016024	Yoac seria ifia edegecac amma ye witicama mana ungguruha monnu faiyuruma haningira ic hendzic hendzirau faiu kindanggeu feoc.
44016025	Tofocnac dzongiau Pauro nga Sira yeri Anutu yegec nunumu ammioc. Ammiec witicngic goango kedzac kpema negengyecmegec.
44016026	Negengyecmemagec, imohaingoc usoctoa kuhagoc meu witicama kpemindzaheu naguya bic anggedarec amma ngic sasawa witicngina fotockedarec.
44016027	Anu witicama garengngo gauunac kpidohoma yacma nagu anggema nandaru hemma, yofi negenec, “Witicngic woradau.” ifi negemma wasaibeanga taima ewehomebeso anu
44016028	Paurongo kungengngoc kpacma deec, “Ge sebiga mi kpena, neni hafoangoc tacdimbe.”
44016029	Ifi deu gareng ye arengfora deu kifa migec ama manau emma dzonong fedefede amma Pauro nga Sira yereac haniu makpema feec.
44016030	Amma yacma ama manaunac hesicyuru mama kpesiyecmeec, “Ngickunenghocna, ni dafi amma komoc kpebade?”
44016031	Ifi deu yereng yofi edeoc, “Ge nga arengfocga ngeni Kebu Yesu Kristo negensinggegec yeng ebicfunac mesingunuu komoc kpegecde.”
44016032	Ifi dema ye nga arengfora Kebuac yoac edeyunuoc.
44016033	Edeyunuec gareng ye yacma tofocnac imohaingoc amau emma kubecngira dzuacsangohe ayecmema deu yengena nga arengfora doku nadzicgec.
44016034	Nadzicgec wisickeu yengena ama manau faiyuruma deu yaka gombunga mengerema yemecgec neoc. Anu ye nga arengfora yeni Anutuac ngic anggecac ubangina ngereeu sogaigec.
44016035	Ama wereckenu kia yeneng witicama gareng ngic yohockang yungecyuruudeac keracnatang sueyunugec.
44016036	Sueyunugec garengngo yoac imoc negemma Pauro yofi edeec, “Ni fainguruba kenecdeac kia yeneng yoac faigec hade. Imocac ngeri mama kemma ruaegoc kecbesera.”
44016037	Ifi deu Paurongo yofi edeec, “Neri romangic arennu torokpema kecde, yeni hanianira mi negendacma ngic kicfu eng dzikacngo nuruma witicamau fainurugec. Nga yoc waic waic suenurugecac negendae, imoc naric kpac. Yeni yenaoc hama hesicnurugec kendede.”
44016038	Anu Paurongo yoac ifi deu keracnatang yeni dzigene kemma kia yoac yofi edeyunugec, “Ngic yeri romangic arennunacngo kecdape.” Ifi degec yeni siduc imoc negemma damuyunuu kengec amma
44016039	ngihoc yerearu hama demembanang ayecmema witicamaunac hesicyuru mama amangina wama kenecdeac edeyurugec.
44016040	Ifi edeyurugec yeri witicamaunac mama Ridia yeac amau emma Yesuac habu yenemma demeseri ayemmema kenoc.
44017001	Pauro nga Sira yeri Amfipori nga Aporonia taong ferecgema Tesaronike taonnu kenoc. Nga ihai yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang ama mong tarec.
44017002	Nga Paurongo angande, ifi amma kpekpeturang amanginau emma sabata naso harebec yenigoc Anutuac yoac denegeng anggec.
44017003	Ifi amma yoac yofi dema mitikibiu yoac edzacyunuma deireckeyemmeec, “Messiango kpendzeng kpekecma homema monggoc gborima yarude, imoc mitikibiu dedea fede. Amma Yesu yennoc Messia, imoc dekperagikecduae.”
44017004	Ye ifi seria deireckeyemmeu yudangic goango ireckema Pauro nga Sira, yerearu kpeketahegec. Nga grikngic Anutu eweheimima kecandae nga ngac kuneng yeni homacngo yerearu torokpegec.
44017005	Anu ngic homacngo siduc gombung negenggec yudangic yeneng keracmangang ayemmema kpedzaroc sobennu kemma yarengic kpacyunugec. Kpacyunuma taonnu dzomugerec meficgema Yasonggac amau Pauro nga Sira taroc, imohai kpedzucnedacgec. Kpedzucnedacma ngihoc meyuruma ngic yeneac botucfu faiyurubesonga degec.
44017006	Dema hofocyuruma Yasong nga Yesuac habuunac goa meyunuma amaac enarameme yeneac kicfu kpedziyunuma kenggec. Imoc yofi dema aro aro kenggec, “Bangeha bangeha dzomugerec meficgema ngicuba miacyemmeandae, ngic imongonoc nenearu ifingoc hadau.
44017007	Haec Yasongngo ama heiyemeru tacdape. Yeri Ngictau Sisaac dedeseriyoac kpema ngictau furia mong kpara Yesu, ye kpanggema dedape.”
44017008	Yeni yoac ifi dema amangic nga enara wosongina megec.
44017009	Ifi anu gareng yeni Yasong nga tosofora ayemmegec sebingina kaso kpema hiedzo faigec wayunugec kenggec.
44017010	Ama toforeu Yesuac habu yeneng imohaingoc Pauro nga Sira Berea taonnu sueyurugec kenoc. Kemma ihai yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang amau emma siduc gombung deoc.
44017011	Deec taong imocac yudangic yeni fakangina nga angammemengina kpacgoc nga Tesaronike yeneac faka isoc kpahac, imocac enacyoac ubaefac hafoangoc negemma hoanggegec. Amma yoacngira ikoha me fora dema wenaha wenaha mitikibi osoma deusu anggec.
44017012	Ifiac amma yudangic yenearunac homacngo Yesu negensinggegec amma grikngic nga grikngac kuneng homacngo yerearu torokpegec.
44017013	Torokpegec Paurongo Berea taonnu Anutuac yoac dekperagiu siduc imocngo Tesaronike kenu yudangic yeneng negenggec. Negemma Berea hama habutoa imoc demanganema herengina miacgec.
44017014	Ifi anggec Yesuac habu yeneng imohaingoc Pauro kondunnu suegec kemeec. Nga Sira nga Timoteo yeri ihaingoc kefoc.
44017015	Anu ngic yeneng Pauro hesicke kengkecma Ateng taonnu faigec. Faigec yeng Sira nga Timoteo bic haecdeac edeyunuu ngic yeni dzigenegec.
44017016	Pauro ye Ateng taonnu yereac tomai kefec. Nga nemuonga wakemangoc tackenggec ye imoc hemma ubahodung kuneng negenec.
44017017	Amma ye yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang amau emma yudangic yenang nga grikngic goa yudangic yenearu torokpema kecgec, yeni yenahafoc mitiac denegeng anggec. Amma ye ifingoc wenaha wenaha kpedzaroc sobennu kemma ngic tacgec, yenigoc miti denegeng anggec.
44017018	Anu taong imohai kekecac hania negen negengngic kecgec, kpacngina epikuengic nga stoikengic. Ngic imoc yeneng Paurogoc yoac demereng anggec goango Pauroac yofi degec, “Ngic imoc yennoc yadi yadima yoac debeso ande, imoc mi negendimbe.” ifi degec toseango yofi degec, “Ye nemu furiaac dedekperagi ngic.” Paurongo Yesuac siduc nga homecfunac yacyac, yoac imoc deecac yeni ifi degec.
44017019	Ifi dema sobengtoa mong kpara Areopage ihai hesicke emma degec, “Ge yoac furia denec, imoc naric edenunubesena.
44017020	Yoac imoc kedzacnina furia, imocac ge haniagoc dena negembeso anemmede.”
44017021	Ateng ngic kuric nga ama mingina sasawa, yeni yoacsiduc furia negemma yoac imocsac denegeng amma siduc homac angkecgec.
44017022	Ifi anu Pauro ye Areopage tutumang botucfu namma ngic yofi edeyunuec, “Ateng ngic, ni wiac sasawa hemma haniangina yofi hentegecduae, ngeni nemu hania hania homac eweheiyemmema yeneac faka hania hania mekecdae.
44017023	Ni taongnginau kengha amma nemuongafocngina yenengkecma arata monnu kibi yofi oho ohoya feu henai, ‘Nemu mi hennegeng angana, yeac arata.’ Nga nemu imoc mi negemma eweheimiandae, yeac hania dekperagingemmeba negenggec.
44017024	Anutu yennoc bangectoa bangec nga wiac sasawa ihai fede, imoc meficgema witiau wiac sasawa faidarec, yeng bangec nga kurumeng imocac mingina kecde. Ye womong ngic maringo memea, imohai tacyac mi angkecde.
44017025	Amma wiac mong hoforu ngicngo ua mema meficgemiande, imoc mi fede, kpac. Ye yengenaoc kekec nga asu amma wiac sasawa ngic yemmekecde.
44017026	Amma ngic mocgu meficgema deu yearunac ngic bangeha bangeha nga habuya habuya fingecsahe kecgecdeac deec. Amma naso nga kpete, imoc yengngoc deyemmeec.
44017027	Nga ngic yeni yenaoc ubanginango Kebu yengena hofocma meficgeandae, ye imoc negensima ifi anec. Foracngoc, ye hereau kpac, ye ngic nenang botucfu kecde.
44017028	Nga yennoc kekecninaac hania, nenang yeac kucfu kecma angammeme angkecdimbe. Amma ngeneac negen negengngic goango yofinoc degec, ‘Nenang Anutuarunac fingering.’
44017029	Anu nenang Anutuarunac, imocac amma ngic yeni ubau negemma gol me silwa me hocngo marikibi meandae, Anutungo ifi isoc ande, imoc mi negensibisia. Anutu ye kuctoa mingina.
44017030	Ngeni warac wiac imoc mi negentegecgecac Anutungo hemma imocac yoara mi deec. Yaguc ine bangeha bangeha ngicngac sasawa ubangina dzigeneudeac demeseri ayemmekecde.
44017031	Yeng bicngoc naso mong deec, imoc fede. Naso imohai bangeha bangeha ngicngac hanianina desima turunga dindingac merennemmeude. Amma ngic mong ye ua imocnoc meudeac demiec, ye ngic imoc edzacnunuudeac homecfunac megboriu yarec.”
44017032	Anu Pauro ye homecfunac yacyac, imocac yoac deu goango demembaic ammigec nga goango degec, “Yoac imoc naso monnu dena monggoc negembisina.”
44017033	Ifi degec Paurongo wayunuma kenec.
44017034	Anu ngic goango ine Pauroaru kpeketahema Yesu negensinggegec. Imoc yenearunac desi desi ngickuneng mong kpara Dionisio, ye Areopageac memba mong nga ngac mong kpara Damari, amma ngicngac goa.
44018001	Paurongo uaya mesima Ateng wama Korinti taonnu kenec.
44018002	Ihai yudangic mong meficgeec kpara Akpira, ye Ponto bangecfu fingerec. Amma ye enema Prisika yegoc Itaria bangecfu kecmaec ngictau Sisa Kraudiongo yudangicngac Roma taonnu kecgec, yeneac dedeseriyoac dema sueyunuu kendacgec. Imocac yeri Roma wama Korinti taonnu gbori gbori hama kefoc. Anu Paurongo yerearu kenec.
44018003	Pauro ye seriama memengic nga Akpira ye ua imocngoc mekefecac ye ameau tacyac amma meficgeu yerahafoc hiedzo memeac ua imoc mekefoc.
44018004	Mekecma Paurongo sabata tatac nasosoc yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang amau emma yudangic nga grikngic denegeng ammagec yoac deireckeyemmeec.
44018005	Anu Sira nga Timoteo yeri Makedonia bangecfunac haec Paurongo ua goa wama siduc gombung dedeac hombananga kefec. Amma yudangic yoac deireckeyemmekefec, imoc yofi, “Yesu ye Messianoc.”
44018006	Ifi ayemmeu yeni yoara surema deendema ammigec yeng fakangina wama wambaya kpeihaiu yube mau yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeneac sacngo ngenang orucfu habeso. Nga kopocsicnginaac turunga neac mi anude, imoc ngenang anude. Imocac yaguc wangunuma bangec monnunac ngicngac, yenearu kembade.”
44018007	Paurongo ifi dema yuda yeneac kpekpeturang ama wama ngic mong kpara Titio Yusto, yeac amau emma tacyac anec. Ngic imoc ye Anutu eweheimima kefec nga amea imoc yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang ama tegiau tarec.
44018008	Nga yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang amaac gareng kpara Krispo, ye nga arengfora yeni Yesu negensinggegec. Nga Korinti ngicngac homacngo Kebu negensinggema mitidoku nadzicgec.
44018009	Anu Tofocnac monnu Kebungo Pauro ongau yoac yofi edeec, “Ni nanggegubade, imocac amma kengec amma enackidzic mi ambesena, ge serima kecma enacyoacna debesena.
44018010	Neac ngichabutoa taong yomohai kecdaeac ngic yeneng gumeme mi anggecde.”
44018011	Ifi edeu Paurongo kifa mocgu nga noboha ihai tacma Anutuac yoac ngicngac edekpou ayemmeec.
44018012	Gariong ye Akaia bangecfu kiatoa kecmanu yudangic yeni uba mocgu amma Pauro ngaba ammima yoacfu mekenggec.
44018013	Mekemma kiaaru nesunggema yofi edegec, “Ngic yomoc ye dedeseriyoacnina kpeande. Ye sing mong tima Anutu eweheimigecdeac ngic fenggeyunuande.”
44018014	Edegec Paurongo enacefac amma yoac debeso ammanu Gariongngo yudangic yofi edeyunuec, “O yudangic, ngic ye kopocsic ebiria meficgebac dede yoacngina naric negembai.
44018015	Nga ngeni ine ngenang edekpouyoac nga kpac hania hania amma singngina imocac yoacngina engemmama andeac ngenaoc desibisia. Yoac ifia neng naric mi desibade, imoc neac ua kpahac.”
44018016	Ifi dema yoacfunac kisangyunuu magec.
44018017	Mama yeni uba mocgu amma kpekpeturang ama imocac gareng Sostene kiaac kicfu kpegec kiango imoc hemma ioc baoc anec.
44018018	Paurongo Korinti kecma Yesuac habu dekpemac ayemmema Siria bangecfu kenudeac Kengkereai taonnu kemema wageu enec. Amma Prisika nga Akpira yerigoc yenahafoc kenggec. Kemma ye Anutugoc dedeseri deecac Kengkereai ihai orucdzoea merecgema wedzerec.
44018019	Yeni Efeso taonnu sikema Paurongo Akpira nga Prisika wayuruma yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang amau emma yenigoc Anutuac enacyoac denegeng anggec.
44018020	Amma yudangic yenigoc kefudeac desambic ammigec ye imoc wama yenigoc yoac yofi dedzege anec.
44018021	“Anutungo negennenude isoc ni ngenearu monggoc dzigenebade.” ifi dema Efeso taong wama wageu monggoc emma kenec.
44018022	Kengkecma Kaisarea sikema kpebung yenearu emma yenigoc yoacyoac amma Antiokia kemeec.
44018023	Paurongo Antiokia imohai naso goau kefec. Kecma taong imoc wama Garatia nga Firigia bangec yerecgema Yesuac habu demeseri ayemmema kenec.
44018024	Naso imohai Efeso taonnu yudangic mong haec, kpara Aporo. Ye Aresandria taonnu fingecma kibiamatoa mesima mitikibiu yoac oho ohoya feec, imocac hania negentegecdarec.
44018025	Ye Kebuac enacyoac kpoumigec negenec. Anu ye Yohaneac dokunadzic, imocac sirihasac negenec. Nga ye Yesuac sing gerec gerehagoc tongganangngoc deec.
44018026	Ye yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang amau siduc gombung kengeha kpac edeyunuec. Amma ihai siduc gombung deu Prisika nga Akpira yeri yoara negemma hoanggema Anutuac sing gboria tongganang deireckemioc.
44018027	Nga Aporo ye Akaia bangecfu kembeso deu Yesuac habu yeni demeseri ammima Yesuac kpebung edi kecgec, yeneac kibi yofi ohogec, “Ngic yomoc ye ngenearu hau ngeneng ama heimibisia.” ifi ohomigec mekengkecma ihai sikeec. Sikeu Anutungo ngicngac danggunuha yemmeu Yesu negensinggekecgec, yenearu kemma homac meficyunukefec.
44018028	Ye didiu yombong yoac kucgoc yudangic dedzameyunuma yofi dekperagiec, “Yesu yennoc Messia.” Ye mitikibigoc yoac imoc dema edzacyunuu ubangina kuha maec.
44019001	Aporo ye Korinti taonnu kecmanu Paurongo sifecfusing ferecge kengkecma Efeso sikema Yesuac habu goa meficyunuma
44019002	kpesiyemmeec, “Ngeni Yesu negensinggema Tiri Asugoc anggec me kpac?” ifi deu yeneng degec, “Kpac, Tiri Asu kecde, siduc ifia mong mi negening.”
44019003	Ifi degec monggoc kpesiyemmeec, “Anu ngeni noc mitidoku nadzicgec?” deu yofi degec, “Neni Yohaneac mitidoku nadziring.”
44019004	Ifi degec Paurongo yofi edeyunuec, “Yohanengo ngic ubangina dzigeneudeac doku nadzicyemmema yofi edeyunuec, ‘Ngadenau hama kecde, ngeni ye negensinggebisia.’ ye yoac imoc Yesuac negemma deec.”
44019005	Ngic yeni yoac imoc negemma Kebu Yesuac kpacfu mitidoku nadzicgec.
44019006	Mitidoku nadzicgec Paurongo maria sebinginau faiu Tiri Asungo yenearu maec. Mama ubangina wakeu yeni nedzarangyoac nga profeteyoac degec.
44019007	Ngic ifi anggec, yeneac kpetengina 12 isoc anec.
44019008	Paurongo yudangic yeneac kpekpeturang amau emma kengeha kpac kecma afo harebec siduc gombung dekperagiyemmekefec. Amma ye Anutuac eucererenggac hania yenigoc demereng angemema defengge ayemmeec.
44019009	Ifi anu ngic goa yeni ubaseri amma Yesuac sing gombung ngadehema ngicngac habutoa yeneac kicfu imoc demanganegec Paurongo wayunuec. Wayunuma Yesuac habu kpedzucyunuma wenacsoc ngic mong kpara Tirano, yeac kpoukpou amau siduc gombung dekpou ayemmekefec.
44019010	Ye kifa yohockang ifi kecmanu Asia bangectoau yudangic nga grikngic ifingoc Kebuac yoac negendacgec.
44019011	Nga Anutungo Pauro nonggo tacmimanu faka kiwa morora kuhagoc meec.
44019012	Paurongo uakporuc nga keremmeme mekefec, ngicngac yeni imoc mema hafeigoc yenearu mekenggec, yeneng imoc kpeserema ngereegec nga asu mangana herenginaunac erema woragec.
44019013	Yudangic goa bangec yerecgema asu mangana yunukporac anggec, yenearunac ngic goango ngicngac asu manganagoc yeneac witiu Yesuac kpac kpacma tobanggema ua yofi mema degec, “Yesu kpacsiduha Paurongo dekperagiande, ge ngic yeac kpacfu worabesena.”
44019014	Amma yudangic mong kpara Skewa, ye womonggareng enara kefec nga yeac medacfora 7 yeni ifinoc anggec.
44019015	Ifi amma degec asumanganango yoac yofi merengyemmeec, “Yesu negenduae amma Pauro ifingoc negenduae. Anu ngeni merac?”
44019016	Ifi dema ngic asu manganagocngo kucgoc yacma wasai mema medac sasawa yunudacma ngakpingina mesuc kpesuc mema sebingina merecgeu yeni sac nadzicma senggang yacma amaunac mama woragec.
44019017	Anu Efeso taonnu yudangic nga grikngic yeni imocac siduc negendacma kucngina mau dzonong fedefede anggec. Ifi amma Kebu Yesu afehema dengeregec.
44019018	Dengerema ngicngac Yesu negensinggegec, yenearunac homacngo sikema angammemengina mangana angkecgec, imoc nonongkac deficgedacgec.
44019019	Deficgegec ngicngac homacngo warac bangecac hadehadegoc faka megec, yeni kibingina kpeturanggema ngic yeneac kicfu faigec gerecfu dzeec. Kpeturanggema faigec dzeec, kibi imoc ngic 10 yeneng kifa 16 kampani ua mema ua bummegecde, dzo kpetea imocacsoc anec.
44019020	Nga yeni ifi anggec Kebuac yoacsiducngo kucgoc fingectegecma noboc noboc sokoma kenec.
44019021	Paurongo mising ua imoc mesidacma yofi deec, “Asungo ubanau negen negeng nendeac Makedonia nga Akaia bangec ferecgema Yerusalennu kemma tacba wisickeu Roma taonnu kembesare.”
44019022	Ifi dema memefihora Timoteo nga Erasto sueyuruu Makedonia bangecfu waraima kenoc. Nga yengena ine Asia bangecfu monggoc kapia torokpema kefec.
44019023	Naso imohai Efeso taonnu Yesuac yoacsiducac amma kpeborongtoa fingerec.
44019024	Imoc yofi: Silwango marikibimemengic mong kefec kpara Demetrio, yeng Atemis nemu womonggac ongea kapic kapic silwango meu enu ngic yeni bummekecgec. Bummegec ye nga uangic tosofora hiedzo homac kirecgeyemmekefec.
44019025	Demetriongo uangic tosofora nga marikibimemengic sasawa kpedzucyunuma yofi edeyunuec, “Ngicwiac, ngeni uanina imocngo dzofinac meficgenemmeande, imoc negendae.
44019026	Nga ngic mong hama kecde kpara Pauro, yeac hania negendae. Ye Efeso amaunac nga Asia bangec goaunac ngic noc efea fenggeyunuma uba mesufu ayemmema yofi edeyunuande, ‘Nemuonga ngicmaringo memea, imoc wiac fora kpahac.’
44019027	Yeng ifi anu uanina kuha mabacac nga imocsac kpac. Nemutoanina Atemis yeac womong efaibacac amma Atemis yengena kpacsiduha kuha madacbacac. Anu Asia bangecfunac nga bangec noboc nobocnac ngic yenahafoc eweheimiandae amma siduha dafi kpac anude, imoc obohode.”
44019028	Demetrio yeng yoac ifi edeyunuu yeni herebu kuneng negemma arohoma yofi degec, “Efeso yeneac Atemis ye engenatoa!”
44019029	Ifi amma ngic homacngo yenearu torokpema taong wakema dzomu gerehagoc meficgebesonga kpekpeturangsobennu yenahafoc nedzima kendacgec. Amma Makedonianac ngic yohockang Pauro modaroc, kpacngira Gaio nga Aristako, yeri meyuruma kpedziyuru kenggec.
44019030	Nga Paurongo ifi negemma ngic kpekpeturannu kembeso deu Yesuac habu yeneng segeregec.
44019031	Amma provinsiac ngickuneng goa Pauroac toso kecgec, yeneng ifingoc kpekpeturang sobennu mi kenudeac dederacyoac yearu faigec kenec.
44019032	Nga kpekpeturang ihai ngicngac yeneng yoacorong homac anggec yoac sufudarec. Sufudaru goatoango “Hania damocac yei hama nandimbe?” ifi dema obohogec.
